story:
Love Bikes is a small bicycle build and repair shop in Pittsburgh, PA. In April of 2012 I celebrated one full year in business (we made it through winter!!) This year's bicycle season has been great and the people in the neighborhood have been super supportive and excited about having a repair shop close by where previously there were none. And for that I am entirely grateful.

Now I'd like to start something new and different and fun. With your help I'd like to begin producing hand-built bamboo bicycle frames and complete bikes. I'd like people to be able to walk into the shop and see and touch a bamboo bike - take one out for a ride and see just how comfortable, strong, and reliable they are. In the summer of 2011 I learned how to build bamboo bike frames at a small shop in Brooklyn not unlike my own. While there I not only learned about the process and the tools and materials but also about the advantages of riding a bamboo bike and the positive effect producing them can have on a neighborhood.

Bamboo bicycles are essentially, functional Art. Not only are they beautiful, they represent ingenuity and can inspire creativity. They promote environmental and cultural awerness. They give their riders and the poeple that build them a real sense of pride that what they're riding and what they're making is unique and ecological. And best of all, bamboo really makes a great bike. It's light, it's stronger than steel, it's comfortable, and it's budget-friendly.

Eventually I'd like all the bamboo used in our bicycles to be grown and harvested right here in Pittsburgh. I'd like to offer free seminars a few times a year to people that want to learn about bamboo bikes and how they're made.  I'd even like to offer one on one studio time for those who'd like to build their own bike right here in the shop. All this starts here by raising the money for the tools, jigs, and materials to start producing our first line of bikes. Our goal amount will be just enough to get us going. Any money beyond that will be used  to buy more material and will get us started off with that much more of a bang!

There are 4 Love Bikes tshirts available at the $100 donation level that also includes a 25% off of labor coupon at the shop. After the shirts run out the $100 dollar level perk will be a Love Bikes sticker, pin and 30% off of labor at the shop.

The $50 level of donation includes a Love Bikes sticker and 10% off of labor at the shop.

The $25 level of donation includes a Love Bikes sticker and pin.

Your generous donation will not only help a small business but will also benefit the environment and people of the developing community in which we're based.

Thank you!

story:
We need your support to keep ENCHAIMENT affordable for ALL! 

Our idea

The idea originated in the restaurant industry of Mr Ravinder Issar's Kohinoor restaurant in Esslingen, Germany.

There is hardly an Indian restaurant that does not serve Indian tea and the guests love it.

Who does not love the smell of hot, freshly brewed Indian Chai?

Behind the scenes however, the restaurateurs deal with several problems. Before the restaurant opens, restaurateurs prepare about 3 liters of tea and store it in a thermos flask, so guests get their tea served as soon as possible.

It is nearly impossible to offer fresh Indian tea to guests during operating hours, because of the stress in the kitchen the hot milk might overflow should just a second of distraction occur. And if the milk does overflow a cook might spend a lot of time cleaning up a big mess.

Our new innovation called "ENCHAIMENT" solves this problem and it enables the host to offer his guests freshly made tea without reluctance.

Economically ENCHAIMENT will offer a vast advantage for restaurateurs, as they will save about 1 Euro a day of extra tea they would otherwise through away with the thermos method. 

Save your money and the extra work by being part of our new innovation.

Why you should invest:

Factor of MONEY: Avoid the wastage of overflowing milk and superfluous cooked tea. Instead invest it in ENCHAIMENT to profit from it in the longterm.

Factor of TIME: You will need LESS time to prepare – and will get MORE time for enjoying the simplicity of ENCHAIMENT.

Factor of CLEANLINESS: Instead of spending your time cleaning, spend it enjoying life.

Factor of SECURITY: You will be guaranteed a good investment - ENCHAIMENT has been registered in the German and International Patent Office (consisting of 144 countries).  ENCHAIMENT has been supported by the Chamber of Commerce Stuttgart, the University of Applied Sciences in Esslingen and SFA GmbH, a development company in Aichstetten.

Factor of COOLNESS: ENCHAIMENT will be the new MUST-HAVE.

Factor of SIMPLICITY: It just takes a touch of a button – innovating simplicity

With the money you invest, we will be able to produce ENCHAIMENT and will be able to introduce it to the world market.

The inventors

Mr Ravinder Issar is a restaurateur and hotelier in Esslingen, Germany. He has come up with the idea of ENCHAIMENT to fill in a long-term niche in a restaurateurs' market.

Mr Günther Fickler is owner of a development company in Aichstetten, Germany, and provided the technological knowledge to the idea and made it become reality.

Both are successful and have owned their businesses since 1994.

Together they built the company INGECO GmbH for production and sales of ENCHAIMENT.

Our technology has been registered in the German and international patent office, which include 144 countries.

Perks

With investing in our perks you will be one step closer to experiencing ENCHAIMENT for yourself.

Tell your friends and family to help us close this market niche with the investment in ECHAIMENT and bring it to your doorstep.

For further information visit our website on www.ingeco-gmbh.com.

story:
What and Why..

My project is intended to save lives and millions of dollars in property damage that are caused by residential gas and propane explosions. 

For me, this project is a personal goal of thirty years.  On a cool September morning in 1982, our house exploded due to a propane leak, killing both of my parents.  Thirty years later, I now have a chance to prevent this tragedy from occuring to others.  I want to save lives, and I can do so with your help.  I am a disabled engineer who has designed a safety valve system which could prevent tragedies like the one that killed my parents.  In addition to having the technical skill, I believe that due to my history, I may be able to serve as a type of rallying point, the type required to change an entire industry.

With your help, I now have the ability to make a difference for others.  Recent changes in manufacturing and pricing have made key elements in making a safety valve which could prevent these tragedies a reasonable and attainable goal.

Over the past year I have experimented with various versions of a sensor-controlled safety valve, and achieved success with a prototype costing under $100 at "model" scale, as demonstrated in the video for the project.  Though functional, I have built this prototype using parts not designed for the purposes I am using them for, factory surplus parts purchased from ebay, and uncalibrated sensors.  The next step is to obtain the proper tools and parts, and build a proper, presentable prototype.

My goal is to scale this project up to incorporate proper equipment, and then to bring the valve system to a major manufacturer.  Due to the immense number of certifications required, it simply is impossible for a small company or individual to produce the actual valve.  Ideally, I would like to pass the design on to a Trane or Honeywell or the like, companies that can actually implement these safety features as standard gas equipment in the future.

This is not about money.  It's about knowing that I can help prevent others from the horrible events I have lived.  I can do it, with your help.

The challenges are twofold.  I became disabled by something called Crohns Disease and other medical issues a number of years back.  My work "schedule" is sporadic and not at all amenable to most companies.  I may start work at three in the morning and continue for sixteen hours.. or I may be sick on any given day, at any time.  This inability to conform to any type of schedule due to my illness is a constant challenge.  A key portion of the funding is to be channeled into converting a basement corner into a reasonable technical workspace so that I can continue to work at the pace I am able to manage given my condition.

To bring this project to it's proper end- mass production and establishing this type of safety system as a standard for utilities- will take more than a few thousand dollars.  It will take the help and cooperation of at least one major corporation capable of handling the intricacies, and it will also require wide public support.  As potential supporters review this, please also consider if there may be support that can be given that isn't monetary.  I will need the assistance of a large manufacturer and utility companies, ideally also the legal and political assistance that will be required to handle regulatory hurdles.

The technology is now within reach.  I can make a difference.  It may just be what I am on this planet to do. 

I have the technical skills and the time.  What I need now is the finances to assemble a proper full scale prototype, and also the assistance and cooperation of people in the industry.  It is my hope that public support of this safety device will be the catalyst needed to engage the required resources to mass produce the final product.  If you can't contribute, tell people you know about it.  Tell them to tell their friends.  Maybe, if we can get enough people to ask "Why isn't in my home already?", I can make it happen for all of us. 

Thank you for your time and interest in my project.  Please help me make a difference.  The home, the life saved could be your own.  Allow me to turn the deaths of my parents into something meaningful.  Let's make it so that nobody else has to know the horror that still haunts me three decades later.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Paul Bishop

paul.bishop1@comcast.net

story:
The Basics

We love rugs, and we're not afraid to say it.

Back in 2010, we picked up this crazy hobby of turning scrap from a well-known Pacific Northwest woolen mill into thick, fuzzy rugs. Our feet loved them. Our pets loved them. We started making them as gifts for family & friends. We donated beds and toys to shelters at the holidays. We started an Etsy shop and looked for local craft fairs. We offered rugs up for school auctions and animal charity fundraisers.

Three years later, we've got a steady business, some fantastic and enthusiastic supporters, two wholesale clients, and the drive to keep expanding.

 

What We Need From You...

And What You Get From Us!

We have our eyes on some big shows in 2013 and 2014, like:

  • the Portland Pet Expo (October 2013) and the Seattle Pet Expo (April 2014)
  • the Portland Mini-Maker Faire and the New York World Maker Faire (both September 2013)
  • the Seattle Gift Show (August 2013) and the Portland Gift & Accessories Show (March 2014)
  • the NW Pet and Companion Animal Expo (April 2014 - our 2nd year)
  • the Oregon Humane Society Doggie Dash (May 2014 - our 3rd year)
  • and other events in the Portland, OR area

There are plenty of rugs just waiting for good homes... and mountains of materials for making even more fuzzy, loveable, huggable RugEmpire rugs. It's the entry fees and travel costs for these shows that makes them just a little bit (or in some cases, a LOT) out of our reach.

So that's what we're asking for: help with the entry fees. No, the $3100 we're asking for doesn't cover them entirely. But it covers a big chunk of them, plus some extra for marketing (advertising and promo items).

What's in it for you? Besides, of course, our everlasting gratitude?

All the rug-related memoribilia you could ever dream of. Bumper stickers, personalized pendants, and yes... RUGS. Want to learn how to make rugs the way we do? That's on offer, too.

Other Ways You Can Help Us Grow

Your encouragement and love means a lot to us! This really isn't just about the money. It's about our tribe believing in us, and in RugEmpire. It's about the energy and excitement you share with us.

 

  1. Visit us at craft shows and expos. Lots of the shows we choose have free admission, so you can come and browse. It's awfully nice to see a friendly, familiar face.
  2. Help spread the word about RugEmpire. Share our pics/links on the social networking site of your choice. We have a Facebook page, a website, and an Etsy shop any time you feel inclined to share.
  3. Show off YOUR RugLove! If you have a RugEmpire rug, let us see some pics of you and your family enjoying the ruglove! Our Facebook page has a photo album for pictures of pets and their rugs.
  4. Gimme that gogo factor -- share our indiegogo fundraiser on the social networking site of your choice. The bigger social reach we have, the better chance we have of being featured by indiegogo itself. More exposure = more gooder for our fundraiser.
  5. Host a rug-a-thon or a toymaking session. It's always fun to take the crafty goodness on the road! You don't have to work, just keep us company.
  6. Give the gift of display items: old folding tables, TV trays, storage tubs, tablecloths, and other stuff we could use for display at craft fairs. If you don't need them, that is. Our products are recycled, and most of our display is recycled, too (only the canopy is new).
  7. Give the gift of supplies. Our rugs are made of scrap materials from a Pacific Northwest woolen mill... we'd be happy to have you take us scrap shopping.
  8. Give the gift of rugs. Shop via Etsy, catch up with us at a craft fair, or if you're in the Portland, OR area you can have a private rug showing.

 

The Potential Impact of All This

RugEmpire has been slowly and consistiently growing over the last three years. We sold one lonely rug in 2010... so okay, that wasn't a hard goal to beat. Since then, we've learned a lot about the value of our product and our time, and about finding the right audience. Our little Etsy shop is chugging along. We've got three wholesale clients (two on the West Coast and one on the East Coast). Each year, we take and fill more custom rug orders.

It's time to take this fuzzy little business to the next level, and that means more exposure. We're ready for bigger shows, more wholesale clients, partnerships with vet offices and rescues... this is the seed money that will get us growing.

What's the eventual goal? There's that Holy Grail of "quit your day jobs" but let's be honest: that's a very long way off. But these rugs are something we love doing and strongly believe are a quality, valuable product.

The bottom line is: we want to share the RugLove. Doing any one of the above shows -- let alone multiple shows -- will help us do just that.

story:
Now you can order these amazing cups on our website now! Please click the above picture or here: https://www.thinkanddoo.com/

 

 

  ​

 

#What goes through your mind when you stare into an empty coffee cup?

 

#Or are you so busy that you can't recall the last time you paused for a moment after a cup of coffee?

This is a story of transforming dreams into reality.

Tenmoku, also known as Jian Ware, is a legendary, precious type of porcelain that produces unique designs that are both mystical and unpredictable. It’s impossible to produce two identical Tenmoku porcelains. The name of Tenmoku comes from the word "Tenmo (天目)". It means the eyes of the sky in Chinese and Japanese.

Ever since my younger years, I have been fascinated by the nebula-like patterns produced by Tenmoku. This simple fascination with Tenmoku transformed into awe-inspiring respect upon learning that there are only 3 intact Yohen Tenmoku porcelains left from the Song Dynasty 800 years ago. Despite current potters possessing much more advanced techniques and devices for making pottery, they still can’t replicate the workmanship of the original Yohen Tenmokus!

 

I was born in the Fujian Province of China. In China, tea drinking culture began thousands of years ago as far back as history has been recorded and it was in Fujian, that Tenmoku teacups were invented about a thousand years ago during the Song Dynasty.

Other than just being a cultural symbol, many elderly people from China and Japan appreciate Tenmoku for its potential ability to soften water and enhance flavour thanks to the special clay and glaze used to produce Tenmoku. One time when I was getting my morning cup of coffee, I serendipitously used a Tenmoku teacup for my coffee instead of my normal coffee cups. The feeling I got when drinking my coffee out of the Tenmoku was unlike anything else I had experienced with common coffee cups.

 

Drinking my morning coffee out of the Tenmoku that day made me realize that there are no authentic Tenmoku coffee cups on the market currently and that the delicate and exquisite designs of Tenmoku perfectly match the elegant and fine flavours of coffee.

Then the epiphany, being an avid Kickstarter backer myself with having backed over 100 projects, I knew it was now time for me to embark on my first Kickstarter journey.

I hope that you can now join me in this wonderful porcelain adventure.




 


 

 

The unique geographical features of an area greatly influence the soil properties in that area. Fujian is situated in a mountainous territory near the ocean. The complexity of Fujian’s environment gave birth to unparalleled clay soils that create one-of-a-kind porcelain products. Tenmoku is made of naturally iron-rich clay that is hard to find anywhere else in the world besides Fujian. 

 

The chemical analysis shows that the clay and glaze of authentic Tenmokus can contain upwards of around 15% Fe2O3! This enables Tenmoku to attract magnets! I could hardly believe it when I first heard this stunning fact. I don’t think any ceramics found in the everyday home could do that!

 

Fujian’s incredible iron-rich soils are also the key to the unpredictable nebular patterns found on Tenmoku. Many other kilns located in different regions of China attempted to imitate Fujian Tenmoku and failed because their soils did not possess nearly enough iron.

 

 

In Chinese and Japanese tea culture, the water, the teapot, the teacup, and even the heating method used all affect the tea’s flavour. Tenmoku was originally designed with specific materials and shapes to bring out the best flavours of the tea and to present bubbles just right in tea ceremonies for matcha.

 

Although some might dismiss me as an idealist, I do taste subtle differences in tea and coffee when I drink them out of a Tenmoku rather than just an ordinary cup. The flavour of the drink appears to be amplified and longer-lasting and the liquid seem to flow more smoothly out of the Tenmoku.

The pottery master who helped us make some Tenmoku samples provided some relatively scientific explanations.

 

Tenmoku formed a nanoporous surface on the glaze. The iron-rich glaze and clay may continuously release a small number of iron ions when in use.  Both of these may help absorb the residual chlorine and heavy metal in water. Additionally, the thick body of Tenmoku insulates heat better than other porcelain and ceramic cups.

Iron is an essential element for the human body, however, an increasing number of studies have shown that coffee and other caffeinated drinks can reduce iron absorption. Although there is no research on the exact amount of iron that is possibly leached out into coffee, cast iron cookware has been prescribed to patients combating anaemia. So at the very least, Tenmoku can help alleviate some of the guilt you feel when you overdose on coffee.

 

A Tenmoku’s colour and patterns may even change slightly over many years of use and every time you finish a cup of coffee or tea, and you stare into the empty cup, you may get a relaxing moment of bliss as you ponder the mysterious pattern contained within the Tenmoku.




 

 

Lightning never strikes in the same place twice, and no potter can produce an identical Tenmoku.

Due to the art of happenstance, and akin to the concept of “Ichi-go Ichi-e” (once in a lifetime), Tenmoku is known for its unpredictable variability in its sophisticated factors of production including its clay, glaze, firing temperature, oxidizing atmosphere, and even its precise location inside the kiln.

Every Tenmoku is its own unique creation.

 

As the key to those nebular patterns, the iron-rich clay and glaze will form unpredictable iron crystals on the surface during the heating and cooling process.

In the hopes of producing many of the different possible nebular patterns for Tenmo, we’ve done a further study with Tenmoku potters on the subtle reactions in the production process.

Under increasingly higher firing temperatures, more oxygen dissolves and penetrates deeper into the surface, thus ferric oxide can be crystallized in a deeper and broader region in the ceramic. This then forms streak-like patterns on the surface when cooled.

 

While under lower firing temperatures, the dissolved oxygen concentrates at a shallower level in the ceramic and creates a more focused concentration below the surface. In these conditions, the surface of the ceramic will produce oval or round spots instead of streaks.

 

Tenmoku is fired in a very narrow temperature region (1,300℃ - 1,400℃) to create an ideal oxidizing atmosphere for producing iron oxide crystallites, which is different from most ceramics and potteries.

 

Due to the chemical characteristics of iron, the various temperatures between 1,300℃ - 1,400℃ and the various cooling speeds cause Tenmoku to exhibit different colours in the finished product including dark plum, grey, silver, blue, yellow, and even multi-coloured.

 

If the firing process is carried out either too slowly or too quickly, then an undesirable deformation and blistering effect will result in the Tenmoku. Therefore, it is extremely difficult to produce a qualified Tenmoku with a beautiful appearance. Additionally, purely on the large randomness of Tenmoku creation, an unprecedented Tenmoku may appear accidentally in a potter’s kiln.


 

Adjusting the glaze formula and testing more and more combinations of firing techniques can lead us to the mystical patterns imbued by Tenmoku production. One of the first questions I had, when I came up with the Tenmoku coffee cup idea, was what kind of handle should be used to complement the beautiful nebulas inside the cup.

 

For getting a grip on this question, pun intended, I turned to my friend Lee for help. Lee graduated from one of the most famous academies of art & design in China and is also fascinated by the idea of Tenmoku coffee cups. He helped me out immensely by providing me with a bunch of drafts and 3D models of the cups.

 

Despite greatly appreciate all the hard work he puts into each handle design, I rejected design after design not feeling that any of them matched Tenmoku. I wanted a handle design that coincided with Tenmoku’s destiny! I recited, again and again, everything I knew about Tenmoku to Lee, the history, the colours, and the legends hoping that this would help him to produce my dream design. Lee never believed that Tenmoku could attract magnets until he finally saw it for himself, and then one day he brought me this:

 

With a concept in mind, I set out to visit master Sun Wenzha to get help in bringing our concept to life. He helped me realize why most ceramic cups all use the same boring handle. Fragile clay has a hard time resisting the influence of gravity. The conventional cup handle is very stable and can keep the breakage level at a relatively low rate. Master Sun Wenzha was extremely patient and open-minded, and he understood the image we had in my minds for the handle. We worked together for over 30 hours to create the optimal shape for the cup handle.

 




 




 

 

Honestly speaking, after working with many potters and kiln owners, I don’t think these Tenmoku cups will ever be some kind of standard product selling on e-commerce sites after this Kickstarter. The cups are more likely to be an unduplicated artwork rather than a product. Thanks to my vast experiences during the last few months, I have become friends with many potters and even more kiln owners. One of the kiln owners accompanied us on every step of the Tenmoku making process even though he had no obligation to. He missed two very important expos because of his ardent desire to help us with Tenmoku and he also invested a lot more money into formula testing than I ever paid him. It appears that both of us are just as obsessed with creating the perfect Tenmoku coffee cup with beautiful nebula-like patterns.

We set the base price as USD 99 and 134 because it is nigh impossible to acquire an authentic Tenmoku cup of this size for less than USD 100. The USD 134 Tenmo Nebula is even more special in that it’s a formula that we adjusted and tested ourselves. There is nothing else like it on the market and it is extremely similar to the Yohen Tenmoku from the Song Dynasty now preserved in the Fujita Museum. We’re thrilled to continue our journey and find the colours and patterns that will appear next!

To thank all the backers who join us in this great Tenmoku adventure, we set a price that barely covers the cost of production for the first 300 backers. We did this to simply share with as many people as possible the beauty and joy of Tenmoku. And yeah, I’m also well aware that USD 39 and 49 are already hefty prices for coffee cups.




 

 

We’ve worked with many potters to complete a few worthy Tenmo cups, but we still haven’t tested all the candidate formulas for the glaze. We may also continue to adjust the size and shape of the handles. The potential to enhance appearance is still large and we want to produce something extraordinary and beautiful. To continue on our journey, we need to place a lot more orders to the kiln.

The good news is that the kiln we’re working with is one of the most experienced kilns in Fujian employing many skilful and highly talented potters. Because every process for manufacturing Tenmoku requires the utmost care and delicate control, a professional kiln is essential to ensuring high-quality products.

 

Let alone the financial side of things, I also would like to share my work with more and more people from all around the world. Tenmoku should not merely be an ancient art representing traditional Chinese and Japanese ways of living but should be an intricate art piece made from endless coincidence that brings a sense of calm and power to coffee and tea drinkers alike. It deserves to be known by more people.

Now you can order these amazing cups on our website now! Please click the above picture or here: https://www.thinkanddoo.com/    ​ #What goes through your mind when you stare into an empty coffee cup?

 
#Or are you so busy that you can't recall the last time you paused for a moment after a cup of coffee?
This is a story of transforming dreams into reality.
Tenmoku, also known as Jian Ware, is a legendary, precious type of porcelain that produces unique designs that are both mystical and unpredictable. It’s impossible to produce two identical Tenmoku porcelains. The name of Tenmoku comes from the word "Tenmo (天目)". It means the eyes of the sky in Chinese and Japanese.
Ever since my younger years, I have been fascinated by the nebula-like patterns produced by Tenmoku. This simple fascination with Tenmoku transformed into awe-inspiring respect upon learning that there are only 3 intact Yohen Tenmoku porcelains left from the Song Dynasty 800 years ago. Despite current potters possessing much more advanced techniques and devices for making pottery, they still can’t replicate the workmanship of the original Yohen Tenmokus!

 
I was born in the Fujian Province of China. In China, tea drinking culture began thousands of years ago as far back as history has been recorded and it was in Fujian, that Tenmoku teacups were invented about a thousand years ago during the Song Dynasty.
Other than just being a cultural symbol, many elderly people from China and Japan appreciate Tenmoku for its potential ability to soften water and enhance flavour thanks to the special clay and glaze used to produce Tenmoku. One time when I was getting my morning cup of coffee, I serendipitously used a Tenmoku teacup for my coffee instead of my normal coffee cups. The feeling I got when drinking my coffee out of the Tenmoku was unlike anything else I had experienced with common coffee cups.

 
Drinking my morning coffee out of the Tenmoku that day made me realize that there are no authentic Tenmoku coffee cups on the market currently and that the delicate and exquisite designs of Tenmoku perfectly match the elegant and fine flavours of coffee.
Then the epiphany, being an avid Kickstarter backer myself with having backed over 100 projects, I knew it was now time for me to embark on my first Kickstarter journey.
I hope that you can now join me in this wonderful porcelain adventure.
 

 
 
The unique geographical features of an area greatly influence the soil properties in that area. Fujian is situated in a mountainous territory near the ocean. The complexity of Fujian’s environment gave birth to unparalleled clay soils that create one-of-a-kind porcelain products. Tenmoku is made of naturally iron-rich clay that is hard to find anywhere else in the world besides Fujian. 

 
The chemical analysis shows that the clay and glaze of authentic Tenmokus can contain upwards of around 15% Fe2O3! This enables Tenmoku to attract magnets! I could hardly believe it when I first heard this stunning fact. I don’t think any ceramics found in the everyday home could do that!

 
Fujian’s incredible iron-rich soils are also the key to the unpredictable nebular patterns found on Tenmoku. Many other kilns located in different regions of China attempted to imitate Fujian Tenmoku and failed because their soils did not possess nearly enough iron.
 
 
In Chinese and Japanese tea culture, the water, the teapot, the teacup, and even the heating method used all affect the tea’s flavour. Tenmoku was originally designed with specific materials and shapes to bring out the best flavours of the tea and to present bubbles just right in tea ceremonies for matcha.

 
Although some might dismiss me as an idealist, I do taste subtle differences in tea and coffee when I drink them out of a Tenmoku rather than just an ordinary cup. The flavour of the drink appears to be amplified and longer-lasting and the liquid seem to flow more smoothly out of the Tenmoku.
The pottery master who helped us make some Tenmoku samples provided some relatively scientific explanations.

 
Tenmoku formed a nanoporous surface on the glaze. The iron-rich glaze and clay may continuously release a small number of iron ions when in use.  Both of these may help absorb the residual chlorine and heavy metal in water. Additionally, the thick body of Tenmoku insulates heat better than other porcelain and ceramic cups.
Iron is an essential element for the human body, however, an increasing number of studies have shown that coffee and other caffeinated drinks can reduce iron absorption. Although there is no research on the exact amount of iron that is possibly leached out into coffee, cast iron cookware has been prescribed to patients combating anaemia. So at the very least, Tenmoku can help alleviate some of the guilt you feel when you overdose on coffee.

story:
Grief Turned into Innovation

Everyone has a dream. Some want to be doctors and some want to be lawyers.
There was a boy who dreamed of becoming a robotics engineer. Taegu Noh, CEO and Founder of PurrSong, was just an average cat lover when he was a student. After finishing his school years, he joined the ROK Navy as an officer. There was a street cat near his base and he felt pity so he brought him, took care of him and raised him for about a year. One day Taegu saw the cat was limping so he took him to the hospital. Sadly, the cat was diagnosed with kidney failure and he died a week later. Taegu was overwhelmed with grief and thought about how to prevent sudden death caused by urinary disease. He decided to make an automatic litter box which can keep track of cats’ urinary health to provide a better quality of life to all cats.

In 2017, Taegu established PurrSong with six other members to put his idea into practice. Talents from diverse backgrounds come together to develop the most innovative automatic litter box. The LavvieBot, the first-generation model, was born. It was decent but not superb as members of PurrSong expected. All of the members worked so hard and improved LavvieBot’s performance and functions. And now, here comes LavvieBot S.

 

 

 

 

What Media Say about LavvieBot S

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What Previous Backers Say about LavvieBot S

 
 

 

 

What LavvieBot S Can Do

 

 

1. Auto clean

If you are too busy to clean up the litter box regularly or are forced to leave your home without cleaning job, the litter box will become dirty and stink.
The litter box filled with excrement is a bad influence on the cat.
LavvieBot S is able to efficiently get rid of the excreta just through a patented rotating rake mechanism. 
When the cat's done its business in LavvieBot S, it automatically starts cleaning after a certain amount of wait time.
The time can be set by users from 15 to 90 minutes and this gives enough time for excrements to get harden so even diarrhea can be perfectly taken care of.
In addition, LavvieBot S used non-sticky material on the bottom of the tray so it always keeps itself hygienically clean.

 

 


LavvieBot's waste drawer is designed large enough (16.1*4.7*6.3") to collect waste for up to 3 weeks. You may cover a plastic bag on the waste drawer when you use it and you can simply throw the plastic bag away for disposal.

 

 

 

 

 

 

2. Auto refill

LavvieBot S automatically refills litter from its 6.5L extra storage after cleaning so it keeps the inside of LavvieBot S in top shape for your cats at all times.

 

 

 

 

 

3. Compatible with ‘PurrSong’ app

LavvieBot S App, ‘PurrSong’ enables you to monitor your cat in real-time and provide you other information needed.

 

1) Able to Check the LavvieBot's status

Through the App ‘PurrSong’, users are able to check the status of LavvieBot.

 

2) Litter Box Usage

The app keeps track of how often and how long your cat uses LavvieBot S so you can always stay on top of your cat’s health. LavvieBot S also recognize each cat in a multi-cat household if their weights differ by more than 1.5 lb.

If the weights are similar, cats can be distinguished through the ID tag that will be selling in the near future.
 

 

3) Customized Notification

The notification alarms could be set to four different types, including Default, Cute, and Custom mode. Each notification from your cat will brighten up your day.

 

 

 

4) Be Smart All the Time

LavvieBot's Firmware update is available through your mobile device. Wirelessly.
This wireless update which can be done by touching it for your mobile app will make your LavvieBot S even smarter.

 

 

 

See How Cat Uses LavvieBot S for 21 Days

LavvieBot S keeps itself clean for up to 21 days per cat.

 

 

 

 

Check Our Highlights

1) Prevent Cat Litter Tracking

 

 

The footrest is properly placed inside of LavvieBot S to prevent cat litter tracking.

 

2) Prevent Odor

 

LavvieBot S effectively neutralizes odor through its activated coconut carbon deodorizer. The deodorizer absorbs up to 93.3% of ammonia and also functions as a dehumidifier. By replacing it once or twice every year, LavvieBot S will prevent most of the odors and keep your place pleasant.

 

3) Low-Noise

LavvieBot S’s noise level is only 26.5dB (Decibels), which is less than the noise level of an average residential bedroom, so the noise wouldn't bother your cat.   

 

4) Easy to Wash

After opening the door on the side, you can easily detach the litter tray by pressing the "Empty" button. You may clean the tray and seperator with water if you want to keep it cleaner.

 

 

 

What Makes LavvieBot S Design Different?

1) 20% Less Space

Compared to other litter boxes on the market, LavvieBot S takes up more than 20% less space. Furthermore, it is designed considering the optimal size and shape that can go very well with the house.

W19.5" X D22.9" X H 27.7"

 

2) Comfy Enough for Privacy

Due to its inner dimensions (12.5*17*14.2”), LavvieBot S can be fitted comfortably for most of the cats. Besides, the tray contains up to 6L of the litter, which is 50% more than other automatic litter boxes.

 

 

"Footage of Large 16.5lb Cat Using LavvieBot"

 

3) Easy Control

The LED display enables the users to easily see the internal and operation states of Lavviebot S. Plus, the operation buttons associated with the indicator lights are placed directly on the lower part so that the users can recognize the functions of the buttons.

 

4) Safety – 3 Types of Sensors

Safety, above all, is always the first consideration. LavvieBot S's indented buttons are placed on the front to prevent cats from pressing them accidentally.

If the cat tries to enter when LavvieBot S is on auto-clean mode, the infrared sensor in the front immediately detects its entry and switches the separator to standby.

This allows the cats to be perfectly safe and use LavvieBot S anytime they want to.

 

 

What PurrSong will provide you
in the future

1) One-Touch Order System

When the litter level is getting low, the app notifies and immediately provides a way of purchasing the litter (One-touch order system may not be possible in certain areas depending on the circumstances/country)

 

2) Connecting with Other ‘PurrSong’ Devices

We will have various PurrSong pet appliances in our lineup such as ID tag, auto water fountain, auto feeder and etc. in the future. We will try to gather as many data as possible so we can help to detect any disease or health problems for our pet in advance.

 

 

 

Timeline

 

Specifications

 

 

 

Check the Exhibitions That

LavvieBot S Got Rave Reviews

 

 

 

 

Our Promise to Our Backers

We will keep you posted for any updates or how things are going at least once a month. Every Pledge comes with an 18-months warranty, life-time access to PurrSong’s friendly 24/7 email support and backer-only groups.

 

 

Warranty

LavvieBot S General Warranty Terms and Conditions

 PurrSong Inc. is committed to providing prompt, courteous and responsible service to all of our backers. We provide an 18month limited warranty on all products that we sell. Online service repairs are also provided on all products that were purchased and installed by PurrSong Inc. for 18 months from, (i) completion date of delivery or (ii) the starting date of beneficial use, whichever occurs first.

1.    Software or Firmware – Provide Smart Care (Remote assistance sessions).

2.    Hardware – Make some preliminary videos of hardware issues and send them.  

3.    Parts – Ship replacement parts with the install video.

4.    Product Defect – May return defective product for warranty exchange.   


Limitation on Damages

PurrSong Inc. shall not be liable for any incidental or consequential damages for breach of any express or implied warranty on this product.
Under the conditions below, the product will be replaced or repaired at a cost even if it is still under warranty period.
-   The warranty does not cover when the product is damaged from natural disaster
-   The warranty does not cover defects or malfunction caused by misuse, abuse of device or failure to follow operating instructions. Also, the warranty will not apply to damage caused by unauthorized dismantlement, alteration, modification or repair of the product by unauthorized person.

 

 

Shipping Details

Shipping Charge
The LavvieBot S will ship to backers to US and Canada only. For the backers in the US and Canada, the shipping cost will be $54 USD(US)/ $120 USD(Canada).
Because of the size and weight of the LavvieBot S in addition to the fact that the origin of shipment is California, we hope that the backers in Canada understand the added delivery fee. 

* No additional custom charges apply in the U.S & Canada.

Plus, the operation buttons associated with the indicator lights are placed directly on the lower part so that the users can recognize the functions of the buttons. 4) Safety – 3 Types of SensorsSafety, above all, is always the first consideration. LavvieBot S's indented buttons are placed on the front to prevent cats from pressing them accidentally.If the cat tries to enter when LavvieBot S is on auto-clean mode, the infrared sensor in the front immediately detects its entry and switches the separator to standby.This allows the cats to be perfectly safe and use LavvieBot S anytime they want to.  What PurrSong will provide youin the future1) One-Touch Order SystemWhen the litter level is getting low, the app notifies and immediately provides a way of purchasing the litter (One-touch order system may not be possible in certain areas depending on the circumstances/country) 2) Connecting with Other ‘PurrSong’ DevicesWe will have various PurrSong pet appliances in our lineup such as ID tag, auto water fountain, auto feeder and etc. in the future. We will try to gather as many data as possible so we can help to detect any disease or health problems for our pet in advance.   Timeline 

Specifications   Check the Exhibitions ThatLavvieBot S Got Rave Reviews 

   Our Promise to Our BackersWe will keep you posted for any updates or how things are going at least once a month. Every Pledge comes with an 18-months warranty, life-time access to PurrSong’s friendly 24/7 email support and backer-only groups.  WarrantyLavvieBot S General Warranty Terms and Conditions PurrSong Inc. is committed to providing prompt, courteous and responsible service to all of our backers. We provide an 18month limited warranty on all products that we sell. Online service repairs are also provided on all products that were purchased and installed by PurrSong Inc. for 18 months from, (i) completion date of delivery or (ii) the starting date of beneficial use, whichever occurs first.1.    Software or Firmware – Provide Smart Care (Remote assistance sessions).2.    Hardware – Make some preliminary videos of hardware issues and send them.  3.    Parts – Ship replacement parts with the install video.4.    Product Defect – May return defective product for warranty exchange.   Limitation on DamagesPurrSong Inc. shall not be liable for any incidental or consequential damages for breach of any express or implied warranty on this product.Under the conditions below, the product will be replaced or repaired at a cost even if it is still under warranty period.-   The warranty does not cover when the product is damaged from natural disaster-   The warranty does not cover defects or malfunction caused by misuse, abuse of device or failure to follow operating instructions. Also, the warranty will not apply to damage caused by unauthorized dismantlement, alteration, modification or repair of the product by unauthorized person.  Shipping DetailsShipping ChargeThe LavvieBot S will ship to backers to US and Canada only. For the backers in the US and Canada, the shipping cost will be $54 USD(US)/ $120 USD(Canada).Because of the size and weight of the LavvieBot S in addition to the fact that the origin of shipment is California, we hope that the backers in Canada understand the added delivery fee. * No additional custom charges apply in the U.S & Canada.

story:
Lucy is your home's superhero.

She's an AI-powered home robot that keeps learning her environment and protects the family while she cleans. Lucy comes with a 1080P HDR color camera and a depth sensor that ensures night vision, providing unique day and night surveillance functionality on a mobile platform. 

Lucy is the first smart home robot to recognize and divide rooms automatically. With an advanced 6-core ARM SoC, Lucy pushes the limit of accurate and efficient inference and brings edge AI to reality. For example, when she sees a bed in a room, she would recognize it as a bed. Together with object recognition and advanced scene understanding capability, she would label the room as a bedroom. 

While most home robots cannot recognize obstacles less than 4” tall, Lucy sees it all, down to 1”. Slippers, lost socks, moving pets, and even unexpected pet accidents never come into contact with her. Whatever you need, she's got you covered!

 

A Bit About Lucy

You might wonder if we named Lucy after the Beatles track, "Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds," or the American television sitcom, “I Love Lucy.” Truth is, the birth of Lucy was inspired by the oldest hominin skeleton ever discovered, who illuminates the human evolution timeline. Her discovery altered our understanding of human evolution, just as Trifo Lucy’s birth rewrites our company history. With the introduction of Lucy, we officially evolved from a smart robot vacuum maker into an AI home robot company.

As a young yet ambitious startup, our vision is to build a family of home robots that enhance people’s lives and let them focus on what’s important. To bring Lucy to life, our team has spent years developing highly advanced algorithms, deep learning models, and AI-based robotic intelligence. That’s why she’s able to keep learning the environment by herself, interact with the family members when needed, and keep an eye out for the possible intruders. 

 

There’s nothing that can escape Lucy's sight. Her 1080p HD camera and infrared camera can stream live video and audio during the day or night!

Lucy is sensitive to any slight movements while you’re away from home. If something’s amiss, you’ll be the first to know where and when it happened. 

 

Lucy's Night Vision: 

 

 

Lucy is always aware of her surroundings. While most home robots cannot recognize obstacles less than 4” tall, Lucy can scan, detect, and avoid obstacles under 1", such as slippers and scattered socks using an advanced real-time object detection with a combination of proprietary 3D geometry and 3D semantics algorithms.

 

And Yes, She Avoids Pet Poop!

Watch a demo

 

Lucy is built to serve and protect. At every opportunity, she takes the time to learn more about our home. Utilizing the onboard camera imagery and my active depth sensor, Lucy develops detailed indoor maps, devises efficient cleaning and patrol routes, and automatically divides and names your rooms, so you don’t have to. 

 

Lucy Not Only Vacuums, But Mops!

Lucy not only vacuums and monitors, but also mops. Lucy comes with a mopping pad and a water tank (86ml) that can be attached to the bottom of the robot. If you have vinyl, tile, or hardwood floor at home—especially in bathrooms and the kitchen—Lucy can add an extra level of clean to your routine!

 

The whole family can interact with Lucy in several ways. Because it's Alexa-enabled, Lucy reacts when hearing simple voice commands.

Just ask, “Alexa, turn on Lucy” and she will get to work. When you're away from home, you can see, speak, and listen to other family members, pets, or even intruders when connected through the Trifo Home App. 

 

Crumbs, pet hair, and dust don’t stand a chance to the optimized brushes and 3,000 Pa of suction of Lucy. She attacks deep into corners with her six-claw side brush—nothing can escape. The larger dustbin and washable primary filter make it easier for Lucy to stay sharp and ready for any mess.

 

The perfect sidekick for Lucy is here! Program her remotely to set no-go lines, pre-define patrolling routes, and more. You can even manually drive Lucy from your phone or tablet. The free app is available for download on the Apple App Store and Google Play.

To see is to believe! Let's see how Lucy works with the app after she finishes mapping your home and creates a floor map.

  • Set "No-Go" Zones: Don't want Lucy to go in certain rooms or areas? Just tell her where to avoid by selecting No-Go zones on your map.
  • Define Patrol Routes: Pin specific locations on the map, and Lucy will follow the routes accordingly.
  • Clean Designated Areas: Easily direct Lucy where to go by framing certain rooms or areas on the map.

 

 

  • One-Step Wi-Fi Connection

We've heard stories about how Wi-Fi configuration scares people away when they first set up their home robot. To make the setup fast and smooth, we simplified the Wi-Fi configuration process, allowing users to connect Lucy to their home Wi-Fi by scanning the QR code. Want to know how to get Lucy connected within 30 seconds? Watch a demo:

 

Shipping

  • United States (Lower 48) - Free
  • China - Free
  • Canada, Alaska, Hawaii - $20
  • UK / EU / Australia - $80
  • Japan / Korea - $50
  • Rest of Asia - $30
  • Middle East & Africa - $40

 

Shipping will be charged AFTER the campaign. Anyone from a country NOT listed will need to contact us with a shipping address to get an accurate quote.

*Due to COVID-19, some carriers have temporarily changed their policies. We are working on lowering the shipping costs, and will keep you updated!

**International backers - import duties, taxes & charges are not included in the shipping cost. These charges are the backer's responsibility and will be collected by the carrier upon delivery. 

 

 

PERKS

 

FAQ

"What's the difference between you and Roomba?"

Answer is, Lucy is more than a robot vacuum.

Lucy is Trifo’s first AI home robot that interacts and learns about the environment entirely by herself. She seems like the average capturer of crumbs, pet hair, and dust, but Lucy has a secret. She has the vision and intelligence more powerful than some of the best home surveillance devices out there. She protects and cleans her home 24/7, ensuring every family member can focus on what’s important.  

*See more FAQs in the FAQ section!

 

Our Final Pick

We chose the current design because it is our vision to perfect people's lives by offer them the optimal balance between family, work, and personal life.

 

"Trifo is a newcomer to the robot vacuum market, but the Lucy is aiming to advance what's possible in object recognition. It features two cameras—one for HD color imaging and one for depth recognition—that are able to discern objects as small as one inch in height. The color camera also live-streams to your phone if you want to peek into your house while you're gone. Additionally, the Lucy can automatically divide rooms without the need for magnetic strips." —Reviewed.com

Prior to the creation of Trifo, Zhang was co-founder and CEO of PerceptIn, a full-stack visual intelligence company aimed at making scalable hardware/software integrated solutions for autonomous robotics systems. Before PerceptIn, Zhang led sparse/dense mapping and pose tracking efforts at Magic Leap. He also drove Magic Leap’s technical evaluation program for outside partner companies. Before Magic Leap, Zhang worked at Microsoft Research where he focused on mapping, localization, navigation, and self-recharge solutions for a prototype consumer robot. He then moved to the Microsoft Bing division, where he built a large-scale developer platform for image data services.

Zhang earned a Ph.D. degree in Robotics from Stony Brook University. He also holds a bachelor’s degree in Automation from Tsinghua University.

We named our company after the mighty clover, trifolium, which works hard to improve people’s well-being. With this in mind, Trifo is dedicated to developing home robots that help families obtain the optimal balance between family, work and personal life.

Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Santa Clara, California, Trifo is a full stack AI home robot company. Focusing on indoor home environments, Trifo creates end-to-end integrated hardware/software systems with sensing, perception and decision-making capabilities. These robots help people live better lives by perceiving physics, geometry and semantics of home environments, communicating with humans in a natural way and continuously learning new skills with advanced AI technologies.

Trifo has earned more than 50 U.S. and Chinese patents and filed for more than 70 additional patents globally in U.S., Europe and China. Trifo’s proprietary algorithms have been published at top robotics conferences such as ICRA and IROS.

 

Our R&D team has spent two years developing and perfecting Lucy. We are so confident in her quality that we back Lucy with a 1-year warranty. If you are seeking warranty service, support, or other information, feel free to reach us at support@trifo.com. We are happy to help!

 

☝ Website: https://trifo.com/lucy
☝ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TrifoRobotics/
☝ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/triforobotics/
☝ Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrifoRobotics
☝ LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/trifo-robotics/

 

Our Promise

Before Lucy, we have abundant experience in developing, manufacturing, and selling other less sophisticated yet similar AI-powered products.

We've built a long-term relationship with vendors and suppliers, such as prototype companies and machine shops. That, coupled with our team's background in product design and engineering, gives us confidence in our timeline.

We promise to deliver within three months of our campaign completion. That’s how much confidence we have in our team, our product, and our manufacturing schedule.

We know how important communication is and we pledge to be open and transparent with you to the best of our abilities.

We commit to resolving issues as rapidly as is feasible given the circumstances and resources available. We need your help to grow the project and fulfill our mission of helping to deliver a better home robot and we are incredibly appreciative and humbled by your support.

story:
The team at feoart and avooq set out to design a kitchen accessory that makes coffee making more convenient and fun.  Our creation, the Abacus Pod Rack, a wall mounted holder that conveniently stores and dispenses Nespresso coffee capsules.  As you may have guessed, the design was inspired by an abacus child's toy which evokes childhood memories of play and fun.  

The Abacus Pod Rack kitchen accessory is manufactured from an aluminium composite material with a strong plastic core and alluring powder coated aluminium exteriors.  Mount the Abacus Pod Rack inside cupboards, under cabinets and on splashbacks (mounts vertically and horizontally).

To install the Abacus simply remove it from its packaging, remove the label and the film from the adhesive strips.  Adhere the Abacus in your desired location by pressing the holder firmly against the mounting surface.  Planning on moving house?  Upgrade your rack to have command strips by adding $7/rack to your conntribution. 

Follow us on

Follow us on

story:
Stormforce has developed an innovative and unique spiral-funnel wind turbine 

ensuring the efficient and continuous production of clean and free energy, 

in any outdoor location, even in low wind.



Our spiral-funnel wind turbine in use for drinking water treatment and/or irrigation

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Totally silent and completely customizable our wind turbine, often described as

 resembling a piece of sculptured art, integrates seamlessly into its 

environment and surroundings.



Our aims, our vision :

Primarily, we want to make clean energy accessible to everyone, everywhere,

everyday. Private residential usage of our wind turbines as well as business and agricultural 

usage will be core components to achieving our aims and goals. However, our vision

 also extends to helping governments serve and manage their national/regional 

energy requirements, especially in underdeveloped regions and countries. 

The supply and installation of our spiral-funnel wind turbines in underdeveloped 

regions and countries can be affordably financed by corporate sponsorship as well 

as government and private funding, to the mutual benefit of everyone. 

How?

Each turbine with a completely customizable surface area of 6.9m² (74.5ft²) offers 

a unique and flexible medium for communication and advertising campaigns,

providing innovative visibility to companies and organisations at a very competitive 

price.

The energy produced, not only is it clean and green, it is FREE. This free energy can

 provide endless benefits to the local communities, supplying energy for :

 -> drinking water treatments (water pumps, well and filtration systems),

 -> agricultural advances (water pumps and irrigation systems),

 -> domestic usage (lighting, cooking, heating/air-      conditioning, water/sanitary systems)

 -> educational programmes (accessing internet and TV/radio, lighting, heating/

     air-conditioning, water/sanitary systems),

 -> medical and health programmes (medical equipment, lighting, heating/

air-conditioning,  water/sanitary systems) 


Following are some typical installation types and usages :


Private use, home energy requirements

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Clubs & Associations

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rural & Mountainous areas

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Limited access, "off-grid" sites

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Retail and SME Business use

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Agricultural usage, all agricultural energy requirements

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Agricultural use, plant and facilities

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hotel & Guesthouse use, all energy requirements

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hotel & and Guesthouse, Privat use, swimming pool, filtration, cleaning...

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Administrative buildings, local Council, Apartment building

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our spiral-funnel wind turbines can be bought/self-financed and used by anyone, anywhere in the world, (initial single unit prices starting from $9,950 USD)

We already have prototypes in operation in Europe (Switzerland, France and Germany). We are continually testing  our  turbines and their new smart technology to ensure continued efficiency and evolution.

Your funding will be used to ensure that this unique and innovative wind turbine technology will become an integral component in the world's clean energy production, benefiting our planet, its future and all our futures.

Your contribution will bring a better quality of life to many people living in the many disadvantaged and energy deprived areas of our planet.


To ensure the successful launch to market of our wind turbine, our goal is to raise an initial $300,000 USD.

We will manage with extreme diligence this primary budget to fund payment to suppliers, to buy machinery and tooling equipment enabling us to launch full scale production.

This is the key first phase of the process of offering the convenience and efficiency of our green and smart energy production technology to customers worldwide.


Our target customer profile is wide and varied.

  Homeowners (all residential and leisure energy requirements),

  Retailers / SME businesses (all business energy requirements),

  Multi-Nationals/ Large-scale industrial companies, (all business and production energy requirements)

  Farmers / Agricultural Co-Operatives (all agricultural energy requirements)

  Governments  / Town & City Councils (all local amenity energy requirements)

Our unique and innovate spiral-funnel wind turbines can cater for every imaginable and conceivable energy requirement, anywhere in the world, even in low wind. Our turbines are designed to help replace fossil and nuclear energy sources. You, we, all of us can personally make a positive difference to our environment, our planet and our futures. We believe our technology will help us all achieve this common goal.


Our story so far ...

Stormforce was established in 2010 in Switzerland, to achieve one simple goal : to develop a viable alternative to noisy, low efficient and esthetically questionable traditional wind turbines.

With the combined efforts of Martin Vetter and David Cassia, the vision was to design and produce a silent wind turbine with both "style and substance" to ensure that it would be :

-> quick and easy to install anywhere, with little to no maintenance required

("Set & Forget"),

 -> totally functional and efficient, even in low wind and regardless of wind direction,

 -> stylish, sleek and esthetically  integrating into its environment and surroundings,

 -> cost efficient.

Our vision, our research and our efforts have been rewarded with the production of our customizable range of  spiral-funnel wind turbines, ZEPHIR 6000DC.


Now is the time for more and more of us to consider "pulling the plug" / "cutting the cord" from the traditional power companies.

Our new technology will not only save you money every month, it will help save our environment, our planet and our future. Our technology can be easily installed and used anywhere on the planet.


Use of funds :

Every single donation, large and small, will assist greatly towards a better future with less pollution and less energy poverty in the world.


As well as kindly donating to our launch fund, there are many other ways to help us in our vision and project.

Even if you do not wish to purchase a wind turbine for your own use, you can spread the message of our vision and goal : Clean energy for everyone, everywhere, everyday.

Tell your family, your friends, your work colleagues, your clubs and associations about Stormforce and what  we hope to achieve.

With your help we can advance further in completing our project, (already over four years in the making!).



Thank you for your support. Your help ensures that Stormforce's vision of spiral-funnel wind turbines providing free, clean energy to the mutual benefit of everyone, our planet and our futures.  

On our website we would like to add your name/company name with your URL web link (with your consent and approval, of course) promoting you among the many people that will make this exciting and pioneering project possible.


The winds of change are upon us : a better alternative for our energy requirements, our planet and our future.

Clean energy is our future. Let's create it alternatively!
story_txt:
Stormforce has developed an innovative and unique spiral-funnel wind turbine 
ensuring the efficient and continuous production of clean and free energy, 
in any outdoor location, even in low wind.


Our spiral-funnel wind turbine in use for drinking water treatment and/or irrigation
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Totally silent and completely customizable our wind turbine, often described as
 resembling a piece of sculptured art, integrates seamlessly into its 
environment and surroundings.







Our aims, our vision :
Primarily, we want to make clean energy accessible to everyone, everywhere,
everyday.
Private residential usage of our wind turbines as well as business and agricultural 
usage will be core components to achieving our aims and goals. However, our vision
 also extends to helping governments serve and manage their national/regional 
energy requirements, especially in underdeveloped regions and countries. 
The supply and installation of our spiral-funnel wind turbines in underdeveloped 
regions and countries can be affordably financed by corporate sponsorship as well 
as government and private funding, to the mutual benefit of everyone. 


How?


Each turbine with a completely customizable surface area of 6.9m² (74.5ft²) offers 
a unique and flexible medium for communication and advertising campaigns,
providing innovative visibility to companies and organisations at a very competitive 
price.
The energy produced, not only is it clean and green, it is FREE. This free energy can
 provide endless benefits to the local communities, supplying energy for :


 -> drinking water treatments (water pumps, well and filtration systems),
 -> agricultural advances (water pumps and irrigation systems),
 -> domestic usage (lighting, cooking, heating/air-      conditioning, water/sanitary systems)
 -> educational programmes (accessing internet and TV/radio, lighting, heating/

         air-conditioning, water/sanitary systems),
 -> medical and health programmes (medical equipment, lighting, heating/

     air-conditioning, 
water/sanitary systems) 

Following are some typical installation types and usages :




Private use, home energy requirements
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Clubs & Associations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Rural & Mountainous areas
--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Limited access, "off-grid" sites
---------------------------------------------------------------------------


Retail and SME Business use
----------------------------------------------------------------------------



Agricultural usage, all agricultural energy requirements
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Agricultural use, plant and facilities
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hotel & Guesthouse use, all energy requirements
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------





Hotel & and Guesthouse, Privat use, swimming pool, filtration, cleaning...
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Administrative buildings, local Council, Apartment building
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Our
spiral-funnel wind turbines can be bought/self-financed and used by
anyone, anywhere in the world, (initial single unit prices starting
from $9,950 USD)


We
already have prototypes in operation in Europe (Switzerland, France
and Germany). We are continually testing  our  turbines and
their new smart technology to ensure continued efficiency and
evolution.

Your
funding will be used to ensure that this unique and innovative wind
turbine technology will become an integral component in the world's
clean energy production, benefiting our planet, its future and all
our futures.

Your
contribution will bring a better quality of life to many people
living in the many disadvantaged and energy deprived areas of our
planet.



To
ensure the successful launch to market of our wind turbine, our goal
is to raise an initial $300,000 USD. 


We
will manage with extreme diligence this primary budget to fund
payment to suppliers, to buy machinery and tooling equipment enabling
us to launch full scale production.

This
is the key first phase of the process of offering the convenience and
efficiency of our green and smart energy production technology to
customers worldwide.



Our
target customer profile is wide and varied.
 
Homeowners (all
residential and leisure energy requirements), 

 
Retailers
/ SME businesses (all
business energy requirements),
 
Multi-Nationals/
Large-scale
industrial companies,
(all business and production energy requirements)
 
Farmers
/ Agricultural Co-Operatives (all
agricultural energy requirements)
 
Governments
 / Town & City Councils (all
local amenity energy requirements)

Our
unique and innovate spiral-funnel wind turbines can cater for every
imaginable and conceivable energy requirement, anywhere in the world,
even in low wind. Our turbines are designed to help replace fossil
and nuclear energy sources. You, we, all of us can personally make a
positive difference to our environment, our planet and our futures.
We believe our technology will help us all achieve this common goal.





Our
story so far ...

Stormforce was
established in 2010 in Switzerland, to achieve one simple goal : to
develop a viable alternative to noisy, low efficient and esthetically
questionable traditional wind turbines.

With
the combined efforts of Martin Vetter and David Cassia, the vision
was to design and produce a silent wind turbine with both "style
and substance" to ensure that it would be :
->
quick and easy to install anywhere, with little to no maintenance
required 
("Set
& Forget"),

 ->
totally functional and efficient, even in low wind and regardless of
wind direction,

 ->
stylish, sleek and esthetically  integrating into its
environment and surroundings,

 ->
cost efficient.

Our
vision, our research and our efforts have been rewarded with the
production of our customizable range of  spiral-funnel wind
turbines, ZEPHIR
6000DC.



Now
is the time for more and more of us to consider "pulling the
plug" / "cutting the cord" from the traditional power
companies.

Our
new technology will not only save you money every month, it will help
save our environment, our planet and our future. Our technology can
be easily installed and used anywhere on the planet.



Use
of funds :

Every
single donation, large and small, will assist greatly towards a
better future with less pollution and less energy poverty in the
world.



As
well as kindly donating to our launch fund, there are many other ways
to help us in our vision and project.

Even
if you do not wish to purchase a wind turbine for your own use, you
can spread the message of our vision and goal : Clean energy for
everyone, everywhere, everyday.

Tell
your family, your friends, your work colleagues, your clubs and
associations about Stormforce and
what  we hope to achieve. 


With
your help we can advance further in completing our project, (already
over four years in the making!).



Thank
you for your support. Your help ensures that Stormforce's
vision of spiral-funnel wind turbines providing free, clean energy to
the mutual benefit of everyone, our planet and our futures.  

On
our website we would like to add your name/company name with your URL
web link (with your consent and approval, of course) promoting you
among the many people that will make this exciting and pioneering
project possible.



The
winds of change are upon us : a better alternative for our energy
requirements, our planet and our future.
Clean
energy is our future. Let's create it alternatively!

story:
Order Now at www.KRUVEinc.com

 

 

At KRUVE, our aim is to elevate the coffee experience by designing beautiful, innovative, and high quality products. That's not an empty promise - we can 'Walk the Talk' too! We've crowdfunded multiple projects and have successfully exceeded our crowdfunding goal each time. Add to that, the products we've crowdfunded went on to win top awards. This time around, we're re-imagining the way we consume espresso. 

Introducing the PROPEL espresso glass! 

By leveraging key design features like headspace, internal fins, and a double-to-single-walled construction, the PROPEL is taking espresso to new heights! 

We can't wait for you to experience espresso in the PROPEL.

 

 

 

In Early 2019, we took home - not one, but two - of the Specialty Coffee Association’s most coveted awards for our EQ glassware line, including Best New Product and the Design Lab Award.   

We took the lessons we learned from the research and development of our EXCITE and INSPIRE glasses, and applied that same design-thinking to our PROPEL espresso glass. 

 

The PROPEL is specifically designed for espresso unlike any other glass. The Patent Pending design centers around these key features:

 

The PROPEL features a robust amount of headspace to capture and circulate aroma, involving the nose in a meaningful way, and enhancing flavor like never before.

 

 

The PROPEL uses internal fins and a convex bottom to help destratify the espresso layers as they separate, providing you with a consistent flavor in every sip.   

Why is this important? World Champion Barista and Industry Expert, James Hoffmann explains...

 

The PROPEL is shaped in a way that encourages you to cup the glass in your hand, which makes swirling natural and intuitive. 

 

When swirled, the espresso coats the inside of the glass, highlighting aromas even further.

 

As with all other glassware in the EQ line, the PROPEL features a double-to-single-wall construction, so the coffee will remain hot, while cool to the touch. 

 

We made the PROPEL dishwasher-safe so it's easy to clean once your done enjoying your espresso. 

 

 

We were lucky to have the PROPEL Espresso glass tested and reviewed by many of our friends and colleagues in the community, including the world's top coffee experts and sensory scientists! Here is just a sample of what they had to say:

 

As espresso brews, the liquid quickly stratifies and separates into layers based on density, gasses, soluble and insoluble solids.

 

 

Each layer has a different taste so stirring the espresso to combine all those layers is vital to get the most consistent flavour throughout the entire shot.

Don't take our word for it, listen to what World Champion Barista and Industry Expert, James Hoffmann has to say about it...

 

For decades, espresso has been consumed via a tiny ceramic cup, which definitely helps when you’re in a rush, but that’s about it.  

Today, we know that espresso has evolved into a much more robust coffee drinking experience, with attention being paid to the entire supply chain. From growing to roasting - and especially the espresso machines themselves - espresso has evolved in leaps and bounds. However, espresso glassware has mostly remained stagnant.

 

 

We also know that glassware significantly impacts the way you consume a beverage. For example, if someone pours you Whiskey in a shot glass, you’re likely going to slam it back. However, if we pour that same whiskey into a snifter glass, you will take time to savor the rich aromas and flavor notes.

 

Espresso is no different. When served in a tiny ceramic cup, we instinctively shoot it back. However, when poured into a PROPEL glass, you will naturally want to swirl it, smell it, and sip it slowly. That’s why our patent-pending espresso glass applies precisely these design principles. 

 

 

 

The glasses are in production now and should start shipping in Late December 2019.

Be sure to order asap! Our first PRODUCTION RUN HAS SOLD OUT so order now to get in on round two and we will ship on a first-come, first-served basis. Shipping starts December 2019 for round two of production. 

 

The PROPEL is a small, but mighty addition to the award-winning KRUVE EQ family! Be sure to check out the other awesome glassware on our website, including the EXCITE, INSPIRE, PIQUE, and EVOKE. Experiment and enjoy using popular brew methods your like Aeropress, V60, and more! 

 

Be the first to get the KRUVE PROPEL Espresso glass and take advantage of the pre-order pricing exclusive to Indiegogo. 

 

The PROPEL comes as a set of two glasses, perfect for sharing your espresso experience. 

 

  • Construction: Hand-blown, Double-to-single wall, borosilicate glass
  • Capacity: 2.5oz (75ml)
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Patent Pending 

 

KRUVE is comprised of engineers, product developers, designers, and marketing specialists who have a passion for bringing big ideas to life. We have proven experience working for fortune 500 companies developing  products and services and have a successful track record bringing our own products to market. Our aim is to elevate the coffee experience by  designing beautiful, innovative, and high-quality precision products.

 

KRUVE would not exist if it were not for the wonderful support and backing of our crowdfunding community. As a thank you to you, we want to give our backers and fans the first opportunity to buy a PROPEL glass at these amazing prices.

 

Special thanks also goes out to:

  • Mr. Specialty Coffee himself, James Hoffmann 
  • Dr. Hoby Welder and the team at Senspoint 
  • Ali and the team at Stealth Coffee Systems 
  • Jackie, Edward, and the team at Zuccarini
  • Eugene and the team from San Remo
  • Asa from The Real Sprometheus 
  • And, of course, our friends and family!  

 

 

Risks and challenges

At this stage, there are few risks involved with delivering our product. We have our manufacturers on standby, ready to place the first order. As with any new product being brought to market, there may be unforeseen circumstances that could cause problems or delays. However, with our extensive experience bringing products to market, including other successful Indiegogo projects, we feel confident that we will be able to overcome any obstacles that come our way and deliver a product that you will love and use every day.
