story:
The Hex Driver, is a one tool solution that provides a perfect fit for the most common sizes of hex key fasteners all without the need to change bits. Simply push and fasten.

 

PRECISION MACHINED FOR THE PERFECT FIT

We worked tirelessly to ensure that our proprietary design gripped fastener heads perfectly. No manhandling and no cam out, the Hex Driver fits each size perfectly.

 

WHY?

For years both working professionals and DIY'ers alike have been struggling with using bulky and often un-ergonomic hex key fasteners. These keys either become lost in a crowded toolbox or never utilized due to their bulky design. We designed the Hex Driver to eliminate these issues, save time, space and frustration.

 

The Hex Driver fits the following sizes:

SAE Unit: 1/16", 1/8", 5/32", 3/16" & 1/4"

Metric Unit: 2mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm & 6mm

 

 

 

MINIMALIST DESIGN

Get ready for some Spring cleaning. Our all-in-one solution means no more searching for a lost hex key in a crowded toolbox. Guaranteed or your clutter back!

 

WE’RE SCREWING EVERYTHING IN SIGHT

The Hex Driver provides a perfect fit for the most common sizes of hex key fasteners. You see it, the Hex Driver can screw it!

READY TO WORK

We have vigorously tested each part to meet the needs of our clients and to ensure that our product holds up under the most rigorous industrial settings. After using the Hex Driver, you'll be saying "If it isn't orange and gray, it's just in the way!"

 

 

PERKS

Ready to save space, time and frustration? Check out our perks on the right side of your screen, and select a package!

FULFILLMENT TIMELINE

Cliff Notes: Delivered just in time for the holiday season!

BLACK OXIDE COATED TOOL STEEL

High quality and corrosion resistant, our tools are always made with black oxide coated tool steel, no chrome vanadium cop-out here! 

 

 

WHO WE ARE

We are American Mutt Technologies and we strive to be the world's most innovative tool company. 

We spent the last two years perfecting the Hex Driver and re-envisioning the world of fastening tools. The Hex Driver is only the first step, our patent pending design will allow us to pursue different styles of fastener head tools in the future.

Our products are assembled in the United States using parts from multiple countries.

That’s a lot of revisions...

Our mascot ensuring that we are diligently working. (We promise we are!)

story:
There was a time when plastic made so much sense - it was easy to use, inexpensive, and when you were done, you just threw it out. Sounds great right?

 

Well, jump ahead a couple of decades and we’ve learned it’s clogging our landfills, destroying our oceans, and impacting our health.

 

We’ve created a line of 100% plastic-free, reusable, biodegradable products meant to replace everyday use items at your home. From storing your food, to brushing your teeth - It’s time to say goodbye to plastic!

We’re opening an EXCLUSIVE LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP deal only on Indiegogo. 

By backing our campaign, you get special membership to our store FOR LIFE. With a membership, you’ll get up to 50% OFF our products plus first access to all our latest products.

 

 

 

Our products are not only the most affordable plastic-free solution currently available but also the highest quality.

 

After years of research and many sleepless nights, we were able to bring together ethically sourced materials into beautiful household essentials.

 

Do you scour ingredient lists? So do we. We do the research so you don’t have to.  All our materials are 100% biodegradable and all our packaging is as natural as the ingredients inside.

 

All of our dyes are non-toxic and free of heavy metals, AZOs, and formaldehyde found in typical textile dyes.

 

Etee’s reusable products are washable can be used up to 150 times - this means one wrap can last you anywhere from 4 months to a WHOLE YEAR.

 

Thanks to the re-usability of etee products, you’ll find yourself spending the same or less on our products when compared to planet-harming plastic ones.

We combined preservation techniques from ancient Egypt with modern day science and knowledge to create all-natural products that seal out moisture, air, and external microbes while naturally slowing microbial degradation in your food. Our items are not just naturally made, they’re naturally preserving!

 

From the cloth in our bags to the bristles of our brushes, every detail of our product is 100% biodegradable. There’s not a hint of plastic in them. We created liquid soaps and cleaners without the need for any plastic bottle, and made our bags and wraps reusable to decrease waste. When you do need to toss them, our products will naturally degrade back to the earth as intended.

 

Get all your - plastic free - household items under one roof.  No more checking the ingredient lists, double checking claims and jumping from site to site.  We offer you the most innovative and easy to use items in one place.

 

Want to stay completely plant based? We have vegan options available.

Join our community and be surrounded by like-minded individuals and a company who will support your journey in living a sustainable life. Together, we can save our world - one step at a time.

 

Our membership program not only gives you amazing offers to our sustainable products, it helps keep you accountable to a plastic-free, zero-waste lifestyle. Together, we can save our world - one step at a time.

By backing our project, you will gain access to our Lifetime membership and receive UP TO 50% OFF our products for life! You read that right - FOR LIFE.

This means, you’ll be part of our community forever and will enjoy legacy benefits as our company continues to grow. 

You’ll be able to order as many of our products, new and old, from our website for up to 50% OFF whenever you want and as many times as you want.

 

When our campaign ends, memberships will be sold as a $49/year USD annual membership.

 

We want our products to be available to everyone. We’re not going to make a change unless our products are available to everyone.  Since day one, we have worked on ways to eliminate unnecessary costs:

 

At etee, we stand by our products. Our 90-day guarantee lets you try everything you order without worry or risk. If you don’t think our products are up to par, just return them to us within 90 days. We’ll refund you - no questions asked. Joining the plastic-free revolution has never been easier.

 

From our health to our oceans to our economy, it’s an unsustainable material that’s slowly choking every aspect of our livelihood. 

 

In fact, nearly all of us have traces of the chemicals already in us due to plastic use. Exposure to these chemicals is linked to cancer, birth defects, impaired immunity, infertility, mental disease, endocrine disruption, and other ailments. Additionally, plastic poisons our food and water sources.

 

Plastic doesn’t break down, it breaks up into tiny microscopic pieces and gets stored in the fatty tissue of the foods we eat and in the water we drink.

Everything suffers because of plastic pollution — tourism, recreation, business, the health of humans, animals, fish, and birds. In fact, plastic presence costs about $13 billion a year in losses for the tourism, shipping, and fishing industries alone,  The financial damage continuously being inflicted across the world and every industry is inestimable.

Imagine a world without plastic—a world where we don’t have to worry about destroying our oceans and the air we breathe. It’s time to take a real stand and show up for our planet and ourselves by making 2019 the year we go plastic free.

We’ve been selling our wraps and bags on our website for some time now - and it’s been great. Our goal is to offer all the best plastic free household solutions in one place at an affordable price.

 

In order to fulfill our mission, we wanted to give everyone the ability to convert fully to a plastic-free lifestyle without buffer. This is why we chose to launch our full line on Indiegogo through a membership subscription. We’re able to fund production without outside investors, and you get up to 50% OFF on our premium products for LIFE. Plus, you’ll get first access to new products down the line.

Be A Member Now - If you back our membership reward tiers, you become a member immediately after our campaign ends! This means you immediately get all the membership benefits, including up to 50% OFF of products on our website.

 

 

Say goodbye to plastic wrap, sandwich bags & bulky storage containers. Preserve your food and protect your family - naturally - with our reusable foodwraps.

Our unique blend of essential oils, waxes and tree resins allow you to easily seal them around bowls and food, keeping the right stuff in (beneficial nutrients) and letting the wrong stuff out (ethylene gas) - naturally.  We use USDA certified organic waxes and essential oils to ensure that what’s touching and preserving your food is natural and non-toxic.

 

Bye, bye zippy, sandwich and plastic produce bags! Preserve your food and protect your family - naturally - with our reusable foodbags.

Etee is the first company to develop an all natural, resealable, biodegradable food bag.  And they really work. Our unique blend of essential oils, waxes and tree resins allow you to easily seal them tight and preserve your food. We use USDA certified organic waxes and essential oils to ensure that what’s touching and preserving your food is natural and non-toxic.

 

These are the best alternative to plastic snack and sandwich bags  Our unique blend of essential oils, waxes and tree resins allow you to easily seal them - keeping your snacks and sandwiches fresh all day long. We use USDA certified organic waxes and essential oils to ensure that what’s touching and preserving your food is natural and non-toxic.

 

You can wash and reuse these bags at your own discretion, but once you’re done with them, rest assured they’ll decompose.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

etee products are natural, reusable, biodegradable, and of course, plastic-free. With our products, you can be the solution - make healthier choices, reduce waste, and save our planet!

We’re offering a lifetime membership to make a plastic free life available to everyone. This is plastic-free living for everyone. Join our community and let’s make this world a better place, together.
story_txt:
There was a time when plastic made so much sense - it was easy to use, inexpensive, and when you were done, you just threw it out. Sounds great right? 
 Well, jump ahead a couple of decades and we’ve learned it’s clogging our landfills, destroying our oceans, and impacting our health. 
 We’ve created a line of 100% plastic-free, reusable, biodegradable products meant to replace everyday use items at your home. From storing your food, to brushing your teeth - It’s time to say goodbye to plastic! 

 We’re opening an EXCLUSIVE LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP deal only on Indiegogo. By backing our campaign, you get special membership to our store FOR LIFE. With a membership, you’ll get up to 50% OFF our products plus first access to all our latest products. 
 
   Our products are not only the most affordable plastic-free solution currently available but also the highest quality. After years of research and many sleepless nights, we were able to bring together ethically sourced materials into beautiful household essentials.  

 

 Do you scour ingredient lists? So do we. We do the research so you don’t have to.  All our materials are 100% biodegradable and all our packaging is as natural as the ingredients inside. 
 All of our dyes are non-toxic and free of heavy metals, AZOs, and formaldehyde found in typical textile dyes. Etee’s reusable products are washable can be used up to 150 times - this means one wrap can last you anywhere from 4 months to a WHOLE YEAR. 
 
 
 Thanks to the re-usability of etee products, you’ll find yourself spending the same or less on our products when compared to planet-harming plastic ones. 
We combined preservation techniques from ancient Egypt with modern day science and knowledge to create all-natural products that seal out moisture, air, and external microbes while naturally slowing microbial degradation in your food. Our items are not just naturally made, they’re naturally preserving! 
 
 
 From the cloth in our bags to the bristles of our brushes, every detail of our product is 100% biodegradable. There’s not a hint of plastic in them. We created liquid soaps and cleaners without the need for any plastic bottle, and made our bags and wraps reusable to decrease waste. When you do need to toss them, our products will naturally degrade back to the earth as intended. Get all your - plastic free - household items under one roof.  No more checking the ingredient lists, double checking claims and jumping from site to site.  We offer you the most innovative and easy to use items in one place. 
 Want to stay completely plant based? We have vegan options available. 
Join our community and be surrounded by like-minded individuals and a company who will support your journey in living a sustainable life. Together, we can save our world - one step at a time. 
 Our membership program not only gives you amazing offers to our sustainable products, it helps keep you accountable to a plastic-free, zero-waste lifestyle. Together, we can save our world - one step at a time.
 
 By backing our project, you will gain access to our Lifetime membership and receive UP TO 50% OFF our products for life! You read that right - FOR LIFE.
 This means, you’ll be part of our community forever and will enjoy legacy benefits as our company continues to grow. You’ll be able to order as many of our products, new and old, from our website for up to 50% OFF whenever you want and as many times as you want. 
 When our campaign ends, memberships will be sold as a $49/year USD annual membership. We want our products to be available to everyone. We’re not going to make a change unless our products are available to everyone.  Since day one, we have worked on ways to eliminate unnecessary costs: 
 At etee, we stand by our products. Our 90-day guarantee lets you try everything you order without worry or risk. If you don’t think our products are up to par, just return them to us within 90 days. We’ll refund you - no questions asked. Joining the plastic-free revolution has never been easier. 
 
  
 
 

 
 
 From our health to our oceans to our economy, it’s an unsustainable material that’s slowly choking every aspect of our livelihood.  
 
Plastic is killing us and our planet.In fact, nearly all of us have traces of the chemicals already in us due to plastic use. Exposure to these chemicals is linked to cancer, birth defects, impaired immunity, infertility, mental disease, endocrine disruption, and other ailments. Additionally, plastic poisons our food and water sources. 
 Plastic doesn’t break down, it breaks up into tiny microscopic pieces and gets stored in the fatty tissue of the foods we eat and in the water we drink.Everything suffers because of plastic pollution — tourism, recreation, business, the health of humans, animals, fish, and birds. In fact, plastic presence costs about $13 billion a year in losses for the tourism, shipping, and fishing industries alone,  The financial damage continuously being inflicted across the world and every industry is inestimable.
 
 Imagine a world without plastic—a world where we don’t have to worry about destroying our oceans and the air we breathe. It’s time to take a real stand and show up for our planet and ourselves by making 2019 the year we go plastic free.We’ve been selling our wraps and bags on our website for some time now - and it’s been great. Our goal is to offer all the best plastic free household solutions in one place at an affordable price. 
 In order to fulfill our mission, we wanted to give everyone the ability to convert fully to a plastic-free lifestyle without buffer. This is why we chose to launch our full line on Indiegogo through a membership subscription. We’re able to fund production without outside investors, and you get up to 50% OFF on our premium products for LIFE. Plus, you’ll get first access to new products down the line.Be A Member Now - If you back our membership reward tiers, you become a member immediately after our campaign ends! This means you immediately get all the membership benefits, including up to 50% OFF of products on our website. 
We will have items available for order or shipment immediately when the campaign information is process, items available for pre-order that will be shipped in 3-6 months, and items that will soon made available. 
Available in beeswax and vegan formulationsSay goodbye to plastic wrap, sandwich bags & bulky storage containers. Preserve your food and protect your family - naturally - with our reusable foodwraps.Our unique blend of essential oils, waxes and tree resins allow you to easily seal them around bowls and food, keeping the right stuff in (beneficial nutrients) and letting the wrong stuff out (ethylene gas) - naturally.  We use USDA certified organic waxes and essential oils to ensure that what’s touching and preserving your food is natural and non-toxic. 
 
Available in beeswax and vegan formulationsBye, bye zippy, sandwich and plastic produce bags! Preserve your food and protect your family - naturally - with our reusable foodbags.Etee is the first company to develop an all natural, resealable, biodegradable food bag.  And they really work. Our unique blend of essential oils, waxes and tree resins allow you to easily seal them tight and preserve your food. We use USDA certified organic waxes and essential oils to ensure that what’s touching and preserving your food is natural and non-toxic. 
 
 
So long plastic snack and sandwich bags! Preserve your food and protect your family - naturally - with our reusable, biodegradable snack and sandwich bags.These are the best alternative to plastic snack and sandwich bags  Our unique blend of essential oils, waxes and tree resins allow you to easily seal them - keeping your snacks and sandwiches fresh all day long. We use USDA certified organic waxes and essential oils to ensure that what’s touching and preserving your food is natural and non-toxic. 
 
 
There is no better alternative to petroleum plastic freezer bags than these bioplastic, ocean biodegradable freezer bags. You shouldn’t need a degree in chemical engineering to know how to dispose of your plastic waste, so that’s why we make our bags with the only known bioplastic (PHA) that will decompose anywhere it ends up - landfill, backyard compost and even the middle of the ocean.  You can wash and reuse these bags at your own discretion, but once you’re done with them, rest assured they’ll decompose. 
 
This handy - and cute - organic waxed canvas case will make zero waste takeout, festivals and trips to Grampa Joe’s easy and stylish.  Pick your utensils - cutlery, reusable straw, chopsticks, even your vape - roll it up and out you go. 
 
 
Want the convenience of liquid dish soap, but without all the unnecessary plastic?  We have the answer!  Our soap comes in a concentrated, biodegradable wax capsule.  All you have to do is squeeze it into your dispenser of choice, add some water and stir.  Don’t have a dispenser?  We’ve got you covered.  Use this liquid dishsoap like you would any regular dish soap.  Add our signature lufa and cellulose scouring pad, cellulose dish cloth and coconut scrubber and you have everything you need to keep your dishes (and etee products) clean and plastic free.  

Our non-abrasive plastic-free luffa and cellulose scouring Pads are designed to remove stubborn stuck on food messes and work with any cookware, glassware, countertops, or appliances. 
Replace your gallon jug of wasted plastic with our packaging free laundry soap blocks. 
With our dryer ball, you will never have to use dryer sheets again, they will pick up all the extra hair and fluff and make your life much more simple. 
Clean teeth & fresh breath without the plastic waste?  Yes please!  Normal toothpaste is 50% water.  In order to keep it stabilized you have to formulate it with chemical preservatives, plus all that wasted plastic packaging makes no sense. With our toothpaste tablets, you can have the dentist clean feeling without wasting any toothpaste or plastic packaging.  
 
Made with bamboo and biodegradable bristles, this removable head toothbrush allows you to replace the head without replacing the handle - saving money, the environment and unnecessary shipping weights.  
Our dental floss is completely plastic-free and comes in plastic-free packaging. The floss is made of a smooth, durable biodegradable thread coated with natural wax - for perfect flossing without the waste! 
 
90% of plastic consumption today is unnecessary. It is time to make plastic-free living something that anyone can be a part of. Our goal and mission is to rid the world of single-use plastic and unnecessary plastic consumption.  
 etee products are natural, reusable, biodegradable, and of course, plastic-free. With our products, you can be the solution - make healthier choices, reduce waste, and save our planet!We’re offering a lifetime membership to make a plastic free life available to everyone. This is plastic-free living for everyone. Join our community and let’s make this world a better place, together.

story:
Let's light up Torry with festive Christmas cheer this year!  

The newly formed Torry Development Trust are working to adorn Victoria Road with Christmas lights and bring a bright festive spirit to the local community of Torry and Aberdeen.

Our aim is to install at least six sets of Christmas lights starting at the Torry side of Victoria Bridge. We already have some funds, but need a little help to complete the set of lights up Victoria Road.


What We Need & What You Get

Torry Development Trust needs to raise £1500 in 10 days (by December 1st) to allow us to purchase six sets of lights. You can donate any amount and all funds raised over this target will be put towards additional lights and an annual fund for the installation of the lights.

If you want to help it is easy to contribute to bring Christmas to Torry, just click on the contribute button on the top right of this page. You can then use a debit/credit card to make payment or Paypal.

The Torry Development Trust will give public recognition and thanks to those who contribute to help make this happen on their Facebook page.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can help in many ways, tell your friends and please share our fundraising campaign on Facebook, Twitter and email and very soon you could be joining us as we turn on the new Torry Christmas lights for 2014!

story:
Introducing Zera™ Food Recycler

 

Designed for the kitchen, Zera™ Food Recycler reduces food waste by over two-thirds its original volume through a fully automated process. The result is ready-to-use fertilizer within 24 hours* that you can spread on your lawn, outdoor plants, and garden, making Zera™ Food Recycler the easy-to-use solution for sending less food to the landfill, and more to your land.

*Based on estimated 3.5 kg weekly household food waste for average U.S. family.

 

Press

See Who’s Talking About Us

 

Responsibility, Meet Convenience

Why You’ll Love Zera™ Food Recycler

 

*Based on estimated 3.5 kg weekly household food waste for average U.S. family.

 

Help Make the World a Little Greener



*Based on estimated 3.5 kg weekly household food waste for average U.S. family.

 

Teach the Value of Recycling

Zera™ Food Recycler enables households to realize the rewards of doing their part to help reduce landfill waste. It’s never been easier to leave a greener legacy, by taking today’s food waste and recycling it into homemade fertilizer, with the device that fits seamlessly into your home and lifestyle.

 

Create Homemade Fertilizer

Even better than recycling food waste, is beautifying your own landscaping and plants at the same time. The fertilizer created from the Zera™ device can be spread on top of the soil of your lawn, garden, or outdoor potted plants, releasing nutrients into the soil.


 

How It Works

 

 

 

 

Zera™ App

Make everyday use a little more efficient by operating Zera™ Food Recycler right from your smartphone or tablet.

  • Start and pause the device remotely
  • Be notified when the cycle is complete, and when the filter needs replacing
  • Activate the control and lid locks with a single button
  • Get up-to-the minute progress status, from anywhere
  • Watch informational, DIY videos
  • Unlock achievement rewards for recycling

 

Zera™ Food Recycler Perk Offerings

Campaign Stretch Goal

Must pre-order before campaign transitions to In Demand.

 

ZERA™ Food Recycler

 

ZERA™ Additive Packs (24)

 

ZERA™ Air Filters (6)

 

 

Tech Specs

A – Zera™ Additive
Made from coir, a plant-based resource, and baking soda - works to break down food waste

B – Sliding Lid
Seals off mixing bin when not adding food

C – Mixing Bin
Holds a week’s worth of food scraps (for an average family)*

D – Output Bin
Convenient and removable bin contains ready-to-use, homemade fertilizer

E – Control Panel
Start, stop, pause, and get notified to run the device after 7 days

F – Mixing Motor
Turns mixing blade to process food waste

G – Mixing Blade
Along with heat and the Zera™ Additive, blades churn and break down food scraps

H – Zera™ Filter
HEPA/Activated Carbon Filter designed to continuously filter the air

Size: 11"W x 22"D x 33.75"H
Weight: 118.6 pounds (53.8 kilograms)
Useable volume: 8.4 liters
Color: White

*Based on estimated 3.5 kg weekly household food waste for average U.S. family.

 

Our Team

As the Project Lead for Zera™ Food Recycler, Tony makes sure everything’s up to snuff – overseeing every product and project requirement. Fun fact: Tony’s also a homebrewer and was a founding team member of Vessi™ Fermentor. What’s he going to do with all his spent grains from homebrewing? Recycle them with Zera™ Food Recycler of course!

 

As Tech Lead, Paula’s had the opportunity to tackle the many engineering problems that have come up during the creation of the Zera™ product. Reducing the noise level, running units through a battery of tests to ensure safety, and more – there’s never a dull moment! After hours, Paula enjoys runs through town and watching the sunset from The Bluff overlooking the beach.

 

As General Manager, Jennifer works to foster a collaborative environment and tirelessly removes barriers so WLabs can bring innovative products to life. When she’s not helping the world recycle more, she’s teaching her 2- and 4-year olds to as well. Around the office, you can spot Jennifer rocking gold shoes on days with especially good news (like the Indiegogo launch)!

 

A former aerospace engineer, Kelley is Marketing Lead in title, but market strategist, advertiser, PR director, and product innovation manager in her day-to-day work at WLabs. When she’s not multitasking, you can find her running track competitively or dancing (we’ve seen her moonwalk). Her favorite quote: "Those who think it can't be done should not interrupt the one doing it.”

 

With a degree in both Mechanical Engineering and Resource Development, Tom brought a lot to the table when it came to Zera™ Food Recycler. While others worked on making sure the device worked, Tom made sure the output was delivering value to the end user as a fertilizer. More than just a mechanical tinkerer, Tom’s cut trails, dug ponds, and explored the local wildlife on his own property in his spare time.

 

In charge of the Zera™ mobile app, website, and ecommerce activation of Zera™ Food Recycler and Vessi™ Fermentor, Megha always has her digital hands full. Both a tech enthusiast and Harry Potter fan, her dream is to invent flying cars, gadgets that store human memories, newspapers that talk, and password-storing pictures, to name a few (maybe a WLabs project someday?).

 

About WLabs

WLabs is an innovation brand that enables the testing of new products in spaces previously unknown to Whirlpool Corporation. When we found out about the large and growing volume of food waste in landfills, our team saw a deep need for better food recycling. With the belief that when responsibility meets convenience, we can do great things, our team created Zera™ Food Recycler.

Zera™ Food Recycler is the third innovation to come from WLabs. We’ve also successfully brought SWASH® Clothing Care System and Vessi™ Fermentor and Dispenser to the market. SWASH® is the system that lets you remove light wrinkles from your clothes, refresh, and re-wear, in just 10 minutes. Vessi™ Fermentor and Dispenser is the single tank that ferments, carbonates, and dispenses home-brewed beer. The Vessi™ device is also available on Indiegogo. Go here to visit the campaign page.

 

Awards

Zera™ Food Recycler (CES 2017 Best of Innovation Award)

  • Eco-Design and Sustainable Technologies product category
     

Zera™ Food Recycler (CES 2017 Honoree Awards)

  • Tech For A Better World product category
  • Home Appliances product category
     

The CES Innovation Awards are based upon descriptive materials submitted to the judges. CTA did not verify the accuracy of any submission or of any claims made and did not test the item to which the award was given.

 

Timeline

 

FAQs

Is WLabs first to market with this type of device?              

We believe we are the first to market in the U.S. with an indoor food recycler that converts a week's worth of food waste into ready-to-use homemade fertilizer within 24 hours.* Competitive products take at least a week to process and the output is not as uniform. There are other products on the market in the U.S. that are purely "food dehydrators" that do not have an additive and do not progress the food decomposition as far as Zera™ Food Recycler.

 

How does Zera™ Food Recycler work?   

The Zera™ device uses oxygen, moisture, heat, and agitation to speed decomposition of a week's worth of food scraps within 24 hours*. The additive provides the "brown" material necessary for the decomposition process.

 

How is the Zera™ food recycling process different from the traditional composting process?       

The Zera™ food recycling process converts food waste into fertilizer through a fully automatic process, accepts a variety of food types including meat and dairy, and can be performed inside your home within 24 hours.* Unlike traditional composting, Zera™ Food Recycler automatically controls moisture, heat, air, and the process is not exposed to unwanted pests or wildlife. Traditional composting takes months to process, requires a large outdoor space, manual heap maintenance, and can attract pests and wildlife.

 

What types of food can the Zera™ device recycle?            

The Zera™ device can recycle 95% of a typical family’s household food waste (including meat and dairy). It is not recommended to recycle large bones and pits.  

 

How large is the unit?    

Zera™ Food Recycler is designed to seamlessly fit in your kitchen. It is counter height so that food scraps can easily be deposited into the unit. The dimensions are 11"W x 22"D x 33.75"H.

 

How much does the unit weigh?

Zera™ Food Recycler weighs 118.6 pounds (53.8 kilograms).

 

How much energy does the device use per year?       

The Zera™ Food Recycler energy consumption is approximately 300 kWh/year, assuming a cycle is run once a week.

 

How often do I need to run a cycle?

A cycle should be run once food waste is filled to the top of the mixing blades. It can be run more frequently if desired, even daily. The Zera™ Additive must be used each time you run a cycle.

 

How long does it take a cycle to run?      

A cycle will complete within 24 hours.

 

Once a cycle is started, can it be paused to add additional food waste?   

Yes, once the cycle is started, you can pause it during the first 30 minutes to add additional food. Once it is past 30 minutes, it cannot be paused, but the cycle can be cancelled.  If cancelled, the cycle will restart when the Start button is pressed.

 

Why can't food scraps be added after the 30-minute window has passed?              

The device needs enough time to fully process any food added to the cycle.

 

Is the device child-resistant?      

Yes, the controls can be locked out (through the control panel or the mobile app). Additionally, the lid locks when the cycle is active, so children cannot access the mixing compartment. Finally, there is a retention tab on the output bin.

 

Is there anything special required for installation?           

No, simply plug Zera™ Food Recycler into a standard power outlet. It has a 6-foot power cord to provide flexibility of placement.

 

What is the output of Zera™ Food Recycler?        

The output of Zera™ Food Recycler is a ready-to-use, homemade fertilizer that can be used on lawns and gardens. It appears similar to coffee grounds, is dry, and spreads easily.

 

Is the homemade fertilizer the same as compost?             

The homemade fertilizer is not standard compost because it is not created from a traditional outdoor composting process. Instead, it is a ready-to-use homemade fertilizer that, once spread on the lawn and garden, will release nutrients into the soil as it continues to mature.

 

How should the output be used?               

The homemade fertilizer should only be used outdoors. It is recommended to apply the homemade fertilizer on the soil surface, not to exceed ¼-inch thick. Keep the product away from roots and plant stems.

The homemade fertilizer can also be broadcast on grass using a lawn spreader.

 

How should the homemade fertilizer be stored?               

The homemade fertilizer should be stored in an air-tight container in a cool, dry area (i.e., garage, basement, closet) for up to six months.

 

Will the homemade fertilizer attract bugs during storage?            

The homemade fertilizer should not attract insects, especially if stored in an air-tight container as recommended.

 

What is the Zera™ Additive made out of?

The Zera™ Additive is made from coir and baking soda. Coir is made from coconut husk, a rapidly renewable plant-based resource. The Zera™ Additive Pack is made from paper and designed so the entire additive (including bag packaging) can be placed in the Zera™ device.

 

How often do I need to use the Zera™ Additive?                

One Zera™ Additive Pack is used every time a cycle is run. It is estimated that on average, a U.S. family will run a cycle once a week.

 

How does the Zera™ Air Filter work? What is it made of?                 

The filter within the Zera™ device is made of activated carbon and HEPA layers, designed to continuously filter the air.

 

How long does the Zera™ Air Filter last?  How frequently should it be changed?

For best performance, the Zera™ Air Filter should be changed every two months.

 

I'd like to receive updates about the campaign, how do I do that?

If you've contributed, you're already following. If not, just hit the Follow button in the upper left corner of your screen, by the share buttons.

 

Where can Zera™ Food Recycler be shipped?

We ship anywhere in the United States (including Alaska and Hawaii).

 

How do I purchase Zera™ Food Recycler?

Right now, Zera™ Food Recycler is available only on Indiegogo. Purchase one by selecting a perk that includes Zera™ Food Recycler, and enter your payment information.

 

Questions?  Email AskPaula@zera.com

We reserve the right to exchange any perk for equal or greater value.

For our privacy statement, visit: http://www.whirlpoolcorp.com/privacy-united-states/

*Based on estimated 3.5 kg weekly household food waste for average U.S. family.

More than just a mechanical tinkerer, Tom’s cut trails, dug ponds, and explored the local wildlife on his own property in his spare time.
 

In charge of the Zera™ mobile app, website, and ecommerce activation of Zera™ Food Recycler and Vessi™ Fermentor, Megha always has her digital hands full. Both a tech enthusiast and Harry Potter fan, her dream is to invent flying cars, gadgets that store human memories, newspapers that talk, and password-storing pictures, to name a few (maybe a WLabs project someday?).
 
About WLabs
WLabs is an innovation brand that enables the testing of new products in spaces previously unknown to Whirlpool Corporation. When we found out about the large and growing volume of food waste in landfills, our team saw a deep need for better food recycling. With the belief that when responsibility meets convenience, we can do great things, our team created Zera™ Food Recycler.
Zera™ Food Recycler is the third innovation to come from WLabs. We’ve also successfully brought SWASH® Clothing Care System and Vessi™ Fermentor and Dispenser to the market. SWASH® is the system that lets you remove light wrinkles from your clothes, refresh, and re-wear, in just 10 minutes. Vessi™ Fermentor and Dispenser is the single tank that ferments, carbonates, and dispenses home-brewed beer. The Vessi™ device is also available on Indiegogo. Go here to visit the campaign page.
 
Awards

Zera™ Food Recycler (CES 2017 Best of Innovation Award)

Eco-Design and Sustainable Technologies product category 
Zera™ Food Recycler (CES 2017 Honoree Awards)


Tech For A Better World product category

Home Appliances product category 

The CES Innovation Awards are based upon descriptive materials submitted to the judges. CTA did not verify the accuracy of any submission or of any claims made and did not test the item to which the award was given.
 
Timeline

 
FAQs
Is WLabs first to market with this type of device?               
We believe we are the first to market in the U.S. with an indoor food recycler that converts a week's worth of food waste into ready-to-use homemade fertilizer within 24 hours.* Competitive products take at least a week to process and the output is not as uniform. There are other products on the market in the U.S. that are purely "food dehydrators" that do not have an additive and do not progress the food decomposition as far as Zera™ Food Recycler.
 
How does Zera™ Food Recycler work?    
The Zera™ device uses oxygen, moisture, heat, and agitation to speed decomposition of a week's worth of food scraps within 24 hours*. The additive provides the "brown" material necessary for the decomposition process.
 
How is the Zera™ food recycling process different from the traditional composting process?        
The Zera™ food recycling process converts food waste into fertilizer through a fully automatic process, accepts a variety of food types including meat and dairy, and can be performed inside your home within 24 hours.* Unlike traditional composting, Zera™ Food Recycler automatically controls moisture, heat, air, and the process is not exposed to unwanted pests or wildlife. Traditional composting takes months to process, requires a large outdoor space, manual heap maintenance, and can attract pests and wildlife.
 
What types of food can the Zera™ device recycle?             
The Zera™ device can recycle 95% of a typical family’s household food waste (including meat and dairy). It is not recommended to recycle large bones and pits.  
 
How large is the unit?     
Zera™ Food Recycler is designed to seamlessly fit in your kitchen. It is counter height so that food scraps can easily be deposited into the unit. The dimensions are 11"W x 22"D x 33.75"H.
 
How much does the unit weigh?
Zera™ Food Recycler weighs 118.6 pounds (53.8 kilograms).
 
How much energy does the device use per year?       
The Zera™ Food Recycler energy consumption is approximately 300 kWh/year, assuming a cycle is run once a week.
 
How often do I need to run a cycle?
A cycle should be run once food waste is filled to the top of the mixing blades. It can be run more frequently if desired, even daily. The Zera™ Additive must be used each time you run a cycle.
 
How long does it take a cycle to run?       
A cycle will complete within 24 hours.
 
Once a cycle is started, can it be paused to add additional food waste?    
Yes, once the cycle is started, you can pause it during the first 30 minutes to add additional food. Once it is past 30 minutes, it cannot be paused, but the cycle can be cancelled.  If cancelled, the cycle will restart when the Start button is pressed.
 
Why can't food scraps be added after the 30-minute window has passed?               
The device needs enough time to fully process any food added to the cycle.
 
Is the device child-resistant?       
Yes, the controls can be locked out (through the control panel or the mobile app). Additionally, the lid locks when the cycle is active, so children cannot access the mixing compartment. Finally, there is a retention tab on the output bin.
 
Is there anything special required for installation?            
No, simply plug Zera™ Food Recycler into a standard power outlet. It has a 6-foot power cord to provide flexibility of placement.
 
What is the output of Zera™ Food Recycler?         
The output of Zera™ Food Recycler is a ready-to-use, homemade fertilizer that can be used on lawns and gardens. It appears similar to coffee grounds, is dry, and spreads easily.
 
Is the homemade fertilizer the same as compost?              
The homemade fertilizer is not standard compost because it is not created from a traditional outdoor composting process. Instead, it is a ready-to-use homemade fertilizer that, once spread on the lawn and garden, will release nutrients into the soil as it continues to mature.
 
How should the output be used?                
The homemade fertilizer should only be used outdoors. It is recommended to apply the homemade fertilizer on the soil surface, not to exceed ¼-inch thick. Keep the product away from roots and plant stems.
The homemade fertilizer can also be broadcast on grass using a lawn spreader.
 
How should the homemade fertilizer be stored?                
The homemade fertilizer should be stored in an air-tight container in a cool, dry area (i.e., garage, basement, closet) for up to six months.
 
Will the homemade fertilizer attract bugs during storage?             
The homemade fertilizer should not attract insects, especially if stored in an air-tight container as recommended.
 
What is the Zera™ Additive made out of?
The Zera™ Additive is made from coir and baking soda. Coir is made from coconut husk, a rapidly renewable plant-based resource. The Zera™ Additive Pack is made from paper and designed so the entire additive (including bag packaging) can be placed in the Zera™ device.
 
How often do I need to use the Zera™ Additive?                 
One Zera™ Additive Pack is used every time a cycle is run. It is estimated that on average, a U.S. family will run a cycle once a week.
 
How does the Zera™ Air Filter work? What is it made of?                  
The filter within the Zera™ device is made of activated carbon and HEPA layers, designed to continuously filter the air.
 
How long does the Zera™ Air Filter last?  How frequently should it be changed? 
For best performance, the Zera™ Air Filter should be changed every two months.
 
I'd like to receive updates about the campaign, how do I do that? 
If you've contributed, you're already following. If not, just hit the Follow button in the upper left corner of your screen, by the share buttons.
 
Where can Zera™ Food Recycler be shipped?
We ship anywhere in the United States (including Alaska and Hawaii).
 
How do I purchase Zera™ Food Recycler?
Right now, Zera™ Food Recycler is available only on Indiegogo. Purchase one by selecting a perk that includes Zera™ Food Recycler, and enter your payment information.
 
Questions?  Email AskPaula@zera.com
We reserve the right to exchange any perk for equal or greater value.
For our privacy statement, visit: http://www.whirlpoolcorp.com/privacy-united-states/
*Based on estimated 3.5 kg weekly household food waste for average U.S. family.

story:
About

Hey Indiegogo, we are Andy and Martin, plant lovers and product designers who have created POTR Pots - eco friendly plant pots for the 21st century!  

A modern take on the traditional plant pot.

Introducing POTR Pots 

A plant pot for the 21st century.

POTR pots are flat pack plant pots designed to self- water your plants and made from 100% recycled materials!  

The super simple product has been inspired by origami and has been designed from start to finish with our environment in mind.  

We have spent the last three months developing a series of prototypes in a variety of shapes and materials to make our POTR vision a reality. Now we need your support to help cover the up front manufacturing costs to bring POTR Pots to life! 

The benefits to backing us are more than just purchasing a beautiful modern plant pot. You will also be preventing plastic ending up in landfill, as well as supporting a start up with big ambitions to change the way we design and manufacture products to create a greener environment.

Check out our media kit if you'd like to share our story!

Featured On

Read the BBC article here!

 

POTR Pots Features

 

Flat pack postage 

POTR pots arrive flat packed in an envelope!

The pots will be shipped flat packed so they can be slipped through your letter box. This ensures that POTR has the smallest carbon foot print possible from our manufacturer to your home. Once opened, they are unfolded and laid flat in their net shape. 

 

Easy assembly

Pull the draw string to assemble!

POTR Pots are super easy (and super satisfying) to assemble using the quick draw cotton cord, transforming the flat pattern into a beautiful multi-faceted pot, capable of holding water in its base.  

 

The cord is tied and tucked inside the pot, before the inner pot stand is assembled into a ring and placed into the pot’s base. The two ends of the cord are then looped under the inner pot stand and inserted into your plant’s soil; using an old pencil is a handy way to do this. Finally the plant can be placed on top of the inner pot stand.

 

Self-watering

Add water to POTR and watch your plant drink!

Simply add water into the pot - if your plant is thirsty it will automatically start drinking the water through the cotton cord. Magic! 

Water is drawn up through the cotton by the plant using tried and tested wicking technology; this is a common way to water your plants and is particularly useful if you aren’t able to water them yourself on a regular basis! With a semi transparent finish to the pots, its easy to see when your plants are getting thirsty, making it obvious when it’s time to refill.

 

Easy to Clean 

POTR pots are super easy to clean!

If your pot happens to get dirty, it’s super easy to clean. Simply unfold the pot and wipe clean. The recycled polypropylene is chemically resistant and can be washed using cleaning product. 

 

Robust

POTR pot vs ceramic pot

Don’t worry if you happen to knock your POTR on the floor, unlike a traditional ceramic pot it will take the fall in its stride.

 

Space Efficient 

POTR are easy to store if you're on the move!

If you need to store or move your pot (perhaps you’re moving home!), POTR pots can be folded into their flat pack state making them incredibly space efficient to store.

 

Environmentally friendly

Making your house plants even greener.

POTR Pots makes your house a greener home!

Throughout their development we have been determined to make POTR Pots as environmentally friendly as possible, ensuring they fit with our long term ambition of creating a circular economy. 

With this in mind, all materials used in our pots are made from 100% recycled materials and are 100% recyclable at the end of life (should you ever choose to get rid of your POTR!). All materials have been sourced from within Europe to reduce our carbon footprint when transporting the raw materials, and all manufacturing is carried out in the UK. 

CO2 footprint of POTR vs concrete pot

POTR pots have almost 100 x less CO2 footprint than clay or concrete plant pots. The reason for this is due to POTR pots being capable of fitting in a standard envelope when being delivered, whereas a traditional pot requires a much larger parcel, requiring delivery by van. 

By using recycled plastic, this also drastically cuts the CO2 impact compared with producing new materials like concrete or clay. It also prevents plastics ending up in landfill sites.

Read more about the environmental impact of POTR vs traditional plant pots here. 

POTR Pots love the environment...they also love this string of hearts!

 

Which size POTR for my house plant ? 

Pre potted plants come in fairly standard sized pots, and can be classified into one of two categories:

Diameter - generally for smaller plant pots (10cm in diameter or less at the rim)

Volume - generally this starts at 1 litre and rises to infinity and beyond!

To begin our collection, we have designed our pots to fit a range of common house plant pot sizes: 

Small POTR Pot = 10cm diameter (0.49 litre) house plant pot or less

Large POTR Pot = 14cm diameter (1.5 litre) house plant pot or less

POTR Pots have a little bit of give around the top rim so can fit slightly larger sizes than the recommended sizes stated above if necessary.

POTR size chart.

Having spoken with many plant shop owners, house plant enthusiasts and from our personal experience, we believe the sizes we have designed will cover a large majority of house plants. We intend to release more sizes in the future!

 

Designed and manufactured in the UK 

 

Manufacture

To help minimize our environmental foot print, we have decided to partner with a local manufacturer based here in Bristol. Not only does this mean saving on transport, we have involved our manufacturer from the beginning, helping to eliminate risks and ensure we deliver POTR pots on time and in budget. 

We have partnered with a company who specialise in die cutting - the main manufacturing process used to create our nets shapes. Not only do they have a skilled and experienced work force, they also design and manufacture the die cutting tools in house. This has allowed us to collaborate on the design of the tool from an early stage, ensuring a space efficient design which minimizes scrap off cuts. 

We are excited to work together and are proud to manufacture POTR Pots here in Bristol.

In house die making at our local manufacturer based in Bristol!

Material

We selected recycled polypropylene due to its fantastic mechanical properties. PP is robust meaning it will last a lifetime; unlike traditional plant pots, POTR pots will not break if they are dropped or knocked. The unique mechanical properties of recycled PP also ensure the longevity of the folding origami hinges. 

Multiple POTR Pots are cut from a single sheet of recycled polypropylene.

We have chosen Bobbiny recycled cotton cord to use as our draw string and wicking cord. Not only is it 100% recycled, it looks great and works really well at wicking water. We have selected 3 colours of cord to choose from which you will be able to pick in the perk options.  

Bobbiny cotton cord colour options (you will have the option to choose your colour when you select a perk).

Specifications:

0.7mm recycled polypropylene

5mm / 9mm recycled cotton cord  

POTR Pots outer dimensions.

Perks

Choose from one of our many perks listed below! You will be able to pick your colour of cotton cord when you choose a perk.

Choose from one of our many perks!

Cotton cord colours are chosen via the perk options. 

POTR Pots compliment other house hold objects.

Development Story

As designers, we believe in designing through making, therefore, we have taken a very hands on approach to developing POTR pots right from the beginning. Traditional origami techniques lie at the heart of POTR's design and functionality - we began our journey by creating hundreds of paper origami iterations, experimenting with different forms and fold functionality. We strived to achieve something that would look beautiful in your home while being incredibly functional and intuitive to use. 

Origami experiments

Mini origami pot wrap

Origami pattern making

Efficient prototyping - 1/4 segment pot prototypes!

To select a suitable wicking cord material, we took a somewhat scientific approach to determine wicking efficiency. Using a control measure to monitor the rate of evaporation, we created an experiment where each of the cord types raced one another to transfer water from the test tube to the soil in the pot. 

The winner of this experiment was the Bobbiny cotton cord.

From left to right; control measure, Vans shoe lace, Bobbiny cord, candle wick, Kurzwaren cord, Bristol Scrap Store twisted cord

Meet the POTR team! 

Martin (left) and Andy (right)

Andy and Martin are experienced product designers with a love of plants and the environment. They have over ten years combined industry experience in bringing products to market at some of the worlds largest consumer product companies.

Having studied Product Design Engineering together at the Glasgow School of Art, they have a long history of working as a team on a variety of design projects. 

POTR Pots combines a passion for simple, playful design with a desire to improve our environment through a thoughtful selection of materials and processes. 

Pot inspection

Connect with POTR

Follow us on Instagram to see more of our development!

Milestones and dates 

We have ensured both our material suppliers and die cutting manufacturers are ready to go!

May - June 2019: Research, ideas, prototypes and sourcing suppliers 

July 2019: Finalise design and test final prototypes

August 2019: Launching of Kickstarter (Quickstarter) campaign 

September 2019: End of Kickstarter campaign + beginning of Indiegogo!

October 2019: Die cutting production trials

November 2019: Bulk order of material

December 2019: Indiegogo campaign ends

Dec 2019 - Feb 2020: Manufacture + deliver perks 

POTR Pots are ready to go!

Budget and Shipping  

We’re raising the amount required for a minimum production of 250 units. This covers the cost to make the units as well as the cost for tooling which will allow us to continue making POTR Pots.

If you like POTR Pots, you just have to pay a small amount for the shipping which varies depending on your receiving destination, see details when you click the “Back this project” button. We're pretty sure this will be less than the cost of shipping a traditional plant pot!

POTR Pots will be posted to anywhere in the world!

Risks and challenges

We have purposely partnered with a local manufacturer to minimize the risk of producing POTR Pots. As there is only one manufacturing process involved in the production of the pots, we have worked closely with our manufacturer on the die cutting tooling design. Having run production trials on a small number of samples, we have gained confidence in the manufacturing process and its ability to produce our desired design. 

With any hardware product, there are risks associated with producing parts at higher volumes, in particular the consistency of the part being produced. This requires fine tuning of the manufacturing process during the set up phase of production. This is something we have discussed in detail with our production partner and will begin this process as soon as we reach funding.

With a background in product design and mechanical engineering, and over 10 years combined industry experience, we are very familiar with working with manufacturers both here in the UK and abroad.

Most importantly, we are passionate about what we have created and are committed to seeing POTR Pots through to production so that our backers receive them on time and in spec.

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

We selected recycled polypropylene due to its fantastic mechanical properties. PP is robust meaning it will last a lifetime; unlike traditional plant pots, POTR pots will not break if they are dropped or knocked. The unique mechanical properties of recycled PP also ensure the longevity of the folding origami hinges.

Reusability and recyclability

POTR Pots are made from 100% recycled materials and are 100% recyclable (should you ever decide to get rid of your pots!). Polypropylene is one of the most commonly recycled plastics in the world meaning that the infrastructure is in place to make recycling this material easier than ever. 

We have purposely chosen a transparent grade of polypropylene due to the fact this makes recycling much more straight forward. A common problem with colored plastics is their post recycling usability. The use of colour limits the application of the plastic for further usage, meaning it is less valuable and less likely to be reused. Using a neutral, transparent grade of plastic means there are multiple posses uses after being recycled.

Sustainable materials

From the get go, our goal has been to make POTR Pots using 100% recycled materials. We are immensely proud to have achieved this goal by finding suppliers capable of producing recycled materials to the visual and aesthetic standards we desired. 

This has not been an insignificant task! It took several weeks of discussions and multiple sample reviews with several suppliers across Europe to find the right combination of material specification, colour, finish and cost. 

Our recycled polypropylene is being supplied from a materials manufacturer in France and our recycled cotton cord we are purchasing from Bobbiny, based in Poland.

Environmentally friendly factories

We have purposely partnered with a local manufacturer to ensure we minimise the movement of materials and goods. By staying local we cut our CO2 footprint!

Sustainable fulfillment and distribution

POTR pots have 100 x less CO2 footprint than clay or concrete plant pots. The reason for this is due to the flat packed design of POTR pots which means they are capable of fitting in a standard envelope when being delivered. Traditional pots are not space efficient and require a much larger parcel when being delivered often requiring delivery by van.

It took several weeks of discussions and multiple sample reviews with several suppliers across Europe to find the right combination of material specification, colour, finish and cost. Our recycled polypropylene is being supplied from a materials manufacturer in France and our recycled cotton cord we are purchasing from Bobbiny, based in Poland.Environmentally friendly factoriesWe have purposely partnered with a local manufacturer to ensure we minimise the movement of materials and goods. By staying local we cut our CO2 footprint!Sustainable fulfillment and distributionPOTR pots have 100 x less CO2 footprint than clay or concrete plant pots. The reason for this is due to the flat packed design of POTR pots which means they are capable of fitting in a standard envelope when being delivered. Traditional pots are not space efficient and require a much larger parcel when being delivered often requiring delivery by van.

story:
Short Summary

We are the family and friends of Jenn! Jenn has always put her family and friends ahead of herself, so we want to give back!

Jenn currently drives an extremely old car that turns off randomly in the middle of driving, has windows that don't go down, no air conditioning, and makes noises no car ever should make.  

Instead of saving up to get a working car, Jenn uses her funds for her family, friends, charities, and foundations. 

We all love and care about Jenn, and we are motivated to raise enough money to pay for the down payment of a used car for her. 

This is a SURPRISE gift. If you know Jenn, please keep this a SECRET from her until her birthday at the end of July.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raised $5,000. 

Jenn has had bad luck with her previous vehicles, as they were used cars from private owners and broke down a lot. We will be using these funds to purchase a used car from a used car dealership (ex: carmax, etc.). 

If we don't reach our goal, the funds raised will still go towards the used car down payment. 

If we raise funds over our goal, ALL funds will still go towards the payment of the used car, lowering the monthly payments as much as possible.

    The Impact

    We are seeking funds from everyone: family, friends, the community, and you! Every penny counts! If you choose to contribute, any amount would help. You will be making a huge difference in someone's life. Not to mention it will stop her from driving a deathtrap.

      Risks & Challenges

      The down side of getting a vehicle for Jenn is that it will put the burden of monthly payments on her after the purchase of the used vehicle. That is why we hope to raise enough funds, over our goal, to lower the monthly payments as much as possible.

      Her family and friends are working out a method to take some of the current bills she pays, so the addition of this used car payment won't effect her too much.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        If you want to help, but can't contribute, just spread the word! These are hard times for many others, so please do not feel obligated to contribute if you cannot.

story:
ampaign ended.

All pledges will be honored and you WILL receive your SmartDimmer.

Please also leave comments and give feedback, we listen!

Control a SmartDimmer from your Chrome browser: here

Would you like to turn off the lights in your bedroom from the bed or change the mood in your living room without having to get up off the couch? Have you had to get out of the car because someone forgot to switch off the lights?




Would you like to control all the lights in your home with one simple smart phone application?




All you need is to change the light switch. The easy to install AIRcable SmartDimmer™ is the solution for you; a game-changing alternative to expensive home automation equipment.



The AIRcable SmartDimmer™ from Wireless Cables Inc. is the ONLY in-wall lighting controller that allows to switch lights directly from the iPhone.

 

Built with Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy (BLE) wireless technology the SmartDimmer allows to switch lights directly from the iPhone. No infrastructure, no WiFi or special equipment is required.

 

The SmartDimmer application allows users to view the status of all lights in the house, the light intensity, the light level, the temperature in the room and the power consumption of each lamp. With the app each light switch is set-up by location, disable or enable dimming function and specify the intensity and function of the night light.

Additional features such as a timer function as well as the automatic porch light can also be configured during setup.

The AIRcable SmartDimmer™ is easy to install, just as easy as installing a new light fixture. And pairing with the iPhone app is very simple. Optimized for LED lights the combination of iPhone application and the SmartDimmer light switch brings convenience and comfort as well as big savings on material and installation cost. Review our installation guide here.

The most compelling feature is the matched Companion Switch. Running only on batteries, the Companion Switch can be installed anywhere, even in areas that don’t have wiring, such as interior columns. Installation of 2-way, 3-way or even multi-way with the Companion Switch is easy and does not require additional costly wiring, ideal for remodeling. The two AAA batteries last for over 10 years. There is no limit for the number of Companion Switches that control one Smart Dimmer and pairing makes communication secure.

Founded in 2003, Wireless Cables Inc. develops long range Bluetooth modules and products under the brand name AIRcable, primarily for industrial use. We are very well known in the industry for our incredible long range wireless data management. With the introduction of our latest design, the FCC certified Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy Single Mode Module, we are entering the consumer electronic market.

We believe that crowdfunding is the optimal way for us to make our debut in retail, as it provides us with an opportunity to introduce our products to an entrepreneurial and tech savvy audience.

Wireless Cables Inc has a long track record of product development and superior customer relationship. Our team consists of experienced industrial design engineers, electronic designers as well as experts in manufacturing of plastic housing, aluminum parts and electronic assembly and testing.

Contribute today and join the revolution in home lighting automation.

 

 

 

  • The only dimmer available today with Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy

  • Direct communication with the iPhone, no infrastructure required, no Wifi, no monthly fees

  • Free iPhone app for whole house lighting control

  • Easy to install, not more difficult than installing a light fixture

  • Optimized for modern LED lighting, linear lighting level for most

  • Fully configurable and controllable wirelessly with user friendly controls

  • Built-in very bright night light, configurable, perfect for kids room and dark hallways

  • Advanced sensors for room temperature, ambient light, power consumption etc.

  • Energy efficient modern electronic

  • Noise free dimming, featuring reverse phase control

  • Unique safety features, detects overload, shorts and high temperature

  • Matched Companion Switch, with batteries, 10 year lifetime, no wiring whatsoever, for 2-way, 3-way, multi-way, no limit

The AIRcable SmartDimmer is just the beginning. It is a new platform that can be used now for all kinds of applications or accessories.

We hope to inspire you to think about more ideas what to do with this new revolutionary home automation platform and it’s build-in sensors. Please look at our developer's kit. We will work with you on your ideas as well as provide every possible help to get your ideas off the ground.

Certainly for you folks in Europe, South America and Asia, we will make a 240V version. The electronic is not difficult to upgrade to the higher voltage and change the timing for 50Hz. But the housing, form size and mounting as well as safety rules are different in each country. We will work on that as soon this campaign comes to an end.

There are always challenges in manufacturing and delivering any electronics product at scale. We have lots of experience and shipping products at higher volume.

We have completed all of our moulds required for injection parts. What you see in the pictures are actual injection samples. We’ve made already a few hundred parts, and readied the mould for mass production.

The most challenging part, the AIRcable BLE wireless module is already completed and received FCC certification (SQCBLE1K), we have over 1000 modules reserved for this product.

Q: Will you have Android, BlackBerry etc. cell phone applications too?

A: Yes we will and we get to it immediately after this campaign.

Q: When is the Android software available?

A: That will happen as soon as Google gets the BLE API into Android. We don't want to create special Samsung or HTC or other software. But you are welcome to do so. Sign up for the developer program.

Q: Why are you using pigtail wires and not terminals?

A: We hate light switches with terminals. These are exposed metal parts carrying high voltage. And you stick your finger inside.... Also in the light of cost savings, additional metal parts that can influence RF and safety we use pigtails.

Q: The light switch requires NEUTRAL connection as well?

A: Yes it does, we are not using leak currents through the lamp that make some LED light blink uncontrolled. Also our green electronics uses a switching power supply for the 5V electronics that has an efficiency of about 80%. Yes, from 165V down to 5V at 80% efficiency. Its actually hard to measure the current on the 110V side when the lights are off. It is only a few hundred micro amps.

Q: What is the maximum lamp power I can control?

A: The SmartDimmer is rated 200W, we think this is enough for LED lights. The SmartDimmer is only usable for 120V AC with 60Hz, NOT at 50Hz or at 220V. It will likely not power a 200W incandescent lamp or 200W CFL because the in-rush current will set off the safety features.

Q: What are the safety features of the SmartDimmer?

A: First, the SmartDimmer checks for overload. It has a current limiter to 2.5A inside, and never lets more power through. During overload within 1 second it will disable itself. Hardware and firmware work together through a triple fail safe mechanism to build the safest lightswitch in the world. Second the SmartDimmer checks internal temperature. At 60C it will switch off the lamp. Third, lifting off the rocker disables the power to the electronic and to the lights manually.

Q: Can I use the dimmer for lights that are not dimmable, older LED?

A: Yes, you can. No problem you just need to switch off the dimming function and also remember that we do not officially test incandescent lights. Hey, they are outlawed, aren't they?? CFLs are also introducing a high in-rush current and the maximum wattage may be lower.

Q: The night light is very bright, can I switch it off completely?

A: Yes you can configure the brightness of the night light from 3000mcd down to 10mcd or even switch it off completely.

Q: Can one SmartDimmer talk to another SmartDimmer?

A: No, the SmartDimmer is only a slave device. You can connect to it and you can control it, but it does not make connections by itself. Use your cell phone to communicate to multiple SmartDimmers, or get the settings from one and apply it to another.

Q: How many SmartDimmers can I have in my house? Is there a limit communicating with that many wireless devices?

A: We don't know of any limit. Communication between the iPhone and the SmartDimmer or the Companion Switch and the SmartDimmer takes only 0.1 seconds, maybe a bit longer if you are too far away.

Q: Does Bluetooth Low Energy communication interfere with my Wifi?

A: BLE uses channels for advertising that are out of the Wifi spectrum. Also see: http://zone.ni.com/devzone/cda/pub/p/id/1685

Q: Is there really no wiring needed for the Companion Switches?

A: Absolutely no wiring, runs on battery, about 10 year lifetime.

Q: Has the AIRcable SmartDimmer been safety tested and certified?

A: We have tested the SmartDimmer and are in process to certified the device with a well established compliance lab providing us with an Attestation of Conformity (AoC).

story:
Short and Simple

I would like to introduce you to the Kovach Children.  They are missionary Children to Brazil, South America.  They moved to Brazil a little over a year ago, and the older children have already been helping to reach Brazilians for Jesus Christ.  When our family moved to Brazil, it was probably one of the hardest things we have done, but yet, as a father, it was such a joyous thing for me to see my children so selflessly surrender all to serve God in another country.  While traveling and preparing to serve in Brazil, our children never truly had much as we were always on the move.  None-the-less, when the final preparations were made, I can’t truly express the emotions of my heart as I saw my children willingly sell and give away what toys they had to charity.  My heart felt joy to see their level of commitment, even at their young age, to Christ.  At the same time, I felt sorrow for them as they gave away many of their cherished possessions and heartache as the younger children, who did not understand, ran down the sidewalk, crying, as they watched a prized possession given away.  This year, I would like to give my each of my seven children at least one nice present for Christmas, but I need your help.  Being servants on a foreign field often means that we are very tight financially, without extra for things like presents.  We will and always do keep Christ the center of Christmas, but at the same time, as a father, I would like for them to be able to have just a little something at Christmas time and to not have only memories of hardships in a foreign country where Christmas is barely acknowledged.  Often, children are the forgotten ones of Ministry and it is my desire to make this a memorable Christmas for them here in Brazil and to ask if you would be willing to help, even just a little…

 Anything above the goal will be used in full for the Children and their Christmas.  Thank you for your Christmas love and Spirit in helping bring a little Christmas joy to these children!

story:
Short Summary

Hello there,

My name is Michael Appley, and I live off-the-grid deep in the coastal mountains North of Santa Cruz, California. I'm the very proud father of my 14 year old son, was a successful owner/operator of my own screen printing business for 15 years, and recently have been getting by as a landlord and a handyman for hire. I am a diesel and small engine mechanic, a property manager, a carpenter, landscaper, tree worker, lumber sawyer, graphic designer, and avid gardener and chicken herder. By necessity I've taught myself to do whatever needs doing with the attitude that if a thing can be done, then I can do it as well as any. Now I want to re-invent myself as an inventor, and The Firebox is the first one on my list.

    The Firebox is a premade fire in a box, much like the packaged firewood that you see in your local store, except that The Firebox becomes a comfortable log wood fire with just the touch of a match. Clean, efficient, and long lasting, I want to have the Firebox available in stores throughout the nation and then perhaps around the world. If you like the idea of the Firebox, and would like to have it available in your local store, then now is the time to act and make a pledge. I'm running a 45 day campaign to establish a national demand and also a state by state local supplier network capable of filling that demand. It's a tall order, an ambitious attempt, and I'm confident that you will see the value in this campaign and help out as best you can to make the Firebox a reality.

      A firebox burns for about 3 hours in three stages. The first hour is the burnoff and topper log consumption. Once the toppers have burnt sufficiently, about an hour, they are dropped into the center and the rail logs spread out a bit, creating a coal bed perfect for grilling your food when you put your grill over the rail logs. This cooking section lasts about an hour and then you pull the grill and roll the rails logs up for the final burn off. Here you might want to throw on some more logs, or maybe another Firebox.

     Because of state laws forbidding transportation of firewood over state lines, and because of the prohibitive costs of fire wood transportation, and not least because I want the Firebox be a means of supporting local rural economic empowerment, the Fireboxes you receive will have been made not only in your state, but most likely in your local region. The good news here is that when you support the Firebox Campaign you are not only supporting a product made in America, but also made in your state and likely your local region, thereby supporting your own local economy. The bad news is that, until we establish a local supplier in your region, I won't be able to fulfill your perk. It's a bit of a risk, but I'm hoping that the idea and the product is good enough that we can blow right through the initial establishment of demand phase and start enlisting suppliers in the regions where the demand is. 

     This campaign is pretty much my job now, and I'll be working non-stop to make it successful. Like you, I am a veritable force of nature once my intention is clear and I know what I want. Trust me. I'll be using all of my obsessive compulsions, all of my fairly vast experience, and call in every one of my favors, real or imaginary, to make this campaign a success and to make sure your pledge is fulfilled. So catch fire, this is happening now. Make a pledge.


What We Need & What You Get

I'm setting the goal at $25,000 and using flexible funding mainly because it allows both paypal and credit card contributions. What we really need though is your support and then, more than anything, we need to establish a state by state and regional supplier network. The Firebox is a good deal for suppliers, and will enable them to make 2-3 times the money on their woodlots. It likely will take a season or three to really get rolling, and initially they may have to modify their current stock of firewood, but long range it will be well worth it, and any suppliers willing to get on board early will get special attention and consideration when the Firebox really takes hold. This campaign is an opportunity to get in ground floor on something that will enable you to make a good deal more money for your work. The numbers are fair, the product unique though obvious, and your involvement crucial. $1,500 is a considerable chunk, but your investment will be virtually guaranteed as it will come with a local customer base which you would be wise to expand. K.O.A. campgrounds, state and national parks, local retail outlets, get some cards made free at vistaprint and establish more accounts. Once we get rolling I'll turn my attention towards establishing national retail accounts and you will be hard pressed to keep up with the demand, and always making more money. I promise. My job will be to produce and supply the boxes, the point of purchase displays, moderate the forum and web site, and then work on establishing models for extracting fuel wood from forests while making them more healthy and less prone to wildfire.

     I've set up the perks to cover a range of end user involvement, a reasonable buy in for suppliers, an upper tier for retailers, and ranges for more minor and then angel levels of involvement. In the beginning of this campaign I think the $1-$50 dollar pledges will be the heart of the matter and I urge you to take the chance. It's your initial support that will give the suppliers the confidence to get on board the campaign and thus enable the fulfilling of your pledges.

     I've included with the 5 and 10 dollar pledge levels, rainbow stickers. These are over 20 years old, vintage original translucent rainbow stickers. This is kind of a flyer, but I've got thousands of these and they are virtually unobtainium.  I remember  fondly the Seventies when these were common on the back windows of cars and held only the meaning of happiness and appreciation of natural beauty and I want these to be the new environmental stickers of the age. So for 5 bucks you get one, and for 10 you get two. They're cool stickers, you can't get them anywhere but here, and you'll be supporting a worthy campaign.


Other Ways You Can Help

No matter what level of involvement you are able to contribute to, or even if you cannot contribute at all, I urge you all to share the Firebox campaign with your friends. Tell your local store about the campaign and let them know you'd buy Fireboxes if they were available, let your local firewood guy know the opportunity exists. C'mon, it's just the click of a button, the comment at the store, a phone call to your local firewood guy. Tell your friends, they'll like it too, everybody likes a good fire. This is real and it's happening right now.
