story:
That smell, that sticky buildup, and don't even get us started on the liquid that seems to self-generate . . . garbage juice, gross!

So if you could avoid smelling it, touching it, replacing bags and dealing with the whole process, wouldn’t you?

 

More Than Taking Out Trash

 

  

365-Day Risk Free

At TOWNEW, we stand by our products. Every order is backed by our one-year manufacturing warranty. Delivery is guaranteed within 60 days of September 30, 2019, or your money back. 

 

 

Your home is crazy busy, and we get it. 

The last thing you want to do is spend all your time cleaning up after everyone else. At townew we want to make taking out the trash just a bit cleaner, a tad simpler, a little faster so you can take a moment for yourself . . . until the next thing comes up that needs your attention. 

 

 

Self-Sealing, Self-Changing

Simply hold the button for 3 seconds and our built-in thermoplastic sealing technology automatically seals the trash bag inside to guarantee no spilling or exposure to any bad odor. Our self-seal is also designed to be moisture and water-resistant. This is to ensure that no matter how harsh the environment is around the trash can (or how many diapers you threw inside), it will still work perfectly.

 

townew automatically replaces the full, sealed trash bag with a new, empty bag.

 

Lid That Stays Open When You Need It To

A simple swipe motion opens and closes the lid with barely a whisper. Plus, townew is equipped with a lid open mode for when you want the lid to stay open. Simply tap the button once to keep it open and tap again to cancel. 

 

Overload Feature

Detects when the trash can is too full, lifting the whole top compartment so it can seal the bag, guaranteeing you no spillage. 

 

 

Trash Bag Refills

Replace the refill ring about once per month . . . And that's it!

Trade in your traditional garbage bags for our durable trash bags made with PE Material which is better for the environment.

Our refill rings are 100% recyclable! Each refill ring contains up to 25 durable trash bags and lasts approximately one month.

Each TOWNEW pre-order comes with four refill rings—that's about a 4-month supply! Refill rings will first be available to purchase on most e-commerce sites, such as Amazon US, CA, EU marketplaces, Newegg and our official website: hellotownew.com.

 

 

Our Story

 

 

 

Specifications

 

A Modern Design

The exterior is built with ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene) material, an engineering-grade plastic that has a high resistant to chemical, impact, and electrical insulation. It can also withstand humidity and different temperatures.

Finally, A Beautiful Trash Can For The Whole House

 

Our Technology

At Knectek Labs, we're refining how technology fits into everyday life. As designers and innovators, we wake up every day with the mindset to build technology that fits everyday life. And if the technology doesn’t exist, we create it. We believe the future of technology is simple and personal. 

Our award-winning products have been featured in:

 

 

Making Headlines

Read More

Read More

Read More

Read More

 

 

Risks and Challenges

We design, engineer, and manufacture products for simplicity and value.

By having direct access and control over the full supply chain, as well as our sales and marketing efforts throughout North America and Europe, we are uniquely positioned as a DTC manufacturer who can cycle information and insights up or down channel extremely quickly. 

We are confident we will meet our planned schedule, but there are risks that may be out of our control. If there are any delays, we promise to communicate with our backers right away. 

After the campaign, we will share the steps of our journey towards manufacturing, packaging, and shipping, allowing each backer to stay in the loop and know where we are at in our timeline. 

 

 

Last year, TOWNEW was beta launched in China on the internet platform and strongly hit the market. Now we are bringing a new model of townew to North America and Europe. Although they look the same, the inside key electronic components are updated with a more advanced motor and designed with different materials to ensure the product is fully certified with FCC and cTUVus.

We’ve also found some unauthorized sites “selling” our beta launch version of townew. As of now, Indiegogo is the ONLY official channel for backing TOWNEW in North America. We have not authorized any vendors or resellers at this point. To all our supporters, we urge you to be careful of any fake websites.

 

Next Steps

Our team is hard at work developing large-size models for release next year. The Indiegogo community is amazing. Your feedback and support has played a critical role in the success of townew so far, which is why pre-order customers will have access to a special offer when the large size model is available.

 

We Are On Track to Deliver

Photos from inside our award-winning factory. 

 

 

Follow these 5 simple steps:

1. Log into your Indiegogo Account.

2. Visit the townew Campaign Page.

3. Click on the Facebook and Twitter buttons at the top of the page to share. You can also copy the link icon and share it anywhere online (e-mail, social pages, forums, blogs...etc.)

4. For each person you refer that makes a purchase, you will receive a $5 Amazon gift card. 

5. Make sure you're logged in when you share your link. You can track your referrals by going to your Indiegogo Profile and clicking Referrals. 

This referral program will run until the campaign ends and does not apply to refunded purchases.

Photos from inside our award-winning factory.

1. Log into your Indiegogo Account.
2. Visit the townew Campaign Page.
3. Click on the Facebook and Twitter buttons at the top of the page to share. You can also copy the link icon and share it anywhere online (e-mail, social pages, forums, blogs...etc.)
4. For each person you refer that makes a purchase, you will receive a $5 Amazon gift card. 
5. Make sure you're logged in when you share your link. You can track your referrals by going to your Indiegogo Profile and clicking Referrals. 
This referral program will run until the campaign ends and does not apply to refunded purchases.

story:
Deep clean your floor, remove stains and make it shine like you’d cleaned by hand, absolutely hassle-free!

 

Accidentally spilled some coffee or milk on the floor?

 

Have no time to clean the stained floor?

 

Stubborn stains make you bend and tire out your hands?

 

Wave goodbye to your mop and bucket!
Handi-mopper is here to do the hard work for you.

Check out this hand-like high frequency mopping robot!

Just like hire someone to mop your floor really hard & fast!

It mops every stain on your floor.

 

 

 

4 invention patents, 6 utility model patents and 2 appearance patents.
& iF Design Award 2020

 

Are you still mopping the floor with your hands, bending down till you’re exhausted?
Handi-mopper has got your back. With its high-frequency reciprocating motion, the robot mop’s patented dual-fiber pad technology simulates the rubbing action of your hands, leaving your floor clean, stainless, and shining like new!

 

No one likes hidden dirt under beds, sofas, along edges, and in corners. Neither does Handi-mopper. With its multiple modes of operation and a gyroscopic navigation system, it cleans every inch of your floor. Its small size means it can fit under your sofa and furniture, efficiently cleaning all hard-to-reach spaces.

 

Handi-mopper knows your home better than you do! It uses advanced positioning technology, mapping, and continuous learning to automatically plan its cleaning route for every room in your home. By track recording, the robot locates itself, remembers clean and non-clean zones, and navigates to new zones to avoid omissions and repetitions.

 

 

The sleek square design of this robot mop is not accidental: Unlike rounded moppers, Handi-mopper has access to all the corners of your house and leaves no dust there.

 

Handi-mopper not only gives the floor in your house a first-class deep clean but it can also disinfect and polish it. Just add any cleaning solution or polish to its tank. Keeping your floor clean has never been this easy! Empty water tank after using wax and dishwashing liquid.

 

No matter whether it’s light dust or stubborn spots caused by juice residue, Handi-mopper will remove them easily, effectively, and totally. Simply set the relevant mode and forget those stains ever existed.
Adjust the humidity level of the water sprayer and mopping frequency and choose one of 3 modes. Handi-mopper will take care of all the rest!
 

 

Edge Cleaning: The robot starts mopping alongside the walls.

 

Standard Cleaning: The robot starts moving from the charging dock, mopping within 4m*4m zones one by one.

 

Spiral Cleaning: The robot starts mopping from the setting point, drawing circles outward — one circle anti-clockwise and one circle — clockwise, following which it goes back to the start point. The diameter is 1.25 meters.

 

 

 

Handi-mopper works with the intuitive Tuya Smart App. Simply connect your robot mop to your Tuya app, set the cleaning mode and start mopping anytime, no matter where you are. You can also time the regular auto works for weeks to ensure the floor in your house is always clean.

 

Handi-mopper is always on duty. With its built-in Wi-Fi connectivity, you can order it to clean your floor while you’re in the office or on vacation! And if you need more control, turn it on and track its progress through the app. All in all, what can be better than stepping into your house with a floor as clean as new?

 

 

 

Handi-mopper won’t ever fall down stairs. Thanks to its smart fall prevention sensors, it detects and escapes any height of at least 7 cm.

 

 

You don’t need to worry your robot mop will ever let you down and leave your floors dirty. Handi-mopper goes to the charge dock automatically once it finishes its cleaning task or its power is below 20%. After getting the necessary juice, it continues the unfinished task or waits for your next order.

 

Made of durable materials, Handi-mopper is designed to last. It comes with a set of durable mops — made of 80% dacron and 20% chinlon — that can be used repeatedly.

 

1. Install the mops on the vibrating pieces and add water to the tank

 

2. Connect to Tuya App, set the cleaning mode

 

3. The robot mop starts smart cleaning

 

4. It returns automatically to the dock to recharge

 

5. Uninstall the mops and clean the tank

 

 

 

 

 

SWDK was developed by Ningbo SWDK Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.. The parent company Ningbo SWDK Electrical Appliance Co., Ltd. is a professional manufacturer for home cleaning appliances and works on the domestic market online and offline. SWDK is also a Xiaomi eco-chain enterprise, which means the company is invested by Xiaomi and its products comply with the latter’s quality requirements.

The team has already achieved great success with various technologies of sweeping, mopping and vacuum cleaning. Their ultimate goal is to help speed up general home cleaning even more, freeing more people from daily house work to enjoy smarter lives and focus on the things that matter most.

Contact the team: support@cn-swdk.com

story:
WholeStory Collective is on a mission to make the world a better place one hammock at a time. We believe everyone deserves to be comfortable. So we set out to create the world's comfiest hammocks and lounge chairs using sustainable materials and expert craftsmanship. But we didn't stop there. In the process we created a business model that fights poverty with every product that we sell. 10% of your purchase goes directly towards building a home for a family in need. Our team is driven everyday to bring true comfort to both our customers and families in need.

Each of our hammocks are crafted by a family of artisans who have been hand-weaving hammocks for over 80 years. To date, we have built 4 homes for families in need in El Sauce, Nicaragua with our non profit partner the 4 WALLS Project. You, our customers are the key driver to all the impact that we create. Help us build house number 5 by purchasing the world's comfiest hammocks listed on the right hand column. And never forget to sit back and relax, you're making the world a better place.

Hanging Hammock Chair

Our three styles of hanging hammock chairs. Simple Sand (Far Left), Navy (Middle), Black & White (Far Right)

Hammock Lounger

Azteca Navy

Simple Sand 

What is the WholeStory?

We believe our customer should know the "wholestory" behind each product we create. We want to educate you on our sustainable supply chain, the artisans hand-making each product, and the family you are helping with your purchase. 

42,000 hectacres of forest get burned down every year in Nicaragua. We have found a partner who is growing tree plantations throughout Nicaragua and then sustainably harvesting those trees to create finished furniture. With every piece of furniture made, 100 trees are planted in Nicaragua.

We have partnered with a family of artisans who have been handcrafting hammocks for over 80 years. Our artisans use a double handwoven technique that creates double the support of a traditional hammock. Our weaves form to your body and are super soft and durable, creating the most comfortable hammock you'll ever lay on!

Nicaragua is the 2nd pooreset country in the western hemisphere with 46% of the population living on less than $2 a day. Nicaragua has been plagued by extreme poverty, civil war and natural disasters for over a century. We have found an amazing non profit partner called the 4 WALLS Project who are building a better future for families in El Sauce, Nicaragua. 4 WALLS builds homes for families in need in rural Nicaragua. Help us build our 5th home for a family in El Sauce, Nicaragua.           

 Founders Story

WholeStory Collecive was started on a simple belief that every family deserves a safe place to call home. This belief brought me to Nicaragua, the 2nd poorest country in the western hemisphere with 46% of the population living on less than 2 dollars a day. But during my first trip to Nicaragua I soon learned it was much more than a place plagued by poverty. It was a place of beauty, talent, and most importantly relaxation. Time was never seen as wasted, only enjoyed.

I soon fell in love with the product that symbolized this beautiful way of life; hammocks! I visited family workshops that handcrafted each hammock one loop at a time creating the most beautiful hammocks I'd ever seen. Instantly I knew I needed to share these amazing hammocks with the world. 

I then took a trip to the northern part of Nicaragua to meet an amazing non profit called the 4 Walls Project. The 4 Walls Project was doing amazing work building homes for families in need in a town called El Sauce. I was taken back by the extreme poverty that existed there and the lack of safe shelter. After this trip is decided I was going to start a hammock company that helped build homes for families in need. 

This Kickstarter project is helping to take WholeStory to the next level by bring the world's best hammocks and lounge chairs to market. We have spent over a year creating designs that would allow both extreme comfort and durability for our customers. By supporting us you have become a building block to a brighter future. We can't wait for you to enjoy our products and are so thankful that you have joined the WholeStory Community.

story:
Why I Began The Half Helen Foundation ...

I failed my first two tests at school – my vision & hearing tests! The tests revealed I was half-blind and half-deaf.

The crazy thing is … my vision loss was preventable. Early detection is critical.

My name is Chelsea Elliott, Executive Director of the Half Helen Foundation. After learning about Helen Keller’s extraordinary life in 4th grade, I declared, “I’m half-blind, I’m half-deaf. I am half-Helen!” Helen Keller said, “The only thing worse than being blind is having sight but no vision.”

The Facts ...

Today, my passion is to improve vision and hearing globally by advocating for and strengthening screening practices. Advanced photoscreening technology exists, yet schools across the country still use the 153-year-old eye chart.  Within seconds, a photoscreening device can screen children as young 6 months old for the 6 most common eye disorders. By December 2015, we will have screened over 20,000 children. Approximately 2,600 of those children will need eye examinations and corrective ware.

Our biggest challenge is ensuring these children receive an eye exam and corrective treatment after identification of a problem. There is NO system in place to track a child through the process of initial screening, comprehensive exam, and follow-up care.

Half-Helen’s next phase is to facilitate the interchange of children’s vision and hearing data between HHF and their parents, school, and doctors, to create wrap-around services that ensure that identified problems are addressed.

Our SaaS platform will allow stakeholders to communicate within the system and have access to the right information as a child moves from IN NEED to SUCCEED. Doctors, insurances companies, schools, and families - CONNECTED.

We Need Your Support!

Half Helen needs your support to develop and expand our screening and follow up services. Help us reach our goal today!  

The children are back in school!

  • New clothes? CHECK!
  • New backpack? CHECK!
  • High quality vision screening? _______ UHHHH

With your help, we can check that box for each child in Texas too!

As Helen Keller said,
“Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.” Together, we can prevent the preventable.


What We Need & What You Get ...

We are seeking funding to consult with a Database Architect who will assist in designing the software application. In order to take this first step, we need your support!  

$10 - Thank You on the Half Helen website

$20 - 1 Half Helen Tumbler cup (straw included)



$35 - 1 Half Helen T-Shirt


$50 - Half Helen Tumbler Cup + T-shirt Package!

 +   


$75 - Couples Package: 2 Tumbler cups + 2 T-shirts

$199 - Join Half Helen on a Vision Screening Day and see our work in action

$500 - Join Our Team for a private dinner in Austin and learn more about our mission (travel left to the donor). 

The Impact You Will Create ...

80% of learning is visual.
The equation is simple: if kids can't see, kids can't learn. 

All children deserve clear vision. Since 2013, Half Helen has provided high-tech vision screenings to over 12,000 children, referring over 1,200 for complete eye exams by eye care professionals. Support Half Helen in our mission to ensure children are capable of experiencing life's opportunities, and are not limited by preventable vision impairments. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Looking for other ways to support our efforts? Read below for our suggestions:

  • Share our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family!
  • Sign up to volunteer at a school vision screening (perhaps your donor-sponsored school!)
  • Serve on the Half Helen Advisory Committee. Email Executive Director, Chelsea Elliott (chelsea@halfhelen.org), to join now.

story:
Stop tracking, spying & hacking with Winston:

 

VAT/GST

For purchases outside the USA, customers are responsible for VAT/GST.

Check out the "Updates" section on Indiegogo to learn more about current shipping status! 

For December/January/February/April Indiegogo perk deliveries, we’ll send tracking notification when your units have shipped.

If you want to find out your reward tier's estimated shipping date, log in to your Indiegogo account click on the "Contributions" tab and "View donation details" on your Winston contribution.

 
 

 

Winston’s founder, Richard Stokes, was in the ad-tech industry for over a decade, most recently as the Global Head of Innovation for the media intelligence division of the world's largest advertising agency. 

In that role, he saw the industry move to embrace new technologies that track, mine, and sell private information (imagine every song you like, every relationship, every purchase you make, and every secret you have being stored forever in the cloud). 

That was the beginning of the omnipresent surveillance state. Rich decided this was not a world that he wanted his children to grow up in. It all came down to one question…if he wasn't the person to do something about it, then who would?

That’s where Winston comes in. 

We founded Winston Privacy with a clear mission: to help Internet users take back control over their personal information online. 

Comprehensive privacy is not only possible, but it's also realistic. Our team is made of people with diverse technical backgrounds and skillsets, and deep knowledge of the state of online privacy.

Our founder is an engineer by training who left a career in advertising after seeing firsthand the increasing abuses of personal data that are taking place. 

At Winston, we’re not only building products that put the power back into your hands, but we’re also advocating for change.

Our team began the Winston journey by shipping about 100 beta and pilot units so that users could put our claims to the test. Now that we’re 100% sure Winston is ready for the market, we decided to turn to the Indiegogo community for support. 

We’ll use all of the funds from our Indiegogo campaign to fund manufacturing for a large scale order and get privacy to your home.

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Winston a reality. 

You can also help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 

Access our Media / Press Kit here.

story:
The cast-iron skillet is the cornerstone of any serious kitchen. With it, you can sear, bake, or fry with unbeatable results. No other type of pan even comes close. But out of convenience, cast-iron is often overlooked in favor of coated non-stick pans.
 
We set out to change that — introducing Prepd Skillet.

Prepd Skillet combines non-stick convenience with the performance, versatility, and durability of cast-iron, to create the ultimate pan.
 
With a beautiful minimal aesthetic and polished smooth cooking surface, our skillet is unlike any cast-iron you’ve ever seen.
 
Prepd Skillet can handle any challenge you throw at it and will take your cooking to the next level. It’s the only pan you will ever need. 
 
The key to high performing cast-iron is a quality seasoning. With Prepd Skillet, we’ve done the hard work so you don’t have to. After polishing, we apply multiple coatings of grapeseed oil and extensive heat treatment so that it will outperform any other skillet, right out of the box.

 
Prepd Skillet rivals even the most high end coated non-stick pans — without any of the synthetic chemicals, so you can cook at high heat without any worries.

 
Unlike other types of pans, cast-iron cooks food evenly -- not just on the surface. Cast-iron has far superior heat retention and volumetric heat capacity, emitting heat beyond the surface of the pan. This results in unbeatable sears, juicy roasts, and perfectly golden bakes that no other pan can offer.
 
Prepd Skillet does the job of a roasting pan, a stainless steel skillet, and a non-stick all in one.

Our skillets are made with care, attention to detail and to the highest quality. Prepd Skillet is an investment that will last many generations, and better yet, it will only improve with age. Every use adds to the layers of seasoning, so your skillet will become even more non-stick the longer you use it.

Our skillet alone will dramatically improve how you cook. But we didn't stop there... We have created a resource of our favorite cast-iron dishes so that you'll be able to find awesome new recipes to cook for breakfast, lunch or dinner. From simple one-pan meals to fancy dishes that will impress your friends, there’s a recipe for every occasion.
We’ve also designed an innovative set of accessories to complement your Prepd Skillet.
 
Made from high-grade leather, the Handle Cover protects you when the pan gets hot. The cover is perfectly contoured to fit the Prepd Skillet handle while still allowing you to easily slide the cover on and off. 
 
The Table Trivet protects your dining table or kitchen surface so you can take your meal directly from the oven to the table. It’s perfect for entertaining. Made from premium silicone and with a unique ventilated design, the trivet is also easy to clean.

 

 

We have been designing and working on the details of the skillet since 2017. Although the product looks very simple it has taken multiple iterations and prototypes of design and we have visited the facilities of dozens of manufacturers to get to this stage.
 

We have already created and refined the tooling for the product and we are very confident in our ability to deliver on time and at scale.

Over the last couple of years of developing Prepd, cooking has become one of the most important parts of our lives. Some of the most enjoyable moments have been sharing a home-cooked meal with friends and family, old and new, with a cast-iron skillet often taking center stage.
 
We became obsessed by cast iron skillets, not only for the results they give in the kitchen but by the way that they are made and as industrial designers and engineers we couldn’t help ourselves, we had to challenge convention and take this classic staple in the kitchen and respectfully modernized it, improving performance for everyday excellent cooking whilst retaining the heirloom quality of a 100-year-old skillet.

 

We've already completed our first round of tooling, trialed the machining process, made first full samples and put them through their paces. We are truly blown away with the performance of these Skillets. 

 

At Prepd it's our goal to make eating well, fun and enjoyable through good design.
 
Prepd was founded by two industrial designers: Chris Place & Will Matters, together we have designed and manufactured dozens of products and delivered product to customers all over the world. Our first product together was the Prepd Pack a reinvention of the lunchbox that was launched and successfully delivered to over 12,500 backers on Kickstarter in 2016. 
 
We can't wait to go on this next Prepd journey with you!
story_txt:
The cast-iron skillet is the cornerstone of any serious kitchen. With it, you can sear, bake, or fry with unbeatable results. No other type of pan even comes close. But out of convenience, cast-iron is often overlooked in favor of coated non-stick pans. We set out to change that — introducing Prepd Skillet.Prepd Skillet combines non-stick convenience with the performance, versatility, and durability of cast-iron, to create the ultimate pan. With a beautiful minimal aesthetic and polished smooth cooking surface, our skillet is unlike any cast-iron you’ve ever seen. Prepd Skillet can handle any challenge you throw at it and will take your cooking to the next level. It’s the only pan you will ever need. 
The cast-iron skillet is a durable and versatile workhorse, but the typically rough cooking surface means it’s not always a smooth operator, and food will occasionally stick. Through precision machining, we completely transform the cooking surface into one that’s perfectly smooth, making it naturally non-stick. The key to high performing cast-iron is a quality seasoning. With Prepd Skillet, we’ve done the hard work so you don’t have to. After polishing, we apply multiple coatings of grapeseed oil and extensive heat treatment so that it will outperform any other skillet, right out of the box.The extra hours of polishing and seasoning result in an incredibly smooth, non-stick finish — so smooth that you can fry an egg on it, without it sticking to the pan. 
Prepd Skillet rivals even the most high end coated non-stick pans — without any of the synthetic chemicals, so you can cook at high heat without any worries.

Prepd Skillet is designed to be the most versatile pan you have ever used. It gives the best results, whether you’re cooking on gas, electric or induction cooktops -- you can even use it on the campfire! Unlike other types of pans, cast-iron cooks food evenly -- not just on the surface. Cast-iron has far superior heat retention and volumetric heat capacity, emitting heat beyond the surface of the pan. This results in unbeatable sears, juicy roasts, and perfectly golden bakes that no other pan can offer. 
Prepd Skillet does the job of a roasting pan, a stainless steel skillet, and a non-stick all in one.

We've already completed our first round of tooling, trialed the machining process, made first full samples and put them through their paces. We are truly blown away with the performance of these Skillets.

story:
The Dovetail End Table is our signature piece. We designed the table to capture a balance between Western sensibilities and the Eastern traditions. Western designs tend to have a more simple and clean look, while Eastern styles contain depth in its use of subtlety and harmony.

The table panels are fashioned from a deep walnut or a rich cherry wood, while the legs are constructed from a lighter colored ash wood to create a beautiful contrast. We take care to use natural finishes to preserve the look and feel of the original solid wood.

 

 

Our main inspiration came from studying the practicality and beauty of ancient woodworking joineries. There are many hidden and beautiful techniques that can be used as joineries to combine two pieces of wood. We found that the dovetail joint has the charm to have both a classic and a modern appeal. The dovetail is a commonly used joint in woodworking today to connect and reinforce panels on cabinets and tables. Besides being eye-catching, dovetail joint provides both strong horizontal and vertical structural support.

In ancient China, woodworkers would masterfully chisel each dovetail by hand. However, it was standard practice in that period to hide these joints out of view; the master craftsmanship hidden and therefore unappreciated.

Our goal is to expose and liberate these beautiful joineries, and present them as their own respective design elements. This has become our approach to designing our products.

The result is a table that is both gracefully simple and incredibly strong.

  • Assembling

 

  • Sanding

We are proud to work with a local American factory in central Pennsylvania to realize our designs.

While the Dovetail End Table looks simple, producing it using modern machinery was a challenge. In the end, we adapted by using custom tooling and created new processes to achieve a high-quality and cost-efficient production. We took great care in each step to build an impeccable product of the highest standard; as expected from something made in the USA.

WE Living is a New York City-based furniture startup featuring unique designs that meld the beauty of contemporary and traditional aesthetics. Our brand’s signature joinery feature derives from the most enduring techniques used in traditional Chinese woodworking.

“WE” stands for West & East. This describes our design approach--a celebration of Western contemporary and Chinese traditional furniture making.

“WE” also stands for community. We believe true inspiration arises when a community openly shares their respective cultures, embraces different values, and strives to bring positive changes to its surroundings.

                      

 

Interested in featuring WE Living or the dovetail end table? You will find everything you need HERE including hi-res images, gifs and type writing. You can also email us at info@weliving.us for inquiries and information.

Yifan was a management consultant with Bain & company. The diversity of her clientele gave her unique exposure to different perspectives on how to approach a market and manage a business. Always been passionate about home decoration, Yifan’s goal is to offer furniture that is unique and well-designed for fellow “home” lovers like herself.

Kaichuan is a designer and maker. He learned the beauty in subtleness while acquiring deep admiration for the wisdom that is passed down through tradition. Kaichuan pursued his Master in Furniture Design at RISD, and his passion has been focusing on creating beautiful home products by combining the modern and the traditional.

When Yifan and Kaichuan first met, they realized immediately they shared the same passion and vision for furniture design, and that together they would create something great.

Part of the idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build products in a rapid, user-centered design cycle. By reaching out on Indiegogo, we can assess our demand, build stronger relationships with our early adopters, and use feedback to make our product as amazing as possible.

The contributions we raise in the pre-order campaign will allow us to place orders with our manufacturers. And they will help us to continue developing more products for the Dovetail collection.

story:
Hicosy
Easy, open hardware platform for energy monitoring

Greater savings and a green environmental impact for your solar panels.

www.hicosy.eu

Energy from the sun - powered by the cloud.

Remotely control your energy plant or your smart-home, on a dedicated Web Console or on your Mobile Device anytime, anywhere.

Support Hicosy now and you will receive free access to premium services and free software and firmware upgrade.


Hicosy for Homeowners

Monitor your consumption and get more power from your solar panels.

As solar panel owners, like you, we love seeing how much energy our system generates and how much energy we’re using. This powerful information can guide you to precious energy savings.
Hicosy is designed to go beyond the standard information provided by your solar panel vendor and allow your to see energy stats on the move, through our dashboard with any smartphone, tablet, or computer.
Just log in to your www.hicosy.eu account and get the next level of energy insights.


Hicosy for plants owners and maintenance contractors

Make the most out of your plant, centralize management and reporting.

For plants owners Hicosy solution is designed to maximize the return of investment. We have combined the Open Hardware platform of Arduino with an easy to install custom module to enable real-time monitoring of solar panels performance. For maintenance contractors, the centralized Hicosy webservice allows you to collect data across all managed plants to optimize your resources and have better operations.

Hicosy Kit - open hardware, without the hassle.

Hicosy comes in two flavours, available for data transmission over WiFi and GSM which enables you to monitor energy production and consumption.


From a platform point of view, Hicosy Wi-Fi and Hicosy Wi-Fi + Cellular enable solutions in all contexts where it’s necessary to have a communication of data to the Cloud Server. Including areas not covered by standard ADSL Internet. Field of application range:
  • H24 monitoring of Photovoltaic plants
  • Tracking of alarms and warning messages
  • Comparison of target data with real production data
  • Economic estimation of ROI
  • Monthly analysis of data production and economic revenues
  • Hicosy also allows customers to put together by themselves a complex end-to-end system to monitor their photovoltaic plants

HICOSY WI-FI

Transmission over the internet

The Hicosy kit is connected to the inverter and to the local network (Home Area Network) either with WiFi or Ethernet connection.
It continuously acquires data related to energy production (energy, voltage, current) and to the states of your plant (alarms particularly), directly from the inverter.
Acquired data are transmitted via your ADSL connection to a Cloud Application on the Web and stored in a secure way making them available on your personal monitoring dashboard and from your mobile device.
The use of this kit requires the availability of a local area network ( WLAN or LAN) and the ADSL connection.


HICOSY WI-FI + CELLULAR

Transmission through internet and GSM network

The Hicosy kit is connected to the inverter, to your HAN and the GSM network.
It continuously acquires data related to energy production (energy, voltage, current) and to the states of your plant (alarms particularly), directly from the inverter. Acquired data are transmitted via internet or GSM connection(based on the best choice) to a Cloud Application on the Web and stored in a secure way making them available on your personal monitoring dashboard and on your mobile device.
The complete use of this kit requires the availability of a GSM coverage on the site of your plant.


List of compatible hardware.

Hicosy kits are currently compatible with all the mayor inverter vendors.
See the full list of compatible Inverters. If your hardware is not listed, don't worry, just contact us and, with your help we will develop the new software to interface your inverter.



Hicosy Service

Webservice

How much energy is generating my plant? Is it working effectively and strongly? If a failure affects the normal working state of my plant, can I realize it? Hicosy monitoring service provides the tools to answer all these questions with a Cloud 24/24 Infrastructure. Our web service allow real-time monitoring with alerts on your mobile device of any fault.
Check your output, compare ratings and estimate the payback time of installation.

Mobile App

See your plant at a glance, right on your mobile device.
Manage your plant and receive push-notifications in real time if something goes wrong.


HICOSY CUSTOMERS

View photos and informations about systems already monitored with Hicosy

Plant in Paternopoli (AV)

Plant of 4.5 kwp, 18 polycrystalline panels equipped with Aurora Powerone PVI 4.2 OUTD, monitored with Hicosy Wi-Fi + Cellular Kit. Discover more on our website.

Plant in Piacenza

Plant of 3.0 kwp, 12 polycrystalline panels equipped with Aurora Powerone PVI 3.0 OUTD, monitored with Hicosy Wi-Fi Kit. Discover more on our website.


Hicosy is developed (with love) by

The R&D lab for open-source technologies from Reply Group

Hicosy is under development thanks to the consolidated experience of Concept Reply. Since 2014 Hicosy has brought R&D expertise on Open Source technologies to the Reply Group by proposing the idea of a complete ecosystem for Internet of Things in the area of Renewable Energy production and monitoring. 


ROADMAP

FAQ

If you've got any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us on our social network or by mail at hicosy.info@reply.eu.

story:
Perks were recently updated (# claimed reset to 0).

This is not just another Litter Scooper... It's THE Scoop!

Millions of people love cats and share their homes with them. But ask any cat owner what they dislike most about having a cat in their home, and they’ll likely tell you: "SCOOPING THE LITTERBOX!"

We have the answer: It's The Scoop is lightweight, zinc-coated metal that is easy to clean and perfect for multi-cat families and professionals!

There's no need to shake it when scooping because the litter falls right through the round tines, so there's NO DUST! All you're lifting is the waste.

It’s The Scoop is the last scoop you will ever need, and it's guaranteed!

 

Background

Living in a house they converted into a cat rescue for over 10 years, Ted and Marie Glover understand the challenges of cat care better than most. The daily task of scooping litter was taking over an hour every day, and something had to change.

They tried every different type of litter scoop out there, only to find copycat designs that didn’t solve the problem: the “panning for gold” action necessary to sift the litter from the waste, which is time-consuming and raises dust and allergens into the air.

Ted’s artistic ability and mechanical background brought vital know-how to design the perfect scoop, and after two long years, the first prototype was delivered. They were able to cut scooping time down from over an hour to just 20 minutes, and there was NO DUST!

Ted and Marie’s son, Dennis, joined K-Kat in 2013, making it a real family business. They did a test run of 1,800 scoops, and have had fantastic feedback from their cat rescue network and from selling It's The Scoop at local cat shows. They are now ready to make their first big production run of 5,000 scoops and need your help to make that happen!

 

 

Perks were recently updated (# claimed reset to 0).

 

(This campaign was successfully funded in February 2015.) 

Learn more about the team and their products at www.k-kat.com!

story:
Fermenta Lock - Makes Pickling Fresh Foods Easy

An all new Airlock Fermenting Lid, for Mason Jars. No awkward water lock sticking up on top of the lid, just a low profile, elegant little one-way valve that lets air out, but not in. So simple, all you need to know how to do, is twist the lid onto your pickling jar!
 
Pickled Salsa
 
Fermenta Lock is more economical than water lock pickling systems. One lid fits any size canning jar (you choose between narrow or wide mouth lid size). Unlike other Airlock Pickling Systems, you do not have to purchase an entire system for each size you need. One wide mouth lid goes on any wide mouth mason jar.
 
The one-way valve is manufactured by hand in the United States. It is made of food grade silicone, not latex!
 
We need your help to make a good product better!

 

Where We Got Stuck

We are currently making the valves by hand. ("We" means Kevin and Laura - you can read more about us, and our business model on our website.) We intend to continue to do so. Since no part exists that is like the one we need, we had to create our own mold for it. The materials available are not the best ones for the purpose, and our product is a little rougher than we need it to be. It functions well, but has a lot of surface texture.
 
You can see the texture in this unretouched image.
The valve is made of yellow silicone.
 
We are also stuck having to pour just a few at a time, because we've only been able to make a few molds with the current method. This makes manufacturing very slow, since each pour has to cure for several hours in the molds.
 
We can SELL the products. We can't produce them fast enough.
 

We need more molds! And we need BETTER molds.

 
If we can obtain a Master Mold for each molded item, from which we can cast as many molds as we need, we will be able to expand as much as we need at an affordable cost. The Master Molds must be custom made (we can get them made in the U.S.). They must be custom machined, and this is a costly process.
 
We also need some additional materials and equipment so that we can improve some of our other products. With these additional materials, we will be able to do the following:
  • Create an airlock valve for our glass pickling crock, and purchase equipment to manufacture the lid and valve.
  • Get master molds and dies for our gaskets for crocks and lids (to make the manufacturing process faster), and obtain better home manufacturing tools for these items.
  • Improve the design and style of our Dunker food weights, and increase the weight so they function better. This will also bring the manufacturing of this product to the US (currently this product is ONLY available imported).
  • Develop a training program to train home business owners to manufacture the valves and glass products,  and create starter kits for home manufacturing, so that we do not have to create a factory environment to meet rising demand. This will allow other home business owners to earn a good living from making our products. (Laura has extensive experience developing training programs, she wrote the curriculum and materials for a Certification course for the University of Wyoming.) This will also make it possible for our product to go International - and for it to be manufactured in other countries to supply international needs.
  • If we do not meet our goal, we'll make what we do receive go as far as possible in reaching our goals. If we receive more than our goal, we'll use the funds to invest in the next level of efficiency and productivity to make our product more available and better quality.

 

It Isn't Just About Making a Product to Make Food at Home

It is about jobs in America - and jobs in other countries to fill orders placed in those countries.
 
We are committed to the concept of local and home food production, but we are also committed to the concept of home business and cottage industry. We've been involved in business startups (as a successful web development and startup consulting company for very small businesses), for more than a decade, and we know how to operate a successful company. When we chose to change our line of work, we knew we wanted to build something different.
 
If you make a product from plastic or rubber (including silicone rubber), it must meet very specific requirements to be FDA approved for food use. It isn't just the components of the rubber or plastic, it is also how it is manufactured. Additional ingredients such as hardeners or substances to improve flexibility may be added during the manufacturing of the parts. It is difficult to tell which chemicals have been used.
 
Given the recent problems with contaminated products which were imported into the US, we knew that we did NOT feel good about contracting internationally for the parts we needed. Virtually all rubber and plastic fabrication is now done in India or China. Even companies in the US which provide fabrication services typically have the work done overseas. This hurts our company because we have less control over quality (we cannot see the materials used), and it hurts America (and many other countries) because jobs have left our country, along with the ability to GET certain kinds of work done within our own borders.
 
By manufacturing this product ourselves, and expanding our business through small subcontractors, we can keep production for US orders in our own country, and REDUCE THE ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT of those jobs. When manufacturing occurs in a small shop setting, there are no catastrophic environmental impacts from factory facilities. Transportation is also reduced, because parts can be made close to the point of assembly.
 
This isn't just a revolution in Airlock Pickling. It is a revolution in manufacturing!
 

You Can Help By Giving Or Sharing

We understand what it is to be broke. If you can give, we'll happily provide you with the perks listed for the donation amounts. If you can't, we'd appreciate your help in other ways:

  • Please help us get the word out to people who have an interest in Pickling, Fermenting, or Home Business.
  • Use the buttons to share with your social networks.
  • Purchase a product from our website at FermentaCap.com. Use this coupon code to save 5% off the order total: INDIEGOGO

Our family and business have been hit hard by devastating events which we did not cause, and could not control. We are in recovery mode, and feel that the best way to overcome the harm done to us is to work our way out of it - the job is just a bit bigger than we can hope to do ourselves. With your help, we can recover more quickly, fire our business with a better product for Fermenting Enthusiasts, and avoid being backordered all the time due to production limitations.

With your help, we'll be ready to offer employment to others several years sooner than we would without help.

Some donation perks dependent upon our ability to receive sufficient funding to obtain necessary equipment to produce the perk. In the event that we are unable to produce any of the perks due to insufficient funding, we will substitute a product of equal value.
story_txt:
Fermenta Lock - Makes Pickling Fresh Foods Easy
An all new Airlock Fermenting Lid, for Mason Jars. No awkward water lock sticking up on top of the lid, just a low profile, elegant little one-way valve that lets air out, but not in. So simple, all you need to know how to do, is twist the lid onto your pickling jar!

 

Pickled Salsa
 
Fermenta Lock is more economical than water lock pickling systems. One lid fits any size canning jar (you choose between narrow or wide mouth lid size). Unlike other Airlock Pickling Systems, you do not have to purchase an entire system for each size you need. One wide mouth lid goes on any wide mouth mason jar.
 
The one-way valve is manufactured by hand in the United States. It is made of food grade silicone, not latex!
 
We need your help to make a good product better!

 
Where We Got Stuck
We are currently making the valves by hand. ("We" means Kevin and Laura - you can read more about us, and our business model on our website.) We intend to continue to do so. Since no part exists that is like the one we need, we had to create our own mold for it. The materials available are not the best ones for the purpose, and our product is a little rougher than we need it to be. It functions well, but has a lot of surface texture.
 

You can see the texture in this unretouched image.The valve is made of yellow silicone.
 

We are also stuck having to pour just a few at a time, because we've only been able to make a few molds with the current method. This makes manufacturing very slow, since each pour has to cure for several hours in the molds.
 
We can SELL the products. We can't produce them fast enough.
 
We need more molds! And we need BETTER molds.
 
If we can obtain a Master Mold for each molded item, from which we can cast as many molds as we need, we will be able to expand as much as we need at an affordable cost. The Master Molds must be custom made (we can get them made in the U.S.). They must be custom machined, and this is a costly process.
 

We also need some additional materials and equipment so that we can improve some of our other products. With these additional materials, we will be able to do the following:

Create an airlock valve for our glass pickling crock, and purchase equipment to manufacture the lid and valve.
Get master molds and dies for our gaskets for crocks and lids (to make the manufacturing process faster), and obtain better home manufacturing tools for these items.
Improve the design and style of our Dunker food weights, and increase the weight so they function better. This will also bring the manufacturing of this product to the US (currently this product is ONLY available imported).
Develop a training program to train home business owners to manufacture the valves and glass products,  and create starter kits for home manufacturing, so that we do not have to create a factory environment to meet rising demand. This will allow other home business owners to earn a good living from making our products. (Laura has extensive experience developing training programs, she wrote the curriculum and materials for a Certification course for the University of Wyoming.) This will also make it possible for our product to go International - and for it to be manufactured in other countries to supply international needs.

If we do not meet our goal, we'll make what we do receive go as far as possible in reaching our goals. If we receive more than our goal, we'll use the funds to invest in the next level of efficiency and productivity to make our product more available and better quality.

It is about jobs in America - and jobs in other countries to fill orders placed in those countries.

We've been involved in business startups (as a successful web development and startup consulting company for very small businesses), for more than a decade, and we know how to operate a successful company. When we chose to change our line of work, we knew we wanted to build something different.
 
If you make a product from plastic or rubber (including silicone rubber), it must meet very specific requirements to be FDA approved for food use. It isn't just the components of the rubber or plastic, it is also how it is manufactured. Additional ingredients such as hardeners or substances to improve flexibility may be added during the manufacturing of the parts. It is difficult to tell which chemicals have been used.

 
Given the recent problems with contaminated products which were imported into the US, we knew that we did NOT feel good about contracting internationally for the parts we needed. Virtually all rubber and plastic fabrication is now done in India or China. Even companies in the US which provide fabrication services typically have the work done overseas. This hurts our company because we have less control over quality (we cannot see the materials used), and it hurts America (and many other countries) because jobs have left our country, along with the ability to GET certain kinds of work done within our own borders.
 

By manufacturing this product ourselves, and expanding our business through small subcontractors, we can keep production for US orders in our own country, and REDUCE THE ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT of those jobs. When manufacturing occurs in a small shop setting, there are no catastrophic environmental impacts from factory facilities. Transportation is also reduced, because parts can be made close to the point of assembly.
 
This isn't just a revolution in Airlock Pickling. It is a revolution in manufacturing!
 

You Can Help By Giving Or Sharing
We understand what it is to be broke. If you can give, we'll happily provide you with the perks listed for the donation amounts. If you can't, we'd appreciate your help in other ways:

Please help us get the word out to people who have an interest in Pickling, Fermenting, or Home Business.
Use the buttons to share with your social networks.

Purchase a product from our website at FermentaCap.com. Use this coupon code to save 5% off the order total: INDIEGOGO

We are in recovery mode, and feel that the best way to overcome the harm done to us is to work our way out of it - the job is just a bit bigger than we can hope to do ourselves. story:
We are two young individuals talented in both software engineering and business development raising money to build Anchor CRM, an innovative new application for real estate agents to more effectively manage their customer relationships, build their online brand reputation, market their listings, and track their business.



What is Anchor CRM?


Anchor CRM is an online application built to manage an agent's online operations. Anchor can help track and manage an agent's customer relationships so that our users can maintain all of their leads and efficiently communicate with their current clients. Anchor CRM also incorporates an external website, Anchor Neighborhood, for agent clients to sign in and communicate directly with our agents, share documents, and track progress. It essentially provides a front-end connection for customers who are sometimes left in the dark by professionals using a back-end CRM system. Anchor Neighborhood also acts as a great marketing tool by allowing agents to easily publish listing tours from unique URLs with the information already stored in Anchor CRM for better client accessibility. Since social networks have slowly become an essential part of many successful real estate agents' business strategy, Anchor directly integrates with popular social platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, and Yelp. By helping agents set up a complete profile and tracking their performance, Anchor can help agents take full advantage of these important online tools.

We believe that the ability to manage all of these different online operations under one simple and easy-to-use application will be incredibly advantageous to real estate agents.



Why are we building it?


About a year ago, one of the founders was helping a real estate agent use some online applications and was incredibly surprised by how outdated, difficult to use, and expensive the software was. After many long nights of brainstorming and researching competitors, Anchor CRM was finally born with the goal of unifying and simplifying all of the online tools available to real estate agents under one clean, easy-to-use application. With Anchor CRM we want to empower any agent, no matter what level of experience they have using the Internet, with an array of online tools to take their business to the next level.

 


Why do we need money?


Right now, we have two energetic founders that are eager to take this business to the next step. We have a basic application built right now, but it doesn’t have all the features integrated to fully realize our vision just yet. Getting funded will allow us to dedicate more time to the business, pay any fees associated with integrating certain features such as SMS and email notifications, integrate with an online payment system, and rent the dedicated servers that we need to get the application online.
Does more funding mean more stuff? Absolutely! The funding goal we have set is the bare minimum we need to get online and operate for a few months. Getting more money means we can spend more time on product development and use finances on other things such as enlisting the help of a user interface expert to make sure we are on the right path design-wise.

 

 

Thanks for taking the time to view our page!

Find more information and sign up for our launch notification list at http://www.anchorcrm.com

story:
We all want to find the perfect balance between keeping our pets healthy and spoiling them.

K9 Planet Adventure Box includes two healthy dog ​treats made with limited ingredients that are produced in North America (Canada and the US). These treats will reward your pet with something special while keeping their health in mind.

Keeping your high-energy dog engaged at all times can be a challenge. K9 Planet Adventure Box includes two durable toys made of high-quality materials to keep up with your pet.

Each set of toys is also tailored to the location that Ace has traveled to that month. For example, when Ace visits Australia, the box might contain a shark toy and a kangaroo toy.


Travel the world with your pet and learn about new and exciting places, all from the comfort of your home.

Ace’s goal is to visit as many places as possible while having fun and uncovering little-known facts about each location. As Ace visits new places, he will share information and facts on a postcard included in your K9 Planet Adventure Box.


To add to the excitement of opening your K9 Planet Adventure Box each month, we’ve included a little something extra just for you to have some additional fun alongside your pet! For example, your box may include a luggage tag or key chain!

 


At K9 Planet, our team loves a good adventure and we love our pups too. We know it’s important for dog owners to have a variety of fun ways to connect with their pups. This is exactly why our team created the K9 Planet Adventure Box – to bring the two things we love most together, adventure and pups.

K9 Planet makes it simple for dog owners to discover the world with their pups in an easy (right to your doorstep) and affordable way (...sure beats a plane ticket).



We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make K9 Planet Box a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a K9 Planet Box, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Audra brings you a truly simple yet robust cybersecurity solution to safeguard your children and all connected devices from dangers of the Internet. Audra HomeShield puts the control back in your hand, empowering you to set right controls for your home Internet, and bringing back peace of mind.

  • Easily group devices into manageable categories like Children, Guests, IoT, Others, etc.
  • Effortlessly set category filters, schedules and time quotas for children.
  • Easily prevent malware and adware affecting your smart devices.
  • Create and enforce blacklists/whitelists to prevent data thefts.
  • Stay constantly notified on the security status of your network.
  • Seamlessly manage all through the simple Audra mobile app.

... discover more about the easy and powerful features of Audra as you keep using it.

 

AN AUDRA MOTHER AND HER HAPPY FAMILY

We received valuable suggestions, ideas and encouragements from our 1,000+ beta testers worldwide. And this helped us to perfect the Audra HomeShield solution for your protection.

We are happy to share one such happy story of a mom who loved Audra HomeShield. See her describe how it helped her to establish good internet usage habits at home.

 

 

HOW AUDRA WORKS FOR YOU

Group devices

Once set-up, Audra discovers all connected devices. Now put them into preset groups like Children, MyGroup, Guest etc. Create more groups - as many as you want.

Block unwanted websites

Select preset blocks for unwanted categories like - Adult, Gambling, Dating, Social media, Malware, Adware, Hacking and many more . Set blocks for the whole preset group or for any specific device. Audra prevents access to all possible websites in that category, and keeps updating the list of websites in that category as well.

Set time controls and quotas

Choose from preset time schedules, like Bed time, Study time etc. Or create your own schedules, and regulate your child's internet usage timings as per each child's requirement. Also set device-wise time quota to prevent screen addiction.

Prevent malware and adware

In a single click, safeguard your devices from malware, adware and other external attacks. Audra automatically updates your device with the latest threat protection as well.

Create blacklist/whitelist

Effortlessly create your own website white-list or blacklist. Ensure no one at home ends up landing in phishing sites and compromises personal data.

Get real-time alerts

Set alerts as per your choice. Get notifications and always stay in touch whenever and wherever you are.

Manage on the go

Be in complete control with your Audra mobile app (IoS & Android). Access all the features at home or on the go.

 

 

SIMPLE PLUG AND PLAY SOLUTION

For any parent, setting up your Audra HomeShield is easy and hassle-free. Power-up and connect the cable - that's all you need to do. Audra will then guide you through the process. You are up and running in no time.

 

 

AUDRA CLOUD AI

Audra Cloud is the most important component of the Audra Software-Defined Firewall (SDF). The cloud teams up with your Audra HomeShield and the Audra app on your mobile, and ensures your home internet follows all the rules you have set.

Audra Cloud AI is constant updated by the Audra Team of security experts, behavior analysts and software developers. It holds all the latest threat definitions, updated sites in category filters and your set controls for your home, so you are assured of the Internet security you always wanted for your home.

 
 

 

WHAT SETS AUDRA APART?

 

 

THE AUDRA JOURNEY

 

 

 

WE'RE FEATURED IN

 

 

THE AUDRA STORY

The seed of Audra was planted in our minds several years back. We challenged ourselves to create a cloud-based AI solution that would deliver secured internet, and would be capable of providing business grade security at home grade simplicity. We kept effectiveness at the core and simplicity on the interface, to ensure that parents across the world can easily set their own internet rules to bring digital balance in and secured internet for the beloved members of their home.

After multiple rounds of R&D and prototyping, we unveiled the first version of Audra HomeShield with Audra Cloud AI to 1,000+ beta testers across the US, Europe, South America and SE Asia, who shared with us their valuable insights, suggestions and feedback.

We are now ready to offer you the re-imagined and perfectly engineered Audra HomeShield; the 'DO IT ALL' cloud AI-based internet security solution that comes with a sleek gateway device, for your own protection, and for the protection of your connected home and its occupants. With Audra HomeShield, you now can easily...

​The Audra philosophy: My internet, My rules

Audra Team is relentlessly working to bring in the solid controls needed to ensure cyber security from known and unknown threats. The other conventional solutions available currently are either extremely complex to configure as a parent or highly expensive to own. Often, the other available solutions are hard-coded in the device you use and lack latest updates to protect you from ever-evolving threats.

Audra believes every home has its own ecosystem of values and beliefs. These values should reflect in the digital habits of the members of that home. So the possible set of internet controls should reside as choices, in a simple and playful manner; parents will decide which controls to apply - how, when, and to what extent. While we have kept robust performance at the back-end, we ensured the interface is extremely simple, to deliver playfulness and delight at the parent end. Audra comes with an aesthetically appealing gateway device, that syncs and pairs up with the intelligent cloud AI. The cloud AI works as the core brain and gives updated controls to parents through the gateway device, to prevent users and smart devices from unwanted use, cyber threats, external attacks and more.

Like we said earlier, the re-engineered Audra HomeShield is the result of thousands of hours of R&D, user feedbacks and design works. And now, we have finally gone into mass production! It has been quite a fascinating and rewarding journey.

 

 

WHAT SOME OF THE EXPERTS SAY

 

 

Encourage Audra to bring secured internet for

 millions of homes.

story:
Our Indiegogo Campaign Has Ended...



English Website |  中文網站


Tested with 6,182 pilot users and over 93% reported better peace of mind with Cubo AI's proactive warning alerts system!  


Meet your baby’s smartest safeguard!
We’re a team of parents, technologists, and baby lovers on a mission to protect babies and bring peace of mind to parents everywhere! Created by parents and a pediatrician, Cubo AI is the newest innovation in smart baby monitors - a baby safety monitor, personal photographer, and digital scrapbook all-in-one!


 


Thanks to all our amazing parents, we are fully funded which means we are 100% Guaranteed to be shipping starting this September with 30-day money back guarantee! 
Pre-Order your Cubo AI now by tapping “Select A Perk” 







 

Hi! I'm Joanna, Co-founder of Cubo AI and a Mom! 

"After 6 IVF attempts, I finally met this little miracle. So when I found my baby's face accidentally covered, I couldn't sleep for months. When even 6 cameras couldn't ease my worries, we partnered with Dr. Kenneth Yeh to design a smart baby monitor for worried parents like me! We co-created Cubo AI's proprietary technology to proactively warn parents of dangerous situations such as Covered Face events so parents can step in when needed. Our team designed every Cubo AI feature with parent needs and baby safety in mind. I'm so excited to bring peace of mind and joy to your parenting journey!"
 





Safe Sleep for Babies. Peace of Mind for Parents!

Co-created with a pediatrician, we developed Cubo AI's face detection technology to alert parents about Covered Face events in real time. Through our mobile app, our AI will alert you when your baby's face may be covered by items or if they've rolled over and can't roll back.


 

Safeguarding your little one from 0 to beyond 3 years old!

Just draw a dangerous area (kitchen, crib corner, balcony) and our AI will alert  you if your little one enters! Whether they're climbing out of the crib, crawling, or walking, Cubo can protect them from crib and beyond! 



Always Be There When Your Baby Needs You!

Cubo AI's Cry Detection alert can let you know via your Cubo app if something's wrong so you can rush to their side!



1080P + 135° Wide Angle Lens - Check up on your little one at anytime!

Cubo's 1080p HD Sony Night Vision Lens means you can check up on them in bed without risking waking them up!



Never Miss a Cute Moment!

So parents don't have to hear "Aww you Missed it" again! Cubo AI automatically captures cute moments such as smiling, crying, first head lift, or first flip over so you don't miss a thing!


 



We did the homework so you don’t have to! Unlike other baby monitors on the market, Cubo is all about proactive detection for safety and joy - so you have less things to worry about!





After surveying over 8000+ parents and interviewing 158, we designed 6 thoughtful additions to meet every parenting need.  



Keeps Your Baby Comfy and Happy!

If your baby's room is out of doctor recommended range of comfort, our AI will warn you so you can check in on your little one to make sure they are comfortable! 

Say Hello Whenever You Miss Them!

Even if you're traveling for work or just downstairs in the kitchen, you can always stay connected to your little one with our 2-way audio feature! Talk or sing to your baby no matter how far you are with Cubo AI!

Check on Your Little Ones Without Waking Them Up!

Tired of fumbling with your phone flashlight during late night check-ins? Every Cubo AI comes with a small night light that faces backwards (so that there's no disturbance to your little one) and can be turned on through your app. Just flick it on before entering their room, and tap to turn off right after - don't need to risk stepping on a toy or fumbling with your phone ever again! 

Babies Sleep Undisturbed

We designed Cubo AI with no blinking red light so our babies can sleep undisturbed.  For those little ones who like to sleep without any light, every light on our Cubo AI can be turned off so your little one can sleep undisturbed! 

Curious how your little one slept last night? Or just want to get a playback of their day when you were at work? Cubo AI comes equipped with 18-hr playback that comes with highlights so you can skip straight to when your little one cried, woke up, or made adorable moves! 


Easy Transition to Their Own Room

Every Cubo AI comes with 3 stands that grows with your baby! A floor stand for the bassinet, crib stand for when they grow into a crib, and mobile stand for the living room and for travel - Cubo goes wherever your life goes! 
 




We designed Cubo AI to go where your life goes - even beyond the crib! With flexible stand options and smart features for every stage of development, Cubo grows with your little one! 



 


All features and camera functions can be controlled directly from your Cubo AI App - no matter where you are! Set your alert settings, peek in on your little one through the app's livestream, or scroll through your baby's Moments Wall! 




We take your privacy and security extremely seriously. 

While our smart technology warns of any impending dangers in the house, our backend security protects your data so no outside intruders can access your videos/photos. Cubo AI will store your cute snapshots on the cloud (AWS & Google) and secure your data with top of the line security: 



...ensuring that only you and your authorized users can watch your little ones growing up. 
 


We love our 6,000 parents who were willing to give us a chance, helping us design the smartest AI baby monitor for parents everywhere! See why our users gave us an in-app rating of 4.3 stars, hear it from them here:












>> Click here to read more testimonials


Cubo’s All-In-One packaging comes with 3 stands so Cubo can go where your life goes!

*We will provide two plug adapters suited for all of our shipping countries.


Check out the latest unboxing video:


No tools needed! Just download the Cubo AI App and your Cubo's ready for fast and easy setup! 


We will provide two plug adapters suited for all of our shipping countries.



 

Our company mission is to give parents around the world better peace of mind in their parenting journey, and we want this to also include our launch on Indiegogo!
Our Cubo AI Backer Protection Plan includes:

- Free Cancellation Before Shipment
Modify, upgrade or cancel your contribution anytime before we ship.
- Guaranteed Shipping
We’re guaranteed to ship, starting September! All orders will be delivered and tracked via UPS.
- 30-Day Money Back Guarantee
Issues with your Cubo AI? Please let us help troubleshoot first. If you find you’re not satisfied, you’re welcome to send it back for a full refund within 30 days of receipt!


Our team is working hard on getting Cubos ready for take off this September! Every Cubo is meticulously tested for quality assurance including correct coloring in both daytime and night time view! We'll keep updating here as our team charges forward on our production schedule to ensure that Cubos land on your doorstep just in time. 




















We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Cubo AI a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a Cubo AI, if you’re a supporter of Cubo AI, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
What Can MSG100 Help?

1. Voice Control

Control your garage door via Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. Your garage remote is not neccessary in the car now.

Currently, many vehicles in market come with integrated Amazon Alexa function. You can check below link for reference.

Vehicles with Amazon Alexa *

If your vehicle is not listed, no worries. You can use an Amazon Echo Dot, Amazon Echo Auto, Anker Roav Viva, Garmin Speak or your Alexa app within smartphones to fulfil this function.

For Google Assistant, please refer to below link. Besides, you can use a Google Home Mini, Anker ROAV Bolt, Hum by Verizon or your Google Assistant app within smartphones to fulfil this.

Vehicles with Google Assistant *

* For US market only. Other countries or regions please ask your vehicle dealer for confirmation. 

2. Remote Control

When your package arrives, simply open your garage door for the delivery man with the Meross app even when you are travelling on the Golden Gate Bridge.

3. Overtime Warning

Do not remember whether the garage door is closed or not when you are in the office. No worries, you can now check and close it via Meross app.

4. Overnight Warning

Forget to close the garage door at bedtime. No worries, Meross app will notify you, and you can close it in your bedroom.

5. IFTTT

Close your garage door automatically when your Nest Thermostat detects no body is in the home(Away Mode).

6. Triggers within Meross Devices *

When your garage door opens or closes, let the Meross smart bulbs flash differently to notify you.

*Function available in August, 2019.

How It Works?

Below figure shows MSG100's main working principle. Simply wire it to your existing garage door opener and get its WiFi connected. Then you can enjoy above smart functions.

The installation is quite easy. Usually it only takes 15 minutes. 

In most cases, you only need to use the provided double adhesive tapes for device fixation, no screws needed.

Package Contents

 

Before You Back Us

MSG100 works with many traditional garage door openers, such as models from Chamberlain, LiftMaster, Hörmann and etc. Before you kindly back us, we need you to follow below steps for the compatibility confirmation.

1. Use pliers to short the wall button terminals of your existing garage door opener. If garage door opens or closes, it works with MSG100. 

2. If above testing fails, but your garage door opener model is listed below or it has a learn button(normally the learn button's color is green/red/orange/purple/yellow). It works with MSG100 but needs an extra accessory. Please kindly email us your garage door opener model and learn button color, we will ship the accessory to you together.

Chamberlain：

Any with Security+/Chain Drive PD752KEV/Chain Drive PD762EV/HD220/HD220C/HD920EV/HD950WF/LW2200/LW260C/LW5000EV/LW9000WF/PD220/PD222/PD612EV/WD1000WF/WD962KEV/WD962KPEV/WhisperDrive 459950/WhisperDrive 547445/WhisperDrive WD832KEV/WhisperDrive WD832KEVG/WhisperDrive WE850KEVG.

LiftMaster:

Any with Security+/8065/8075/8155/8165/Elite 3585S/Elite 3593/Elite 3595CS/Elite 3800/Elite 3850/Elite 3850-267/Elite 8500/Elite 8550/P3/Premium 8355/Premium 8365-267.

Craftsman:

AssureLink Wifi-enabled 30437/Assurelink 3043/Assurelink 54918/Assurelink 54985/Ultra Quiet Belt Drive 54918.

Genie:

2022/2024/2042/Pro 1028/Pro 2028/PowerliftPowerMax 900/PowerliftPowerMax 1200/PowerliftPowerMax 1500/PowerliftPowerMax SC-1200/PowerliftPowerMax SC-1500/SilentMax 900/Silient 1000/SilentMax 1200.

Overhead:

Odyssey 1000/Odyssey 1200.

Wayne Dalton:

ProDrive 3220C.

 

Production Stage

story:
Why Raised Bowls?

 

A raised feeder allows your pet to eat using a more natural body posture, thereby reducing stress on your pet's back and neck. Since your pet's head isn't pointed downward to eat from the floor, a raised feeder also makes swallowing food and water easier on your pet.

 

 
 
 
"What is your kitty's favorite feeder?"
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

No more ground-floor level bowls for your cat. Reduce cat's whisker stress and vomiting with our 3-tier raised Macaron Bowls. Whisker Stress, often known as whisker fatigue, may cause huge discomfort and even pain many times, making eating and drinking very frustrating.

 

 

 

"Four Bowls | Four Heights"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Improve your cat's eating and drinking habits

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

"I  love it!"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As evidence, indoor cats live longer than their outdoor counterparts. Cats who are kept indoors can reach the ripe old age of 17 or more years, whereas outdoor cats live an average of just two to five years. Another reason for indoor cats’ longevity is that it’s easier for their owners to identify health problems early, before they become life threatening.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

2020 KIET Certificate for Macaron Bowls

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Bowls for Food

Bowls for Water

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our cold and hot packs for Macaron Bowls are safe. We use the same safe ingredients that are used in medical devices for poultice rather than general cold and hot packs.

 

Number of Bacteria as time passes

 

 

The Macaron Bowls placemat is a silicone mat that can be placed under the bowl to prevent it from shaking when your cat drinks water or eats. There are orange and yellow colors.

 

 

 

Click this button to chat with us!

 

 

 

 

Updates

September 18th,2020: Macaron Bowls are being manufactured.
