story:
The Affordable Wood Fire Pellet Grill that expertly grills, smokes, bakes, roasts, braises, sears or BBQs.

 

 

 

A wide variety of savory wood pellets such as pecan, hickory and mesquite adds subtle smoky flavors.

 

Digital temperature control automatically adds pellets as needed to regulate the temperature. Convection heat distribution technology ensures food gets cooked evenly to perfection.

 

Z Grills Elite 900 fires up and is ready to cook your food to perfection instantly.

 

Super versatile and wide temperature range from 180 to 450 degrees to grill, smoke, bake, roast, braise, BBQ or sear.

 

Go ahead and look. We've tried to find our equal out on the market, too. That's why we're doing it ourselves.

 

The auger at the bottom of the hopper pulls the hardwood pellets into the fire pot where they contact the hot rod and ignite the pellet grill. Convection heat distribution technology cooks food evenly and encircles food with delicious and flavorful smoke.

 

 

The Elite 900 optimizes electricity and uses small amounts of pellets for flavoring purposes making it friendlier for the environment than traditional charcoal or gas grills.

 

 

 
 

Every pre-order comes with one Z Grills Elite 900. Some assembly required.

 

 

Its compact design fits in most small spaces, while keeping smoke and temperature under control.

 

Our designs have been tested and proven. The Z Grills Elite 900 has been put through thorough safety testing and countless hours of grilling.

 

 

We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of 200+ people, founded by a group of experienced engineers. Our dream is to create the best pellet grills in the market and to empower people everywhere to be master grillers. We love crowdfunding our latest product on Indiegogo and want to build up an engaged community. We can’t wait for backers such as yourselves to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we will be able to create the world’s best pellet grill for everyone.

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship to the US only. All shipping costs included.

We plan to ship the product in July 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Z Grills Elite 900 grills off the line plus plus exclusive access to prices never to be seen again.

 

 

 

 

The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

 

 

 

What is it? A high-performance wood pellet grill at an unbelievably low price.
Who created it? Z Grills, a team of expert grillmakers based in China, who have overseen every aspect of the grill creation process.
Why should we use it? Using a wood pellet grill is healthier and easier to maintain than a traditional grill. With the Z Grills Elite 900, you can use the same grill to smoke, bake, grill, roast, braise, sear and BBQ, its highly time- and energy-efficient with a wider choice of flavors and a variety of usage options.
How much does it cost? The Z Grills Elite 900 will retail for $659 USD. A limited quantity will be sold as low as $339 during this pre-order campaign.
Where can we buy it? Right here, right now on Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order? One Z Grills Elite 900 and one manual. 
Why are you crowdfunding? To offer our early supporters the lowest possible prices and introduce a larger number of people to the Z Grills experience.


What features are available? Z Grills Elite 900 is a wood pellet grill with a large capacity hopper and a precision digital temperature control system (180-450˚ F).
What colors do you offer? Bronze is our current offering. Other colors may be unlocked throughout the campaign.
What sizes do you offer? One size is available (49 x 42 x 27 in.).

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology? The Z Grills Elite 900 offers consistent heat control as a 7-IN-1 grill.
What are the dimensions and weight? L: 44 inches
W: 27 inches 
H: 49 inches
Net Weight: 89 pounds 
How does it work? The grill slowly burns (at a consistent rate to keep temperature controlled) the wood pellets, releasing the heat into the grill. 
Will there be updates to it in the future? Yes, we look forward to adding app control and grill customization options.
Where is it manufactured? In China, by our on-site team of expert grillmakers.

 

How do I set it up? Every order includes a manual for reference that includes set up instructions.
How do I turn it on and off? There On/off switch on control panel controls the grill. 
How do I control it? Using the digital temperature control panel.
What is the care and cleaning of it? The included manual contains care and cleaning instructions. 
What are the recommend ages? This grill is recommended for adult-use only.
Where can I use it? Any backyard or outdoor space with access to a power outlet.
How durable is it? You can expect your Z Grills Elite 900 to last 10 years with proper care.

 

When does shipping begin? July 2017.
Where does it ship? We are shipping to the US only.
How much is shipping? Shipping is free for US orders only during this campaign.
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Excellent! Please contact us at zgrillsusa@gmail.com.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Shipping fees include VAT or local taxes. 

 

Is there a warranty? Yes, every Z Grills Elite 900 has a 3 year warranty. 
What is your refund policy?

Z Grills will offer you exchanges or refunds within 30 days of receiving the product. You will be responsible for shipping & handling fees.
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days. You will be responsible for shipping & handling fees.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? You will see your pre-order contribution reflected in your Indiegogo profile. We will also send out an update to our backers, and send you a tracking number once your order has shipped.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Press: support@zgrills.com
Investment Inquiries: info@zgrills.com
Support: support@zgrills.com
story_txt:
The Affordable Wood Fire Pellet Grill that expertly grills, smokes, bakes, roasts, braises, sears or BBQs.   A wide variety of savory wood pellets such as pecan, hickory and mesquite adds subtle smoky flavors. Digital temperature control automatically adds pellets as needed to regulate the temperature. Convection heat distribution technology ensures food gets cooked evenly to perfection. Z Grills Elite 900 fires up and is ready to cook your food to perfection instantly. Super versatile and wide temperature range from 180 to 450 degrees to grill, smoke, bake, roast, braise, BBQ or sear. Go ahead and look. We've tried to find our equal out on the market, too. That's why we're doing it ourselves. The auger at the bottom of the hopper pulls the hardwood pellets into the fire pot where they contact the hot rod and ignite the pellet grill. Convection heat distribution technology cooks food evenly and encircles food with delicious and flavorful smoke.  The Elite 900 optimizes electricity and uses small amounts of pellets for flavoring purposes making it friendlier for the environment than traditional charcoal or gas grills.    Every pre-order comes with one Z Grills Elite 900. Some assembly required.  Its compact design fits in most small spaces, while keeping smoke and temperature under control. Our designs have been tested and proven. The Z Grills Elite 900 has been put through thorough safety testing and countless hours of grilling.  We are a young, energetic, and-fast growing team of 200+ people, founded by a group of experienced engineers. Our dream is to create the best pellet grills in the market and to empower people everywhere to be master grillers. We love crowdfunding our latest product on Indiegogo and want to build up an engaged community. We can’t wait for backers such as yourselves to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we will be able to create the world’s best pellet grill for everyone.    We are able to ship to the US only. All shipping costs included.We plan to ship the product in July 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first Z Grills Elite 900 grills off the line plus plus exclusive access to prices never to be seen again.    The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!   

What is it?
A high-performance wood pellet grill at an unbelievably low price.


Who created it?
Z Grills, a team of expert grillmakers based in China, who have overseen every aspect of the grill creation process.


Why should we use it?
Using a wood pellet grill is healthier and easier to maintain than a traditional grill. With the Z Grills Elite 900, you can use the same grill to smoke, bake, grill, roast, braise, sear and BBQ, its highly time- and energy-efficient with a wider choice of flavors and a variety of usage options.


How much does it cost?
The Z Grills Elite 900 will retail for $659 USD. A limited quantity will be sold as low as $339 during this pre-order campaign.


Where can we buy it?
Right here, right now on Indiegogo.


What do we get when we order?
One Z Grills Elite 900 and one manual. 


Why are you crowdfunding?
To offer our early supporters the lowest possible prices and introduce a larger number of people to the Z Grills experience.



What features are available?
Z Grills Elite 900 is a wood pellet grill with a large capacity hopper and a precision digital temperature control system (180-450˚ F).


What colors do you offer?
Bronze is our current offering. Other colors may be unlocked throughout the campaign.


What sizes do you offer?
One size is available (49 x 42 x 27 in.).

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
The Z Grills Elite 900 offers consistent heat control as a 7-IN-1 grill.


What are the dimensions and weight?
L: 44 inchesW: 27 inches H: 49 inchesNet Weight: 89 pounds 


How does it work?
The grill slowly burns (at a consistent rate to keep temperature controlled) the wood pellets, releasing the heat into the grill. 


Will there be updates to it in the future?
Yes, we look forward to adding app control and grill customization options.


Where is it manufactured?
In China, by our on-site team of expert grillmakers.

 

How do I set it up?
Every order includes a manual for reference that includes set up instructions.


How do I turn it on and off?
There On/off switch on control panel controls the grill. 


How do I control it?
Using the digital temperature control panel.


What is the care and cleaning of it?
The included manual contains care and cleaning instructions. 


What are the recommend ages?
This grill is recommended for adult-use only.


Where can I use it?
Any backyard or outdoor space with access to a power outlet.


How durable is it?
You can expect your Z Grills Elite 900 to last 10 years with proper care.

 

When does shipping begin?
July 2017.


Where does it ship?
We are shipping to the US only.


How much is shipping?
Shipping is free for US orders only during this campaign.


I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Excellent! Please contact us at zgrillsusa@gmail.com.


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Shipping fees include VAT or local taxes. 

 

Is there a warranty?
Yes, every Z Grills Elite 900 has a 3 year warranty. 


What is your refund policy?
Z Grills will offer you exchanges or refunds within 30 days of receiving the product. You will be responsible for shipping & handling fees.


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days. You will be responsible for shipping & handling fees.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
You will see your pre-order contribution reflected in your Indiegogo profile. We will also send out an update to our backers, and send you a tracking number once your order has shipped.


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Press: support@zgrills.comInvestment Inquiries: info@zgrills.comSupport: support@zgrills.com

story:
Homefarm brings you the freshest greens, effortlessly grown, from the comfort of your home

- it's cultivation simplified -

 

Introducing Homefarm

homefarm® brings you the freshest greens, effortlessly grown, from the comfort of your home. it's cultivation simplified.

as featured in

 

Selected as a SeedStars World South Africa Finalist - Best Start-up in South Africa.

 

 

Our Launch

 

The Homefarm Lifestyle

The Homefarm lifestyle is about enjoying access to the freshest, most nutritious and delicious produce all year round from the comfort of your home. The convenience of growing crops with Homefarm means that users can begin to effortlessly incorporate the healthiest produce into their daily diet.

 

 

What Makes Homefarm Special

There are a number of Hydroponic Appliances which have become available on the global market recently. Homefarm however, offers unrivalled value when it comes to its features, functionality, and all round reliability and ease of use.

 

Our Touch Panel User Interface shows off the quality of the product, as well as the optionality in terms of Performance and Automation.

 

The unique design of Homefarm means that it can be placed on or below a countertop, be built into kitchen cabinetry or be stacked up to 3 units high.

 

Technical & Performance Specifications

 

 

3 day time-lapse of Black Mustard Microgreen grown in a Homefarm
 
 
4 day time-lapse of Red Amarinth Microgreen grown in a Homefarm
 
 
4 day time-lapse of Basil germination in a Homefarm
 
 
There are a wide variety of herbs, microgreens and leafy vegetables which Homefarm can grow. Each crop has different yield times; from seed to harvest. Below is a small, but representative, sample of the crops which are suitable for Homefarm and their yield times.
 
 
 

The yield quantities will also differ from crop to crop, but will be sure to satisfy your craving...

 

The Homefarm Seed-Pod System

We will be selling a Seed Pod 6-pack for $10 or R120 ex shipping through our online store - coming soon. We sell the packs according to themes such as Kitchen Basics and Salad mix.

For Example:

The Kitchen Basics contains: 2x Basil, 2x Coriander (Cilantro) and 2x Parsley.

The Salad Mix contains: 2x Rocket (Arugula), 2x Watercress and 2x Black Mustard.

 

The Homefarm Seed-Pod Store

Before we ship any of the Homefarm appliances to backers our on-line Homefarm Seed-Pod store will be up and running.  Please note* that when it comes to international shipping outside of South Africa, we may not be able to ship seeds, depending on the local laws in your country. In this case we sell Seed-Pod 'blanks' and will help you source local seeds which can be manually scattered atop Seed-Pods before inserting into a Homefarm.

 

The Homefarm App

The Homefarm product experience includes a dedicated app, which is central to the user experience; it connects your smart phone to the product and provides information on the herbs it can grow as well as ideas and recipes for their use.

 

Coming soon to the app store

 

Pledge Reward Items

 

*Please note: All Homefarm Appliances come with a 2 month starter pack of Seed Pods. The Homefarmer Pro comes with an additional 6 months seed-pod supply. 

 

Reward Tier Packages

Please find & select your pledge and rewards from the options at the top right hand side of this page.

Why we are Crowdfunding

A successful crowdfunding campaign will enable us to take a major step forward on our journey towards complete commercialisation of the Homefarm product and will give us the opportunity to get the product into the hands of an exclusive first group of customers.

We need a minimum of $40,000 in funds to complete and safely deliver on a successful campaign. These funds will be going towards further development of the Homefarm App, the optimisation of our design for manufacture, the development of an assembly line for low-to-medium batch manufacturing as well as working capital for the manufacture and delivery of all of the campaign rewards, including the Homefarm Appliance.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Can Homefarm grow fruits and vegetables?

Homefarm is not designed to grow fruits and vegetables. It should be used to grow leafy greens, herbs and microgreens, as per the available selection of seed-pods. Refer to crop examples above for an example of the types of crops Homefarm can grow.

Why does Homefarm not grow fruits and vegetables?

Fruits and vegetables have very long yield times and low harvests per unit area in comparison to herbs and microgreens. This is why Homefarm's primary use is geared towards leafy greens, herbs and microgreens which can be harvested regularly by the user. Fruit and vegetable plants also require a greater amount of light to bear fruit than what Homefarm has been designed to offer. Note: Homefarm has had limited success with chillies.

How will I get my seedpods after I get my Homefarm?

You will be able to purchase seed-pods through our online store which we will be launching in October this year. If you live outside of South Africa we will only post Homefarm seed pods in minimum quantities of 10 boxes per shipping.

How much will the Seed-Pod boxes cost?

For a box of 6 seed-pods we will be charging approximately 15$ per box or R150 in South Africa.

How much will I be able to harvest with my Homefarm?

If growing 50% microgreens and 50% herbs in a Homefarm you can expect to harvest 1 – 2 portions of microgreens per day and 2-3 handfuls of herbs each week.  

How long will it take to pay off my Homefarm from my savings incurred as a result of being able to grow my own herbs and greens?

You could pay off a Homefarm within 18 months.

If I cannot connect it to my water-mains, how often will I need to re-water?

You will need to manually re-fill the water tank every 3 to 4 days. You will be notified on the User Interface as well as through the dedicated Homefarm App.

Will I need to turn the lights on and off manually with the product?

No. The products automatically controls the lighting cycles as well as the other Homefarm systems.

Does Homefarm grow organic produce?

Not yet. We have plans to sell an organic seed-pod range in the future but for now Homefarm uses a non-organic nutrient, much the same as all other non-organic produce bought in stores.

Do Homefarm crops require pesticide?

No. If used correctly, Homefarm creates a closed environment for its crops and therefore crops are protected from bugs infesting them.

Can Homefarm grow Marijuana?

If, in accordance with the laws of your country, you are allowed to grow Marijuana in your own home, and you possess all of the necessary permits, Homefarm can be used to grow Marijuana plants for the first 8-10 weeks of the growth cycle.

 

The Team

 

With Special Mention and Thanks to:

Peter Krige

Eric Gu

Pranya Naidoo

Marcha Naude

Crystal MacIntosh

Martin Bleazard

 

Timeline

 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are four possible challenges we face which could result in the late delivery of contributor’s perks.

The first is compliance. The compliance process typically takes about 2 months if all goes smoothly. However, it is possible that the compliance process takes a little longer if design improvements and development interventions are needed during the process. The cost of these interventions would not be high but could lead to a delay.

The second is manufacturing. When one goes through your first major production run of a physical product, the failure rate can be higher than you’d ideally like, which means some parts may need to be sent back to the manufacturer for re-manufacture. This can lead to delays. We would be covered by Quality Assurance agreements so this would not pose a financial risk to the project and ultimate delivery.

The third is around the logistics of distribution and delivery. We will do everything ahead of time to ensure that our delivery plans are in place for all the relevant geographical locations that we ship to, but sometimes there can be unforeseen challenges in the shipment process which can cause delays.  

The fourth is related to the outcome and success of the campaign itself. If we receive many more pledges than we expect and as a result have to produce many more Homefarms to reward our backers, we will need to re-assess our manufacturing strategy which will likely cause a delay, most probably by a couple of months as we would need the time to scale our manufacturing capability beyond what we are planning for this campaign. 

In every instance, we promise to be completely transparent and will communicate frequently with our backers to ensure that they are in the know regarding our progress and schedule at all times.

Other Ways You Can Help

You don’t need to give money to our campaign to be a contributor. If you believe in our project and would like to see Homefarm come to market, please let your friends and family know what we are up to. One way of doing this is to share our campaign page URL on social media. Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Balsam Hill is partnering with My New Red Shoes this Christmas In July to help raise awareness about the need for school clothing for local children living in poverty.

The income and opportunity gap between the rich and the poor is more striking in the San Francisco Bay Area than almost anywhere else in the nation.  Did you know that when families are homeless or hungry, school clothing is not a top priority?  As the result, thousands of children living in poverty miss school or are unable to fully participate in class or on the playground due to a lack of suitable clothing.  Attending school in ill-fitting shoes and clothing can be physically uncomfortable and embarrassing for children. It can affect their self-esteem and mark them as easy targets for bullying.   

To support My New Red Shoes efforts to help impoverished school children succeed in school, Balsam Hill  has committed to match 100% of all donations made up to $1,000 and 10% of donations exceeding $1,000 in our Christmas in July Campaign.

What We Need & What You Get

Because academic success is such an important predictor of enhanced life opportunities, breaking the cycle of poverty starts with helping children to participate in the classroom, engage in school activities and build positive relationships with their peers and adults.  My New Red Shoes believes that all children should have the opportunity to start the school year ready to learn and on equal footing with their peers.  Our Clothing for Confidence Program provides new back-to-school shoes and clothing to our community’s most vulnerable children. Beyond a pair of new shoes and new clothing, tangible necessities that children need for school, My New Red Shoes gives underprivileged children and youth the comfort of knowing that they are part of a community that cares.

Please join us.  As an incentive, for every $50 that you donate to My New Red Shoes, you will receive a mystery ornament from Balsam Hill’s Mistletoe and Holly Christmas Ornament Set.  

The Impact

My New Red Shoes is dedicated to improving the educational experience of our community’s disadvantaged students.  Since 2006, My New Red Shoes has served nearly 28,000 children in need.  By providing new shoes and clothing to homeless and poor children, we ease a critical concern for the children and families that we serve.  The feedback that we receive from children, families and our collaborative agency partners affirms that our simple gift of new shoes and clothing has helped poor students to achieve positive academic outcomes. 

An agency professional shared with us that one of their program recipients had been the victim of bullying due to his old and worn shoes and clothing.  After receiving his new shoes from My New Red Shoes Clothing for Confidence Program, the agency reported that the child was now attending school with renewed confidence and had begun engaging in extra-curricular activities.

It’s a simple gift, but it can have remarkable results.  Each donation made will be directed to My New Red Shoes along with funds matched by Balsam Hill.



Other Ways You Can Help

For more ways to support My New Red Shoes - Click Here

story:
The Problem

Stress and fatigue in the United States are at an all time high.

As a result, sugary energy drinks and coffee are being consumed at an alarming rate. 

But...we all know that these products aren't healthy or sustainable solutions.

The Solution

Tea is one of the healthiest drinks on the planet.

As a health nut in search of a better way, I have devoted the last 4 years of my life to creating the best supplements for natural energy. 

It started with superfood tea blends.

ClearTea provides physical energy that keep you feeling energized throughout the day.

Brainiac provides a smooth boost of mental energy to help you concentrate and focus.

The feedback from tea drinkers has been even better than expected. Most people are raving about them...

Check out our Amazon reviews HERE

But the taste of unsweetened tea isn't for everyone.

Help us put our superfood tea blends into convenient capsules you can take without tasting anything.

Enter the capsule...


Using a capsule allows you to completely avoid the taste.

It also allows us to use some amazing ingredients that we wanted to include in our tea blends, but quickly ruled out due to their awful taste.

Bacopa Monnieri and Ginkgo Biloba give Brainiac capsules an enhanced focus boost.

Ashwaganga and Panax Ginseng give ClearTea capsules a lasting endurance boost.

But trust us, you don't want these ingredients anywhere near your taste buds. 

Now you really can get the healthiest supplements your way...

Don't change your life to take your supplements.

Get supplements that fit into your lifestyle.

Why We Need Your Help

As a small business, Opportuniteas doesn't have the funding needed to meet the minimum order quantities of the top capsule supplement manufacturers. 

With your help, we hope to raise 7500 dollars to create taste-free capsules that give anyone natural energy and focus.

Where Your Money is Going...

    • Initial Product Order - $5500
    • Safety testing - $500
    • Packaging and fulfillment - $850
    • Indiegogo and processing fees - $650

When Do I Get my Product(s)?

We will deliver your bottles of superfood tea by June and capsules by July but hopefully earlier.

Other Ways You Can Help...

  • Help us get the word out about our amazing campaign
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

If you can't contribute we'd still love your help.

Most Importantly:  Thank You!

We wouldn't be able to safely energize the world without the support of health-conscious and passionate individuals like yourself.


FAQ...

Q: How will Opportuniteas superfood tea blends help me?

Our superfood tea blends are natural, nutrient dense formulas designed to cover the needs of active people. You get phenomenal nutritional insurance because we use a wide variety of ingredients from nature. This makes it much easier to avoid nutrient deficiencies and optimize total body health. Whole foods boost energy. You can feel the difference. Most importantly...Absolutely no compromises! 

We don’t use any artificial sweeteners, colors, flavors, additives, or preservatives.

Q: I have a medical condition or am pregnant/nursing. Is it safe to use Opportuniteas or other dietary supplements?

Check with your doctor first. Everyone is beautiful and unique. Some foods are perfectly fine for most everyone but can be harmful to others. Thousands of people have tried our superfood tea blends and we have not heard of any major adverse reactions beyond not enjoying the natural flavor. While medical experts have guided us in every step along the way, we cannot give advice on your specific medical conditions.

Q: What are the major risks and challenges? 

Any business that relies on crops grown outdoors has some degree of variability. Not every batch of matcha or goji berry is the exact same. However we've put in a lot of time finding the best sources for ingredients. We already have a robust supply chain in place with multiple ingredient suppliers, manufacturers, and distributors ready to go.  

We've already gone through the painstaking process of bringing new products to market for our current superfood tea blends. If anything unexpected arises manufacturing capsules we will let you know right away, but we expect everything to be delivered on time or even early.

Q: Where are Opportuniteas products made?

All of our products are manufactured in a Good Manufacturing Processes Certified and FDA certified facility here in the USA.

Q: Have another question? 

We are happy to answer it, just let us know. Our goal is to make it incredibly easy for you to get the best natural energy and focus. 

Contact Us: info@opportuniteas.com
story_txt:
The Problem
Stress and fatigue in the United States are at an all time high.
As a result, sugary energy drinks and coffee are being consumed at an alarming rate. 
But...we all know that these products aren't healthy or sustainable solutions.
The Solution
Tea is one of the healthiest drinks on the planet.
As a health nut in search of a better way, I have devoted the last 4 years of my life to creating the best supplements for natural energy. 
It started with superfood tea blends.

ClearTea provides physical energy that keep you feeling energized throughout the day.
Brainiac provides a smooth boost of mental energy to help you concentrate and focus.

The feedback from tea drinkers has been even better than expected. Most people are raving about them...
Check out our Amazon reviews HERE
But the taste of unsweetened tea isn't for everyone.
Help us put our superfood tea blends into convenient capsules you can take without tasting anything.

Enter the capsule...



Using a capsule allows you to completely avoid the taste.
It also allows us to use some amazing ingredients that we wanted to include in our tea blends, but quickly ruled out due to their awful taste.
Bacopa Monnieri and Ginkgo Biloba give Brainiac capsules an enhanced focus boost.
Ashwaganga and Panax Ginseng give ClearTea capsules a lasting endurance boost.

But trust us, you don't want these ingredients anywhere near your taste buds. 
Now you really can get the healthiest supplements your way...

Don't change your life to take your supplements.
Get supplements that fit into your lifestyle.
Why We Need Your Help
As a small business, Opportuniteas doesn't have the funding needed to meet the minimum order quantities of the top capsule supplement manufacturers. 
With your help, we hope to raise 7500 dollars to create taste-free capsules that give anyone natural energy and focus.
Where Your Money is Going...


Initial Product Order - $5500
Safety testing - $500
Packaging and fulfillment - $850
Indiegogo and processing fees - $650

When Do I Get my Product(s)?
  We will deliver your bottles of superfood tea by June and capsules by July but hopefully earlier.

Other Ways You Can Help...
Help us get the word out about our amazing campaign
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
If you can't contribute we'd still love your help.
Most Importantly:  Thank You!
We wouldn't be able to safely energize the world without the support of health-conscious and passionate individuals like yourself.

While medical experts have guided us in every step along the way, we cannot give advice on your specific medical conditions.

story:
The Fever Smart campaign achieved 157% of its goal, and we are now accepting pre-orders at: www.feversmart.com


Fever Smart is the first smart patch thermometer for children's health and parents' peace of mind.

Fever Smart is a smart patch thermometer that allows you to monitor your child’s temperature continuously and remotely.

You’ll never have to wake your sleeping child again to check their temperature. Using our simple device and your smartphone, you can easily track your child’s temperature for signs of fever. Fever Smart provides important information to parents monitoring their children’s health.

Features

Fever Smart is one of the first children’s products to have full integration with iOS 8 and Apple’s Healthkit platform. Our simple system is the easiest way for parents to keep track of their children's health.

Fever Smart’s core features make it the most effective device on the market for temperature monitoring.

Designed with parents and children in mind

We created this device with children in mind. The Fever Smart team worked together with parents and children to create the best design and product for our users. We performed extensive testing to ensure quality, accuracy, and safety.

Why we are different

Easy to Use: Fever Smart’s system is quick to set up, and our device is extremely easy to use.

Comfortable: Conventional thermometers can be uncomfortable for children. Kids don’t like things in their mouth, ears … or elsewhere! Fever Smart sits comfortably under a child’s armpit.

Continuous Readings: Normal thermometers can’t catch dangerous temperature spikes because they only provide one-time readings. Fever Smart can help address a health problem before it’s too late.

Accurate: We chose to measure axillary temperature because it is the most accurate non-invasive temperature reading. Fever Smart is less prone to effects from ambient temperature than other devices that measure temperature on extremities like hands or feet.

Affordable: Fever Smart is less expensive than most other wearables on the market.

Product Development

Our device is designed and developed- we are 100% ready to manufacture. The machines are tooled up and the sample devices have been tested.

After two years of hard work, we’ve come a long way with Fever Smart. Now we need your help: your support will allow us to finalize the first round of manufacturing so that we can make Fever Smart available to the public. Help us share our technology so that together we can bring peace of mind to millions of parents around the world.

How it works

Place the small device underneath your child's armpit using one of the disposable patches.

The device constantly measures the child's temperature and sends the data to a relay unit, which is any iPad, iPod touch or smartphone that sits in the same room as the child. This relay unit then sends the data to the cloud, so you can access the information from anywhere in the world via a smart device.  

Download the Fever Smart app on your phone and use it to track your child's health. 

You can set individual parameters for temperature thresholds: when the child's temperature exceeds the set thresholds, you will receive alerts so you can take immediate action.

Perks

Technology

Team

FAQ

Is Fever Smart safe to use?

Fever Smart is absolutely safe. We have FDA certification and our device is designed to provide the most accurate temperature readings in a safe, non-invasive way. 

How does Fever Smart measure temperature?

Fever Smart uses axillary (under the armpit) temperature. Axillary temperature is usually 0.5°F (0.3°C) to 1°F (0.6°C) lower than an oral temperature reading.

Why does Fever Smart use axillary temperature?

Fever Smart uses axillary temperature because it allows for accurate non-invasive temperature readings.

What is a "relay unit"?

The relay unit is a iPad, iPod touch or smartphone that sits in the same room as the child. The relay unit is able to receive the bluetooth transmission from the Fever Smart device and relay it to you over wifi. The Fever Smart device can also communicate directly to your smartphone via bluetooth, but the range is limited (15 feet).

What devices can be used as a "relay unit"?

We currently support any device after (and including): iPhone 4s, iPod Touch 5, iPad 3, and iPad Mini. The new iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus will also be compatible with the device.

Will Fever Smart work with Android, Blackberry, Windows? When will my platform be supported?

Prior to launch, we are developing for iOS. In the future, Fever Smart will also be accessible through Android, and a mobile-friendly and tablet-friendly web app which can be accessed on any web-enabled device or any device within Bluetooth range.

Does Fever Smart come with any of the disposable patches?

Of course! Each Fever Smart is shipped with 10 disposable patches. Additional patches can be purchased at an affordable price. 

How can Fever Smart help my child's pediatrician?

With Fever Smart, you can track your child's temperature trends over time and send this information to their pediatrician. Doctors can use the data to create personalized healthcare solutions.

I live outside of the United States, can I pre-order a Fever Smart?

Yes. Fever Smart will ship worldwide.

What are the shipping costs?

Shipping in the US is included. There is an additional cost of $20 for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country. If it turns out that shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.

Is the battery replaceable?

Yes - if the battery ever runs out, you can simply replace it. Fever Smart uses CR2025, which can be purchased at any convenience store.

Is the device waterproof?

No. Fever Smart should not be used in the bath or pool. 

How do I contact someone on the Fever Smart team?

If you wish to get in touch with us, you can contact us at info@feversmart.com

What are the shipping costs?

$20 for international shipping. Shipment does not include extra fees from
customs, or additional costs associated with your country. If it turns out that
shipment to your country proves impossible, we will reimburse your order.

Yes - if the battery ever runs out, you can simply replace
it. Fever Smart uses CR2025, which can be purchased at any convenience

story:
Your iron needs an Upgrade

Get it with the JNC Nano Steam Iron Combo (Nano Combo). Forget clunky, inconvenient traditional irons and steamers that don’t do the job: the JNC nano combo is a powerful portable garment steamer and iron that delivers professional results instantly. From laundry caring to sterilizing, from silk to suit – nano combo’s tiny size makes it the ultimate steamer to use at home and on the go. nano combo smooths out wrinkles faster than traditional irons and steamers, and its high-temp nano steam penetrates deep into the fibres to eliminate bacteria and odour naturally.

 

 

Powerful enough to take wrinkles out of thicker fabrics, yet gentle enough to care for the most delicate ones, the JNC Nano Steam Iron Combo is the evolution of the iron and the traditional steamer – a must have for everyone looking for a quicker, more efficient way to care for their clothes, at home and on the go.

 

 

Flexsteam Technology

Our Flexsteam nano steam penetrates and softens the fabric for professional results after every use. Regardless of the thickness and material of the fabric, nano steam kills the bacteria in the deepest areas, which the common steam particles cannot reach, while high-temp sterilizing and negative ions removes odour.

 

 

The Smallest & Most Professional 

Nano Steam Iron Ever --- Nano Combo

 

So Fashionable

 

 

Light & Tiny

Nano Combo weighs only 450g – that’s lighter than a bottle of water. It easily fits into a corner of your suitcase when taking it on a trip.

 

 

Small but mighty 

There’s no need to make things more complicated than they need to be – Nano Combo is lighter and faster than a traditional iron, all to make life easier.

 

 
 

Sleek design

Ergonomically and simply designed, minimalist design complements your home. It comes in two stylish colours: Passion Red and Elegant Violet.

 

 

Simple to use 

Just press the button and go. It’s that simple.

 

 

 

Hygienic 

Nano Steam cleans deep into fabric fibres to remove odor and kill 99.9% of bacteria such as fine Escherichia coli, Candida albicans, Staphylococcus aureus, and aphids.

 

 
 

So Quick

Steam comes out within 5 sec, saving you time and hassle in your day to day life.

 

 
 

Care for a range of sensitive fabrics

Clothes that need special care becomes a piece of cake under Nano Combo! A suit resumes its smart shape and line after in minutes!

 

 
 

 

Easy storage & carriage 

with carrying case 

 

 

 

Protect & Sterilize

From baby clothes to underwear and bed sheets, you can use Nano Combo to keep fabrics as bacteria-free as possible.

 

 

 

Single Voltage

100V ~ 120V

220V ~ 240V

ESTIMATED DELIVERY: Feb 2019

 

 

User-friendly 

Use Nano Steam with a handy vertical or horizontal operation depending on your needs. Vertical Steam range 1m; Horizontal Steam range:1.1m; You can easily control the strength by just adjusting the distance between the iron and the clothes.

 

 
 
 

Convenient 

Both Dry and Steam ironing; Clothes after Nano ironing will not get wet. Just iron and dress up.

 

 

 

So Handy

 

 
 

 

Efficient

With the flexsteam technology, it can make your clothes look perfect quickly due to its high conversion rate. With its water tank (65mL) of sizable capacity, it doesn’t need many refills to get the job done. All you need is 5 mins with a little bit water – 65mL is enough to steam a shirt and a pair of trousers.

 

 
 

Deep cleaning 

Nano steam penetrates to the deepest area where the common steam particles cannot reach, regardless of the thickness and material of the fabric, eliminating odour and bacteria thoroughly.

 

 

Extend the life cycle of your clothes

Nano steam care can minimize the depreciation of the clothes, making the clothes as brand-new. With Nano Combo, you can always be well prepared before any of your big events in your life!

 

 

 

 

TEAM 

JNC has been being an active and well-known player in the market for more than 20 years with overseas exposure. In the 90s, we mainly focused on digital and audio visual products like MP3, TV, Hi-Fi, etc.

Since 2013, we’ve been expanding our product line to electrical home appliances.

At JNC, we’re exploring more possibilities with increasing focus on fashionable, smart and chic design under the overall direction of “Smart Living”

 

Packaging Design

story:
At GMYLE, we always design good gadgets to make your life easier.

A comfortable home needs a precise lighting system and you should have full control of it. Therefore, we are here to proudly present you the most affordable smart light bulb on the market: Lumiere.

Lumiere is a smart, multi-color LED light bulb that you can effortlessly control via your phone & tablet – turn on / off, dim down, change the color and set a lighting schedule. You can define the perfect mood & ambiance for every moment with the precise lighting. Lumiere also works with Amazon Alexa & Google Home, which allows you to voice control the lights without a fingertip.

 

Smart Lights are up-and-running in different medias and Lumiere is the best choice with defined dynamic lighting!

 

Affordable – double savings on energy and money.

With Lumiere, lighting system is finally affordable to everyone. We use LED in Lumiere which saves about 80% of energy spent and, after all, the energy saving will significantly reflect on your electric bills that you can save a fortune.

 

Wi-Fi Smart Plug – the story of success

GMYLE is always specializing at enhancing your life with dedicated gadgets and we are proud to show you our previous success – Wi-Fi Smart Plug. We are one of the best sellers in Amazon selling over 40,000 units every month – nearly 1 per minute! And with over 600 positive reviews, gadgets from GMYLE are something that you can trust!

 

Cool to stay focused. Warm for being relaxed.

Light influences our mood & behavior and Lumiere enhances your lighting system to the next level. Keep awake and energized in daytime with cool & bright white light; stay laid-back with warm & relaxing white light for the cozy family night; unwind and lull to sleep with depleted & soft white light. Light up your space with the perfect warm to cool white light spectrum provided by Lumiere.

 

Perfect ambiance with 16 million colors.

With the full range RGB color, you can effortlessly light up your room from Lumiere’s 16 million colors. Change the definite color and shift the atmosphere with the lighting sets at once with a touch, without hesitation.

 

Save & recall the ideal lights and moods.

Lumiere allows you to control and fine-tune your defined ambiance from vivid colors to comfy shades. Save your favorite light settings and recall the scenes with a single tap on your phone & tablet.

 

Say goodbye to dimmer switch installation.

Light dimming can be so easy with Lumiere. Simply a tap on your phone & tablet, and you can tune up and dim the light at the perfect brightness without any hardwired installation and dimmer switch.

 

Lights ON / OFF with scheduled control.

With Smart Life app, you can schedule and control your Lumiere at ease. Whenever you are about to reach home from work or it is time to sleep, you can always set schedules to turn on / off your Lumiere anytime, anywhere.

 

Voice out. Light on.

Lumiere works well with Amazon Alexa and Google Home. Turn your lights on / off without lifting your fingers. Use your voice to light the desired colors and brightness for your flawless lifestyle.

 

 

Follow the steps to set-up and explore the functions of Lumiere

  1. Connect to Smart Life app on Android / iOS devices
  2. Turn on / off
  3. Change from warm to cool light
  4. Control brightness
  5. Change color
  6. Select color pre-sets
  7. Set schedule

 

 

Back the Lumiere project here with no hassles

  1. Choose the right Lumiere perk you would like to have and click “GET THIS PERK” button;
  2. Fill out the relevant information – shipment, payment and so on;
  3. Sit back, relax and follow our updates;
  4. Wait for the delvery of the PERFECT smart light once the Lumiere project can reach its goal!

 

Project Status

GMYLE has been specializing and manufacturing electronic gadgets since 2006 and we are proud to announce that Lumiere is almost ready for mass production. Thanks to the hard work from our genius engineers and designers, we now have everything on schedule and Lumiere is expected to deliver in late March 2018.

We are / will always be transparent and honest about the details of the project.

 

Q: What is the base type of Lumiere?
A: E26 Edison Screw.
 
Q: What is the difference between E26 and E27?
A: There is only 1mm difference between the E26 and E27 thread outside diameters and they are virtually identical and usually interchangeable. Lumiere uses E26 Edison Screw.


Base types used in major markets:
E26 Edison Screw – Canada, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, United States
E27 Edison Screw – Europe
E27 Edison Screw or B22 Bayonet Cap – Australia, United Kingdom 


Q: What is the standard wireless network needed for Lumiere set up?
A: It is requested to use a 2.4Ghz 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi network to set up your Lumiere. If you use a 5Ghz Wi-Fi network, you may not be able to set up and connect your Lumiere.

 
Q: Can I control Lumiere use my phone & tablet anywhere?
A: Sure, you can remotely control your Lumiere wherever you are once you are connected to any data and / or Wi-Fi network. You need not to be in the same network with Lumiere once it is successfully set up. Please make sure your Lumiere is covered by stable and strong 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi network.
 
Q: Can I use Lumiere in my country / region?
A: Lumiere works on 100-120V 50/60Hz power mains. It is recommended for you to check if Lumiere is compatible to your country / region by comparing the world standard.
 
Q: Can I control multiple Lumiere in the same room at once?
A: Sure. You may use the “Group” function in Smart Life app and control a group of Lumiere at once.
 
Q: Can Lumiere be controlled by multiple phones and tablets?
A: Sure. You may use “Device Sharing” function in Smart Life app and share the control to other phones and tablets.

 

At GMYLE, we are proud to design good gadgets to make your life easier.

Our research & development team always stand by and strive to provide your favorite gadgets & cases to your life and beyond. And our expert customer service team are always ready to handle inquiries you may have. GMYLE dedicates to enhance your style & life with our Lumiere and other gadgets.
story_txt:
At GMYLE, we always design good gadgets to make your life easier.A comfortable home needs a precise lighting system and you should have full control of it. Therefore, we are here to proudly present you the most affordable smart light bulb on the market: Lumiere.Lumiere is a smart, multi-color LED light bulb that you can effortlessly control via your phone & tablet – turn on / off, dim down, change the color and set a lighting schedule. You can define the perfect mood & ambiance for every moment with the precise lighting. Lumiere also works with Amazon Alexa & Google Home, which allows you to voice control the lights without a fingertip. Smart Lights are up-and-running in different medias and Lumiere is the best choice with defined dynamic lighting! Affordable – double savings on energy and money.With Lumiere, lighting system is finally affordable to everyone. We use LED in Lumiere which saves about 80% of energy spent and, after all, the energy saving will significantly reflect on your electric bills that you can save a fortune. Wi-Fi Smart Plug – the story of successGMYLE is always specializing at enhancing your life with dedicated gadgets and we are proud to show you our previous success – Wi-Fi Smart Plug. We are one of the best sellers in Amazon selling over 40,000 units every month – nearly 1 per minute! And with over 600 positive reviews, gadgets from GMYLE are something that you can trust! Cool to stay focused. Warm for being relaxed.Light influences our mood & behavior and Lumiere enhances your lighting system to the next level. Keep awake and energized in daytime with cool & bright white light; stay laid-back with warm & relaxing white light for the cozy family night; unwind and lull to sleep with depleted & soft white light. Light up your space with the perfect warm to cool white light spectrum provided by Lumiere. Perfect ambiance with 16 million colors.With the full range RGB color, you can effortlessly light up your room from Lumiere’s 16 million colors. Change the definite color and shift the atmosphere with the lighting sets at once with a touch, without hesitation. Save & recall the ideal lights and moods.Lumiere allows you to control and fine-tune your defined ambiance from vivid colors to comfy shades. Save your favorite light settings and recall the scenes with a single tap on your phone & tablet. Say goodbye to dimmer switch installation.Light dimming can be so easy with Lumiere. Simply a tap on your phone & tablet, and you can tune up and dim the light at the perfect brightness without any hardwired installation and dimmer switch. Lights ON / OFF with scheduled control.With Smart Life app, you can schedule and control your Lumiere at ease. Whenever you are about to reach home from work or it is time to sleep, you can always set schedules to turn on / off your Lumiere anytime, anywhere. Voice out. Light on.Lumiere works well with Amazon Alexa and Google Home. Turn your lights on / off without lifting your fingers. Use your voice to light the desired colors and brightness for your flawless lifestyle. 

 
Follow the steps to set-up and explore the functions of Lumiere
Connect to Smart Life app on Android / iOS devices
Turn on / off
Change from warm to cool light
Control brightness
Change color
Select color pre-sets
Set schedule
  Back the Lumiere project here with no hassles
Choose the right Lumiere perk you would like to have and click “GET THIS PERK” button;
Fill out the relevant information – shipment, payment and so on;
Sit back, relax and follow our updates;
Wait for the delvery of the PERFECT smart light once the Lumiere project can reach its goal!
 Project StatusGMYLE has been specializing and manufacturing electronic gadgets since 2006 and we are proud to announce that Lumiere is almost ready for mass production. Thanks to the hard work from our genius engineers and designers, we now have everything on schedule and Lumiere is expected to deliver in late March 2018.We are / will always be transparent and honest about the details of the project. Q: What is the base type of Lumiere?A: E26 Edison Screw. Q: What is the difference between E26 and E27?A: There is only 1mm difference between the E26 and E27 thread outside diameters and they are virtually identical and usually interchangeable. Lumiere uses E26 Edison Screw.Base types used in major markets:E26 Edison Screw – Canada, Japan, Korea, Taiwan, United StatesE27 Edison Screw – EuropeE27 Edison Screw or B22 Bayonet Cap – Australia, United Kingdom Q: What is the standard wireless network needed for Lumiere set up?A: It is requested to use a 2.4Ghz 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi network to set up your Lumiere. If you use a 5Ghz Wi-Fi network, you may not be able to set up and connect your Lumiere. Q: Can I control Lumiere use my phone & tablet anywhere?A: Sure, you can remotely control your Lumiere wherever you are once you are connected to any data and / or Wi-Fi network. You need not to be in the same network with Lumiere once it is successfully set up. Please make sure your Lumiere is covered by stable and strong 2.4Ghz Wi-Fi network. Q: Can I use Lumiere in my country / region?A: Lumiere works on 100-120V 50/60Hz power mains. It is recommended for you to check if Lumiere is compatible to your country / region by comparing the world standard. Q: Can I control multiple Lumiere in the same room at once?A: Sure. You may use the “Group” function in Smart Life app and control a group of Lumiere at once. Q: Can Lumiere be controlled by multiple phones and tablets?A: Sure. You may use “Device Sharing” function in Smart Life app and share the control to other phones and tablets. At GMYLE, we are proud to design good gadgets to make your life easier.Our research & development team always stand by and strive to provide your favorite gadgets & cases to your life and beyond. And our expert customer service team are always ready to handle inquiries you may have. GMYLE dedicates to enhance your style & life with our Lumiere and other gadgets.

story:
We did it!

Thanks to your support, we now have a lovely website where you can already watch our second episode. And more are coming up!


---

The Video

What you see up there isn't an introductory video where we ask you for your support. Instead, it's a full episode of the show we'd like to do, so you can get a real feeling for what we're trying to accomplish.


Our Story

Who are we? Well, we're a married couple and a cat. We make our living from creative work (our artistic output includes indie games like The Infinite Ocean and The Book of Living Magic; lately we've been working on an art project called The Oneiropolis Compendium), which is to say we're rather poor.

But we can't let that stop us from trying to enjoy life!

Verena loves cooking, and we've always enjoyed internet cooking shows (we were big fans of Kamikaze Cookery); and we've also often been frustrated by how needlessly convoluted many of the recipes you find on the internet are. So we thought we'd create a show that's all about making good cooking accessible to those of us who are on the lower end of the income spectrum.

And we've already done an episode (see above)! And people liked it - we even got several photos of delicious-looking bread baked with the instructions from our video.

Unfortunately, the "starving artists" part of the title isn't a joke, so while we can keep doing the show, we can't even afford a website. And a website would be sort of essential to being able to get the show out there where people will find it. We could also use a bit of money to fix various things in the kitchen.


The Impact

We'll show people how to make food that is yummy and yet affordable. We'll show that cooking isn't some mysterious superpower but something you can learn. And we'll make a show that is fun to watch - a show you'll be able to watch even if you're not a fan of cooking.


What We Need & What You Get

The money will be used to pay for a bit of webspace and a domain; if possible for a couple of years. What is left over will go towards:

  • Fixing the light in our kitchen, so you can see what we're doing and we can also film at night.
  • Fixing the light in our oven, so you can see what we're baking.
  • Getting a better camera microphone.


Other Ways You Can Help

Spreading of the word is always appreciated. Neither this IndieGoGo campaign nor the actual show can achieve much without word of mouth - so let everyone who might be interested know about them!

story:
eyecloudCam is the first standalone battery-powered home security camera with built-in AI that also features on-device face recognition.

 

 

From basic security monitoring to complex devices, homeowners are increasingly focusing on comfort and convenience.

For security and privacy reasons, people have already gone for risk-free, easy-to-use solutions in the shape of security camera systems, and with fast-changing technology, these systems look as if they're popped from the future.

Along with advantages, existing security cameras also come with disadvantages such as laborious installation, pesky false alerts, high cost, etc.

We want to change all that:

One of the biggest challenges in the development of eyecloudCam was to collect all smart features of security cameras on a single device. We also wanted to make all AI features - motion and person detection, and face recognition - as accessible as possible.

Thanks to our team, we worked out the right solution.

 

 

In the long run, the most important thing for us was to develop an all-in-one intelligent, affordable, easy-to-use solution that does not require cables or any other additional devices, and keeps people in touch with their homes regardless of their location.

 

 

Cordless and Wireless

 

eyecloudCam is amazing in that it is an independent, flexible, cordless device. You don't have to worry about the [un]available sockets in your house, cable management, the dust that might gather on the wiring, your cat chewing the cords, or about a power outage.

 

 

Easy-to-Mount

 

eyecloudCam can be placed on any horizontal area or can be stuck to a vertical surface, ceiling or roof in a jiffy.

Thanks to our practical and innovative design, our portable security solution provides an easy & quick set-up and can be installed anywhere, without any pins and needles.

Just a double glued circle sticker, a magnetic mount, and 3 extra-screws, just to be sure.

 

 

A Rechargeable Battery That Can Last Up to 6 Months

 

eyecloudCam comes with a built-in rechargeable battery. To enhance the experience, we've managed to extend the battery life by using a high-capacity rechargeable lithium battery inside eyecloudCam & applying energy saving AI technology for less energy consumption.

 

 

Depending on user settings, usage and temperature, the battery can last up to six months in standby mode.

 

 

Eliminates Most False Alerts

 

eyecloudCam goes along with a PIR  sensor that measures infrared light radiating from "objects" and distinguishes humans from other non-humans [animals, environment]. 

When eyecloudCam detects a person, it starts recording and stores videos locally.

 

 

Superior Data Privacy

 

After food, water, warmth and rest, security and safety are next in the hierarchy of needs.

The same goes for data. For us, data privacy should be neither an option nor a luxury - it is an imperative and a necessity that we are committed to.

Our awesome solution allows on-device processing, without requiring an internet connection, and provides a high-level of protection similar to bank-grade encryption, to ensure that your sensitive data stays with you only and as safe as possible.

 

24/7 Crisp Videos and Livestreaming

 

Truly wireless, portable, weatherproof and noninvasive, eyecloudCam is the perfect solution for your outdoor security and safety needs, recording 1080p videos, day and night, at a 110° viewing angle. 

eyecloudCam stores ±1600 10 to 30-second videos locally. When the internal storage [32 GB] reaches maximum capacity, the oldest videos are automatically erased, making space for the latest ones. If you wish to save certain videos, you can download them to your phone.

 

 

 

Your Home - A Pocket Away

 

With eyecloudCam you can take your home everywhere you go. Get remote access and live stream anytime you want, no matter your location via your iOS or Android smartphone.

Oh, and there's more! You can also share your camera with others, as long as they have the app on their phones. So, if you're in the middle of nowhere and don't have access to the internet, you can ask a friend to check over your crib.

 

 

Embedded Person Detection Technology Eliminates Almost All False Alerts

 

Most false alarms are caused by falling leaves, animals, cars and other moving objects in the monitoring range.

To solve this problem, we have developed and implemented an optimized embedded neural network, and employed AI algorithms on people detection to eliminate most false alarms.

 

Embedded Neural Network allows eyecloudCam to see and analyze objects in the monitoring range, avoiding false alarms caused by falling leaves, animals, cars and other moving objects.

 

 

 

Essential to our innovation was our experience working on Intel's Movidius VPU, as well as our expertise in computer vision, image sensors, and AI algorithms.

 

 

Premium No Longer Means Expensive

 

Rechargeable batteries, 32GB of local storage, product versatility, and no cables - these are the ingredients chosen to create the perfect small home security camera to the tune of $130.

 

 

Our intuitive app was designed in such a way that it does all the setup for you.

Just download the app, register with your email, log in, switch on eyecloudCam, and then sync your smartphone to the device.

 

Established in 2017, eyecloud.ai is a Silicon Valley company with development centers in Romania and China that focuses on AI-on-edge product design, research, development, and production.

With an industrial background at Intel, Movidius, Google, Yahoo, and SunnyOptical. eyecloud.ai has gathered more than 30 years of collective experience and first-hand expertise in embedded artificial intelligence, real-time image, and video processing, sensor optics and module design, camera system design and integration, and big data mining and cloud computing.

 

eyecloudCam History

 

“We designed eyecloudCam with a mission – to make AI affordable, energy saving, and easy to use by consumers in the smart home market. By supporting eyecloudCam, people have the chance to contribute with new ideas and partake in this amazing adventure, that of bringing AI home.”, said Yuan Po, founder of eyecloud.ai. And here we started the trip to develop this idea into eyecloudCam.

 

 

When developing eyecloudCam, our top priority was to make sure we provide the best cost-performance ratio for a home security camera solution. We’re currently working with the best suppliers and manufacturers around the globe, and can't wait to bring in eyecloudCam!

Check out our progress up until now:

Footnotes

 

Here at eyecloud.ai we believe quality and punctuality are of the essence, and we’re doing our best to get these two qualities together.

Our product current design and features are tested approved and ready for lockdown. We also want to adjust eyecloudCam accordingly so as to bring it to our backers’ expectations.

However, the delivery timeline might be influenced by the manufacturing conundrums, added features or our backers’ ideas and suggestions. We’ve already included the above-mentioned risks and challenges in our delivery timeline. Regarding the shipping risks, each package comes with an insurance. So if anything happens with the eyecloudCam during shipping, we’ll send you another one instead ASAP.

story:
Hi Kickstarter! We are excited to introduce our first line of products, The Leverage Collection – American-made products that are both beautiful and functional.

 

 

Sleek and modern, these bottle openers have been stripped down to only what is essential. They are attractive design pieces that you would be proud to display on your wall or out on your bar.

 

 

 

The Leverage Bottle Openers are a joy to use and open bottles with little fuss or effort. They open bottles by gently flexing, but not bending the cap – a great feature for home brewers and collectors.

 

 

Each bottle opener will be cast in solid brass through a process called lost wax casting and then hand-finished. Next, they'll be sandblasted for a satin finish and sealed to protect the finish and minimize discoloration so your bottle opener will look beautiful for years to come.

 

 

Designed in our studio in Brooklyn and manufactured in a factory in Indiana. We are committed to making all of our products in the USA.

  

 

The very first iteration of the Leverage Wall-Mounted Bottle Opener was created in 2014 and has since been revised and refined dozens and dozens of times. Our bottle openers have undergone rigorous testing and have been engineered to perfection.

 

 

 

We will also be offering the Leverage Key Hook as a reward. This solid brass key hook is a stylish way to securely hook your key to your pants or bag. The Key Hook also opens most beer bottles. See FAQ for more info. 

 

 

 

 

 

Each product will be available in two finishes:

  • satin brass*
  • blackened brass

*sealed to protect the natural brass color and minimize discoloration and darkening that is common with natural uncoated brass.

 

 

 

  • Leverage Wall-Mounted Bottle Opener: 1 wall-mounted bottle opener, plus 2 drywall plugs and 2 screws in a matching finish
  • Leverage Handheld Bottle Opener: 1 handheld bottle opener
  • Leverage Key Hook: 1 key hook, plus 1 jump ring and 1 flat split ring in a matching finish

story:
Meet  MiTVTi

An amazing software platform powered by a Raspberry Pi that converts any digital TV or monitor into a computer, personal cloud,  media streaming and a kiosk for public services.

 

Why MiTVTi?

Have you been in a situation where you need an extra computer for the occasional guest, for your little kids or for yourself ? Maybe your main computer is busy or you feel apprehensive to share your computer with sensitive data.

Do you want to store your phone contacts and photos into a personal and secure home cloud without all the hassle?

Do you need a media streaming device to watch movies?

In that case MITVTi is FOR YOU!!!

We have created MiTVTi  to offer a friendly  platform to keep us connected and entertained when we are at home. We  designed the platform with the goal to reduce the cost of the hardware and develop an intuitive interface. It's aimed to reduce the digital divide in developing communities with an affordable system supported by a  user-friendly interface that converts any  digital TV or monitor into a door for the information society.

We created a kiosk for public services as  means for underprivileged communities to get access to services from their governments.

We would like to ask your contribution to our project, you can take advantage of all the great features of MiTVTi  knowing that simultaneously you are helping to create a platform that intends to bridge the digital divide in impoverished communities, and many children will be able to have access to the internet and to have a computer thanks to you.

 

Features

 

 

 

Hardware 

MITVTi is powered by the incredible Raspberry Pi, we evaluated more than 10 different systems  to select the better hardware to power our platform and the Pi was the winner based in performance, price and robustness. Besides the hardware Pi has a vibrant community and eco system that is helping to close the digital gap in the world.

 

Project development

MiTVTi  is  in prototype mode, fully functional. We are in the process of optimizing the platform performance, software debugging, and improving some features based in the feedback of  the beta test users. Once this final review is completed we will move to QA to release the platform and be ready for mass production.

What's in the box?

You will receive your MiTVTi package with the following items:

  • MITVTi hardware device
  • SD card with software platform MiTVTi installed
  • App for Android and OS MiTVTi
  • Power supply for MiTVTi
  • HDMI cable
  • Keyboard
  • Mouse

Why we need your help

We have a functional prototype that soon will be ready for production. We have a big  dream: to bridge the digital divide but we are a small company with limited financial means and placing an order of thousands of units of  required hardware is out of our league. 

With your help we can close the gap and make up several thousands kits,  keep the lights on , and continues working on improving the software platform.

_________________________

Meet the team

 

We are a team of three guys that love technology and we have been working on hi tech projects for more than ten years with experience in design, electronics, software and analytics. We are based in US and Netherlands. We want MiTvTi to be an empowering product for developing countries and are planning to establish the manufacturing line  in Mexico and we plan to launch the operation to underserved communities from that country.

The team:

Edmundo Gutierrez, co-founder and responsible for product engineering, Edmundo has more than 10 years of experience in leading engineering  design teams in technology companies. He holds a Ph.D. in Engineering.

Juan Santana, co-founder, has more than 10 years of experience in developing advanced software and hardware technology. Juan holds two US patents and a Ph. D. in Physics.

Dante Dominguez, co-founder,  has extensive experience in start up operations and new product introductions, he is responsible for product development and business operations.
story_txt:
Meet  MiTVTi
An amazing software platform powered by a Raspberry Pi that converts any digital TV or monitor into a computer, personal cloud,  media streaming and a kiosk for public services. Why MiTVTi?Have you been in a situation where you need an extra computer for the occasional guest, for your little kids or for yourself ? Maybe your main computer is busy or you feel apprehensive to share your computer with sensitive data.Do you want to store your phone contacts and photos into a personal and secure home cloud without all the hassle?Do you need a media streaming device to watch movies?In that case MITVTi is FOR YOU!!!We have created MiTVTi  to offer a friendly  platform to keep us connected and entertained when we are at home. We  designed the platform with the goal to reduce the cost of the hardware and develop an intuitive interface. It's aimed to reduce the digital divide in developing communities with an affordable system supported by a  user-friendly interface that converts any  digital TV or monitor into a door for the information society.We created a kiosk for public services as  means for underprivileged communities to get access to services from their governments.We would like to ask your contribution to our project, you can take advantage of all the great features of MiTVTi  knowing that simultaneously you are helping to create a platform that intends to bridge the digital divide in impoverished communities, and many children will be able to have access to the internet and to have a computer thanks to you. Features   Hardware MITVTi is powered by the incredible Raspberry Pi, we evaluated more than 10 different systems  to select the better hardware to power our platform and the Pi was the winner based in performance, price and robustness. Besides the hardware Pi has a vibrant community and eco system that is helping to close the digital gap in the world. Project developmentMiTVTi  is  in prototype mode, fully functional. We are in the process of optimizing the platform performance, software debugging, and improving some features based in the feedback of  the beta test users. Once this final review is completed we will move to QA to release the platform and be ready for mass production.What's in the box?You will receive your MiTVTi package with the following items:
MITVTi hardware device
SD card with software platform MiTVTi installed
App for Android and OS MiTVTi
Power supply for MiTVTi
HDMI cable
Keyboard
Mouse
Why we need your helpWe have a functional prototype that soon will be ready for production. We have a big  dream: to bridge the digital divide but we are a small company with limited financial means and placing an order of thousands of units of  required hardware is out of our league. With your help we can close the gap and make up several thousands kits,  keep the lights on , and continues working on improving the software platform._________________________Meet the team We are a team of three guys that love technology and we have been working on hi tech projects for more than ten years with experience in design, electronics, software and analytics. We are based in US and Netherlands. We want MiTvTi to be an empowering product for developing countries and are planning to establish the manufacturing line  in Mexico and we plan to launch the operation to underserved communities from that country.The team:Edmundo Gutierrez, co-founder and responsible for product engineering, Edmundo has more than 10 years of experience in leading engineering  design teams in technology companies. He holds a Ph.D. in Engineering.Juan Santana, co-founder, has more than 10 years of experience in developing advanced software and hardware technology. Juan holds two US patents and a Ph. D. in Physics.Dante Dominguez, co-founder,  has extensive experience in start up operations and new product introductions, he is responsible for product development and business operations.

story:
IMPORTANT: Please read the update here :

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-world-s-first-smart-potato-smartpotato/x/22825198#/updates/all

 

 

Download press kit

 

THIS IS NOT A PRANK
THIS IS AN ACTUAL ELECTRONIC DEVICE
WE WILL MANUFACTURE IT FOR REAL

ASK ANY YES/NO QUESTION,
THE POTATO WILL ANSWER TO YOU

Any difficult decision to take? Leave it to the potato!

 

 

The potato is not included.

We've got Male and Female t-shirts. Sizes range from XXS to XXXL. You will receive an email to choose the size when we ship.

POTATO answers to YES/NO questions. You can compare POTATO to the 2020 version of the Magic Eight Ball. The difference is that POTATO answers are not random: they are really influenced by the electrical signals picked up by the board inside the potato (I like to call them potato brainwaves), processed trough a Tensorflow neural network. Due to the state-of-the-art nature of this technology, we can therefore not provide any warranty regarding the accuracy of the potato language to human language translation.

 

STRETCH GOALS

$30,000 - The project is funded. We will be able to manufacture the Neuraspud.

$60,000 - The smart potato will be able to produce weather forecasts

$90,000 - The smart potato will have its own blockchain

$120,000 - The potatoes will be able to communicate with each other over a meshed-potatoes network


If the $30k goal is not reached, people who bought the Neuraspud will have the choice between receiving goodies such as t-shirts and stickers or cancelling their pledge to get a refund.

The t-shirts and stickers will be delivered even if the goal is not met.

 

THEY TALK ABOUT US

And many many others...

 

AS SEEN ON TV!

 
 
 

APPROVED BY CES!

story:
This is the start of the last SUMPOD IndieGoGo campaign, and a last chance to buy at a reduced bulk buying price.

The SUMPOD is the first 3D Printer and Mini CNC machine designed specifically for home and school use. It has taken the advances from the home 3d Printer and CNC communities and put them in a home friendly form.

It is constructed from precision cnc machined MDF parts and quality components to produce a strong and accurate machine. Each machine will also include a professionally engineered and machined 0.4mm nozzle.


The build area is 150mmx150x100. It is shipped ready for 1.75mm PLA filament but can be adapted easily for 3mm PLA.


Also we have finalised a website, SUMPOD.COM, that not only will be informative about all things SUMPOD but has been designed to have a community feel.

More will be added to this campaign and to the website to further explain the benefits of owning a SUMPOD in the coming weeks. Please view the other camapigns for further information for now.



PERKS

These are now the PERKS available:


$500 MDF KIT WITHOUT ELECTRONICS
$600 MDF KIT WITH ELECTRONICS
$775 MDF KIT WITH FULLY SOLDERED ELECTRONICS



The postage and packaging cost will be the same and should NOT be added to the contribution: A paypal invoice will be sent on the completion of the campaign.

UK                     $60
Rest of World    $120


This campaign aims to ship all orders before Christmas 2011.


SUMPODs will again be shipped in the order received.



Thanks

Richard Sum
