story:
Our Story:

Two years ago I decided to take a break from my life as a puppeteer.  I loved my work, but my aging body was having a hard time with the set-up, tear-down, tour around, part of it.  I took that break by going to S. Korea to teach English. While there, I discovered the most wonderful ancient art form of Hanji and completely fell in love!  Hanji is hand made paper art for the home; lamps, bowls, platters, paintings, and furniture.  The possibilities are endless.  Now I'm making these beautiful lamps and people are ooohing and ahhhing, but it's a hand made object and in order to grow the business at all, I must be able to make more product. I need building support!! 

I recently ran an ad on Craig's List for piece work thinking to sub-contract some of the components. I had over 50 responses!  People are hungry out there!  Heck, I'm hungry!  So my dream is to create a small cottage industry that can keep myself and a 2-4 other people happily employed. This campaign will support me in creating enough Hanji lamps and other objects for the home to do my first arts festival in Atlanta, Georgia. It is the Inman Park Festival which runs April 30 and May 1.

The Impact:  

The response to the Craig's list ad was a bit sad on the one hand, but uplifting on the other.  I feel good about being able to offer reasonable pay for happy, part time work. I can see the possibility of this becoming an ongoing,  thriving cottage industry.  Local artists will get some  part time work, we get to support an ancient hand made craft of S. Korea, and we get to  light the world, one hand made lamp at a time! 

If this campaign doesn't happen, I'll just do the best I can.  It's hard out here folks.


What We Need & What You Get:

We need $2,860.00 to accomplish the following:

Get two local artists to work 10 hours a week for the next 8 weeks @ $10.00/hr. = $1600.

Support in buying and shipping some of the materials from Korea = $400.

Materials to make a booth = $500.

Application fee for the Inman Park Festival, Atlanta, Georgia = $300. 

$60.00 to rent a generator for the weekend (got to light the lamps!)


What you get: 

For a $10 donation you get a cup of joe if you can make it to Asheville.

For a $25 donation you get a piece of Hanji paper mailed to your home.

For $50 you get a little 3x5 Hanji painting (unframed) mailed to your home.

For $250 you get a sweet, single stem Hanji lamp of your very own.


Other Ways You Can Help:  Please tell your friends about this campaign. If I hear from someone that they donated because a friend sent them here, and you're that friend, then I'll send you a piece of Hanji paper.

story:
For the last year, DU has been trying to have a central location close to ASU campus. The original Duck House did so much for the chapter, and many brothers have said that when ΔΥ had that house, that it was the peak of DU...The men of Delta Upsilon have become a closer brotherhood and are bouncing back from a tough spot in which the hardwork of these men have started a movement of new positive momentum...it is do or die time brothers, either we keep the positive momentum strong and we bounce back better than ever before, or we will fall and fail.

 

A central house for DU will add additional fuel to spark the momentum that our men have started. Currently we have no central place to come together except for at chapter. The Duck House will provide the central location for new event's, a welcoming place to hang out, an opportunity to grow and gain a sense of brotherhood many haven't yet seen. The house is a house full of memories for our Alumni, and getting this house back will be an honor to them. This house is essential to the future of DU.

 

The men moving into this house will have to overcome the most infamous landlord in all of Tempe, and are doing so for the sake of the chapter. Rent is $1500, and the deposit will be 1-1.5x rent which will put move-in costs at $3000+. The house is 5 bedrooms, and will quickly fill. The rent after move-in after being filled is very affordable, but move-in will be financially difficult. Help these brothers stepping up to bring back the Duckhouse, and we will grow!

$1000 will negate the costs enough to make move-in possible, if over $1000 is raised, all the money will go to getting this house set up for DU and benefit the chapter....a Duck House party will definately be happening when we have this house.

 

Anyone that can donate will be recognized and be greatly appreciated by the entire chapter. Dispursement of financial aid for Spring starts on 12/31/12, so the deadline will be set for slightly after that date. Please donate what you can..All the funds will go directly to bringing the Duck House back for DU.

 

Δικαια Υποθηκη

story:
Kids play tables are a must… but how difficult is it really to find a beautiful, functional and fun table that makes both kids and parents happy? 

With [MU]table fun and organization CAN go hand-in-hand.

 

Designed in Italy, [MU]table’s style is the design-oriented alternative to your child’s everyday play table, but paired with the flexibility and durability of a table that will last your family for years.

[MU]table table and chairs come in five different colors, Mauve, Mint, White, Dove Grey and Tiffany, that you can mix and match according to your interior design style. 

 

Not only do [MU]table chairs match perfectly with the table color of your choice, but they will also adjust to the four different heights with the table! You can add as many chairs as you wish with your [MU]table... they are optionals as we know that kids love to play in different ways!

[MU]table included 4 double-sided playboards that stack on top of each other.  

All the following fun activities are INCLUDED: a blackboard and magnetic board, Base for Lego ® Duplo® and Lego® Classic, a city landscape playset and a natural landscape playset, a puzzle base and a wooden cover.

                              

Plus, we have more play boards in the works! 

Additional boards can be purchased separately in the future (not within the Kickstarter campaign), like a doll house, playdoh table, kitchen table, music table and more!

                             

THE TOY STORAGE BAGS

At the center of the table you’ll find a hole with a bag attached. When playtime is over, toys can be thrown in the bag under table, keeping your home organized and clean while still being fun. When your kids want to change game they just need to flip the playboards and change bag. 

 

 

[MU]table is 71.6cm large and each playboard has a diameter of 54cm. Here you also find a table with all possible heights you can adjust your [MU]table and chairs to!

 

 

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make [MU]table a success.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a [MU]table, if you’re a supporter of [MU]table, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
The Chair That Fights Sitting Epidemic Consequences, in Evolutionary Way 

 

Sitting while working, studying, driving, and being entertained is the way of the modern life. It is an undeniable fact. Our team has developed a personal tool that helps people fight the consequences of prolonged sitting while they are sitting! If sitting is unavoidable, let’s sit on the chair that can protect our health and offer productivity along with developmental benefits. HORA Chair activates training of Meditative-Mobilization™ and Evolutionary-Meditative Mobilization™!

 

The Impact

 

HORA Chair protects the health of its user – yours, your kids’, your employees’, your family’s. With each new chair in use, we protect the human race from degradation due to inactivity and sedentary lifestyle, whether at work or at home.

For 5,000 years, there has been no need to redesign the way chairs were made because our ancestors, even short 70 years ago, led a more active lifestyle – at work, at home, on the farms, everywhere. Consequently, short periods of sitting on an ordinary chair did not cause much damage to them. But now, sitting 9 to 12 hours a day, degrads our posture, wears out our skeletal system, damages our organs, reduces our life expectancy, and lowers the quality of our genes thus affecting the future generations.

It is time for the chair to evolve so it could help us fight off the consequences of modern sedentary lifestyle. It is time to move beyond simple ergonomics towards the evolutionary design that protects you and, ultimately, the human race.

Practice HORA has developed the chair that can do that. If you have to sit at work, it is best to sit on the HORA Chair as it provides 21+ benefits (productivity, health, development, etc.)

Standing desks have many benefits, but the number of benefits they offer is much lower than 21+ benefits of the HORA Chair.

The product requires some assembly. It takes only 20 to 25 minutes to put it together. This design  lowers shipment cost and protects the environment.

 
 
 
What We Need & What You Get

 

 

We have self-funded US & International patents (pending), R&D, prototyping & product testing to design the most affordable solid wood chair.

US$ 1,000 - 10,000

  • Funds purchasing of the 1st manufacturing of the US batch
  • Funds "importing option" to provide chairs at a lower price point across the globe

US$ 30,000

  • Funds social media campaign for "smarter sitting"
  • Funds "importing option" to provide chairs at a lower price point across the globe
  • Funds "US made" inventory at lower cost for higher volume
  • Prepays for trade show space where any individual can experience sitting with gravitational center activated, and learn about Evolutionary-Meditative Mobilization™

US$ 60,000

  • All the items above, plus
  • Work with a PR firm to develop news & article placements as well as faster scaling of the information about the product
  • Invest in creating the distribution network across furniture stores
  • Start working with different materials and designs to produce a variety of HORA Chairs that activate the gravitational center of the chair user

US$ 120,000

  • All items above
  • Hire dedicated sales personnel for our new retail location and off-site sales.

US$ 1,000,000 

  • Work on revolutionizing the concept of Evolutionary-Meditative Mobilization™ chairs faster and more efficiently by creating a different entity with more products, designers, efficient logistics, and sales network

     

    Risks & Challenges

     

    We are managing these risks & changes 

    • Supplier reliability for small batch products (for now)
    • Offering more price parity for non-US markets 
    • Speed to market

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Share our contacts with buyers who are buying chairs for their small & large offices / coffee shops, etc.
    • Share our contacts with distributors who are interested in selling this innovative chair
    • If you are in the Chicagoland area, visit our new retail and training studio to experience the difference between sitting on the HORA Chair and any regular chair
    • Share our product postings and crowdfunding campaign on social media 
    • Join our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/HORAUSA/

    Who Invented HORA Chair

    • Founder of Practice HORA - Aleksander Atayan, Master HORA, (Russia) 
    • George Hora (Russia)

Funds "importing option" to provide chairs at a lower price point across the globe

US$ 30,000

Funds social media campaign for "smarter sitting"
Funds "importing option" to provide chairs at a lower price point across the globe
Funds "US made" inventory at lower cost for higher volume
Prepays for trade show space where any individual can experience sitting with gravitational center activated, and learn about Evolutionary-Meditative Mobilization™ 

US$ 60,000

All the items above, plus
Work with a PR firm to develop news & article placements as well as faster scaling of the information about the product
Invest in creating the distribution network across furniture stores
Start working with different materials and designs to produce a variety of HORA Chairs that activate the gravitational center of the chair user

US$ 120,000

All items above
Hire dedicated sales personnel for our new retail location and off-site sales.

US$ 1,000,000 
Work on revolutionizing the concept of Evolutionary-Meditative Mobilization™ chairs faster and more efficiently by creating a different entity with more products, designers, efficient logistics, and sales network

 

Risks & Challenges

 
We are managing these risks & changes 

Supplier reliability for small batch products (for now)
Offering more price parity for non-US markets 
Speed to market


Other Ways You Can Help

Share our contacts with buyers who are buying chairs for their small & large offices / coffee shops, etc.
Share our contacts with distributors who are interested in selling this innovative chair

If you are in the Chicagoland area, visit our new retail and training studio to experience the difference between sitting on the HORA Chair and any regular chair

Share our product postings and crowdfunding campaign on social media 

Join our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/HORAUSA/



Who Invented HORA Chair

Founder of Practice HORA - Aleksander Atayan, Master HORA, (Russia) 
George Hora (Russia)

story:
Short Summary

Biogas is an amazing natural energy source that has been greatly under-utilized in the United States.Biogas is virtually identical to fossil natural gas, only instead of taking 65 million years to make, it can be made every day in your own backyard using a simple biodigester using no moving parts, special equpment or chemicals.

My name is Warren Weisman, I am one of only a handful of biogas and anaerobic digestion experts in the United States, even though biogas is easier to make a fire with than wood. I have over 20 years experience as a builder and have worked as a heavy equipment mechanic and power plant operator. Together with my business partner David Rasmussen, we want to popularize biogas technology by offering simple, low-cost biodigesters that are easy-to-operate by busy homeowners and small farmers to generate clean burning biogas for home cooking fuel, or to fuel electric generators, pumps or water heaters.

There are nearly 50 million households in China presently using biogas and in Sweden many cities run their entire transit bus fleets off biogas, yet less than a dozen homes in the United States. We would like to introduce small-scale domestic biogas use to the United States for customers to enjoy energy independence, reduce environmental impacts and utility bills while recycling valuable nutrients for local gardening and farming. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $10,000 to put towards development of a double burner biogas stovetop that is UL approved for indoor domestic use in North America currently under development at Oregon State University and a marketing campaign to increase local and national awareness of home biogas.

We will offer $25 contributors a pdf version of Warren Weisman's "Energy From Organic Waste Vol. 1: Introduction to Biogas" booklet, which includes several links to learn more about biogas online. The pdf file will be delivered electronically and  a copy of Hestia Home Biogas Home Biogas Generator Building Plans, a complete set of building plans for building one of our 600-gallon home biogas digesters. This includes a copy of "Energy From Organic Waste Vol. 1" and unlimited online technical support during bulding, start-up and operation of your home biogas digester.

Our $100 contributors will receive a complete biogas demonstration kit with 5-gallon anaerobic digester and 10-page instruction booklet. 

Our $1,000 contributors will receive and a Hestia Home Biogas double burner stovetop legal for indoor domestic use in North America and a $500 discount on any home biogas digester or small farm digester purchase.

The Marketing campaign will be scalable, and if our goals aren't met, we will downsize our plans to suit our available budget.

Home scale biogas could be far better utilized if more people were aware of it. If you cannot contribute, please be sure to learn more about biogas and tell your friends about this amazing completely natural energy. Please share if you cannot contribute yourself. Thank you!

story:
The Best Accessory for your HiFi System & Docking Speaker.

Why WiFi audio!?  Trust me, you will love it once your have TuneBox.



TuneBox | Wi-Fi Your Hi-Fi. 

Play Music from Your iPhone, iPad, Android Device and PC

You are having Hi-Fi stereo system in your home, play music from your iDevice or Android device has always been a problem. Connect a 3.5mm audio cable? Nahhh..! Not an option!

TuneBox answers your question. TuneBox is a wireless audio receiver, providing a hassle free way to play your music on mobile devices to Hi-Fi system. Simply connect TuneBox to your Hi-Fi system via SPDIF or 3.5mm stereo audio cable, turn it on, connect your iDevices and Android devices to TuneBox.

TuneBox work with all your devices – iPhone, iPad, Android phones, PC and Mac. 

Simple Setup - Never been such EASY!!


Play from your devices is simple. At the very first time you use TuneBox, you can find TuneBox show as a Wi-fi access point, simply connect, then you can use AirPlay on iOS or Wi-Fi player in Android to play music.  If you want to connect TuneBox to your home Wi-Fi network, simply scan the QR code on TuneBox, so that you can enter the management interface of TuneBox, and connect to your Wi-Fi access point. TuneBox will show as a AirPlay device or Wi-Fi player in your home network afterwards.

ONE TIME Setup, no more paring like Bluetooth.

Play from All Your Devices – Cable Free


You are having music on your iPhone, Android phone and your PC, and want to play on your Hi-Fi system or speaker. TuneBox allows you to play your music from multiple devices via Wi-Fi. 

TuneBox supports AirPlay from iOS devices and iTunes on Mac OS X and Windows. 

For Android devices, TuneBox will be recognized as a Wi-Fi player in your home network. 

If you are using a Windows PC, simple install the [WiFi SoundCard] utility, TuneBox will work as a wireless soundcard on your PC, so that you can play any type of music and sounds from your PC to TuneBox.

Play Music in Multi-Room | iTunes


Want to host a party!! Play music in multi-room is very nice application to you.

Design Style

Beyond WiFi audio streaming technology, what do we care? We do care more about the life style. We image TuneBox might stand by HiFi system or any of great design speaker then it's not allow just a box. (Plastic BOX)

We try many different kind of materials for TuneBox over months. Our goal is to build up a best accessories for your HiFi system and speakers. Therefore we drop the plastic materia as case design then chosen Aluminum + Wood combination for TuneBox. Even it cost a lot with this idea. Eventually, the result shows us this direction is all worth it.

Model & Process



Choose Your Favorite Way to Connect

TuneBox provides various types of audio connectors. You can choose either from 3.5mm audio jack or S/PDIF optical fiber port to your active speakers or HiFi system.

About US

NEXUM intend to develop awesome device to streaming the audio from any of iOS, Android and Windows device. And we are so proud to implement this product in past of year. NOW, after spent huge time and resource , we are almost ready to go.

story:
Reimagine your Aquarium. Meet FELIX!

FELIX gives you complete control over all your aquarium devices through an APP. No more having to use old-school power bars and timers! It's ready for all your voice commands through Siri, Alexa and Google, and comes with a fully submersible 360° cam so that you can view your aquarium from anywhere in the world. 

Worried about power outages or your current heater failing? Add an optional Life Support battery pack or a USB temperature sensor and presto! You've got total peace of mind.

FELIX is built on an open source software and hardware platform, so expandability and integration are limitless. Our open API allows us to integrate with a wide range of devices seamlessly.

 

Save BIG

​

Beautifully Designed

 

FEATURES

 

APP Controlled 

  • Power management of individual devices
  • Custom and Automatic settings

  • Automated Reminders (feedings, water changes etc)

  • Alerts (available when used with added sensor and readers)


 

Submersible 360 Camera 

  • Monitor your aquarium from anywhere in the world
  • Auto content creator - curates images for you to share
  • Share your aquarium with other FELIX owners







 

Home Assistant Ready (may require additional hardware)

  • Siri 
  • Google
  • Alexa

 

 

Expandable USB Hub for Integration

  • Temperature Sensors (great for setting up redundancy in case of heater malfunctions)
  • pH meters
  • Light controls
  • Feeders







 

 

Life Support - Backup Power (Optional)

  • Life Support - the APP automatically alerts you during power failures
  • Up to 7 days of life support
  • Add an additional Life Support to increase backup to 14 days

 




 

 

Pro Guide AR - A Professional Aquascaper at Your Fingertips

  • Augmented Reality shows you realtime suggestions
  • Improved recommendations based on user inputs
  • Layout suggestions based on themes

 



 

Pro Guide AR

    The FELIX Pro Guide Augmented Reality helps you create the perfect aquarium. It's as simple as scanning your aquarium with your AR enabled smartphone. Based on your existing layout, FELIX AR engine will provide you with recommendations on how to improve your existing aquarium.

     

    Health Cam AI (Under Development)

    The FELIX Healthcam lets you know when your fish and plants are doing well or when it's time to take notice; alerting you of any potential problems before they happen. FELIX will also make recommendations based on this feedback. The technology we are developing is centred around image recognition, machine learning and neural networks. In its simplest explanation, it's a recommendation engine using image recognition to compare your fish against other fish in our data base. This is a long term project that will be developed and deployed in stages. We are passionate and committed to it as we believe that the implications of this technology will be game changing, not only for aquarium owners, but for zoos, conservationists, universities and researchers. We look forward to sharing more information about the FELIX Healthcam in the months ahead. You can read more about  deep learning and neural networks here.

     

    Arrow Certification Program

    FELIX is proudly Arrow Certified! With the assistance of Arrow Electronics and their extensive knowledge of supply chain management, engineering and production, we look to produce a world class product on time and on budget.

     

    Give us a Turbo Boost

    We’ve completed our prototyping, sourced our parts, and are now finalizing the development of our tools and molds with the aim of starting initial production for supporters in March and full production for retail in June. To launch production, we have set a goal of $30,000 for this campaign. 

    The best part about being a supporter of our campaign is the direct input you will have in creating some of the features that will end up in the APP. We'll stay in very close contact with all of our supporters and provide you with tools to communicate your ideas to us. 

     

    Meet The Co-Founders

    Oliver Knott, George Farmer and Esther Mous are some of the passionate co-founders of FELIX. Their extensive experience with fish, plants, and aquariums, combined with a team of talented engineers, software developers, researchers and entrepreneurs, has brought FELIX to this stage.

     

    Nostalgia. Our first working prototypes.

Nostalgia. Our first working prototypes.

story:
Give your helmet it’s own place in your home with the Halley Helmet Rack, a minimal approach to helmet storage.
 

 

 

 


We know that your home speaks volumes of what you love and who you are, and it’s time to let your passion for motorbikes do the talking.

 


Our aim is to design a minimalist and functional rack that supports your helmet the right way thanks to its spherical surface, which creates a large surface area to stop the lining from tearing or distorting.
 

 

uncrate, Silodrome, blessthisstuff, hiConsumption, Motorcycle News, Hot Bike, Cool Material, EatSleepRide,  Ferry Clot Motorcycles, Chazter, Column, The Awsomer, Heldth, Imboldn, Mens Gear, getupcoming, Motouutiset, CarTrottle, Movetenms, Mike Shouts, Motorbike Writer,  Acquiremag, VoxBox, Gizmo.News, Bons Rapazes, Gessato, 1down4up, CoolThings, Werd, Gewoonvoorhem, Everyday Object, Man Man, SoloMoto.es, Moto.it, 

 



Calling all riders! If you’re like us, you know that a helmet is more than just a piece of kit. It’s an extension of our love for motorbikes and how we picture ourselves on and off the road.
 

 

But when you get home, where do you store your helmet? Fed up of having our helmets hidden in cupboards or torn by traditional coat hooks, we came up with a solution: the Halley Helmet Rack.

Our aim at Halley is to give your helmet the place it deserves in your home, somewhere special to display it. We wanted our first product to look elegant and attractive as a piece of design whilst also prioritizing function.


 

 

The smooth, spherical design is made to create a large surface area and fewer pressure points inside the helmet. This stops the lining from tearing and distorting, a problem often caused by traditional racks and hooks.


 

 

The design is minimalist and smart, whilst also versatile to suit the rider’s own style. The black matt coloring represents our clean and sophisticated aesthetics. Our vision is to create a timeless look by using quality materials and smooth finishes.

 


Halley obeys just one rule: our love for motorcycles isn’t restricted to the road so give your helmet the place it deserves in your home.

 

 

 

 

Quality design, high speed and big icons like Steve McQueen and Paul Newman – this is how we envision the world of motorcycles.  

 Halley is made for the unwavering rider who embodies tenacity and freedom on and off the road; who appreciates the balance between a minimalistic aesthetic and a functional-orientated approach to design; a devoted rider who cares about the function of their kit.  

 Founded in Barcelona in 2017 to make timeless and innovative motorcycle accessories, Halley was born out of a willingness to never stop questioning and searching for new answers. A university project inspired our first product, the Halley Helmet Rack, which has been tweaked and perfected over the past year. We’re thrilled to start this new journey together – we hope you enjoy the ride.
 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For use with open and full face helmets


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Easy to assemble in 5 minutes

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Includes:  
· 1- Helmet Rack body  
· 2- Trim 
· 3- Stainless Steel Ball 
· 4- Wall plug x4 
· 5- Screw x4 
· 6- Washer x4 
· 7- Technical Screw x2 
· 8- Installation Instructions

 



 

 

 


Supporters of the Halley Kickstarter campaign can buy a custom designed motorbike vector file for a donation of their choice. You decide how to use the print and how much you want to pay. 
Suggested pledge is 5€/5$.

The file is also sent as a complimentary gift with all purchases of the Halley Helmet Rack.

 

You can print the file onto canvas for a timeless piece of art for your home




Get a custom new look by printing the file onto a t-shirt


Or transfer the file onto vinyl and let your walls do the talking.
Just check with your local print shop to discover more possibilities

 



 




 

SPECIAL THANKS

We would love to thank our family, friends, and everyone who has helped throughout the journey. Your feedback, support, and positive encouragement have been incredibly inspiring.


Bell, BIHR, MOTOS TURO,

CREDITS:

Video: Dieter Decostere, Bret Gerding, 413 FILMS, Ricardo Mingacho, Matthew Atkatz       
Potography: Anabel Luna  
Locations: LOFTNOU, Bar MALASANG, 

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS 

Due to legalities, we are unable to mark any Halley product as a gift when shipping overseas. The product will be sent from the EU and the recipient will be responsible for any duties, fees and taxes applicable to their country.

The product will be sent from the EU and the recipient will be responsible for any duties, fees and taxes applicable to their country.

story:
Hello,

My name is Marina, I am 25 and live in Melbourne, Australia.

My campaign here is to raise funding to bring to life a piece of technology from the fictional world of Star Trek. The Combadge.

 

The abilty to communicate with someone simply by pushing one single button brings 24th century technology here today.

With your contributions, my team and I aim to produce an operational prototype with the goal of putting the device into mass production.

 

Being that Star Trek is owned by CBS Television Studios and Viacom/Paramount Pictures, the initial prototype would have to be of an original design. But it is my intention to produce the prototype with the aim to allow licensing arrangements to be made from companies such as Viacom/Paramount that would enable me to mass produce a functional Star Trek Combadge. This will not only appeal to Trekkies as the small size of the technology allows me to licence this product to corporations such as Disney, Time Warner, DC and Marvel. This means under licensing agreements, I will be able to produce these Combadges in the form of a Mickey Mouse or Donald Duck badge, a Superman or Batman logo badge etc.. 

 

Q: What's the point of a Combadge when almost everyone has a Mobile/Cell Phone these days?

 A: Well, aside from the fact that another part of Star Trek technology will be brought out of the fictional world and into reality, a Combadge is communication at it's simplest.

These days, the vast majority of us carry around a smartphone. These are wonderful devices that are packed with many features.

The problem with all those features is that the smartphones main feature, telephony, takes a back seat.

How many times have you accidentally hung up on someone because your cheek or ear accidentally pressed disconnect? How many times have you been speaking to someone for a few minutes, telling them something important before you realise that what you just said to them wasn't heard because you had mute activated by mistake?

Why is that?

The answer to that question is simple.

A smartphones primary function is no longer to make a simple phone call.

It's the reason why people have and use both an iPhone and an iPod.

Sometimes you just want to listen to music.

Just like sometimes you just want to make a call.

This is where the Combadge comes into play.

No camera, no text, just pure and simple phone calls. 

 

The Combadge is also a parents best friend.

The Combadge will allow parents to program a selection of phone numbers into the device which the child will able to access and dial using voice activation.

Once programmed, the Combadge is secured to the child's clothing, and to contact any one of the pre-programmed numbers the child simple presses the Combadge and says the name of person they wish to call and within seconds, that person is talking to the Combadge wearer. For instance, the child presses the Combadge and says "DAD", The Combadge then calls DAD. 

The Combadge will also contain a GPS which enables a parent to keep track of their childs whereabouts at any time of the day or night. This feature is invaluable as the childs exact location can be monitored by either an app or pc based program. 

Another great reason is the kids won't lose their $200+ phone anymore.

No need for text messaging, big phone bills, or worrying that your child is wasting their life away on social media websites, as the child will only be able to call the numbers programmed into the Combadge.

 

Q: Why produce more than one variation of the Combadge?

A: Simply put, not everyone is a Star Trek Fan, and for this to be commercially viable, it must appeal to a broad range of potential customers.

To achieve this, I have estimated it will take about $100,000 to produce a prototype. Designing and producing the tech that makes it work is available now. To actually take it to the stage of mass production including the licensing agreements will cost a lot more, but by having the functional prototype, it allows investors to actually see what they can invest in.  

With your help, I can make this revolutionary communication device come to life.

Thanks for your support,

God Bless,

Marina.

story:
Short Summary

Renewable energy has dropped in price and is now just as cheap as fossil fuels.  Data from the U.S. Energy Information Administration suggests that as the current subsidies are withdrawn, wind and solar will be competitive with all the other energy resources.  Climate change is a huge problem, but the problem with clean energy isn't the cost; it's that the Sun isn't always shining, and the wind blows hardest at night when electricity demand is low.  The rest of the time, fossil fuel burning plants need to crank up to balance supply with demand.  Sabreez helps solve that problem by showing people when clean energy is abundant and cheap.  This will help reduce some of the expense associated with battery storage and construction of more natural gas power plants that will need to operate for just a few hours a day as more variable renewable resources are brought online.

I'm Scott Hoppe, and I'm a Geologist with a background in designing environmental remediation systems for hazardous waste sites.  Global Warming is the biggest environmental problem we've ever faced; but the answer is simple- Use More Clean Energy!  After spending months reviewing big datasets, I discovered a natural phenomena that could be expressed as a computer variable and developed into a social game to save people money while reducing their impact on the environment.  I call this variable the "Wind Number."  Your Wind Number is the ratio of your power that comes from Wind vs Fossil Fuels.

Smart Meters provide hourly data on your energy consumption, and about 1/3 of U.S. households now have a smart meter.  Utilities offer lower hourly rates at night when wind power is strongest, and higher rates during the day when natural gas plants are cranking up.  Therefore, the more wind power you use relative to fossil fuels, the more money you save.  It's easy to save 10% just by signing up and following our messaging on Facebook.  Users that install energy efficient appliances, solar, and charge their electric car at night have higher Wind Numbers.  The App is free, all you have to do is make informed purchasing decisions that improve your quality of life, lower your energy costs, and reduce your impact on the environment.

After years of development, I filed a provisional patent application on the Wind Number method of saving money on utility costs last year, concurrent with the creation of a prototype of the Green Button App with the help of a computer programmer.   During the Summer of 2014, I conducted a social game on Facebook.  The marketing campaign focused on the San Francisco Bay Area, presented information on how to use more clean energy and save money, then people ran the program and posted their Wind Numbers on the Facebook page.  The User with the highest Wind Number each month won a box of LEDs.  Although a box of LEDs costs only $60, it can save more than $1,500 over a 20-25 year period, making it a compelling investment.  It also lowers carbon emissions!  Overall, Sabreez gave away about $10,000 in savings this Summer.  In summary, People Like Winning.

The Wind Number is competing in the U.S. Department of Energy's American Energy Challenge.  When you look into the competition, you can see that Sabreez offers the most Consumer-Friendly App!  Other Apps may tell you how bad your energy usage is for the planet; Sabreez offers you the solution.  Using more clean energy is Sabreez.

I'm in fundraising mode now, and need $40,000 to turn the prototype into a platform that can be introduced State-wide next Summer.  I've created a tantalizing list of perks that provide you with an outstanding return on investment, so it costs you nothing to help Sabreez launch it's mission to save the planet.  Your help can lead to the exponential growth of a simple message that reduces our dependence on fossil fuels, promotes economic growth, and slows climate change. 

What We Need & What You Get

It's hard to pay $10 for an LED when a cheaper bulb is sitting right next to it on the store shelf; but buying that cheaper bulb costs 20 times more over the decades-long lifetime of an LED.  Ironic, isn't it?  LEDs are the safest investment in the world, and just one of the technologies that increase your Wind Number.

When Sabreez gives you an energy audit, LEDs are just one tool to lower your bill.  We can disaggregate your energy usage, tell you what's consuming your electricity, and make cost-effective recommendations to reduce your bill.  Well worth a $50 contribution to help launch our energy-saving company, don't you think?


Contribute more than $75 to this Campaign and Sabreez will send you LED lighting that will give you more than twice your money back.  The more you contribute, the better your return on investment.  Contribute $200, get more than $1,000 back in savings if you live someplace where electricity costs more than 13 cents/kWh.  It's low risk, good for the environment, and helps to launch a great company.  Please note that savings are based on replacing incandescent bulbs of equivalent brightness and color, but if you haven't tried the new LEDs, you don't know what you're missing.  They do everything incandescents do, with the exception of sucking money out of your bank account.


Funds raised in this campaign will be applied to software development, better defining the brand, and marketing and advertising.  The Smart Meter data technology used by Sabreez is new, but California is creating a marketplace for Apps like Sabreez, and that marketplace should be completed this Winter.  The Wind Number will offer the most compelling value proposition as well as a valuable service to consumers wishing to save the most money while navigating the complexity of smart grid.  As wifi-enabled devices like electric cars grow in popularity, the company will offer the service of optimizing the amount of clean energy you use just by hitting "auto."  Expansion plans are in the works for other parts of the Country that have made the investment in Smart Meters and Wind Farms; your contribution will help spread our message.

    The Impact

    Your contribution will help spread a message that will go viral.  Clean Energy Costs Less!  You just have to use it when it's available.  There are a variety of technologies that help you save money using clean energy when you go on a time-of-use rate tariff.

    • Using the delay button on your appliances to run them between 11 pm and 5 am.
    • Installing a Nest thermostat or other home automation system.
    • Buying energy star appliances.
    • Running your pool pump at night.
    • Charging the electric car at night.
    • Installing solar- exporting power when wind power is low and preventing the need for that last kWh from a natural gas plant.

    All the smart grid technologies increase your Wind Number, but you can do a lot to save just by understanding the rhythm of nature's daily energy production cycle; and use less fossil fuels.

    Your Wind Number is based on a single variable- when you use energy.  As such, it makes a great game, and the pilot program this Summer demonstrates that people like to win.  Using clean energy and saving money feels good.

      Risks & Challenges

      Green Button Apps like Sabreez are new and it's not exactly clear how we will fit into the Smart Grid ecosystem.  Less than 1% of the U.S. population knows this technology exists.  The need to integrate time-variable renewable energy production with out-of-sync energy demand is huge, and utilities currently favor balancing the difference with power plants or storage assets which add to their revenue.  Sabreez replaces some of those expensive assets with information technology.

      Sabreez will help expedite the adoption of smart grid technologies because it's clear that these are the best investments a home owner can make.  As such, the App will receive advertising revenue.  The State of California is also setting up a system where companies like Sabreez will be able to receive revenue from the load shifting encouraged by the Social platform.  That last power plant coming online for a few hours per year costs a lot! Better to not even build it.

      Once the prototype is converted into a more pleasing user experience, Sabreez will begin a State-wide comprehensive marketing campaign to reduce peak power demand.  Within two or three years, the App should have 100,000 subscribers, which might translate into the removal of several Megawatts of Natural Gas power generation.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Knowing your Wind Number is the first step to using more clean energy with Smart Grid.  Like us on Facebook to learn more.  California utilities have also made a significant investment in their online platforms.  PG&E will tell you your rate options, and detail many ways to save you money.  Other utilities will follow.

        Solving Global Warming begins with each of us.  All it takes is the willingness to save money using more clean energy.  This will most certainly happen, it's just a question of when.  Sabreez is dedicated to making it happen now.

story:
Meet ZuziLite

ZuziLite is a wireless smart lamp for every occasion. At home, out camping or hiking, at parties, you can interact with Zuzilite through app or intelligent touch switch, and enjoy its 16 million color lights at your fingertips. Portable, versatile, and easy to use, Zuzilite is your lighting companion wherever you go.

 

What people are saying

I’ve seen the cylindrical shape of Xiaomi YeeLight and normal bulb designs of Phillips Hue lights, but the ZuziLite’s design is completely unique.

 

Use Your ZuziLite in Multiple Occasions

You might have a lot of lamps in life: bedside lamp, reading lamp, alarm flashes, emotion mood lamp, torch, and more you can come up with. In fact, you can remove all those gadgets and release your space. 

Get the freedom of using just one lamp. 

ZuziLite is your great decor for any room which will magically turn your space into enjoyable and light-hearted one. 

 

Light up Your World Wirelessly 

Lock up wires and charging station. No need to stay plugged in to work, your ZuziLite works continuously for 10 hours on the go. When  you need to recharge it, connect with USB cable to any power bank, car charger or phone charger. 

16 million colors to offer the greatest possibility and up to 450 lumens dimmable light. 

Make every inch of the night sky colorful so that we can be surrounded by the bright.

 

 

Minimalism to Fit Any Space

ZuziLite supports smartphone app control as well as capacitive touch control. While you need a smart device to access the lamp's more fun and pro features, you can still shift between pre-set colors and switch on/off by tapping your finger on the side edge. 

With clean, well-organized interfaces, ZuziLite app offers straight-forward and smooth operation for fun. 

Brightness adjustable by smartphone app, whenever you're enjoying story time with kids, chatting with friends in a party, ZuziLite provides just fine lighting. 

Download the ZuziLite app from App Store/Google Play for free. 

 

Enjoy Unlimited Options and Fun

ZuziLite team developed a collection of interactive games on ZuziLite app for entertainment: Colored Bubbles, Shake & Dance, Color & Baby, Color Picker, etc..

 

Specifications

Timeline

 

Perks

 

Zuzi Team and Why Crowdfunding

Zuzi Technology Co., Ltd is a company constituted of designers, hardware and software engineers, tinkers and thinkers. We focus on smart home product development, with vision that everyone would live in a full-automatic comfortable design home. "6s" concepts are what we're adhere to: Simple, style, smart, superlative, subversion and service. 

Our mission is make every inch of the night sky colorful so that we can be surrounded by the bright. With good experience on lamp, we believe ZuziLite is just a start and far from perfect. Though we will be continuously committed to developing fine gadgets to make our life easier and smarter. 

Mass production is costly. Molding, components, certification charges…these add up to a big amount. As a startup, we need your support to bring ZuziLite to the market, to get known and used. We believe it is an amazing gear. We have finalized a trust-worthy factory who pays much attention to quality control. With your help, we can finally get it delivered to the public's hands. 

 

 

Referral Program

Thank you for all your supports. 

We want you to share ZuziLite with your friends, and reward you for spreading the word. We just created our referral program, so let your friends know. Here is what you get:

 

HOW DO I PARTICIPATE

  1. See an easy visual guide here: HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN THE REFERRAL PROGRAM
  2. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  3. Click on the referral link under the on the right of ZuziLite video and share with your friends and/or share via the social buttons under the video.
  4. Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.
  5. You can check your account and see how many referral dollars  you have driven.

 

DETAILS

  • If 3 of your friends purchase from the link you share, you'll get $5 refund! 
  • If 5 of your friends purchase from the link you share, you'll get $10 refund! 
  • If 8 of your friends purchase from the link you share, you'll get $20 refund! 
  • If 10 of your friends purchase from the link you share,  you'll get FULL AMOUNT REFUND! That means, you get one ZuziLite for free! 

 

RULES

  1. You must be a contributor to the campaign.
  2. You will only get referral credit if you are logged in to Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perk.
  3. You cannot receive more than one prize. Your final prize will be determined by the prize that is closest to your total referral contribution dollars.
  4. You will be able to choose from getting one more ZuziLite for free or refund if 10 contributions from your custom link. 

 

NOTES
We will announce prize winners on the closing of the campaign, and proceed your corresponding credits 15 days after that.  Stay tuned!

 

Warranty

Shipping

Frequently Asked Questions

1. What kind of battery do ZuziLite have?  

5200 mAh lithium.

2. How long do I need to fully charge ZuziLite?    

There is a battery charge protection to protect the battery life,  so it takes about 6 hours to fully charge.

3. What makes ZuziLite so special?    

Wireless. Smart APP control. Capability to  be used in many occasions.

4. When are the perks expected to ship?    

We will start shipping in Nov. from early bird perk.

 5. Is shipping included in the perks?

We include free shipping to US and EU backers. Backers in other areas around the globe please add $15 shipping cost.

6. Is there a warranty for ZuziLite?    

Yes, we provide a one-year warranty.

7. How do I connect if I have questions about the ZuziLite?    

You can send email to zuzilamps@crowdfundinguru.com,  we will reply within 24 hours.

With good experience on lamp, we believe ZuziLite is just a start and far from perfect. Though we will be continuously committed to developing fine gadgets to make our life easier and smarter. Mass production is costly. Molding, components, certification charges…these add up to a big amount. As a startup, we need your support to bring ZuziLite to the market, to get known and used. We believe it is an amazing gear. We have finalized a trust-worthy factory who pays much attention to quality control. With your help, we can finally get it delivered to the public's hands.   Referral ProgramThank you for all your supports. We want you to share ZuziLite with your friends, and reward you for spreading the word. We just created our referral program, so let your friends know. Here is what you get: HOW DO I PARTICIPATE
See an easy visual guide here: HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN THE REFERRAL PROGRAM

Log into your Indiegogo account.
Click on the referral link under the on the right of ZuziLite video and share with your friends and/or share via the social buttons under the video.
Make sure your friends use your unique referral link when they buy, so you get credit.
You can check your account and see how many referral dollars  you have driven.
 DETAILS
If 3 of your friends purchase from the link you share, you'll get $5 refund! 
If 5 of your friends purchase from the link you share, you'll get $10 refund! 
If 8 of your friends purchase from the link you share, you'll get $20 refund! 
If 10 of your friends purchase from the link you share,  you'll get FULL AMOUNT REFUND! That means, you get one ZuziLite for free! 
 RULES
You must be a contributor to the campaign.
You will only get referral credit if you are logged in to Indiegogo, and share your personal referral link. Your friends must use this link to purchase their perk.
You cannot receive more than one prize. Your final prize will be determined by the prize that is closest to your total referral contribution dollars.
You will be able to choose from getting one more ZuziLite for free or refund if 10 contributions from your custom link. 
 NOTESWe will announce prize winners on the closing of the campaign, and proceed your corresponding credits 15 days after that.  Stay tuned! WarrantyShippingFrequently Asked Questions1. What kind of battery do ZuziLite have?  5200 mAh lithium.2. How long do I need to fully charge ZuziLite?    There is a battery charge protection to protect the battery life,  so it takes about 6 hours to fully charge.3. What makes ZuziLite so special?    Wireless. Smart APP control. Capability to  be used in many occasions.4. When are the perks expected to ship?    We will start shipping in Nov. from early bird perk. 5. Is shipping included in the perks? We include free shipping to US and EU backers. Backers in other areas around the globe please add $15 shipping cost.6. Is there a warranty for ZuziLite?    Yes, we provide a one-year warranty.7. How do I connect if I have questions about the ZuziLite?    You can send email to zuzilamps@crowdfundinguru.com,  we will reply within 24 hours.

story:
ALMA GREEN Design Duvet Covers and Pillow Cases

 

Since time immemorial, humans have looked to the skies in search of Meaning. 

As much as the night skies provide the foundation for orientation, we wanted our brand new collection to be as meaningful. In our search of orientation in today's world, with our determination to change the world one sheet at a time, we chose to name our range with constellation names.

 Our collections showcase the first innovation of its kind using recycled cotton to provide your bedroom with comfortable and exquisite linen.

ALMA GREEN Design  Pillars

 

ALMA GREEN Team

Sylvie Degrange -  CEO / Co-founder of ALMA GREEN Design, worked 15 years in off line sport, shoes and Textile retail industry and 6 years in on-line flash sales and market places companies. She extensively worked for corporations around the globe, France, Taiwan, Spain, USA, Kuwait. She is the go-getter and the business guru behind the brand. She met her BFF, Hélène-Marie 25 years ago when they both were working in the same company. Being a daughter of two scientists, Hydro biologist and Geologist, she grew up surrounded by nature in the Alps and knows the effort it takes to preserve the environment. 

Hélène-Marie Ceillier -  Head of Design / Co-founder of ALMA GREEN Design, who lived in Japan, France and South Africa, and travelled around the globe, has always been an entrepreneur. She is a free spirit, native creative and the designer behind the brand. Sharing her time between Europe and Cape Town, she knows what water restriction means!

SPARKING MINDS

ALMA GREEN Design  Co-Founder, Hélène-Marie, has been leaving in South Africa for the last decade, and she is with her son Raphael and Emma, the Lady who runs the Crèche in the townships of Knysna , at the heart of this beautiful NGO. SPARKING MINDS  organisation sets-up projects such as providing safe and clean  environments for young children through renovating and building crèches  and dispensing crucial teaching skills to educator and facilitators,  with a constant monitoring of the establishments and providing necessary  equipment and other necessities required for the healthy development of  the babies and younger children. 

ALMA GREEN Design is proud to contribute to the development of this amazing project, and will donate 1% of this Kickstarter campaign sale to the NGO and all the profit of the sale of the Bags contributions.

 

ALMA GREEN Design Process

 

ALMA GREEN Design Materials

Our range of bed linen and cushions is made of 100% natural fibers from the world finest quality Recycled and Organic Cotton. Our Cotton weight is 165 gr/m2. 

Most textile  due to relaxation from the stresses incurred during production, will have tendency to shrink. As we don't use any typical commercial shrink-resist finishing, which basically consists to apply a strong acid chlorine treatment,  our fabric may shrink during the firsts washes up to 5%. Here are some simple advices to prevent it and take good care f your ALMA GREEN Design bed linen. 

Wash and Care : 

Wash in cold water: keeping your linen away from high temperatures (washing and drying) will keep the longevity of the fibers and prevent them from breaking.   

Don’t overfill your washing machine, wash on delicate cycle and don’t mix them with other clothes. Taking them out as soon as the cycle ends will prevent them from wrinkling.

 Some Duvet Covers come with beautiful prints. In order to keep the colours alive, it is essential to wash them on the reverse side. Prints inside.

ALMA GREEN Design CERTIFICATION

Now you can really TRUST what you put so close to your skin!

WHAT WE NEED ?

Thanks to the  Kickstarter community we have raised  € 9,000 in order to fund the first production run of the ALMA GREEN Design bed linen collection. The funds will be used for initial production run including producing the yarns, the fabric, and skilled labor.  Now extending our campaign to Indiegogo will enable us to keep raising funds, in order to produce more units.

All products ordered from April to end of May will be delivered in June. 

Spread the word !!!

story:
Laundry runs in the family

We're Equator Advanced Appliances, a small business that makes high-efficiency appliances, including washing machines. It was started in 1991 by entrepreneur, Atul Vir, when he pioneered Combo Washer-Dryers in the US market. Today, Atul and his daughter, Amrita, make up a father-daughter team with ambitions to revolutionize the laundry industry with the Equator Hybrid, the most advanced laundry appliance in the world.

 

Amrita (age 5) on one of the first combo washer-dryers 

 

Equator Hybrid

Atul pioneered the combo washer-dryer market in the US 18 years ago. These machines allowed one to put laundry in, press a button, and return a couple of hours later to clean clothes. In addition to the time saved by these front-load machines, they are also highly energy efficient and use 1/3 the water used by traditional top-loading machines.

The problem with front-load machines is that consumers must bend down to load and unload their laundry. We decided to tackle this issue by designing a machine that opens like a conventional top-loading washer.

 

Equator Hybrid

What makes the Equator Hybrid unique is the horizontal-axis technology that uses a front-load design but enables it to be opened from the top, providing exceptional ease-of-use.

The research and development for this concept was done by a world-class American design team to better satisfy the needs of the busy American consumer. The result was 14 patents (10 for design and 4 for technology). In addition to being the first top-loading horizontal-axis machine with a one-touch opening mechanism, the Equator Hybrid will also include the following features:

  • Size of a conventional washing machine (H40"x W27"x D28")
  • Uses 220 volts, allowing less drying time
  • Capacity of 3.5 cubic feet, the size of a conventional washer
  • Touch screen controls with one-touch start 
  • One button operation for loading access to the drum 
  • Automatic water input depending on laundry weight 
  • Automatic dry time and dry temperature 
  • Pause/Add-a-sock feature 
  • Built-in diagnostics 
  • App for remote operations 
  • Adjustable control panel
  • Machine calls/texts you to let you know laundry is done

 

Prototypes

Three prototypes of the Equator Hybrid have been produced. Below are photos of a fully assembled prototype and digital drawings of various internal assemblies.

 

Front View

 

Dryer Assembly

 

 

Exploded View

 

Interior Assembly

 

Control Panel

 

Breakdown

The funding will go toward the manufacturing of the Equator Hybrid.The selected plant location is about 90 miles from Houston, a town called Schulenburg. It is the heart of the area where settlers from Germany immigrated over 150 years ago. The location is the Stanzel model aircraft factory building which is about 20,000 square feet in size. There is adequate space for parts storage, assembly staging, testing, and packing. While some of the components will be manufactured in other plants, some of the components will be manufactured in-house. Much of the equipment is already in place.

Schulenburg Production Facility

 

The project will generate about 30 jobs in the first year. Particular attention will be paid to testing the product in order to ensure it has a robust feel to it. We believe that it will deserve the label “Made in America.”

The funding breaks down as follows:

Raw materials: $110,000
Components: $110,000
Assembly: $135,000
Packaging: $27,000
Shipping: $68,000-Overhead: $20,000
Total: $470,000 
Finance Fees: $30,000
IndieGoGo Campaign: $500,000 goal

 

What You Get

We offer a unique set of perks for backing this project. The higher level perks include an Equator Hybrid and other exciting perks, exclusively available through Equator. The lower level perks are unique and useful, which we hope you will enjoy. 

 

The Impact

The Equator Hybrid is no ordinary washing machine. It is designed to be the most advanced laundry appliance in the world and will have huge export potential, especially to Europe and Australia.

 

Risks and Challenges

The main challenge in the Equator Hybrid project is putting all the moving parts of the project together. These include coordinating suppliers for contract manufactured components as well as finished components. To overcome this, priority will be given to suppliers located stateside who can provide just-in-time shipments. In addition, there will be the challenge of getting manpower for the assembly of machines. We have anticipated this by situating the site in Schulenburg, where one can draw on employees with German heritage who are known for precision engineering. There is also a technical college located in the city from where we can draw fresh talent. Anticipating the above challenges enables us to overcome them in a timely manner.

 

Thank You! 

Whether you're able to contribute or not, we would appreciate you sharing our story and our idea with those around you! Thank you for reading about the Equator Hybrid! We appreciate your support!

Thank You!

story:
Piks is a creative toy designed to develop children's attention and concentration. 

Piks est un jouet créatif conçu pour le développement de l'attention et de la concentration des enfants. 

No doubt you’ve noticed how today’s children are less and less focused. Surrounded by smartphones, apps and video games, there’s been a quite an increase in behavioral issues. 

This isn’t just an idea. Just as the following references show, many studies, theories and modalities have been created to help children in this phenomenon. Practices such as meditation, concentration or therapy through play are being proposed to help our children attain a calmer, more natural state of being and to help manage their emotions.

10 Tips to Increase Your Child's Concentration

7 In-Class Activities to Improve Concentration in Children

How to Practice ADHD Play Therapy at Home

Rock Balancing Stone Stacking Art STEAM Activity for Kids

How Stacking / Nesting Toys Can Develop Early Language and Fine Motor Skills

These techniques are really inspiring and we feel they should should be available to all children. And this is why we decided to create Piks.

Avez-vous déjà remarqué que les enfants sont de moins en moins concentrés ? Puisque ce sujet devient chaque jour plus présent, nous avons décidé de créer un jouet qui permettra aux enfants de s’épanouir tout en se divertissant ! 

Tout comme le montrent les références ci-dessous, de nombreuses théories et pratiques améliorent la concentration, les capacités cognitives et favorisent le contrôle des émotions. Et ceci tout en plaçant nos enfants dans un environnement plus calme et naturel.

Comment aider un enfant à se concentrer?

Pourquoi jouer aide nos enfants à grandir

Art-thérapie : la créativité au service des élèves perturbés

Éduquer, c’est (aussi) jouer

Nous croyons que ces pratiques sont très inspirantes et qu'elles devraient être appliquées d’une manière ou d’une autre à tout les enfants. Et c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de créer Piks.

 

The aim of the Piks game is simple - to create the most original and impressive structure by positioning all of the pieces without any of it falling down.  

By playing with Piks, children explore the intricacies of balance while decision-making, motor skills and imagination all come into play transforming the players into artists in a performance of concentration and skill.

Le but du jeu est simple : créer la structure la plus originale et impressionnante sans laisser tomber aucune pièce  ! 

La prise de décision, la motricité fine et l'imagination transformeront les joueurs en de véritables artistes en pleine performance de concentration. 

Because we take playing seriously, this isn’t just a toy! Carefully designed, Piks offers many great educational skills and benefits for kids. 

Parce que s’amuser sainement est un thème sérieux pour nous, Piks n’est pas un jouet comme un autre. Conçu avec soin, Piks développe de nombreuses compétences pédagogiques et présente de nombreux avantages pour les enfants.

Because of our commitment to offer a toy that develops concentration skills, we decided to seek inspiration and direction from the field of education, more precisely from research on kids' concentration disorders.  

Why are we inspired by education and behaviors issues ?

Toys are the first objects that our kids have in their hands so they provide an immense opportunity for development through fun. Our belief is that these objects should convey important values and skills and be conceived using the best educational knowledge possible. To do this, we truly believe that dialogue between the fields of design and education is mandatory.

Du fait de nos valeurs et notre engagement à développer des compétences de concentration, nous avons décidé de nous inspirer du domaine de l'éducation et plus précisément des recherches et des solutions alternatives aux troubles de l'attention et de la concentration. 

Pourquoi sommes-nous inspirés par l'éducation et par des troubles de comportements ?

Les jouets sont les premiers objets que nos enfants reçoivent entre leurs mains. Nous croyons que ces objets doivent véhiculer des valeurs importantes et doivent être conçus de la manière la plus éducative possible. De ce fait, nous croyons fortement que le lien entre le domaine du design et de l’éducation est important. 

Our goal is to send you all Piks by March 2019 so all can enjoy the toy and its valuable benefits in the coming year!  

Check out our rewards below and support our project Piks and our brand O P P I ®.

Thank you so much for your support!

Notre objectif est de vous envoyer Piks au mois de Février 2019 afin que nous puissions tous profiter du jouet et de ses précieux avantages en 2019 ! 

Découvrez nos contreparties ci-dessous et soutenez Piks et notre marque O P P I ®.

Merci beaucoup pour votre soutien !

Based in France and co-founded by two brothers, O P P I ® is the result of Hansel Schloupt’s passion for product design, toys and education; and the in-depth knowledge of production of his brother, Bastien Schloupt. 

After suffering from an undiagnosable illness for 10 years, Hansel was finally cured in the city of Barcelona, Spain. He then decided to study industrial design there at ELISAVA School of Design. Inspired by his own health experience, he was quickly interested in the fusion between design and human behavior. He explored his interest further at ECAL/Cantonal Art School in Lausanne Switzerland, obtaining a Product Design Master. After several years of practical experience, his projects led him to the topic of therapy and fun and from there he found his true passion - designing educational toys based psychological/educational insights.

After receiving different awards including the Core 77 Design Awards 2013 or the IKEA Swiss Foundation Award 2016, Hansel and his brother, Bastien, decided to create O P P I ® together.

Basé en France et co-fondé par deux frères, O P P I ® est le fruit de la passion de Hansel Schloupt pour la conception de produits, des jouets et de l'éducation ; et de la forte connaissance de production de son frère Bastien Schloupt.  

Suite à 10 années de lutte contre une maladie orpheline, Hansel a eu la chance d'être guéri dans la ville de Barcelone et a décidé d'étudier le Design Industriel à l'école de design ELISAVA. Inspiré par son expérience personnelle, il s'intéresse très vite à la fusion entre le design et les comportements humains et explore ses intérêts au cours d'un Master de Design Produit à l'ECAL / École Cantonale d'Art de Lausanne en Suisse. Après plusieurs années de pratique, ses recherches et ses projets l'ont amené à aborder le sujet de la thérapie et du jeu, pour ainsi trouver une passion pour la conception de jouets éducatifs. 

Après avoir reçu différents prix, dont le Core 77 Design Awards 2013 ou le soutien de la Bourse IKEA Swiss Foundation 2016, Hansel s'entoure de son frère Bastien, avec qui il créé O P P I ®.

Do you like Piks? Cool ! Then don’t hesitate to share Piks with your friends by clicking on one of the links below. We need you!  

Vous aimez Piks ? Cool ! Alors n'hésitez pas à partager Piks avec vos amis en cliquant sur l'un des liens ci-dessous. Nous avons besoin de vous !

Questions? Feedback? 

Any questions, concerns, suggestions or feedbacks are very welcome. We love to share ideas, hear comments and we will be more than happy to answer any concerns you may have. Many thanks!

Shipping & Backers

Piks is available worldwide and for all of us. Due the different sets and packaging sizes we offer, shipping rates may seem a bit high for some locations. Please know that we’ve calculated all shipping rates and are able to cover some of the cost for larger orders. For example, when you pledge for Piks Kit n°5 or Kit n°6, shipping is completely free in France and 50% off in the rest of the world.

Also, there is no way for us to collect and pay any applicable VAT/custom duties due in advance. They are a result of a specific country's tax code and can only be paid in that country after the package crosses the border. Therefore, these costs may be owed when you receive your package and are the responsibility of each backer. For additional information regarding VAT/duties, please check our FAQ below.

Des questions et / ou des commentaires?   

Toutes les questions, doutes, suggestions ou commentaires sont les bienvenus. Nous aimons partager des idées ou des impressions et nous serons plus qu'heureux de répondre à vos questions.

Expédition & Contributeurs

Piks est disponible dans le monde entier et pour tous. En raison des différentes tailles de packagings que nous proposons, les tarifs de livraison peuvent sembler un peu élevés pour certaines destinations internationales. Nous avons calculé les frais de transport à l'avance et sommes en mesure d'assumer certains des frais de livraison pour certaines commandes. De plus, la livraison devient totalement gratuite pour la France lorsque vous commandez le Kit Piks n°5 et n°6 et 50% en réduction pour le reste du monde.

A noter aussi que nous ne nous permettrons pas de facturer des coûts supplémentaires et des taxes / droits applicables pouvant résulter du code fiscal local d'un pays spécifique. Cependant, ces frais peuvent être engagés à la réception de votre contrepartie. Ces frais sont à la charge de chaque contributeur. Pour les informations concernant la TVA et taxes, veuillez consulter notre FAQ ci-dessous.

Credits / Crédits  

Product Images by Philippe Fragniére

Environmental Images by Anaïs Roux  

Piks is a project that was initiated at ECAL/Cantonal Art School of Lausanne by Hansel Schloupt and carried on by O P P I ®.
