Surrounded by smartphones, apps and video games, there’s been a quite an increase in behavioral issues. This isn’t just an idea. Just as the following references show, many studies, theories and modalities have been created to help children in this phenomenon. Practices such as meditation, concentration or therapy through play are being proposed to help our children attain a calmer, more natural state of being and to help manage their emotions.10 Tips to Increase Your Child's Concentration7 In-Class Activities to Improve Concentration in ChildrenHow to Practice ADHD Play Therapy at HomeRock Balancing Stone Stacking Art STEAM Activity for KidsHow Stacking / Nesting Toys Can Develop Early Language and Fine Motor SkillsThese techniques are really inspiring and we feel they should should be available to all children. And this is why we decided to create Piks.Avez-vous déjà remarqué que les enfants sont de moins en moins concentrés ? Puisque ce sujet devient chaque jour plus présent, nous avons décidé de créer un jouet qui permettra aux enfants de s’épanouir tout en se divertissant ! Tout comme le montrent les références ci-dessous, de nombreuses théories et pratiques améliorent la concentration, les capacités cognitives et favorisent le contrôle des émotions. Et ceci tout en plaçant nos enfants dans un environnement plus calme et naturel.Comment aider un enfant à se concentrer?Pourquoi jouer aide nos enfants à grandirArt-thérapie : la créativité au service des élèves perturbésÉduquer, c’est (aussi) jouerNous croyons que ces pratiques sont très inspirantes et qu'elles devraient être appliquées d’une manière ou d’une autre à tout les enfants. Et c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de créer Piks. The aim of the Piks game is simple - to create the most original and impressive structure by positioning all of the pieces without any of it falling down.  By playing with Piks, children explore the intricacies of balance while decision-making, motor skills and imagination all come into play transforming the players into artists in a performance of concentration and skill.Le but du jeu est simple : créer la structure la plus originale et impressionnante sans laisser tomber aucune pièce  ! La prise de décision, la motricité fine et l'imagination transformeront les joueurs en de véritables artistes en pleine performance de concentration. Because we take playing seriously, this isn’t just a toy! Carefully designed, Piks offers many great educational skills and benefits for kids. Parce que s’amuser sainement est un thème sérieux pour nous, Piks n’est pas un jouet comme un autre. Conçu avec soin, Piks développe de nombreuses compétences pédagogiques et présente de nombreux avantages pour les enfants.Because of our commitment to offer a toy that develops concentration skills, we decided to seek inspiration and direction from the field of education, more precisely from research on kids' concentration disorders.  Why are we inspired by education and behaviors issues ?Toys are the first objects that our kids have in their hands so they provide an immense opportunity for development through fun. Our belief is that these objects should convey important values and skills and be conceived using the best educational knowledge possible. To do this, we truly believe that dialogue between the fields of design and education is mandatory.Du fait de nos valeurs et notre engagement à développer des compétences de concentration, nous avons décidé de nous inspirer du domaine de l'éducation et plus précisément des recherches et des solutions alternatives aux troubles de l'attention et de la concentration. Pourquoi sommes-nous inspirés par l'éducation et par des troubles de comportements ?Les jouets sont les premiers objets que nos enfants reçoivent entre leurs mains. Nous croyons que ces objets doivent véhiculer des valeurs importantes et doivent être conçus de la manière la plus éducative possible. De ce fait, nous croyons fortement que le lien entre le domaine du design et de l’éducation est important. Our goal is to send you all Piks by March 2019 so all can enjoy the toy and its valuable benefits in the coming year!  Check out our rewards below and support our project Piks and our brand O P P I ®.Thank you so much for your support!Notre objectif est de vous envoyer Piks au mois de Février 2019 afin que nous puissions tous profiter du jouet et de ses précieux avantages en 2019 ! Découvrez nos contreparties ci-dessous et soutenez Piks et notre marque O P P I ®.Merci beaucoup pour votre soutien !Based in France and co-founded by two brothers, O P P I ® is the result of Hansel Schloupt’s passion for product design, toys and education; and the in-depth knowledge of production of his brother, Bastien Schloupt. After suffering from an undiagnosable illness for 10 years, Hansel was finally cured in the city of Barcelona, Spain. He then decided to study industrial design there at ELISAVA School of Design. Inspired by his own health experience, he was quickly interested in the fusion between design and human behavior. He explored his interest further at ECAL/Cantonal Art School in Lausanne Switzerland, obtaining a Product Design Master. After several years of practical experience, his projects led him to the topic of therapy and fun and from there he found his true passion - designing educational toys based psychological/educational insights.After receiving different awards including the Core 77 Design Awards 2013 or the IKEA Swiss Foundation Award 2016, Hansel and his brother, Bastien, decided to create O P P I ® together.Basé en France et co-fondé par deux frères, O P P I ® est le fruit de la passion de Hansel Schloupt pour la conception de produits, des jouets et de l'éducation ; et de la forte connaissance de production de son frère Bastien Schloupt.  Suite à 10 années de lutte contre une maladie orpheline, Hansel a eu la chance d'être guéri dans la ville de Barcelone et a décidé d'étudier le Design Industriel à l'école de design ELISAVA. Inspiré par son expérience personnelle, il s'intéresse très vite à la fusion entre le design et les comportements humains et explore ses intérêts au cours d'un Master de Design Produit à l'ECAL / École Cantonale d'Art de Lausanne en Suisse. Après plusieurs années de pratique, ses recherches et ses projets l'ont amené à aborder le sujet de la thérapie et du jeu, pour ainsi trouver une passion pour la conception de jouets éducatifs. Après avoir reçu différents prix, dont le Core 77 Design Awards 2013 ou le soutien de la Bourse IKEA Swiss Foundation 2016, Hansel s'entoure de son frère Bastien, avec qui il créé O P P I ®.Do you like Piks? Cool ! Then don’t hesitate to share Piks with your friends by clicking on one of the links below. We need you!  Vous aimez Piks ? Cool ! Alors n'hésitez pas à partager Piks avec vos amis en cliquant sur l'un des liens ci-dessous. Nous avons besoin de vous !Questions? Feedback? Any questions, concerns, suggestions or feedbacks are very welcome. We love to share ideas, hear comments and we will be more than happy to answer any concerns you may have. Many thanks!Shipping & BackersPiks is available worldwide and for all of us. Due the different sets and packaging sizes we offer, shipping rates may seem a bit high for some locations. Please know that we’ve calculated all shipping rates and are able to cover some of the cost for larger orders. For example, when you pledge for Piks Kit n°5 or Kit n°6, shipping is completely free in France and 50% off in the rest of the world.Also, there is no way for us to collect and pay any applicable VAT/custom duties due in advance. They are a result of a specific country's tax code and can only be paid in that country after the package crosses the border. Therefore, these costs may be owed when you receive your package and are the responsibility of each backer. For additional information regarding VAT/duties, please check our FAQ below.Des questions et / ou des commentaires?   Toutes les questions, doutes, suggestions ou commentaires sont les bienvenus. Nous aimons partager des idées ou des impressions et nous serons plus qu'heureux de répondre à vos questions.Expédition & ContributeursPiks est disponible dans le monde entier et pour tous. En raison des différentes tailles de packagings que nous proposons, les tarifs de livraison peuvent sembler un peu élevés pour certaines destinations internationales. Nous avons calculé les frais de transport à l'avance et sommes en mesure d'assumer certains des frais de livraison pour certaines commandes. De plus, la livraison devient totalement gratuite pour la France lorsque vous commandez le Kit Piks n°5 et n°6 et 50% en réduction pour le reste du monde.A noter aussi que nous ne nous permettrons pas de facturer des coûts supplémentaires et des taxes / droits applicables pouvant résulter du code fiscal local d'un pays spécifique. Cependant, ces frais peuvent être engagés à la réception de votre contrepartie. Ces frais sont à la charge de chaque contributeur. Pour les informations concernant la TVA et taxes, veuillez consulter notre FAQ ci-dessous.Credits / Crédits  Product Images by Philippe FragniéreEnvironmental Images by Anaïs Roux  Piks is a project that was initiated at ECAL/Cantonal Art School of Lausanne by Hansel Schloupt and carried on by O P P I ®.

story:
FEATURED ON

 

For all the times...

  • you wear your cozy winter socks and drink hot soup at home.
  • you are cold and shivering at your office desk.
  • your need to buy many different gadgets when the season change.
  • you finally find a heater but it's either bulky, ugly, noisy or just not working properly as it's described.

️That's why we at Airdog created an innovative Portable Dual Fan Heater for anyone who wants a powerful mini heater that is efficient, safe, and ultra-modern in design.

 

MORE THAN A HEATER

Feel comfortable in your space with the Airdog Portable Dual Comfort Fan Heater. This elegant yet powerful device works as both a cooling fan and heater for your personal thermal comfort, which will help you through the whole year without worrying about buying another gadget due to the season change. 

Utilizing Airdog PTC technology, the heater draws full power initially to heat up and reach the ideal temperature quickly with the touch of a button. In fact, it provides heating in just two seconds. Aside from being safe and effective, this dynamic heating system is also energy and time efficient. Loaded with safety features, the heater even shuts off automatically when it is knocked over and the best in class fire-retardant (V0) plastic housing.

PERSONAL AND PORTABLE

Airdog has three color options, Black, White and Rose Pink for your preference. Weight less than 3 pounds. This new lightweight Airdog Dual Comfort Fan Heater is designed with a portable elegant leather handle that enables you to bring anywhere you prefer.


The portable leather handle allows you to travel easily between your home and your office. Enjoying the perfect warm without occupying  too much space. Keep the minimalism.


 

BEST IN CLASS TECHNOLOGY


 


 

With the advanced PTC technology, Airdog provides wide angle warming and enables a fast 2-second warming for providing you the fastest warming experience. This dynamic heating system is not only effective, but also time and energy efficient. Airdog heater can be designed to operate anywhere between -40°C and 70°C (-40°F and 158°F). It is the best solution for providing superior fast heat transfer in a personal space. 

The optimized angle and air flow duct enable to warm a bigger area. There are two warming levels, 750-800 W for a less cold weather, and 950 W for a freezing weather. 

Airdog PTC technology draws full power initially to quickly heat up and reach the optimum temperature. As the heat increases, the power consumption simultaneously drops. 


 

SUPER EASY TO USE

Airdog has only button to let you set up the temperature ( Regular Warm, Warmer and Nature Wind Fan) that you need in daily basis. It has build-in sleep timer ( 2-hour, 4-hour, 8-hour) for your night sleep. 


There is a removable filter in the unit to prevent function decreasing by daily dust. You can clean it by simply washing it with water and put it back after fully drying to keep the good performance.

 

SAFETY COMES FIRST


ENJOY YOUR PEACE OF MIND

Airdog operates quietly even for its max power, which allows you to use during your work hours, reading and sleep.


 

WHY CHOOSING AIRDOG


ABOUT AIRDOG

 

DESIGN PROCESS

We want to provide an affordable Dual Comfort Fan Heater solution that is efficient and safe without composing the modern look. After running through thousands of people's ideas/needs and tests before finalizing Airdog Portable Dual Comfort Fan Heater.

 In order to achieve those, our team lock down with the best-in-class PTC technology and V-0-rated materials (V0 rating is the best rating designated by the international safety organization, UL).  

Your support is the key for enabling us to share this good product to people around the world. We really really appreciate your support!

Thank you! 


REWARDS

​

 

TIMELINE

 

OUR STORY

Silicon Valley Air Expert Inc. is a leading air purifier company founded by a group of technology experts and entrepreneurs from Silicon Valley.  We are dedicated to developing innovative technologies to improve human’s health, especially providing Innovative Non-filter air purification solutions based on ionic wind technology for more than 8 years. We have been helping hundreds of millions of people who breath poor air daily in USA, Canada, EU, UK, Hong Kong and Taiwan and China etc. Meanwhile, we are developing other innovative options for modern smart home, like portable air purifiers, central ventilation system, sleep improvement products, smart heaters and more.

For more info, please visit our official website https://airdogusa.com/

Risk and Challenge

Free shipping within the Continental United States. We will not make any profit on shipping cost. And we are trying our best to adjust the campaign as well as the production. All the product are expected to be sent out before Christmas time either for yourself or for your loved ones as a sweet gift, but there will be some uncertainties during a crowdfunding project. You can follow up our latest news by adding us on our social media official accounts. 
Thank you for supporting us!

story:
Lumir is a portmanteau word of 'Lumi' which means the light and 'Mir' which means the world. With a goal to light up the world, we invented our first product 'Lumir C'.

We could get KC, FCC, CE and RoHS certificates on Lumir C through last year and also we already have a Korean patent (USA patent pending).

Now we need your help to make our first production run. Thank you for your support!

 

 

 

 

 

: Simplicity ; Just putting Lumir C over a lighted candle will turn the LED on.

: No battery ; Batteries have been causing severe pollution to environment. But eco-friendly Lumir C doesn't use any batteries so it is free from that problem.

: Cordless ; It doesn't need any burden wire or outlets because your candle will make electricity instead. So you can use Lumir C anywhere you want such as in camping, on bedside or while decorating your house if you have just one candle.

: Modern design ; With our neat design, it fits everywhere.

 *Tip : Using your favorite scented candle with Lumir C will make you feel relaxed.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 We've come to know the seriousness of blackouts travelling throughout India. Though many households in developing countries still brighten the darkness with candle light, it is too dark to lead an everyday life with only one candle.

Therefore we agonized over the problem.

'What if they can light up a room with just one candle?'

We focused on the fact that most of fuel are spent as heat energy when a candle burn. By using the principle which is the conversion of temperature difference in two other types of semi-conductor directly into electricity, Lumir C turns LED on only with heat energy of the candle without external power supply.

 

Lumir K

 

 

 

  • Brightness : 85lm
  • Weight : 220g
  • Product dimension : 4.3” * 4.3” * 8.6”
  • Package dimension : 4.7” * 4.7” * 2.4”

A low-cost product, Lumir K, is operated by the same technology as Lumir C. It can save up to 80% of fuels than a kerosene lamp because it uses a little heat source. By reducing the incomplete combustion, it can reduce up to 88% of black carbon than a kerosene lamp. 

 Through Lumir K, they can light up the darkness more healthily with low-cost.

 Lumir K was made to solve the insufficient light problem.  Please contact us by e-mail below who want more specific information. Let's light up the world together by adding worth to our warm technology.

Contact Us : CSR@lumir.co.kr

 

 We've been researching and developing Lumir K which will be launched in second half year. We'll make more proper product to the locals through Lumir C that will be in mass production soon by your support. And this is some of the video that we filmed while researching.

 

 

Lumir C is shaped after a lighthouse that lights up a dark sea. Delicate mood of a candle and modern sense of LED are in wonderful harmony.

 

 

 

 

 Through many sketches, We have completed the current design of  Lumir C .

 

 

 <Mood>

Lumir C Mood creates soft atmosphere around you and makes you feel cozy.

 

 

<Candle>

 

 

<Spot>

Lumir C Spot helps you read books or magazines in comfortable atmosphere.

 

 

* Since this product gets the power from the heat energy, the brightness can be differ from the picture above depending on the size of the flame.

 International Shipping 
International backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees.

story:
Who we are...... 

  • I'm George Biasco. I and my team are  Social Innovator.         
  • The social innovator is a new figure  highly specialized that was created to bring and sensitize the society to the issues of environment, energy, health and digital communication. The basis for the specialization of each innovator is the research and development of innovative prototypes that can best safeguard today's society without compromising the future of his children. So, we thought MGT (MacGyverTools). MgT is a small, lightweight and portable smart screwdriver. This screwdriver is obtained from the RECYCLED ALUMINIUM that you normally buy at hardware stores. 
  • The idea of ​​the tools is to sensitize people to respect the environment with the recycling of aluminum by joining something that is useful to your own lifestyle and your character. We thought associate a MGT a color to represent our personality, our character.


  • SILVER.

    Represent: silver is respectable and courteous, mature and determined, wise and organized. It reflects back the energy sent out, whether that energy is positive or negative. Silver opens the mind and lights the way forward

                             

    BLUE. 
  • Represent: Intelligence, communication, trust, efficiency, serenity, duty, logic, coolness, reflection. Blue is the colour of the mind and is essentially soothing. Consequently it is serene and mentally calming. It is the colour of clear communication. Blue is the world's favourite colour.

                                 

    GREEN. 
    Raprensent: Harmony, balance, refreshment, universal love, rest, restoration, reassurance, environmental awareness, equilibrium, peace. Green strikes the eye in such a way as to require no adjustment whatever and is, therefore, restful. It is the colour of balance.                    

                         

    RED.

    Represent: Physical courage, strength, warmth, energy, basic survival, 'fight or flight', stimulation, masculinity, excitement. Its effect is physical, it stimulates us and raises the pulse rate, giving the impression that time is passing faster than it is. It is stimulating and lively, very friendly.                                          

    MGT was born because I am a heedless person. Often when I go to do the repairs I forget my screwdrivers. Today I have not this problem because the screwdrivers with MGT are always with me.

  • Yes, A small aluminum keychain, very light (only 30g x 2.7" of lenght and 0.5 " width )     
  •               

  •     

  •            
  •        

        
  •  

  •        

                                          

                                                    

  MGT TOOL  INCLUDED :

                                    1  MGT                       2  DIFFERENT INSERTS                                                             +     

For more information contact me on the email : edmound.caroli@gmail.com

  • I will be very grateful to all those who will help we realize our dream. Your contribution will help we for the costs of start-up. 

What We Need...........

  • I need about 20.000 $  to cover costs of start-up. Start-up costs include: costs to rent, cost of machine tools to design and build new tools, taxes to start a company.  

If we don't reach the goal, however, we mgtools team will use the funds to open any cost to our small company. WE CAN, WE MUST..........FOR THIS REASON WE THOUGHT TO GIVE ALL THE POSSIBILITY OF HAVING A MGT, WHO CAN NOT EVEN BUY...

  •  Your donation,  if made ​​by 22/05/2014, will be linked  to the extraction of the American Pawerball of the 24/05/2014( shipping June ) as follows in the description of the perk.                                                  http://www.powerball.com/pb_home.asp.
  • All other donations will be linked to the extraction of the 25/06/2014 (shipping Jule  )

1)  GREEN: CONTRIBUTE OF $ 3 ,                                                                                    CAN WIN 1 MGT GUESSING THE FIRST NUMBER OF THE LOTTERY+        POWERBALL NUMBER( You can choose just one a number between 1 and 59 of the lottery + powerball number between 1 and 35.  )

 

The numbers must be specified at time of donation IN THE SHIPPING INFORMATION, FOLLOWING AS INDICATED:

The numbers must be specified at time of donation IN THE SHIPPING INFORMATION, FOLLOWING AS INDICATED:

story_txt:
Who we are...... 

I'm George Biasco. I and my team are  Social Innovator.         


The
 social innovator is a new figure  highly 
specialized that was created to bring and sensitize the society to the issues of environment, energy,
 health and digital communication. The basis for the specialization of each innovator is the research and
 development of innovative prototypes that can best safeguard today's 
society without compromising the future of his children. So, we thought MGT (MacGyverTools). MgT is a small, lightweight and portable smart screwdriver. This screwdriver is obtained from the RECYCLED ALUMINIUM that you normally buy at hardware stores. 
The idea of ​​the tools is to sensitize people to respect the environment with the recycling of aluminum by joining something that is useful to your own lifestyle and your character. We thought associate a MGT a color to represent our personality, our character.


SILVER.
Represent: silver is respectable and courteous, mature and determined, wise and organized. It reflects back the energy sent out, whether that energy is positive or negative. Silver opens the mind and lights the way forward
                         
BLUE. 
Represent: Intelligence, communication, trust, efficiency, serenity, duty, logic, coolness, reflection. Blue is the colour of the mind and is essentially soothing. Consequently it is serene and mentally calming. It is the colour of clear communication. Blue is the world's favourite colour.                             
GREEN. Raprensent: Harmony, balance, refreshment, universal love, rest, restoration, reassurance, environmental awareness, equilibrium, peace. Green strikes the eye in such a way as to require no adjustment whatever and is, therefore, restful. It is the colour of balance.                                         

RED.
Represent: Physical courage, strength, warmth, energy, basic survival, 'fight or flight', stimulation, masculinity, excitement. Its effect is physical, it stimulates us and raises the pulse rate, giving the impression that time is passing faster than it is. It is stimulating and lively, very friendly.                                          
MGT was born because I am a heedless person. Often when I go to do the repairs I forget my screwdrivers. Today I have not this problem because the screwdrivers with MGT are always with me.


Yes, A small aluminum keychain, very light (only 30g x 2.7" of lenght and 0.5 " width )     


              

    

           



           

 

       

                                                                                      


  MGT TOOL  INCLUDED :                                    1  MGT                       2  DIFFERENT INSERTS                                                             +     For more information contact me on the email : edmound.caroli@gmail.com
I will be very grateful to all those who will help we realize our dream. Your contribution will help we for the costs of start-up. What We Need...........I need about 20.000 $  to cover costs of start-up. Start-up costs include: costs to rent, cost of machine tools to design and build new tools, taxes to start a company.  If we don't reach the goal, however, we mgtools team will use the funds to open any cost to our small company. WE CAN, WE MUST..........FOR THIS REASON WE THOUGHT TO GIVE ALL THE POSSIBILITY OF HAVING A MGT, WHO CAN NOT EVEN BUY...

 Your donation,  if made ​​by 22/05/2014, will be linked  to the extraction of the American Pawerball of the 24/05/2014( shipping June )  as follows in the description of the perk.                                                  http://www.powerball.com/pb_home.asp.

All other donations will be linked to the extraction of the 25/06/2014 (shipping Jule  )
1)  GREEN: CONTRIBUTE OF $ 3 ,                                                                                    CAN WIN 1 MGT GUESSING THE FIRST NUMBER OF THE LOTTERY+        POWERBALL NUMBER( You can choose just one a number between 1 and 59 of the lottery + powerball number between 1 and 35.  ) The numbers must be specified at time of donation IN THE SHIPPING INFORMATION, FOLLOWING AS INDICATED:2) GREEN BALL:  CONTRIBUTE OF $5 ,                                                                            CAN WIN 1 MGT GUESSING THE FIRST NUMBER OF THE LOTTERY  (You can choose just a number between 1 and 59 of the lottery. )                            The numbers must be specified at time of donation IN THE SHIPPING INFORMATION, FOLLOWING AS INDICATED:         3) GREEN POWER:  CONTRIBUTE OF $ 7,                                                               CAN WIN 1 MGT GUESSING THE POWERBALL (You can choose just one a powerball number between 1 and 35 )                                                                                                                                        The numbers must be specified at time of donation IN THE SHIPPING INFORMATION, FOLLOWING AS INDICATED:                     If you want to order a MGT :4) WITH  CONTRIBUTE $20 , YOU WILL RECEIVE,  1  MGT+ 2 INSERTS         1  MGT            2  DIFFERENT INSERTS +  1 POWEBALL LOTTERY, OPTION GREEN.                 +              +     5) WITH CONTRIBUTE $38 , YOU WILL RECEIVE                                     2  MGT (SILVER AND BLUE) + 4   INSERTS  + 1 POWEBALL LOTTERY       OPTION GREEN                         +         +     6) WITH  CONTRIBUTE $70 , YOU WILL RECEIVE, 4  MGT(4 DIFFERENT COLOR)   +  8  INSERTS  +   1 POWERBALL LOTTERY OPTION GREEN.                        +    +       ALL FREE SHIPPING !!!!!!!!!

story:
Summary

Welcome to Chicago Brew - a North Chicago coffee shop with a diverse cast of characters, both customers and staff alike. If you spend just an hour in any Starbucks you’ll agree the potential story lines are virtually endless. In fact, the inspiration for Chicago Brew comes from nearly 7 years of combined experiences Executive Producer Glenn Selby and Co-creator Andrew Voigt have had actually working at Starbucks. Chicago brew is like many time-tested, work-place sitcoms - Taxi, Cheers, The Mary-Tyler Moore Show, WKRP in Cincinnati - and many more. Chicago Brew is next in line for this legacy.

 

What We Need

We want to share with you our vision to bring Chicago Brew to network television.

The script for the pilot is complete and we plan to pitch it at the October New York TV Festival. We want to take advantage of every networking opportunity available. With that in mind we are producing a sizzle reel, a DEMO if you will. This is simply a shorter version of the pilot we can use to generate interest at the festival and open even more doors. To do this we need to raise $18,900. Why $18,900? We realize if we want to be taken seriously by the networks, we need to play on their level. To do that, the sizzle reel must be a quality production. To produce a quality production we must hire quality people, which mean actors, crew, and all the logistical support to pull it off. Chicago Brew is NOT an experiment, we believe it’s the next Classic Television Comedy. So please consider helping us make this a reality.

 

Ways You Can Help

One way you can support this project is with a financial contribution. Take advantage of the perks offered on this page. If you want to contribute more, we can find more ways to thank you!

Some people are just not able to contribute, we get that. So here another way you can help.

SPREAD THE WORD!

  • Share the link to our page with your email list
  • Post our link on your Facebook page and ask folks to share it
  • Send out a tweet to all your Twitter followers
  • Let anybody and everybody know about our page

Thanks so much for visiting our page.

story:
Through AniBite’s one-touch open and close design, take the tedium out of daily routines. The key to AniBite’s patented design is a guiding support bar that leads the object into place while automatically raising and lowering the storage cover. Items can be grabbed or secured in one simple motion making storage effortless. Whether your toothbrush, glasses or car keys, organize your life around AniBite.

 

 


 

 

AniBite set-up and use is all about simplicity. To install, simply remove the paper cover and stick AniBite firmly on the wall surface. Open the cap and place the object securely into AniBite's mouth. AniBite can store your belongings in a number of positions, both vertical or horizontal.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Safely Attach AniBite to ANY surface: Mirror, Steel, Wood, Glass, Whiteboard, Wallpaper and More. Even attach on embossed or uneven surfaces such as tile. AniBite won’t do any damage to the attached surface and can be removed with a simple twist and pull. 

AniBite is the only holder that provides the specialized sanitary benefits of a toothbrush holder while also having the multi-use capability to store and organize other light weight objects. In addition, AniBite offers universal attachment, even on uneven surfaces, which no other holder can do.

story:
YOUR TEA MASTER

Qi Aerista comes with 6 different preset brewing modes for Floral, Green, Oolong, Black and Milk tea for your strong brew tea, plus Cold Brewing for all tea types. 

 

We have been working with in-house and external tea experts over the past years to determine the optimal brewing programs for these tea types:  

 

QI AERISTA YOUR TEA COMPANION

Inspired by the traditional methods of tea steeping and flow-brewing, Qi Aerista is based on our revolutionary patented circulative & immersive brewing system that can optimally manage the 4 key tea brewing elements.   

 

QI AERISTA APP

 

HOW DOES IT WORK

 

Step 1 - Add water

 

Step 2 - Add tea leaves into the infuser

 

Step 3 - Select your tea program and strength, then press "Brew"

 

Step 4 - Enjoy the savouring sights and aromas as tea brews

 

Step 5a - Easy cleanup

 

Step 5b - Easy cleanup

 

 

OFFERING TEA LOVERS MORE

 

Behind Qi Aerista is a team of passionate folks that care about tea and the tea experiences that we can offer to tea lovers.

 

A CLOSEUP OF QI AERISTA

Qi Aerista is built using safe and commonly-used materials such as heat-resistant borosilicate glass, stainless steel, BPA-free plastics and food-grade silicone rubber. 

No plastic part is in constant contact with water inside the pot during normal use. 

Here are the final product dimensions of Qi Aerista. Note that the base of the prototypes seen in photos and videos have a larger diameter of 220mm / 8.7in. The new and smaller base is currently under development and is targeted to be ready by the end of 2016. 

 

 

QI AERISTA VS OTHER TEA MAKERS

 

PUBLIC APPEARANCES

 

MEDIA COVERAGE

 

 

WORDS FROM EXPERTS & FANS OF TEA

Over the past year we have reached out to the tea community with Qi Aerista and have received a lot of praise and support. 

See what tea professionals & tea lovers have to say about Qi Aerista at our public appearances around the world in 2016. 

 

WHY INDIEGOGO INDEMAND

Building a great product requires tremendous skills, effort and dedication. But most importantly, we need your support to help realize our vision of brewing the perfect cup of tea for everyone, including people new to tea.

To propel our Qi Aerista project into mass production and market launch phase, we need your help. The raised funds will help account for the costs of: 

  • DFM (Design for manufacturing) process of the finalized product design 
  • Tooling, manufacturing & quality control
  • Sourcing material and components
  • Testing & safety certification (e.g. IEC, CCC, CE, UL) 
  • Handling and logistics    

 

MEET THE TEAM

We are a team of dedicated professionals in R&D, design, tea knowledge and marketing. With our passionate love for tea and innovation, our goal is of introducing more people to the wonderful world of tea and make every tea lover's tea experience enjoyable.  

Some of the companies we have worked for:

 

OUR ADVISORS

 

SPECIAL THANKS

 

SHARE THE QI AERISTA STORY

 

 

 

 

 


FAQ

PRODUCT USAGE - Can we use tea bags/loose leaf tea/other ingredients?

Certainly! For small pieces of tea like fannings and dust grade, we strongly suggest placing them in tea filtered bag before brewing them in your Qi Aerista. You are welcome to put your favourite spices when you want to brew your chai. However, we suggest to run a brewing cycle (e.g. 2-3 mins) with just water first after each brew of strong flavored tea. If that does not satisfy you, then add a little vinegar to run the brew with water.

PRODUCT USAGE - How much tea leaves/water can I add?

We recommend using  one heaped teaspoon (about 3 grams) for every 250ml (about 8oz) of water.

PRODUCT USAGE - What kind of water should I use?

Most of your cup of tea consists of water, therefore, choosing the right kind of water is a key step to brew a perfect cup of tea. Avoid choosing water that is high in mineral contents as you may find unwanted metallic flavour in your tea.  Also, if the water’s mineral content is too high it will leave scale deposits in your pot. Absolutely purified water is also not recommended as it will make the tea flat and dull. As a result, we advise using clean drinking water that has either low or balanced mineral content.

PRODUCT USAGE - Can we use Qi Aerista just to boil/heat the water?

Yes, once the infuser is removed from Qi Aerista, it will turn into variable temperature kettle mode. Via our app, you can set the temperature to boiling or to other temperatures between 20C to 100C (68F to 212F) you like.

PRODUCT USAGE - How do we make milk tea with Qi Aerista? Can I add milk directly?

We recommend using Qi Aerista to make the base tea, then mix with milk and other ingredients (e.g. sugar) in an external container (e.g. mug). We don't recommend directly adding milk inside your Qi Aerista.

PRODUCT USAGE - How do we clean it?

All parts in contact with water (e.g. infuser and pot) can be removed for cleaning or rinsed under the tap.

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - Can we replace the glass pot?

Currently, we do not offer replacement for the glass pot.

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - How does the Wi-Fi work and what kind of access it needs?

You can link the app to Qi Aerista through a direct Wi-Fi connection (i.e. no Wi-Fi network needed). Basically look up the list of Wi-Fi networks to connect to (say Qi-Aerista-123 in SSID) on your smartphone and enter the corresponding password to connect. The exact procedures will be outlined when our product is ready to ship.

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - How far can Qi Aerista be from our smartphone?

Similar to the other Wi-Fi devices depending on the home's interior design.

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - What voltage and power plugs does it have and use?

We are offering two versions initially: 220V+UK plug and 110V+US plug. So if you live in a place that uses neither of these plug types, then you will need an earthed adaptor that can safely support 1000W (e.g. 10A current for 220V).

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - Does it have a warranty? Can we replace different pieces of it if one was broken?

Yes. Qi Aerista comes with 1-year limited warranty from the date of delivery that would cover the repairs, replacement or refund of our product due to a defect in product material or its workmanship within the warranty period. Terms and conditions apply, including the product should be used in a manner that is consistent with the user manual. Details of the warranty claim arrangement with our agents and partners in your local jurisdiction will be provided at the time of shipping.

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - Do we have to use the app in order to brew tea?

No. You don’t have to use the app. The app is available to provide you with more great features like customizing your brewing temperature and time. If you are happy with our preset temperature and time for your favourite tea type, then just use Qi Aerista as a one-button press tea brewer.

TECHNICAL ASPECTS - What’s the standby and timer set power?

Standby power is less than 0.5W. For timer set, power is about 1W.

SHIPPING - How is the shipping handled and how much does it cost?

International shipping dates may vary. For single-unit shipping to Hong Kong, add $10. For shipping to other countries, including mainland China, add $20. Note that backer will be liable for any tax or import duties that you may be required to pay upon importing your reward into your country.

SHIPPING - We live outside of Hong Kong. Can we still pre-order?

Certainly. Qi Aerista ships anywhere in the world.

SHIPPING - Do we add the shipping fee to the pledge amount or is it charged later?

The shipping fee will be added to your pledge amount based on the shipping address you choose and you’ll be charged once you confirm payment.

SHIPPING - How can we confirm the shipping address?

Our shipping address will be confirmed right before we are ready to ship. So no worries if you have a change in shipping address in the meantime.

CONTACT - I’m a member of the press/media. How can I reach the Qi Aerista team?

Please contact support@qi-aerista.com. Press release can be located in the following link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0Bz3fREp...

CONTACT - If I have a question, how can I reach you?

If you’ve read through these FAQs and still have unanswered questions, feel free to contact us at support@qi-aerista.com.

Terms and conditions apply, including the product should be used in a manner that is consistent with the user manual. Details of the warranty claim arrangement with our agents and partners in your local jurisdiction will be provided at the time of shipping.
TECHNICAL ASPECTS - Do we have to use the app in order to brew tea?
No. You don’t have to use the app. The app is available to provide you with more great features like customizing your brewing temperature and time. If you are happy with our preset temperature and time for your favourite tea type, then just use Qi Aerista as a one-button press tea brewer.
TECHNICAL ASPECTS - What’s the standby and timer set power?
Standby power is less than 0.5W. For timer set, power is about 1W.
SHIPPING - How is the shipping handled and how much does it cost?
International shipping dates may vary. For single-unit shipping to Hong Kong, add $10. For shipping to other countries, including mainland China, add $20. Note that backer will be liable for any tax or import duties that you may be required to pay upon importing your reward into your country.
SHIPPING - We live outside of Hong Kong. Can we still pre-order?
Certainly. Qi Aerista ships anywhere in the world.
SHIPPING - Do we add the shipping fee to the pledge amount or is it charged later?
The shipping fee will be added to your pledge amount based on the shipping address you choose and you’ll be charged once you confirm payment.
SHIPPING - How can we confirm the shipping address?
Our shipping address will be confirmed right before we are ready to ship. So no worries if you have a change in shipping address in the meantime.
CONTACT - I’m a member of the press/media. How can I reach the Qi Aerista team?
Please contact support@qi-aerista.com. Press release can be located in the following link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0Bz3fREp...
CONTACT - If I have a question, how can I reach you?
If you’ve read through these FAQs and still have unanswered questions, feel free to contact us at support@qi-aerista.com.

story:
Have you ever been overwhelmed by technology? 

Meet Hub - the only device you need to help take back your life and focus on what truly matters. Stripped of extraneous features, Hub serves as an IOT powerhouse that you can pair to your home network. With its robust ESP8266 brain and beautiful metallic exterior, Hub is set to change the way you interact with your connected devices and content. 

We've come to Indiegogo to validate our product with you, the consumer, and to raise vital funding. We need $10,000+ to become a legitimate entity, open an online store & get this on shelves.

Fast & simple installation

Integrated SpeechListen(TM)

A mobile monitoring app from anywhere

 

Hub's one-time setup is easy. When you first turn on Hub, it creates a local Wifi hotspot that you can join with your phone or computer. Then, follow the simple on-boarding process to get Hub connected to your home network. Once you’re finished, Hub will be ready to go!

In addition to our classic Hub, we have a series of other tiers for you to enjoy. Partake with however large a purchase you want.

 

 

 

What is the difference between Hub and the June Intelligent Oven?

The June Intelligent Oven is a countertop convection oven that automatically cooks foods based on what you put in it. In some cases, the June Intelligent Oven can be used as a microwave. Hub is an internet-connected, smart station.

Is there a paid subscription service for Hub?

While we do a lot for you on our server, all cloud-computing is free for the lifetime of your Hub.

Is it possible to take photos with Hub? If so, how?

No, the current iteration of Hub does not have an onboard camera. 

Some have mounted cameras on top of their Hubs for similar functionality, but this hack is not endorsed by Hub Laboratories.

How is it powered? Are the batteries replaceable?

Hub runs off AA batteries, and they are replaceable.

Is there a mobile app?

Yes, an app is currently in development for iOS & Android.

Can I get my Hub in a different color?

Chromium Grey is our only available colour now. Charcoal Black & Country Club White are slated for the holiday season.

When will Hub be delivered?

Our first batch will ship August 2017, at the latest.

Who can I contact for tech support?

If you’re having trouble setting up Hub, first make sure the problem isn’t your phone or computer. If you are using an Apple product, refer to http://www.apple.com/retail/geniusbar/.

Who is this product intended for?

Everyone with a home network! Hub is the perfect companion for any family, couple, or individual.

story:
My name is Juan and I’m the co-founder of vaustil grills. I come from a family where food is a central part of life, we believe that food is one of those things that can make every day of your life a little bit happier, which turned my biggest passion into grilling.

The whole story began in Mexico, where back then, my father was very unhappy with the grills available on the market, so he decided to build a grill by himself. He was inspired by the Argentinean grills and took around 2 years of continuous improvement until he was completely happy with what he had. In Mexico, we grill more than 3 times a week and for me, it is the tastiest cooking method. Therefore, when I moved to Europe, we always thought about bringing our Argentinean grills. 

After some time we found a great project team, with a passion for design, love for food, who had the skills to do it. For Europe, we redesigned and developed our Argentinean grills and took it one step further and build the perfect charcoal grill - El Primero.  

 

 

With our integrated charcoal starter, it’s now easier than ever to generate a strong flame for your grilling needs, with the optimal temperature being reached in less than 20 minutes. Simply load the integrated charcoal starter with coal or briquettes and then set alight the firelighter (or your ignition material of choice) in the Primero ignition compartment.  

 

 

Primero offers an even distribution of constant heat. Using an intuitive height adjustment mechanism, the V-profile grate can be set to the ideal grilling heights to obtain that perfect exposure to the heat below. This way, Primero exercises convenient flexibility across multiple food groups, matching these to your glowing embers. 

 

 

Through a unique V-profile grate design, liquids released from food are ingeniously discouraged away from dripping onto glowing coals. This prevents the formation and build-up of carcinogenic (cancer-causing) substances, which can be deposited on food or inhaled with smoke. 

 

Conventional smart-grills are limited to a single temperature zone. This is where the powerful smart-technologies behind the intuitive Vaustil Primero grills distances itself from conventional. Standing at the forefront of technology with its remarkable 7-zone temperature sensor management, Vaustil’s Primero Smart grills provide a comprehensive heatmap across the grate. An intuitive Grill Assistant App lends a hand in guiding you to perfectly grilled meat sensations. 

 

 

The outer surfaces of Primero grills are isolated, protecting against unnecessary burns at festive and family gatherings. With Primero, heat is distributed where it should be, and not where it shouldn’t. 

 
 

It needed a lot of steps, trials & errors - a lot of sweat, tears & joyful moments to meet our expectations and to reach our goals. We started building and exploring in 2015. It took us three years to build the - for us - perfect grill.   

Because our product is already developed, we will use the Kickstarter money only to buy materials for our first serial production.

We developed two different versions of our grill. vaustil Primero comes without electronics and pure grilling passion. vaustil Primero Smart owns seven temperature sensors right beneath the grate and provides you great insights during grilling. It's very easy to upgrade your vaustil Primero to the Smart-Version, whenever you want.  

We listed a lot of unique characteristics of our grills above. To get a good overview, why vaustil grills are the smartest on the market, we marked the most important features and listed them in a comparison.  

We started our journey about three years ago. Here is - in a nutshell - what happened so far.  

 

 

. Michael Steiner // Marketing 

. Christoph Hermann // Productdesign

. Martin Weigand // Product

. Stefan Ortmair // Design & Marketing

. Juan de Rosenzweig // Business Development

. Joachim Kornauth // Product & Construction

. Alexander Hartl // Electronics 

. Norbert Striedinger // Finance

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a rock-solid production and delivery plan.

Firstly, our production is quite advanced and you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over 2 years designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples.

Secondly, we have very skillful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterwards.

Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

story:
Something that envelops your body each night shouldn’t feel coarse or uncomfortable. Slumber sheets are 100% Certified Egyptian cotton intricately woven for the smoothest sleep experience you’ve ever had.

 

Say goodbye to those annoying little balls that pill up on your sheets after washes and use.

Slumber sheets are woven with extra-long cotton fibers for softer material, fewer exposed ends, and reduced snagging and pulling.

 

No more kicking sheets off in the middle of the night. Slumber sheets are so breathable you’ll keep them on all year long.

Slumber sheets are woven with our tested and optimized Percale weave. That means your body heat flows freely through, instead of being trapped by oppressive, double-layered weaving.

 

Extra-long fibers combined with one-ply mean you’re getting the lightest, softest thread available. Our thread is of the highest quality.

 

No more trying to figure out which side is the long one. Slumber sheets come with helpful side labels, clearly indicating how the sheet fits your bed.


 

 

We're only charging the price we have to sell at, not the price we can make a killing at. By getting rid of unnecessary markups, and throwing out outrageous hidden fees, we’re taking the nonsense out of pricing bed sheets. We sell all standard sheet sets under $100 with U.S. shipping on us.

 

Seriously, stop spending your money on their marketing budgets. The below pricing includes estimated NY to LA shipping rates.

 

 

You wouldn't put harmful, chemical-ridden food in your body. So why would you wrap your body in harmful material?

 

Slumber Sheets come in Twin, Full, Queen, and King sizes. You'll select your sheet size after our campaign.

 

 

Our beta testers can't stop raving about our sheets. They say Slumber Sheets are the best. 

 

Slumber Sheets will come in white for now. We'll unlock all 4 colors as stretch goals throughout our camaign. You'll select your color after the campaign has ended.

 

 

 


 

 

 

We’re a small group of highly specialized and diverse individuals in New York aiming to upgrade your sleep. Our team has expertise in the specifics of manufacturing fabrics, development and marketing, so we built a team addressing all other needs. We have a team of consultants, advisors, contributors, and coworkers (and dogs) who provide insight to everything from design to testing to cost efficiency, we even have a professional devil’s advocate. Everything we need to accomplish our mission - get everyone the best nights sleep at an affordable price.

 

 

Production Benefits & Standards:
 

  • Eco Friendly
    • We produce in a plant which saves 300 million liters of water per year.
    • Waste heat recovery From EGB TON 9,985
    • Solar 200 KW, which reduces 292 tons of CO2 emission /year
    • 100 % LED Light
  • Biological Effluent Plant  (panta-rei)
    • Less waste water
    • EU Regulated
    • Super efficient and 13 step process to treat all waste water
  • Climate and humidity control facilities
    • Produce in temperature controlled Humidification plant. Which allows the fabric to weave at optimal level.
  • Osthoff Singe finishing machines - best in class finishing machines, german engineering at its best
  • Non-harsh chemical dying
  • No bleaching involved
  • Benzoyl Peroxide Safe
  • No Synthetic Materials

Certifications:

  • Our suppliers:
    • Cotton Leads* certified for sustainable and responsibly grown cotton
    • award winning from both the government of Germany and Egypt
    • cotton is DNA tested and certified before being sold
  • Our manufacturers:
    • SGS UKAS 5965 certified
    • ISO 9001:2008
    • WRAP certified which specifically pertains to their labor standards.
      • Oeko-Tex Certified - no harsh chemicals involved
  • Our Competition:
    • Supporting child labor
    • Poor worker condition
    • Huge impact to the Green House

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

We plan to ship the product in August 2018. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Our sheets are already incredibly affordable. By buying now you're getting access to even LARGER discounts that we'll never offer like this again. You're also helping us build a company with a vision to change the way we all think about sleep.

 

 


 


 

 

What is it? Slumber sheets are premium, 100% Egyptian cotton, breathable percale sheets at an amazing price.
Who created it? Slumber, we're a small team. 
Why should we use it? You want a sweat free, comfy night of sleep? Yeah, thought so.
How much does it cost?  All standard sets are under $100. Premium at an affordable price. We weren't kidding.
Where can we buy it? Online. Direct through us.
What do we get when we order? You get your set and a customary Lavender Sleep Mist.
Why are you crowdfunding? We're crowdfunding to bring our new brand to life and get Slumber sheets out to as many people as possible.

 

Where is it manufactured? Our cotton is sourced from certified and responsibly run farms in Egypt. Our sheets are manufactured by world class and award winning manufacturers in Bangladesh.The Mists are handmade here in the US.
What colors do you offer? We're launching with just white. Help us unlock Ivory/Cream, Stone Grey, and  Midnight Blue.
What sizes do you offer? US standard: Twin, Full, Queen, King
Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet? They are comfy, sleek, crisp.
Which option is best for me? Pick a size that fits your mattress, the number of sets you'll need, and get to it.
Do these Wick moisture and stretch like Spandex and tencel sheets?  Their weave absolutely makes them moisture-wicking, but in order to keep them 100% Egyptian cotton, they don't contain any Spandex, etc. You'll get the normal amount of stretch that high quality cotton provides.

 

How do I set it up? They're sheets? Put your fitted sheet on first (don't worry, we labeled the sides), then the top sheet (if you choose), the pillow cases, and customize to your desire. Spray some mist, get comfy and get to sleeping.
What is a percale weave? Percale is a traditional one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under weave that results in a matte finish with a cool, crisp feel. It results in a very breathable and durable sheet while maximizing the softness of the materials used. This allows our sheets to get softer over time, while lasting a long time and helping regular body temp.
Where are the sleep mists made? Our sleep mists are hand-made here in the US. We only use the finest all-natural ingredients & make them in small batches.
What is the care and cleaning of it? For optimal comfort, machine wash in warm water with a gentle cycle. To whiten sheet, use non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low or dry on a line to minimize wrinkling. Optionally steam iron the sheets on medium heat. (We actually reccommend this)
Do Slumber Sheets wrinkle? We don't use artificial wrinkle-free chemicals in our sheets. We use 100% real cotton, so it will naturally wrinkle. Good news though: a little bit of steam and an hot iron can go a long ways to taking care of any wrinkles.
Does it have an expiry date? Well no, its not exactly food. But we recommend getting new sheets when your old ones start wearing out or if you need new colors.

 

Why Egyptian Cotton? Egyptian cotton is long regarded as the best cotton in the world. The Egyptian climate and the Nile River work to produce really soft, fine extra-long staple cotton unlike anywhere else in the world. Other options are cheaper, but definatley don't feel as good.
Is it machine washable? Yes it is safe to wash in a machine. Not everyone has time to wash by hand.
Is your packaging eco-friendly? You bet! We make it a point. We use recycled polybag mailers and kraft boxes to ship you your sheets. All of our packaging materials are recylcable or reusable.
What certifications do you have? Okeo-Tex 100 certified. Egyptian cotton certified by CEA (Cotton Egypt Association).
How durable is it? We've tested for over 32 rough wash cycles and got minimal wear & tear. Generally should last you 3 years with proper care.
What is Oeko Tex Certification? Our sheets are OEKO-TEX certified, meaning that they were found free of harmful substances and chemicals for every step of the process.
What do you mean by certified Egyptian Cotton? It means we only use 100% real Egyptian cotton that is responsibly sourced and is dna tested and certified by the Cotton Egypt Association.
What thread count are Slumber sheets? Thread count actually isn't the best way to measure the quality of your sheets – in fact, it’s a marketing term from the 50’s. There is no real standardized procedure to measure it as well, some companies will talk about the number of yarn and other will talk about the number of threads in an square inch. We put our sheet construction through a variety of test to find the optimal combination for your sleep. We found that 300 single-ply threads work the best and so our sheets are 300 thread count. 
Are there any risks associated with use? Only if you are allergic to either cotton or lavender, this might be problematic. Otherwise its safe.

 

Shipping

When does shipping begin?

August 2018.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? About 3-5 days after you get shipping confirmation.
 
Where does it ship? Slumber sheets will ship worldwide. Shipping prices vary and can be found inside your perk when your country is selected. 
How much is shipping? Free in the US. Discounted shipping to the rest of the world.
 
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Great, give us a shout and lets here what you have in mind.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? Crowdfunding is sales tax free in the United States, however you
may have to pay customs for international backers.
What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today? That you have a great sleep and demand we get you sheets and sleep mist faster?

 

Can I order multiple sleep mist? Not right now. We have very limited number of sleep mist. But in the future we will make sure you can continue getting more of your favorite sleep mist.
What is your refund policy? Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.
How do I choose more than one reward?  To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester.  Only Backers are eligible to become Beta Testers. Pre-order your unit first, and then send us an email with your order confirmation number to receive more info.
Why do I have to wait longer than usual? This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact? Press: press@getlsumber.com
Investment Inquiries: hello@getslumber.com
Support: help@getslumber.com

Our cotton is sourced from certified and responsibly run farms in Egypt. Our sheets are manufactured by world class and award winning manufacturers in Bangladesh.The Mists are handmade here in the US.


What colors do you offer?
We're launching with just white. Help us unlock Ivory/Cream, Stone Grey, and  Midnight Blue.


What sizes do you offer?
US standard: Twin, Full, Queen, King


Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet?
They are comfy, sleek, crisp.


Which option is best for me?
Pick a size that fits your mattress, the number of sets you'll need, and get to it.


Do these Wick moisture and stretch like Spandex and tencel sheets? 
Their weave absolutely makes them moisture-wicking, but in order to keep them 100% Egyptian cotton, they don't contain any Spandex, etc. You'll get the normal amount of stretch that high quality cotton provides.

 

How do I set it up?
They're sheets? Put your fitted sheet on first (don't worry, we labeled the sides), then the top sheet (if you choose), the pillow cases, and customize to your desire. Spray some mist, get comfy and get to sleeping.


What is a percale weave?
Percale is a traditional one-yarn-over and one-yarn-under weave that results in a matte finish with a cool, crisp feel. It results in a very breathable and durable sheet while maximizing the softness of the materials used. This allows our sheets to get softer over time, while lasting a long time and helping regular body temp.


Where are the sleep mists made?
Our sleep mists are hand-made here in the US. We only use the finest all-natural ingredients & make them in small batches.


What is the care and cleaning of it?
For optimal comfort, machine wash in warm water with a gentle cycle. To whiten sheet, use non-chlorine bleach. Tumble dry low or dry on a line to minimize wrinkling. Optionally steam iron the sheets on medium heat. (We actually reccommend this)


Do Slumber Sheets wrinkle?
We don't use artificial wrinkle-free chemicals in our sheets. We use 100% real cotton, so it will naturally wrinkle. Good news though: a little bit of steam and an hot iron can go a long ways to taking care of any wrinkles.


Does it have an expiry date?
Well no, its not exactly food. But we recommend getting new sheets when your old ones start wearing out or if you need new colors.

 

Why Egyptian Cotton?
Egyptian cotton is long regarded as the best cotton in the world. The Egyptian climate and the Nile River work to produce really soft, fine extra-long staple cotton unlike anywhere else in the world. Other options are cheaper, but definatley don't feel as good.


Is it machine washable?
Yes it is safe to wash in a machine. Not everyone has time to wash by hand.


Is your packaging eco-friendly?
You bet! We make it a point. We use recycled polybag mailers and kraft boxes to ship you your sheets. All of our packaging materials are recylcable or reusable.


What certifications do you have?
Okeo-Tex 100 certified. Egyptian cotton certified by CEA (Cotton Egypt Association).


How durable is it?
We've tested for over 32 rough wash cycles and got minimal wear & tear. Generally should last you 3 years with proper care.


What is Oeko Tex Certification?
Our sheets are OEKO-TEX certified, meaning that they were found free of harmful substances and chemicals for every step of the process.


What do you mean by certified Egyptian Cotton?
It means we only use 100% real Egyptian cotton that is responsibly sourced and is dna tested and certified by the Cotton Egypt Association.


What thread count are Slumber sheets?
Thread count actually isn't the best way to measure the quality of your sheets – in fact, it’s a marketing term from the 50’s. There is no real standardized procedure to measure it as well, some companies will talk about the number of yarn and other will talk about the number of threads in an square inch. We put our sheet construction through a variety of test to find the optimal combination for your sleep. We found that 300 single-ply threads work the best and so our sheets are 300 thread count. 


Are there any risks associated with use?
Only if you are allergic to either cotton or lavender, this might be problematic. Otherwise its safe.

 Shipping

When does shipping begin?
August 2018.


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
About 3-5 days after you get shipping confirmation. 


Where does it ship?
Slumber sheets will ship worldwide. Shipping prices vary and can be found inside your perk when your country is selected. 


How much is shipping?
Free in the US. Discounted shipping to the rest of the world. 


I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Great, give us a shout and lets here what you have in mind.


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Crowdfunding is sales tax free in the United States, however youmay have to pay customs for international backers.


What are the risks & challenges of getting the device today?
That you have a great sleep and demand we get you sheets and sleep mist faster?

 

Can I order multiple sleep mist?
Not right now. We have very limited number of sleep mist. But in the future we will make sure you can continue getting more of your favorite sleep mist.


What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.


How do I choose more than one reward? 
To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester. 
Only Backers are eligible to become Beta Testers. Pre-order your unit first, and then send us an email with your order confirmation number to receive more info.


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build the device, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
Press: press@getlsumber.comInvestment Inquiries: hello@getslumber.comSupport: help@getslumber.com

story:
יקרות ויקרים, 

גיליונתן צריכות להגיע לדרום אמריקה - לעוף על כנפי השכינה, לשתות מצוף הבריאה, לטעום מפירות הגן וכל הג'ז הזה... אבל וואלה, הטיסה יקרה, ואנחנו זקוקות לעזרתכן (הטקסט מנוסח בלשון אישה אבל מיועד לנשים ולגברים כאחד)

אז יאללה - we want your money 

לתשומת ליבכן

  • אנחנו מציינות סכומים מומלצים אבל מעודדות כל אחת ואחד לשים סכום כאוות נפשה 
  • הסכום שהגדרנו נמוך ממה שצריך לגייס אבל כדי שיוותרו לנו על כל מני עמלות עדיף להגדיר יעד נמוך ולעקוף אותו מאשר יעד גבוה ולא לעמוד בו. ובקיצור, גם אם הגענו ל$2000 אין שום סיבה בעולם להפסיק לתת! מחיר כרטיס ליחיד עומד על בערך $1500 כך שהסכום האמיתי שצריכך לגייס הוא $3000
  • הקמפיין ייסגר בסוף החודש ולא תהיה אפשרות לשים כסף לאחר מכן.
  • החיוב יתבצע בכרטיסי אשראי, ועל כן ייתכנו עמלות של עד שלושה אחוזים על כל סכום שתחברו לתת 

קולולולולוולוללו

story:
OK, That sounds awesome. But why?

We love the Aeropress® coffee maker; it's been in our families morning routine for many years. If you own one, you've almost definitely encountered that moment when you've made a coffee for a friend or partner, and then you've got to re-do the whole process for yourself before you can enjoy them together; with the 2POUR®, you no longer have that problem.  

 

 

Features of the 2POUR

Reusable. We believe in buying once, buying better. That doesn't mean it has to be expensive either; we are committed to ensuring everything we design is made to last and at an affordable cost for all. The 2POUR® has been designed to last a long time - meaning you'll only ever have to buy one, that is, unless you're buying one for a friend too.

Washable. We designed the 2POUR® not only for a great coffee brewing experience but we also made it super easy to clean. The product is a single-unit design with no removable parts, resulting in a quick and easy cleaning experience with most household cleaning cloths. 

Easy to use. The Aeropress® is one of the easiest products we've ever used to make coffee and the 2POUR® is no different. It was really important for us to design the 2POUR® so that when combined with the Aeropress® it has little to no impact on the original brewing experience; meaning, 'less fussing, more sipping! - but this time, with friends!

 

 

Design

When designing the 2POUR® our main goal was to ensure that it remained in line with the same principles of the Aeropress® coffee maker; harvesting smooth, rich coffee in just a few minutes. 

 

 

We've taken very subtle design influences from both the portafilter (used on commercial coffee machines) and the Chemex style pour-over brewer - resulting in a new, but familiar 2POUR® which is equally at home on your countertop. 

 

 

As we've already mentioned, using the 2POUR® impacts on your Aeropress® routine very little and requires minimal setup; all you need to do is put your Aeropress® on top, it's that easy! 

 

 

Wait, the Aeropress® only holds 250ml of water?

I know what you're thinking, the Aeropress® can only make one cup for a reason - it only holds 250ml of water, right? Well, the short version is, yes!  

Our research showed that there is already a demand for a two cup strength method using the Aeropress®, so we've taken the time to perfect this method so that you can extract the same great tasting coffee from one plunge.   

 

Why are we here now?

Thanks to the backers funding the start of production on Kickstarter, there is no risk to you. We are launching this on Indiegogo to give people that missed out on the Kickstarter to still purchase the item at the same price of £13.00 (RRP £16.99) before it arrives later this year. The mold has been started so our timelines should be close to our expectations.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the Aeropress® as much as us, share this to help spread the word. Your input is appreciated, immensely.

story:
Q: Why do I care about a QR Code reader?

A: More and more, you see these codes appearing. They are showing up everywhere; in print, on shelves in stores and even online. We realize that a lot of them are leading you to nowhere land (more information pages or some even to “sign me up” forms). BUT, that is about to change.

Virtual Grocery Store: http://youtu.be/nJVoYsBym88 

And, if you think it isn’t going to happen in the US, think again: http://www.terillion.com/reviews/target-leverages-qr-codes-in-store-to-drive-holiday-sales/   

Q: What makes your app so special?

A: Three things:

Complete-

unlike most QR readers that just scan and launch your browser, ours, in addition to a lightening fast scanner, has a full shopping cart and payment processing built in for the complete buying process in one step

100% mobile shopping experience-

unlike the two video above examples where the experience is tied to some backend website, we are bringing the buying process right to your phone. You save your cart on your phone. You scan and record your information on your phone and carry out the transaction on your phone.

Use anywhere-

our platform is available and open to all advertisers. You don't need to have multiple apps on your phone (you aren’t going to buy Target stuff with your Wal-Mart app and vice versa).

 

Smart.er QR Code for Smart.er Shoppers

Smart.er QR Code

A Smart.er QR Code is enabled for instant purchasing from your smartphone via the Gratify Smart.er QR Code Reader for Shopping app. 

You can purchase our app for your phone and share with you friend and family on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter or via email.

THANKS from the Gratify team. www.gratify-me.com

Show off your QR code savy and wear your very own 

Apparel Item Design - Ultra soft line of materials, choice of colors, size and sleeve for T-Shirts, Polo and Hoodie images are lapel style. With the Smart.er QR Codes on the apparel, they are uniquely your own and you can change where the QR code directs people to as often as you like. Check the Gallery tab for Apparel Size Chart PDF file.

Apparel Design

If you have any questions that we can answer for you, please don't hesitate to drop us an email. Someone will get back to you as soon as possible. Email to: kickstarterquestions@gratify-me.com

Have some fun with our out takes: 

http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=vb.368190706550412&type=2

story:
With Vray, simply remember three numbers: 1, 5, & 99.9. Don't waste minutes or even hours sterilizing your belongings, Vray is capable of eradicating up to 99.9% of bacteria and germs in 1 sterilization session that lasts only 5 seconds in duration.

Vray is an optimized UV sterilizer developed to decontaminate all object and surface. Short-wave UV-C light has been commonly used in the sterilization of medical appliances, food and water purification since the mid-20th century. Vray is the optimized device to apply this technology to everyday household belongings while integrating the necessary safety features to accommodate everyday use.

You may be shocked by how many Bacteria, Germs and other Micro-organisms live on your everyday belongings. Even in a well-cleaned home, these micro-organisms are hard to detect as they are invisible to the human eye.

Germs live to thrive and multiply in any way they can. Did you know that when you flush, the water current can spread toilet-originated germs as far as 6 meters away? You need to control the hidden & unknown dangers with Vray. 

Equipped with a rechargeable battery, Vray can be used for three hours with one full charge. Cordless and lightweight at 505grams(1.11lb), Vray’s portable design allows for sterilization anywhere around the home, car or office.

Also capable of hands-free operation, Vray's inner curve allows for 5 cm of space beneath the UV-C light. This 5 cm distance is the ideal range for optimized sterilization effect. Designed to maximize sterilization in a short duration, eradicate germs effectively with Vray.

Vray's enhanced sterilization is provided through a high reflectivity of reflector that directs and focuses Philips-certified UV-C lamps with scientifically proven germicidal effect.

Vray's sterilization area enlarges the further you pull Vray away from the object. Sterilization area is marked by the spread of Vray's soft blue light. Sterilize even large objects in seconds with Vray.

Due to the high-intensity of UV-C wavelengths, direct exposure to humans or animals for excessive periods of time can be harmful. Vray prevents exposure to the skin and eyes with patented safety features to ensure exposure only to the sterilization target area by user's operating intention.

SAFE MODE (ON): Safe mode is activated as soon as Vray is turned on, it means default status is safe mode. In safe mode, Vray will automatically turn off when tilted 30 degrees in either direction. Equipped with an safety sensor, Vray can detect when there is danger of light being exposed towards the user.

SAFE MODE (OFF): For more user convenience, safe mode can also be turned off with the click of a sensor button for 2 seconds. When safe mode is off, the light will stay on even if Vray is held at an angle. This is to ensure Vray can sterilize any location and all-around even larger objects.

Vray equipped with UV-C safe lamps with an anti-shatter coating. Safe lamp will break only internally so there are no glass fragments to clean up separately.

Given that Vray is equipped with a glass UV-C lamp, like any glass product, it has the potential to break upon impact. Broken glass can be hazardous as tiny glass shards can be difficult to detect and clean up. By using anti-shatter glass, this hazard can be avoided as there are no glass fragments to worry about. With Safe lamp, clean-up is also simple as you can simply throw away the glass lamp as a whole.

 

 

 

Since childhood, I have suffered from atopy and have a particular sensitivity to allergens. Given my hypersensitive condition, I have bought a wide range of sterilizers over the year. Based on personal experience, I found that sterilizers often suffer from two main problems. 

At first there was size issues, with sterilizers limited to small objects forced to sterilize in bulky boxes. Then came along sterilizing bats, but they were unwieldy given that you had to constantly hold them & there were no safety features to prevent UV exposure.

Addressing these pain points, we developed Vray, a user experience-focused multi-sterilizer.

Initial design included a handle for portable use. Legs could be attached to the base to allow for hands-free operation.  First re-design solves the issue of stress to the wrist caused by the narrow handle. New convex design is less unwieldy and requires no extra steps for hands-free operation by leaving a space beneath the light for sterilization.  Vray top surface modified from flat to curved to provide easier grip. Unnecessary lamps were removed to save battery life. For more even weight balance, the internal battery and corresponding charging port were moved. At the last, Non-slip grooves added for fingertips to enhance hand-grip even further. 

The production team of Vray has been going to work at the mold & injection plant leaving our familiar office behind. Checking the quality of each Vray one-by-one, the main body of Vray was coated with a matte finish to enhance grip-feel while imbuing a high-quality sheen to Vray. Undergoing 6 prints, the Vray tag and warning disclaimer label were produced and added to the main body. Also production team was charged with button development. A thorough material quality inspection was performed on the silicon production before moving on to assembly.

The Vray design team was in the process of packaging checks. They decided that a cleaner and simpler design would be more suitable for Vray. Upon multiple re-designs, you can see below the end product of their hard work. As you can see, much sweat and hard work went into making Vray. Vray begun delivery to kickstarter backer at the end of 2017. 

 

 

Shipping Details

You will be charged different shipping cost based on delivery country, on top of the price of item. Please check the total price for your contribution. Be aware that any fees required by the shipping company are not shipping costs, but are duties and taxes, which vary from country to country, charged by your government and we, PRIMETECH Co., Ltd., are not responsible for those extra fees. Also, shipping fees are non-refundable. We need at least 5 working days notice of cancellation and refund before shipping the perks. Scheduled shipping day is the last day of every month.
