Broken glass can be hazardous as tiny glass shards can be difficult to detect and clean up. By using anti-shatter glass, this hazard can be avoided as there are no glass fragments to worry about. With Safe lamp, clean-up is also simple as you can simply throw away the glass lamp as a whole.  

 
Since childhood, I have suffered from atopy and have a particular sensitivity to allergens. Given my hypersensitive condition, I have bought a wide range of sterilizers over the year. Based on personal experience, I found that sterilizers often suffer from two main problems. At first there was size issues, with sterilizers limited to small objects forced to sterilize in bulky boxes. Then came along sterilizing bats, but they were unwieldy given that you had to constantly hold them & there were no safety features to prevent UV exposure.Addressing these pain points, we developed Vray, a user experience-focused multi-sterilizer.Initial design included a handle for portable use. Legs could be attached to the base to allow for hands-free operation.  First re-design solves the issue of stress to the wrist caused by the narrow handle. New convex design is less unwieldy and requires no extra steps for hands-free operation by leaving a space beneath the light for sterilization.  Vray top surface modified from flat to curved to provide easier grip. Unnecessary lamps were removed to save battery life. For more even weight balance, the internal battery and corresponding charging port were moved. At the last, Non-slip grooves added for fingertips to enhance hand-grip even further. The production team of Vray has been going to work at the mold & injection plant leaving our familiar office behind. Checking the quality of each Vray one-by-one, the main body of Vray was coated with a matte finish to enhance grip-feel while imbuing a high-quality sheen to Vray. Undergoing 6 prints, the Vray tag and warning disclaimer label were produced and added to the main body. Also production team was charged with button development. A thorough material quality inspection was performed on the silicon production before moving on to assembly.The Vray design team was in the process of packaging checks. They decided that a cleaner and simpler design would be more suitable for Vray. Upon multiple re-designs, you can see below the end product of their hard work. As you can see, much sweat and hard work went into making Vray. Vray begun delivery to kickstarter backer at the end of 2017.   Shipping DetailsYou will be charged different shipping cost based on delivery country, on top of the price of item. Please check the total price for your contribution. Be aware that any fees required by the shipping company are not shipping costs, but are duties and taxes, which vary from country to country, charged by your government and we, PRIMETECH Co., Ltd., are not responsible for those extra fees. Also, shipping fees are non-refundable. We need at least 5 working days notice of cancellation and refund before shipping the perks. Scheduled shipping day is the last day of every month.

story:
Don’t you hate changing your sheets and doing laundry? We all do! Especially students!

Everyone has always joked about the fact that students hate changing their (gross) dirty sheets. Studies show that students who sleep on a clean sheet experience a major difference when it comes to health, productivity and overall wellbeing.

It was time to do something about this real problem. BUT NOW THERE IS A SOLUTION…

What if you could have a soft, comfy, clean fitted sheet with 7 peel away top layers that would last almost an entire semester?

Now you can… Just peel off the ew! And sleep on the new! ™ 

Instantly, reveal a new cotton-like waterproof sheet to sleep on no matter what happens!  No need to hassle with the time and the expense of changing, washing, drying, and wrestling with the corners every time you soil your sheets. And forget about those stains that never come out…

Dirty Sheets Are A Serious Problem:

The average person spends 1/3 of their life in bed sleeping. This doesn't even account for the time you use your bed for other purposes, such as eating, drinking, studying, watching TV, reading,,guest use…..and other activities!  In addition, illness, incontinence, toilet training, and a variety of other situations may require you to change your sheets more often.

Everyday particles of dirt from sweat to dead skin and hair, as well as bedbugs and dust mites, among other creatures, reside in your sheets. Even showering or wearing clean sleepwear doesn't negate all the dirt that accumulates on your sheet!.

Bed sheets are expensive and you usually have to purchase several to have one available when laundering and changing them.

Your old conventional options all have drawbacks:

1. Do It Yourself - You have to take your sheet to the laundromat. 

It is expensive and time consuming and you have to wrestle the sheet back onto your bed. Your bed is ‘naked’ this whole time and can’t be used until you do the laundry.

2. Use An Outside Service - You have to change your sheets, pull them off, find a clean spare and hassle with making the bed. 

The soiled sheet sits in your laundry bin until you drop it off or a service picks it up, does your laundry and returns it to you. This service is expensive and time consuming and you may have to change your sheet again before you get the laundry back.  

3. You Do Nothing  - You sleep in filth. 

Laundry is expensive, a hassle, and NOT environmentally friendly with all of the water, chemical detergents and electricity used. More importantly, many times the stains don’t even come out and you have to throw the sheet away and your mattress can be ruined as well!

OUR INGENIOUS SOLUTION:

Instantly, make your bed and sleep on a comfy, soft, waterproof fitted sheet and if it gets soiled, simply peel away that layer to reveal a new and clean layer below.  


AfreSHeet is a patent pending design for comfort and ease of use to make your life simpler, healthier, and happier by allowing you to sleep better. Made of soft cotton-like materials, just peel off the soiled layer and throw it away. AfreSHeet is recyclable and each sheet comes with

7 layers of happiness. Never sleep in a dirty bed again! We are developing special manufacturing methods to keep our price for just one “afresheet (7 peel-away sheet layers) ” to 25% less than most quality bed sheets.

We Need Your Support

We need this funding to manufacture the first AfreSHeets and continue our search for the finest materials. There are many unique challenges to creating a new category of product.  We are constantly working to optimize the design to create the best product possible. For those of you out there who are not college students (maybe still wishing you were) we will also be making AfreSHeets in other bed sizes. With this funding, we can make this happen even sooner, so you can also experience the luxury of AfreSHeet by sleeping in clean bed sheet instantly!

Sneak peek of the exclusive AfreSHeet sleeping eye mask:

story:
"...the most exciting innovation for wooden toys in a generation."

"Amazing!! I need another baby"

"I'd be happy to have no toys in the house except MURO"

MURO is the World's First Modular Activity Wall.  This multi-functional activity wall allows you to add or remove toys whenever you like, and with a big range of toys to choose from, you'll be able to build a unique wooden toy personally suited to support your child's development.  Not only that, but MURO is a beautiful piece of furniture that looks great in any home.

So far we have great range of toys to choose from, all based on tried and tested classics and developed with educational psychologists to gradually develop key skills whilst they play.  

All the toys use a simple plug-and-play system that allow them to be placed anywhere on the board, meaning you create your own MURO.  Whatever your children like to play with you will be able to create a truly unique play space made up of toys specifically focused on teaching different developmental skills.

When your MURO arrives all you have to do is find the perfect spot to attach it to the wall (all fixings included) and you can start creating your Activity Board straight away.

All the toys use the same simple plug-and-play mechanism, so creating, tweaking or completely rebuilding your MURO are as fun as playing with it.  Whatever your kids are into (at that particular moment!) we're bound to have something that will keep them entertained.  And as they grow older and develop, you can change the toys to keep them stimulated and learning.

The plugs have been carefully designed to attach toys with just the right amount of force so that they will have to wait until they're a bit older (around 36 months) before they can move toys around themselves. This keeps toys in one place when they are younger and keeps it interesting as they grow up.

 

 

 

​

story:
Thanks for supporting our campaign! 

Our Indiegogo campaign is now closed and we'll be taking all future orders on our website.

Please visit us there at:

www.polycade.com

For any questions, we can also be reached at info@polycade.com.

--------------------------

 

Check out this recap of our live stream with Atari and Chuck-E-Cheese creator Nolan Bushnell! Watch the full version here.
 
 

 

The Polycade Arcade Gaming Software (AGS) makes PC gaming easy, and enables you to play the games you love console style, or arcade style.


Whether you dabble in games or spend every free moment playing, Polycade makes your gaming experience painless and magical!

 

 

 

Download the Polycade Arcade Gaming Software and play with your existing Windows computer!

You can use an Xbox Controller, our eZpZ Controller, or our Arcade Controller to play!  

 

High quality, simple, and doesn't break the bank!

 

 

 

 

The Polycade Game Store allows you to purchase and download games. We focus on two areas:

 

 

Can't find what you're looking for in the Polycade Game Store? You can also play games from other platforms, including Steam, GOG, and all your favorite retro consoles!

 


 

 

 


A premium wireless arcade controller that's also compatible with our Panel Swap system


 

 

Play Polycade from the comfort of your couch!

The Polycade 2600 is an easy plug-and-play system - just add your TV! Choose from a variety of controllers to play with.

We have lovingly dubbed this product the "2600" as an homage to Atari!

 

 

Our arcades include everything - screen, controls, computer, speakers, etc!

Magnetic Decals!

Chief Keef with his Squadcade!

Street Fighter match with Kalin White

 

 

More details about our software!

 

Read on to learn more about the rad features we've got in store for launch!

 

 

When logged in, you'll enjoy some great features:

  • Your high scores will be recorded!
  • Games you own are playable on any Polycade you sign into!
  • Continue from your last save on any Polycade!
  • Customize the look and feel of the interface with unique skins

 

Excitement reaches maximum levels when you pull out 4 controllers and game with your favorite people!

 

We rate games with characteristics that will help you find the titles you want to play.


Back in the golden age of the arcades, high scores had a particularly gratifying feeling. Our unique leaderboard system allows you to see the scores that matter to you!

 

Built-in support for your favorite platforms!

 

Playing your favorite classic games is easier than ever. Our software will help you add games from retro consoles. Polycade AGS comes with emulators bundled and already configured - saving even the most tech savvy users hours of research, mapping, testing, and meta-tagging.

As of now, we support the retro platforms mentioned above, and our configuration options allow you to add additional emulators as you see fit.

 

Polycade AGS features a unique achievement system that we call Patches. Patches are earned through a wide variety of actions - from earning the highest score in your city to real-life quests like “Play on 10 different Polycades!”. The first 100 players to achieve each patch will receive a free, physical cloth patch in the mail!

Backing any tier $25 and above gets you the exclusive Launch Team Patch!

 

If you leave your Polycade system idle, it will switch into screensaver mode. Polycade AGS includes a variety of animated artwork from artists around the world!

Alternatively, you can set your system to launch a game when idle.

See below for some examples of screensavers that are included with Polycade AGS!

Screensaver art - "Miami" by AbueloRetrowave 

Screensaver art - "Sunset" by Grabrela Arts

 

To commemorate the launch of Polycade AGS, we're including several exclusive extras! Backing any perk $25 or above will get you all 3 extras, including your first Patch achievement!

Launched with a Kickstarter campaign in November of 2015, Polycade was founded with the vision of a gaming platform designed to be social, approachable, and ubiquitous.

 

The Polycade Team is made up of 10 diverse and talented individuals and are led by co-founders Jake Galler and Tyler Bushnell. We come together everyday on a mission to make gaming as welcoming and inclusive as the golden age of the arcade...and we play lots of games together.

 

When we launched our Kickstarter campaign back in 2015, we hadn't yet found our ideal manufacturing partner. Two years ago we found the right partner to aid us in building our dreams, and we've been working up to this launch together.

While it may look like we're biting off a lot here, we've already built nearly everything you see offered in this campaign. The vast majority of the components used in each of these products we have been using in the Polycade Lux for years. We built 11 Squadcades a few years ago - with a few minor updates the new version will be ready for production. The electronics of the Polycade 2600 have been tested at length, and we will see a physical prototype of the enclosure in February.

Though the scope of these timelines are manageable, manufacturing always carries the risk of delays. Shipments of components can get lost, unexpected numbers can stress availability. Whatever may happen, our team is standing by to keep you informed and find the best solution around any roadblock.

story:
Existing detergents on the market are not completely soluble in water and either do not clean our clothes completely or they leave residual detergent that can lead to allergic reactions which can be harmful to our health.

Getting rid of any hazardous materials, your skin will be protected from any harsh chemicals while being gentle on the delicate skin of infants and children. The anionic particles in the detergent addresses the lime/iron contents of your water all the way to the cloth and your skin, protecting you from these chemicals and minerals. Also, since there are no hazardous materials in our detergent, Smacle will prevent any damage to the interior/exterior of your machine.


Sparkling Technology

With Smacle's countless foam generated bubbles, when the bubbles come in contact with the fabric's cells, a reacion occurs that destroys dirt and other contanimating items. This action promotes  a chemical reaction in the detergent that increases the dispersion effect and dirt and any unseeable foreign matter attached to the cloth is washed out completely. Just like the invention of liquid detergent and its innovation into the the detergent industry with its unparred emulsifying power for washing clothes, Smacle is the first in the world of its kind and will revolutionize the detergent industry.



Using less than 1/2 the amount of traditional detergent, Smacle generates more cleaning agents and bubbles to demonstrate its outstanding capability for washing large loads of laundy while using less detergent.




The human ear can only process certain wavelengths of ultrasound (16Hz~20kHz?). Most people will have seen glasses cleaners of ultrasound machines used for pregnancy. The reason that ultrasound waves are used for cleaning is because ultrasound waves generated in the water has the ability to remove objects that are stuck to the surface of an obect.

INNOVATION OF DETERGENT!

Smacle is the world's first detergent to use ultrasonic cleaning technology. Most ultrasonic cleaners out there require the use of a separate machine or device in order to do so. Smacle is an ultrasonic cleaner that doesn't need a separate device and is all combined into our ultrasonic detergent.


Detergent has been a neccesity in our lives for decades, especially in powder form > the only change has been the addition in liquit detergent. In addition, the reality is that detergents can have an adverse effect on the environment or personal health. Can we solve these problems? Is their a way to overcome? These are the questions that Smacle was developed to address. Ultrasonic cleaners were the first thing we thing we discovered in our research to address these issues while reducing the amount of detergent used to lean. For 13 month, the efforts of our team were combined to create an effective foaming agent that would clean fabric effectively while being harmless to the fabric and to us.



Smacle is an environmental research and development company that specializes life-friendly products. Our vision is the realization of creative ideas that benefit both people and the planet.

Smacle's name come from the derivtaion of Smart & Cleaner. Being a smart detergent means, unlike conventional detergents, Smacle does not use any hazardous materials and uses the least amount of chemical surfactants as possible. Smacle uses extracted ingredients from plants, fruits, etc. producuring the safest detergent possible. By reducing the amount of hazardous materials and chemical surfactants, Smacle maximizes the safety to people and the environment. Also, it reduces the amount of land and water contamination by reducing the amount of overall detergent you use. Smacle's strong point is that by using our detergent, you're watching out for the health of your family as well as helping protect the environment.


  • Foaming composition for washing or cleansing aid and preparation method
  • Using an active yeast solution in combination with Gingko biloba for the manufacturing and creating of Smacle
  • Using carbon activated palladium catalysts methodology for the manufacturing in combination with a flourinated hydrocarbon chlorofluorocarbons formula







Hi-Seoul Brand company, Lightors has received recognition for being a promising and representative small-medium enterprise by the city of Seoul.

Only those companies that offer globally competitive innovative technological products are able to receive this special recognition in hopes of expanding Korea's domestic export enterprise.


Smacle greatest feature is that it's a foaming detergent that is 100% water soluble. It's a huge advantage as a product, but also vulnerable to moisture and that is a disadvantage. With that said, product transport, packaging, etc. will have to be thought through and may raise the cost of production. By trying to create an eco-friendly product that is also harmless to the human body, replacing the chemical elements and raw materials used for disinfecting clothing has come with its technical difficulties and comes with its financial risks and costs. The stick packaging is also new to detergents and therefore requires the research and creation of new packaging that will not react with the detergent itself. However, our Smacle team has been working diligently over the past year to create stable packaging for transport and moisture exposure using trial and error as well as altering the shape of the crystals used in Smacle to minimize the chance of reducing the effectiveness of Smacle after being transported. In addition, using natural extracts as previously mentioned, in addition to orange, coconut extracts, etc. we ensure and have received certified test report and patents that our products' cleaning effectiveness is same, if not better, than conventional detergents. To address the stick packaging issues, we have equipped our own facilities to be able to create our own packaging, ruling out any issues with outsourcing a crucial part of our product delivery. Our team guarantees that Smacle will be everything it's expected to be and will ensure proper delivery of Smacle to all of our backers.


How much can one stick of Smacle handle?

- For a standard drum/front loading machine, 1 stick of Smacle can handle a 10kg load. If larger than 10kg, then 2 sticks can be used. If the 10kg machine is not full, then only half of a stick is needed and the rest can be saved for later use. For standard/top loading machines, a 100 liter machine that's full should use 2 sticks, an 80 liter machine will take 1 stick, and lower capacity machines (50 liters) should only take 1/2. If you hand wash your laundry, a 5 liter load will only need 1/4 of a stick and should only soaked for 30 minutes. Smacle works will with any washing mchine. 

What if I want to use less than 1 stick?

- In the case where you have a small load of laundry, simply fold, clamp, tape, the   end of the stick and use it next time. 

Storage Conditions

- Because our product is sensitive to moisture, it is important to keep Smacle's exposure to moisture or humidity minimized. Please keep away from direct sunlight and extreme temepratures and keep indoors. Please keep out of children's reach. 

Can the package be recycle?

- Yes, the packaging is recyclable. It falls under the same category as plastic bags, etc. 

How much do I save by using Smacle?

- A standard load of laundry using a 10kg machine uses anywhere between 40g-80g of detergent. With Smacle you only need about half and in some cases, only a quarter. 

How much is a spoonful?

- A measuring spoon will equal about 20g, which is the same amount as a Smacle stick.

Isn't there any residual detergen when using cold water?

- There is absolutely no soap residue left even when using cold water, but will take longer to dissolve than when using hot warmer. As long as the amount of water is enough to dissolve Smacle, then it will completely dissolve. 

Is there any bleach or fabric softener?

- Smacle is different from standard alkaline detergents and is mild enough where where a separate fabric softener is not needed. However, if you wish to use a particular scented softener, then that is up to you. We are currently developing a new product to replace the need for bleach. 

Is there any risk of color bleeding (dye transfer)?

- Color bleeding will not occur. As long as the garment label does not contain any   special instruction for washing, then there is nothing to worry about. 

How do I prevent moisture exposure? What do I do if this happens?

- Once the product has been opened and used, attention must be paid to sealing the product again in between uses. If possible, transferring the contents to a sealed container will be helpful. 

How effective is the foaming feature?

- The combination of water and Smacle creates a super effective foaming solution that removes the hidden dirty in your clothing using ultra fine bubble and ultrasound techniques. Also, this removes any detergent residue to protect your skin and reduce pollution. 

Can Smacle can be placed together with clothing in the machine?

- Yes, Smacle can be poured directly into the machine. Smacle will become foam on contact with the water and not adhere to your clothing. 

Can Smacle be used for hand washing or to clean other products?

- Because Smacle is harmless to the human body, hand washing is permissible. It can also be used to wash shoes, appliances, the kitchen, etc. Because our product contains baking soda, it's effective in removing debri, oil stains. 

After washing, is there a particular scent?

- Because Smacle was meant to be harmless to human skin, we left out any additional chemicals that may scent our product. But because our products contain natural ingredients from oranges and other product, there may be be a subtle hint after washing.

What if I want to become a distributor?

- Please contact lightorstube@gmail.com with any questions.

Is your product patented?

- Yes, we have registered domestic and international patents. Please contactlightorstube@gmail.com with any questions.
story_txt:
Existing detergents on the market are not completely soluble in water and either do not clean our clothes completely or they leave residual detergent that can lead to allergic reactions which can be harmful to our health.Getting rid of any hazardous materials, your skin will be protected from any harsh chemicals while being gentle on the delicate skin of infants and children. The anionic particles in the detergent addresses the lime/iron contents of your water all the way to the cloth and your skin, protecting you from these chemicals and minerals. Also, since there are no hazardous materials in our detergent, Smacle will prevent any damage to the interior/exterior of your machine.Sparkling TechnologyWith Smacle's countless foam generated bubbles, when the bubbles come in contact with the fabric's cells, a reacion occurs that destroys dirt and other contanimating items. This action promotes  a chemical reaction in the detergent that increases the dispersion effect and dirt and any unseeable foreign matter attached to the cloth is washed out completely. Just like the invention of liquid detergent and its innovation into the the detergent industry with its unparred emulsifying power for washing clothes, Smacle is the first in the world of its kind and will revolutionize the detergent industry.Using less than 1/2 the amount of traditional detergent, Smacle generates more cleaning agents and bubbles to demonstrate its outstanding capability for washing large loads of laundy while using less detergent.The human ear can only process certain wavelengths of ultrasound (16Hz~20kHz?). Most people will have seen glasses cleaners of ultrasound machines used for pregnancy. The reason that ultrasound waves are used for cleaning is because ultrasound waves generated in the water has the ability to remove objects that are stuck to the surface of an obect.INNOVATION OF DETERGENT!Smacle is the world's first detergent to use ultrasonic cleaning technology. Most ultrasonic cleaners out there require the use of a separate machine or device in order to do so. Smacle is an ultrasonic cleaner that doesn't need a separate device and is all combined into our ultrasonic detergent.Detergent has been a neccesity in our lives for decades, especially in powder form > the only change has been the addition in liquit detergent. In addition, the reality is that detergents can have an adverse effect on the environment or personal health. Can we solve these problems? Is their a way to overcome? These are the questions that Smacle was developed to address. Ultrasonic cleaners were the first thing we thing we discovered in our research to address these issues while reducing the amount of detergent used to lean. For 13 month, the efforts of our team were combined to create an effective foaming agent that would clean fabric effectively while being harmless to the fabric and to us.Smacle is an environmental research and development company that specializes life-friendly products. Our vision is the realization of creative ideas that benefit both people and the planet.Smacle's name come from the derivtaion of Smart & Cleaner. Being a smart detergent means, unlike conventional detergents, Smacle does not use any hazardous materials and uses the least amount of chemical surfactants as possible. Smacle uses extracted ingredients from plants, fruits, etc. producuring the safest detergent possible. By reducing the amount of hazardous materials and chemical surfactants, Smacle maximizes the safety to people and the environment. Also, it reduces the amount of land and water contamination by reducing the amount of overall detergent you use. Smacle's strong point is that by using our detergent, you're watching out for the health of your family as well as helping protect the environment.
Foaming composition for washing or cleansing aid and preparation method
Using an active yeast solution in combination with Gingko biloba for the manufacturing and creating of Smacle
Using carbon activated palladium catalysts methodology for the manufacturing in combination with a flourinated hydrocarbon chlorofluorocarbons formula
Hi-Seoul Brand company, Lightors has received recognition for being a promising and representative small-medium enterprise by the city of Seoul.Only those companies that offer globally competitive innovative technological products are able to receive this special recognition in hopes of expanding Korea's domestic export enterprise.Smacle greatest feature is that it's a foaming detergent that is 100% water soluble. It's a huge advantage as a product, but also vulnerable to moisture and that is a disadvantage. With that said, product transport, packaging, etc. will have to be thought through and may raise the cost of production. By trying to create an eco-friendly product that is also harmless to the human body, replacing the chemical elements and raw materials used for disinfecting clothing has come with its technical difficulties and comes with its financial risks and costs. The stick packaging is also new to detergents and therefore requires the research and creation of new packaging that will not react with the detergent itself. However, our Smacle team has been working diligently over the past year to create stable packaging for transport and moisture exposure using trial and error as well as altering the shape of the crystals used in Smacle to minimize the chance of reducing the effectiveness of Smacle after being transported. In addition, using natural extracts as previously mentioned, in addition to orange, coconut extracts, etc. we ensure and have received certified test report and patents that our products' cleaning effectiveness is same, if not better, than conventional detergents. To address the stick packaging issues, we have equipped our own facilities to be able to create our own packaging, ruling out any issues with outsourcing a crucial part of our product delivery. Our team guarantees that Smacle will be everything it's expected to be and will ensure proper delivery of Smacle to all of our backers.How much can one stick of Smacle handle?- For a standard drum/front loading machine, 1 stick of Smacle can handle a 10kg load. If larger than 10kg, then 2 sticks can be used. If the 10kg machine is not full, then only half of a stick is needed and the rest can be saved for later use. For standard/top loading machines, a 100 liter machine that's full should use 2 sticks, an 80 liter machine will take 1 stick, and lower capacity machines (50 liters) should only take 1/2. If you hand wash your laundry, a 5 liter load will only need 1/4 of a stick and should only soaked for 30 minutes. Smacle works will with any washing mchine. What if I want to use less than 1 stick?- In the case where you have a small load of laundry, simply fold, clamp, tape, the   end of the stick and use it next time. Storage Conditions- Because our product is sensitive to moisture, it is important to keep Smacle's exposure to moisture or humidity minimized. Please keep away from direct sunlight and extreme temepratures and keep indoors. Please keep out of children's reach. Can the package be recycle?- Yes, the packaging is recyclable. It falls under the same category as plastic bags, etc. How much do I save by using Smacle?- A standard load of laundry using a 10kg machine uses anywhere between 40g-80g of detergent. With Smacle you only need about half and in some cases, only a quarter. How much is a spoonful?- A measuring spoon will equal about 20g, which is the same amount as a Smacle stick.Isn't there any residual detergen when using cold water?- There is absolutely no soap residue left even when using cold water, but will take longer to dissolve than when using hot warmer. As long as the amount of water is enough to dissolve Smacle, then it will completely dissolve. Is there any bleach or fabric softener?- Smacle is different from standard alkaline detergents and is mild enough where where a separate fabric softener is not needed. However, if you wish to use a particular scented softener, then that is up to you. We are currently developing a new product to replace the need for bleach. Is there any risk of color bleeding (dye transfer)?- Color bleeding will not occur. As long as the garment label does not contain any   special instruction for washing, then there is nothing to worry about. How do I prevent moisture exposure? What do I do if this happens?- Once the product has been opened and used, attention must be paid to sealing the product again in between uses. If possible, transferring the contents to a sealed container will be helpful. How effective is the foaming feature?- The combination of water and Smacle creates a super effective foaming solution that removes the hidden dirty in your clothing using ultra fine bubble and ultrasound techniques. Also, this removes any detergent residue to protect your skin and reduce pollution. Can Smacle can be placed together with clothing in the machine?- Yes, Smacle can be poured directly into the machine. Smacle will become foam on contact with the water and not adhere to your clothing. Can Smacle be used for hand washing or to clean other products?- Because Smacle is harmless to the human body, hand washing is permissible. It can also be used to wash shoes, appliances, the kitchen, etc. Because our product contains baking soda, it's effective in removing debri, oil stains. After washing, is there a particular scent?- Because Smacle was meant to be harmless to human skin, we left out any additional chemicals that may scent our product. But because our products contain natural ingredients from oranges and other product, there may be be a subtle hint after washing.What if I want to become a distributor?- Please contact lightorstube@gmail.com with any questions.Is your product patented?- Yes, we have registered domestic and international patents. Please contactlightorstube@gmail.com with any questions.

story:
This year, I had a difficult time deciding what to get my boyfriend. He's the type of person who won't let you get him anything extravagant, because he's too busy thinking of everyone else to think about himself.

But I came up with the perfect SURPRISE present: He can't afford a plane ticket to Portland to see his parents for Christmas. He recently transplanted to New York for grad school, and it would be the first Yuletide spent away from his family. After not being able to go home for Thanksgiving either, he's not taking it so well. (His mom cried when he told her.) I already offered to pay for his ticket, and he wouldn't accept. He's too stubborn to let me do that, which is one of many things I love about him.

He's so generous and thoughtful when it comes to others that I want to do something for him, and this is what I came up with: He won't let me buy his ticket, but what if his family, friends, and anyone who wanted to chip in all helped out? What if we ban together to give the most amazing guy in the world the holiday he deserves? That sounds like a Christmas miracle to me.

(For those curious, the cheapest round-trip ticket between New York and Portland for December 23 and December 28 is $700.48. It'll likely get more expensive as Christmas gets closer, but I'm happy to cover the remainder.)

story:
Who We Are:

My name is Sonya Spagnola-Lee. I am the founder and creator of Scratch Fresh Foods Inc. and mother of 3 amazing children! I created Scratch Fresh Foods because I found there was a need for healthy alternatives to snacking and fast foods. Everything we make is made from scratch, using locally sourced ingredients.  I founded this company just over a year ago after taking some business classes with the Toronto Business Development Centre. I quickly found my location and set to work.

After a little while, my advisor came to see me and asked me if I would be interested in renting out some of my space to someone who was also getting started in the food business. Since I had a huge amount of space and only required a very little bit of it, I thought sure, why not.

And so it began! That was the start of The Scratch Kitchen. Since that very first client, I have fallen in love with being able to help others start their dreams.  As more people became interested in my space, I would add more equipment.  I was a single mom who was solely responsible for caring for 3 children, so the idea of going into debt and perhaps failing was a big scare for me. I added to the kitchen as I could afford to, using what little I had in my savings, finding the best deals possible, even if that meant 3 days of cleaning and scrubbing the 40 year old convection oven I purchased used.(yes, I litterally scrubbed that oven for 3 days...but now she looks brand new and works like a beast!)

Things had been going great. In our first 5 months, we helped two businesses grow and launch into their own locations. I had a steady stream of clients and things were great.

In hind sight, I should have stuck to my plan.  Save and buy, save and buy.  In January I made a deal with a new client. I thought it was a good deal(I can always see the positive in everything). I rented space to a cclient at a reduced rate, in return they would put bigger and better equipment into the kitchen for all of my clients to use. This would mean better production, faster production time, better quality etc etc. It seemed easy enough, fair enough.  We had the agreement that should either party become unhappy then we would give the other party 6 month’s notice. I felt would be a fair amount of time to replace the equipment or buy it from them should they leave.

Why Things Are Never As Good As They Seem....

On June 4th I received an email informing me that my client would be ending their contract and withdrawing all of their equipment by the end of the month. There was no negotiating, no conversation, no warnings. No offers to buy equipment. No professionalism. I did my best to try to negotiate with them.There were plenty of lies.

On June 30th, with no notice and a Police escort by their side, I was forced to stand by and watch as they not only ripped apart my dreams and all I had worked so hard for, but the dreams of each one of my clients. How could we continue with no stove, no hood vent? I begged for them to at least leave the hood vent and I would pay for it. I was laughed at. 

Since that day, I have not been able to get them to honour their agreement and fix the damages they caused. The back door alone is damaged in excess of $700.  I have taken on a second full time job in a factory, hoping that the $13.00 an hour I make will somehow add up to enough to replace the equipment. I have lost 3 of my clients because there is nothing for them to work on. And I am in very close danger of just closing down the doors altogether.

In my life, I can honestly say that I have always done what I could to help someone out. I have given away free kitchen time at my expense to help a new business launch. I have always given my time and knowledge free to help others get on their feet. I would never consider even for a second to treat someone so badly, to rip apart everything they have worked so hard for. I guess that’s why I was so blind-sided by this. I have a girlfriend who says I am not “city” enough. I don’t want to believe that I have to be hard and cold. There are good people out there. I have seen them and met them.

Why We Need Your Support Today...

I have never had to ask anyone for help before. It is a difficult thing to do, I’ll admit, much tougher than I thought. I much prefer to be the one helping others.

Today I must give up a little of my pride, be a little embarrassed, and ask for your support. Not just to save my business for me, but to help me save my kitchen for everyone who works there. I have great clients who don’t deserve to lose out in their business because of a mistake I made. Finding commercial kitchen space in Toronto is a very difficult thing to do. Even though I still feel very sad and hurt by the actions of my client, I know there are still good people out there worth helping.

With your support, The Scratch Kitchen needs to raise $15 000. We need to replace the hood vent and fire suppression system that was removed. This is the most important use of our funds. On average, the cost for a hood system runs at $1000 per foot. We need to replace at minimum, an 8 foot hood. We also need to replace our gas range. Used, we have been able to find a good one for $1000. We would need to pick it up and also have it installed, which will also run $1000 as the client had my gas line removed with his equipment and refuses to put it back.  If we had funds left from that, a walk in cooler is next on the list to be replaced. We currently had a commercial 2 door cooler, but have a difficult time sharing a small space with so many people.

We aren’t looking for the best, most expensive equipment. We just need to find equipment that will allow us to survive. That will allow us to use the funds in the best possible way so we can all continue our businesses and grow! 

If we don't get the full amount asked for, then we will use whatever funds we get to first go towards a new hood vent and fire supression system. Without that, we are nothing. 

Other Ways You Can Help...

We appreciate you taking the time to read our story and hearing what we have to say.  We know we are asking for a lot, and we truly appreciate any help you can give us more then you’ll ever know. If you read our story, and can’t help us financially then we completely understand. You can still help us in the following ways:

1. Liking Scratch's official Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/ScratchFreshFoods) and visiting our other social network sites.
2. Sharing the advocacy with your family and friends through word-of-mouth and social networks. 
3. Writing an article or blogging aboutScratch Fresh Foods and its mission of helping local food entrepreneurs.
4. Referring individuals and companies who can sponsor Scratch events and provide support for our micro-enterprises.
5. Visiting Scratch at 561 Marlee Ave Toronto with your friends and families to get a taste of our delicious homemade offerings.

If you want to get further involved, you may send your name, e-mail and number to info@scratchfreshfoods.com!

story:
Earn money for your favorite animal charity by helping us spread the word about Condor for Pets. Click the “link” button above and share your custom link on Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, Stumble Upon, BuzzFeed, blogs, etc. and we will donate $2.00 for every sensor we sell through your referral to the animal charity of your choice. Click here for more information. 

Pay by check or money order (click here for instructions) and receive and additional 10% off of any perk!


PROUD TO BE PART OF UNIVERSITY OF CENTRAL FLORIDA'S BUSINESS INCUBATOR PROGRAM! (https://www.incubator.ucf.edu/)

Each year too many pets suffer from heat related issues at the hands of unsuspecting owners. Now they don't have to!

We love our pets, and they love going places with us! We take them for a quick errand or a trip to the vet, and stop off along the way there and back for this or that. We think it feels nice outside and a few minutes won't matter, but on certain days a few minutes can seriously impair your pet's health and even cause death. 

Don't be sorry! Let Condor for Pets let you know when there's a problem so you can take action before it's too late.

Until now there were no products on the market to help pet owners understand when temperatures inside of cars, kennels, barns and other places were reaching unsafe levels. They usually found out by being paged to the service desk to be greeted by authorities, or worse confronted by angry concerned citizens in the parking lot.

Well now there's a better way! Condor for Pets provides an affordable, easy to use solution that alerts owners when there is a temperature issue, so that action can be taken to avoid serious health complications for their pets. Further a decal can be placed on your car window, so authorities and concerned citizens can see you're pet is being monitored.

    The Total Package

    Condor for Pets provides state of the art technology at an affordable price. Each package includes, 1 sensor and unlimited access to our phone App for IOS or Android (for as many users as you like), as well as our cloud based application for computers and tablets, and a decal for your car. No software, no downloads and very easy to use. 

    Simply place the wire free, wireless sensor wherever your pet is and push the “on” button. It’s that easy! Condor will start immediately taking temperature readings and continue every 5 minutes until you turn it off. You will receive alerts via text/email when temperature has reached an unsafe level, allowing you to take action before your pet is in distress.

    • Small, portable device can be used almost  anywhere.
    • Durable & chew resistant.
    • Wi-Fi & cellular options.
    • Access information from any smart phone,  computer and/or tablet...and YES, we have an App!
    • Free decals for your car windows to let others know your pet is being monitored by Condor Pet so they don't need to worry.

    Not Just for Dogs

    They're part of the family, so who wants to leave them behind when we go on vacation? But, unfortunately, our pets aren't as welcome at all the places we travel to as we might like them to be. We leave them in the RV believing they will be fine, but  an underestimate of how hot its getting inside a vehicle, or a failure of the A/C, can lead to catastrophic consequences.

    And sadly sometimes our pets suffer when they are home in barns and kennels where temperature rises to an unsafe level before we realize it, causing expensive and serious health emergencies that could be avoided.

    Timeline

    Condor for Pets is the next great product in the Condor Temperature Monitoring suite of technology. We pride ourselves on being a USA manufacturer and we plan to keep it that way. Materials are expensive so we need to presell as many units as possible to drive that cost down so that we can offer the most advanced technology at a price everyone can afford. We believe our country is the strongest economically when we provide jobs for everyone, and manufacturing is a great way to do that.

    • August 2014 – September 2014 – Presell as many units as possible to drive down material cost.
    • September 2014 – Pre-Production
    • October 2014 – Production
    • November 2014 – Shipping

    Makes a great gift for any pet lover!

    Proud to be a USA Manufacturer! Your support will help bring jobs back to our country!

We leave them in the RV believing they will be fine, but  an underestimate of how hot its getting inside a vehicle, or a failure of the A/C, can lead to catastrophic consequences.
And sadly sometimes our pets suffer when they are home in barns and kennels where temperature rises to an unsafe level before we realize it, causing expensive and serious health emergencies that could be avoided.
Timeline


Condor for Pets is the next great product in the Condor
Temperature Monitoring suite of technology. We pride ourselves on being a USA
manufacturer and we plan to keep it that way. Materials are expensive so we
need to presell as many units as possible to drive that cost down so that we
can offer the most advanced technology at a price everyone can afford. We
believe our country is the strongest economically when we provide jobs for
everyone, and manufacturing is a great way to do that. 



August 2014 – September 2014 – Presell as many units as possible to drive down material cost.
September 2014 – Pre-Production
October 2014 – Production
November 2014 – Shipping
 Makes a great gift for any pet lover!

Proud to be a USA Manufacturer! Your support will help bring jobs back to our country!

story:
Update: We are looking for distributors and resellers, worldwide. Please contact me at charles@octavelight.com






Octave Light R1

the Highest Precision and the Most Dependable 3D Printer with an affordable price

Every 3D Printer enthusiast knows that top-down style stereolithography is great. The Top-down with Recoater blade method is what have been used in industrial-scale stereolithography machines for more than 20 years. It is proven and trusted.

Yet, nobody knows how to manufacture an accurate top-down 3D Printer with an affordable price. But things are OK now, because the Octave Light R1 DLP Desktop 3D Printer is here to show people how it is done.

This is the pre-sales of the Octave Light R1, the highest precision and the most dependable 3D Printer with an affordable price. The objects printed by the Octave Light R1 are so accurate that you can see the imprint of each individual DLP pixels when inspecting the printed objects under a microscope. The 365 nm versions of the R1 is also the first affordable 3D Printer in the world with a 365 nm LED light source, which used to be only available in industrial scale stereolithography machines.

All orders will be delivered, even if our Indiegogo Flexible Funding goal were not reached. I own the Octave Light company and I own its small factory, so I can personally promise you that your order will be delivered, with high quality. The R1 will help you turn your inspirations into reality.

Since our first public announcement one month ago on 15th February, 2016, we are already featured on two of the most prominent 3D Printing online magazines:



(Please click the two images above to open new windows to the articles. They are both good reads.)

The pre-sales orders received from this Indiegogo campaign will be shipped out of our factory starting 31st May, 2016. Why we can deliver so fast? It is because we already have 11 full-time staffs worked for 10 months on the Octave Light project; all major manufacturing equipments are already installed; and the engineering of the R1 is already in mass production stage.

Hi, I am Charles Lo. It is my personal goal to engineer, manufacture, and deliver the best 3D Printer to every family on this planet. I am so committed to this mission I have already invested my whole saving bank account into the Octave Light project. You can help our mission by spreading the words, or by purchasing one Octave Light R1 in this pre-sales campaign.

By the way, the best way to contact me is emailing to charles@octavelight.com


Why the Octave Light R1 is the highest precision and the most dependable desktop 3D Printer with an affordable price? Please see the reasons below.

Laser Measured Precision


The Octave Light R1 features a Laser Measurement Sensor, that has a resolution of 3 μm. 3 μm is less then the radius of a red blood cell. The red dot you see on the resin in the photo above is the laser. The rectangular and stylish box above the red dot is the Sensor.

This is the exact same Laser Measurement Sensor that is used in silicon wafer manufacturing machines, in the semi-conductor industry right now. When I say the R1 uses industrial grade components, I am being serious.

Why a Laser Measurement Sensor is essential for accuracy? It is because when you put objects inside and under the resin surface, the resin surface rises; and when you take objects out of the resin, the resin surface lowers.

All other affordable Top-down 3D Printers in the market today do not know how to correctly solve their Z axis direction inaccuracy problem, because of the rising and lowering of the resin surface. They are out of control on how tall their printed objects actually are.

The Octave Light R1 is the only affordable Top-down 3D Printer that has Z axis precision! For each layer that we print, we are using the Laser Measurement Sensor to determine the exact location of our resin surface in real time, while we are vertically adjusting our build platform. Therefore, the height of our printed objects are always accurate, and all layers are always equally thin.

All other affordable Top-down 3D Printers in the market today also have the problem of having their projected image out of focus, because of the varying location of the resin surface. So their projected image is blurry. And their printed objects are deformed in the X direction and Y direction.

The Octave Light R1 is the only affordable Top-down 3D Printer that can keep its projected image in shape focus. For each layer that we print, after we have determined the exact location of our resin surface with our Sensor, we move our Optical Engine vertically to make sure that the focal plane always land on the resin surface. When you inspect our printed objects, you will see our focus is so accurate that each individual pixel of our Optical Engine is sharply imprinted on the objects.

Further, our Sensor is able to measure the top surface of transparent resins. That's an astounding achievement, if you ask any laser sensor engineer. So, the Octave Light R1 is compatible with transparent and semi-transparent resins.

Before we go to the next point, let's enjoy this photo of a cathedral, two castable patterns of multi-stone rings, our logo, a sphere, and various other interesting objects. They are all printed simultaneously by the Octave Light R1 at 25 µm per layer. A normal piece of letter paper is 100 µm thick. 25 µm is one quarter the thickness of a piece of paper here.

This 25 μm per layer performance of the Octave Light R1 is matching any industrial-scale Stereolithography machines. We are putting the precision and dependably of true industrial-level machines, right onto your desktop. Think of the implications of that!

These printed objects are still attached to the build plate. We took the whole plate of objects directly out of the R1, rinsed them with isopropyl alcohol, and put them straight in front of a camera for you to see. No supporting rods were added or removed. It was printed just this way.


The next photo is the angel on top of the cathedral. All details are printed perfectly.

Ultraviolet LED runs cool


The light source of the Octave Light R1 is a powerful ultraviolet LED, which has a long lifetime and is energy efficient. The Octave Light R1 only turns on the ultraviolet LED right before each exposure and immediately turns off the ultraviolet LED after each exposure. The ultraviolet LED is off most of the time, when there is no resin exposure to do. This further prolongs the already long lifetime of the ultraviolet LED and the digital micro mirrors. The Octave Light R1 is the first affordable 3D Printer to turn off its ultraviolet LED during the time in between each exposures.

The 365 nm LED version of the Octave Light R1 is the first affordable 3D Printer to offer a 365 nm light source, which was traditionally only used in industrial Stereolithography machines.

Why our 365 nm light source is a groundbreaking feature for the whole affordable market? It is because the majority of useful and advanced resin chemistries only works with a true Ultraviolet light in the 365 nm range. With our 365 nm LED, you are opened to a wide wide ranged of existing, proven, and advanced stereolithography material selections!

If you have any medical, dental, or orthodontic certified resins that can only be printed with the 365 nm wavelength area (hint: DSM Somos BioClear is ISO 10993-5, ISO 10993-10, and USP VI certified.), then the Octave Light R1 365nm is for you. The Octave Light R1 365nm is especially attractive to orthodontist who want to bring their previously out-sourced 3D Printing in-house, onto their own desktop.

If you have any existing and traditional industrial grade stereolithography resins (hint: all of those DSM Somos resins engineered for 355nm Solid State Lasers), that have specific mechanical properties or transparency properties you want, and those existing resins are only sensitive to the 365 nm wavelength area, then Octave Light R1 365nm can get the job done.

Before we go to the next point, let's enjoy this Octave Light R1 print out at 1:1 scale of an orthodontic 3D scan. We are again printing at the finest setting of 25 µm layer thickness. The orthodontic model in the two photos below is still attached to the build plate. As always, we took it straight out of the R1, rinsed it with isopropyl alcohol, and put it directly in front of a camera for you to see.

Doctors can use the Octave Light R1 to print out models of internal organs and structures from the 3D data of medical scanners. These 3D printed highly detailed and accurate physical models are particularly valuable for surgical planning.

To push the boundary of technology further, doctors and dentists can digitally model surgical guides by referencing 3D scanned data, and then print out the surgical guides with medically certified resins. This will help the whole world perform surgeries in a even more precise and efficient way. Imagine, the day when every hospital in this world can easily effort their own high precision 3D Printer. Today is the day with the Octave Light R1.

Orthodontists can use the Octave Light R1 to put their intraoral scanners to good use, by printing out orthodontic models directly on their own desktop, in their own office.

Medial devices can be quickly tailor made, by trained medical professionals, with the Octave Light R1. The latest scientific discoveries and the newest technologies can be easily transformed into functional prototypes, with the Octave Light R1.

This print out of a jaw of teeth excites not only orthodontist, dentist, and doctors. If you are a 3D artist, you can see how the Octave Light R1 correctly prints out the organic texture of the teeth and the gum. If you can digitally 3D sculpt the texture, we can print it out.



Custom Ultraviolet Optics with
Direct Light Path


The Octave Light R1 is the only DLP 3D Printer in the affordable market today, that offers both a UV LED light source and a more than two millions pixels industrial-stereolithography-grade optical engine.

The majority of affordable DLP 3D Printers today (e.g., the previous-market-leader B9 Creator) contain a consumer-grade entertainment-level projector and use a projector light bulb as their light source. Those projector light bulbs have short lifetime, are energy inefficient, produce a lot of heat, and are needed to be replaced frequently. Those cheap projectors they use were designed and intended for movies playing and office presentation. Those projectors were engineered to project a visual (non-ultraviolet) colorful image a few meters away on a white wall. Those projectors are simply inaccurate when being modified into a DLP 3D Printer, resulting in their distorted images and their distorted prints.

Some newer entries (for examples, Ember, MoonRay, M-Jewelry) into the affordable DLP 3D Printers market tell you that they use an UV LED Light Engine. What they did not tell you is that, their 405 nm light engine contains a low end digital-micro-mirror array. Their digital-micro-mirror array has only 912 X 1140 pixels. (That's about 1 million pixels) And those pixels are in diamond shape for cost saving reasons. Diamond shaped pixels can cause inaccuracy and blurry images.

The optical engine of the Octave Light R1 is custom made from the ground up for the purpose of industrial grade stereolithography. It contains 1920 X 1080 (more than 2 millions) square pixels to precisely control the light pattern on the surface of the liquid resin. Its optical components are specifically engineered to precisely transmit ultraviolet light. Each Octave Light R1 is calibrated with 9 digital microscopes simultaneously, to ensure its optical and mechanical precision, before shipping out of our factory.

The largest pixel count digital-micro-mirror array available on the market with an affordable price today, is a 1920 X 1080 array. With the Octave Light R1 you are already getting the highest number of pixel counts, in the affordable market segment. The digital micro mirror array in the R1 is so advanced that it is only available on the market since the Q4 of 2015. We are at the edge of technology here.

All other affordable DLP 3D Printers that uses UV LED light source destroyed the accuracy of their own optics by putting mirrors and plastic windows in the optical path of the UV light. Their design is compromising the accuracy of their optical engine, for packaging reasons and for cost saving reasons.

The Octave Light R1 rejects all compromises. There are no mirrors, no glass or plastic windows, no vat (resin tray) bottom, nothing is blocking the optical path of our optical engine. The precision lens of the optical engine of the R1 throw its UV light directly onto the top surface of resin. This is another reason why our optics are of the highest precision in the whole desktop 3D Printer market.

As always, we go one step further. The Optical Engine of the Octave Light R1 has an internal light intensity sensor to detect the brightness of the LED light source. This enables the accurate adjustment of the Ultraviolet light intensity, to ensure that the resin layers cure depth is consistent.

Before we go to the next point, let's inspect two printed objects with microscope. The photo directly below is the top of the 12 mm diameter sphere in the cathedral print. Do you see the pixels on it? Each pixel is an exact 50 µm X 50 µm square, which is just enough area to tightly fit in four human macrophages.


The Octave Light R1 is so accurate with our laser measured top-down printing method and our industrial-stereolithography grade optics, that you can use a microscope to look at our printed parts and see the imprints of each of the 2 millions 50 μm X 50 μm pixels.

The microscopic photo below is the gum between the lower two centre front teeth of the orthodontic print. Again, you can see the square pixels. Because our Optical Engine is sharply focused for each printed layer, each pixel is sharply and precisely imprinted onto the model. We do not blur things out; we are always sharply focused. All details, even down to a pixel, are preserved with our Top-down-with-Recoater-blade printing method. When we say the Octave Light R1 is of the highest precision, we have the results to fully back it up. This is not science fiction; this is the Octave Light R1.


 

Top-down Printing with Recoater Blade


The Top-down Printing with Recoater Blade method of the Octave Light R1, is how stereolithography is done on the industrial level, since more than 20 years ago. It is proven, reliable, and widely trusted. All other popular affordable DLP / SLA 3D Printers in the market today uses the bottom-up printing method.

Ever wonder why a bottom-up 3D Printer fails to print frequently? Printing every layer in a bottom-up 3D printer is a Tug-of-war between their build plate and their resin tray bottom. And this Tug-of-war is not two teams pulling a rope, it is their bottom-up 3D printer pulling apart the objects it is trying to print. Will the printed object breaks away from the resin tray bottom and remains attached to build plate? Or will the printed object breaks in half and falls off from the build plate? If the printed object survives the printing of this layer, will it survives the printing of the next layer and the next? Each layer is a gamble with a bottom-up 3D printer. And one print job composes of thousands of layers. This is an exponential accumulation of the risk of failure. When they are taking thousands of gamble in each of their print job, it is easy for them to loss in their gambling.

Occasionally, when a printed object survives the act of bottom-up 3D Printing, most of the fine details on that printed object may already be gone.

The Bottom-up way of 3D Printing also requires a larger amount of thick support rods, to hopefully hold the printed object tightly onto their build plate. The many and thick support structures required by the Bottom-up method, means long manual clean up time and rough printed objects. It also means that the Bottom-up way of 3D Printing is wasting your valuable resins to print many and thick supporting rods.

The Octave Light R1, with our Top-down with Recoater blade method, solidifies the currently printing layer of resin between air and the previously printed portion of the object, then proceed to Recoat the next layer of liquid resin on top of the just solidified layer. There are no peeling actions and no forceful actions with the Octave Light R1. It just works.

Our Top-down with Recoater blade method does not require many support structures. With our method the supporting rods can be thin and the connecting points can be invisibly tiny. This means we save you manual clean up time on the the printed objects and we preserve the surface of your printed objects. This also means you can effectively utilize your valuable resins to print the objects you actually want to print.

The Top-down printing with Recoater blade process is industrially proven to be the most reliable. That's why the Octave Light R1 is the most dependable 3D Printer with an affordable price.

All other affordable Top-down 3D printers in the market today do not have a Recoater blade. So, their printer cannot keep each printed layer flat, unless they wait forever for each layer of resin to eventually flows flat by itself. With the thickness and flatness of their layers being uncontrollable, those without-Recoater-blade Top-down 3D printers are jokes.

The Octave Light R1 has a Recoater blade to keep each layer precisely flat and keep the print time fast. This is how it is correctly done, and we are doing it with an affordable price.

Before we go to the next point, let's be amazed by the two photos below, from the first print featured in our Indiegogo campaign video. (Our Indiegogo campaign video will be uploaded and posted soon.) You can see a superbly spherical 12 mm diameter sphere supported by only one long 1 mm diameter thin rod. Any experienced 3D printer user would think he/she is seeing a miracle here.

Again, this is printed by the Octave Light R1 at 25 µm per layer. We took it straight out of the R1 along with the build plate attached, rinsed it with isopropyl alcohol, and put it directly in front of a microscope for you to see. This is exactly how it was printed, by the R1.

I hereby challenge any bottom-up 3D printers to print this. This may be an impossible miracle for any other affordable 3D printers, but this is business as usual for the Octave Light R1.



Adapts to Various Resin Levels


Unlike the majority of top down stereolithography machines that require you to fill the resin tank full to function, the Octave Light R1 can print normally with any amount of resin you have in the tank between the min mark and the max mark. The photo above on the left is the Octave Light R1 printing at the minimum resin level, and on the right is the R1 printing at the maximum resin level. The printhead of the Octave Light R1, is always hovering right above the resin surface during a print, no matter the resin surface is at a high or a low position. This is a feature we cannot find even in high-end industrial-scale Stereolithography machines. The Octave Light R1 is full of innovative and useful functions.

The more resin you have in the tank, the taller the objects you can print; the less resin you have in the tank, the lower is your resin level, and the shorter in height the objects you can print. This means you can save on resins with the Octave Light R1, because you only need to keep the resin level just high enough to print the objects you want to print.

Before we go to the next point, let's see the final design of the mass production version of the Octave Light R1. The taller design is the 405nm version of the R1. The shorter-in-height design is the 365nm version of the R1. We are only displaying four design drawings of the 405nm version on this page. To view the design of the 365nm version, and to view the rest of the drawings, please check our Indiegogo campaign image gallery.

There is a Protective Light Shield around the Octave Light R1. So, don't worry. The Shield is made with the same ultraviolet light shielding transparent plastic as our orange color resin tank. There is a sensor to detect whether the Shield is opened or closed. And the Octave Light R1 will perform an emergency stop, if the Shield is accidentally opened. The design of the Shield is beyond being functional. The R1 still looks stylish and futuristic with the Shield installed, because the Protective Light Shield is always part of the design from the beginning.

In between prints, you can leave the remaining resin in the tank of the Octave Light R1. You can store unused resin inside the R1, just like what you would do with any industrial-scale stereolithography machines.

The resin tank is easily removable and replaceable. We sell spare resin tanks. So you can use an extra resin tank to conveniently and quickly switch between different kind of resins.






No Consumables, No troubles


Rejoice, for the Octave Light R1 has no consumable parts or coatings to be replaced! (And it is a joy to see the finished print emerging out of resin too.)

Gone are the days of manually scraping and reapplying the silicone PDMS coating on the B9Creator and the Form 2. Gone are the days of replacing thin and stretchy PET films. Gone are the days of spending money, time, and energy on replacing consumables.

All other bottom-up 3D Printers in the market today has consumable parts that needed to be replaced, frequently. The B9 Creator, the Form 2, and the Ember, etc, all have a week and soft silicone PDMS coating that needed to be reapplied after printing around 1 kg of resin. It is troublesome to manually remove the old silicone coating, manually level the resin tray, and then manually apply a new layer of silicone in a dust free environment. (Or does the Formlabs company expect you to buy a brand new resin tank every time the silicone coating gets sticky or cloudy? That's a big hidden cost for their Form 2 3D Printer.) If you are printing some long and vertical rods repeatedly in the same resin tray location, you will wear out the silicone coating on their bottom-up 3D Printer so fast that it won't last more than three prints.

Other bottom-up 3D Printers that do not have a silicone coating have stretchy and thin Teflon based PET films that gets deformed, destroyed, or punctured by their printing action and needed to be replaced often. When those 3D Printer companies describe their flexing PET film as "permanent", I think they actually mean "a few months".

The Octave Light R1 has no consumable parts to be replaced. We save your money and, most importantly, we save you valuable time. With the Octave Light R1, you can just print, print, and print, without interruption.

Before we go to the next point, let's enjoy three photos of the beautiful prototype #4 of the Octave Light R1. The outer ultraviolet light shield and some appearance metal panels are not installed on the prototype #4. The four integrated handles, some round corners, and a few details were not machined into the prototype #4. Otherwise, the prototype #4 is nearly mass production ready. It was already manufactured with our mass production equipments. It was made with the same kind of large scale CNC milling machines that's used for manufacturing the Macbook Pro. By the way, the Octave Light company have purchased the CNC mill in November 2015 for the sole purpose of manufacturing Octave Light 3D Printers.

At this moment when I am writing this, we are assembling the prototype #5 and the prototype #6 simultaneously, to help us adjust our own manufacturing processes. We are already one foot stepped into mass production.

The 365 nm Optical Engine of the prototype #7 is already completely built and fully tested. We are also machining the mechanical parts of the prototype #7 at this moment.

I promise you the mass production version of the R1 is at least three times more stunning then the already aesthetically pleasing prototype #4. Put the Octave Light R1 in an art gallery and it fits just right in.




Industrial-grade and Easy to Use


Besides the advanced technologies already mentioned above, the Octave Light R1 contains these industrial-grade components:
  • Two 16 mm specification thick ball-bearing screws to precisely and smoothly drive the Printhead Z axis and the Build platform W axis;
  • Three Nema 23 big stepper motors, to efficiently produce high torque with low electric current; and
  • Three pairs of matched, preloaded, and P5 rated, Angular Contact Bearings, to accurately support the Recoater C axis, the Printhead Z axis, and the Build platform W axis.
We use 6061 T651 aluminum and stainless steels to CNC machine the chassis of the Octave Light R1. Even the T651 heat treatment on our aluminum is aircraft grade.

Most importantly, all of these technical achievements and industrial-grade components are integrated perfectly into the easy to use Octave Light R1. All you need to do is load your 3D Model into a computer and press the print button. We are here to put the the full power of industrial grade Stereolithography right into you hand today, in a stylish and simple-to-use desktop machine.

Right before we go to the final point, let me introduce you to some of our core team members. In the photo below, from left to right, is
  • Gu, our Electrical Engineer;
  • me;
  • Lisa, our Purchaser;
  • Zhao, our Mechanical Engineer; and
  • Bo, our Manufacturing Manager.
Our Software Engineer, Sujan, and our five machinists are too busy to make it into this photo.


Specification, Pricing, and Delivery

Please click here to download the pdf file regarding the specification, pricing, and delivery time of the four versions of the Octave Light R1.


Why do we sell our ultra advanced and futuristic 3D Printer so cheap? Obviously, a company does not survive without profit. But the Octave Light company is not motivated by profit; we are motivated by our mission of making this world a better place for everyone. We are here to bring highly advanced technology to every family on this planet at the lowest price we can manage. And we need your help to accomplish that.

Please share our news on Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media. If you are a journalist or a blogger, please write about us. Please talk about the Octave Light R1 with your friends and family members.

The short link to our Indiegogo campaign is https://igg.me/at/R1

We regularly upload new videos onto our Vimeo channel. Please check on our Vimeo channel often and share our videos often.
https://vimeo.com/OctaveLight

You can help by spreading the words on the Octave Light R1, or you can help by purchasing one of the four versions of the R1 from this Indiegogo Pre-sales. Either way, we are thankful.

All of the researches, components selections, and engineerings are already done and finished with the Octave Light R1. We are already at the stage of manufacturing. I myself have 7 years of experiences being the Manufacturing Manager and Operation Manager of two world-class factories for two different USA companies. That means I know how to correctly do mass production. You are well taken care of.

This is the pre-sales of the Octave Light R1. We need a large volume of orders to be economical with our low price. We are using Indiegogo Flexible Funding. Whether our funding goal is reached or not, all orders is going to be quickly shipped. Everyone who have the excellent taste of purchasing an Octave Light R1 through our Indiegogo campaign, is going to have their R1 delivered to their door, in high quality.

The discounted pre-sales price last only until 23rd April, 2016. After this pre-sales, if you buy the R1 on our website, the price will be the normal retail price. We are giving out this big discount because this is a pre-sales. So, please take advantage of this opportunity here.

If you are jewelry designer, the Octave Light R1 405nm Fine is for you. You can print out castable pattens of your beautiful jewelries right on your own desktop. Any reasonably priced castable resins designed for DLP 3D Printer is going to work. With the R1, your jewelries are going to have the finest and most beautiful details, which other bottom-up 3D Printers cannot achieve.

The Fine versions of the R1 are perfect for investment casting of precious metals. Besides making jewelries, you can also make precision medical or dental devices with this method.

If you are a 3D artist, then the Octave Light R1 405nm Big is for you. With the R1's comfortably big build volume, you can do limited productions of 1:6 scale figures right in your home. And if your imaginations are running wild, then larger scale figures like 1:4 can be accomplished with certain tricks. The R1 can correctly represent any textures you can digitally sculpt. The R1 preserves the surface of your model and saves your time doing post-processing, because the contact place between the support rods and the printed objects are tiny dots. It is time to turn your digital arts into real physical collectables.

Engineers and Industrial Designers can use the Octave Light R1 to print their CAD drawings into accurate and functional prototypes. If you need to use existing industrial grade stereolithography resins to simulate the physical properties of certain types of plastics (e.g. PE, PP, ABS) or to print highly visually transparent models, then the 365nm versions is for you. If you want the cost saving of using cheap DLP 3D Printer resins, while still having the power of a true industrial-level Stereolithography machine, then the 405nm versions are for you. The Fine versions of the R1 with their 50 um X 50 um pixel pitch is perfect for printing smooth running small gears and mechanisms. If you don't print small and fast-spining gears often, then the Big version is for you.

You can even do digital manufacturing with the Octave Light R1 right in your home.

If you are an orthodontist, then it is time to bring your previously out-sourced 3D Printing in-house, with the Big versions of the Octave Light R1. Please determine which resins you are going to use first, before selecting between the 365nm versions or the 405nm versions. The ISO 10993-5, ISO 10993-10, and USP VI certified DSM Somos BioClear is compatible with the 365nm versions of the R1. Dreve Dentamid is selling dental/orthodontic resins that are engineered to be printed with 405 nm LED DLP system. But I know that Dreve also have stereolithography resins that can be printed with the 365nm versions of the R1.

The resin from a famously expensive German 3D Printer company, which I will not name here, are actually compatible with the 405nm versions of the R1. The price of the R1 is at least 1/5 the price of a 3D Printer from that German 3D Printer company.

If you are a doctor, a dentist, an orthodontist, or other medical professionals, the Octave Light R1 is here to help you provide medical services quicker and at a lower cost. Obviously, I am an industrialist; I am not a doctor, not a dentist, not an orthodontist, and not any other medical professionals. So, please do your own researches and make your decision yourself. You are welcome to contact me by emailing to charles@octavelight.com to discuss more on the potential usages of the Octave Light R1.
